date_attribute.weather: In Shanghai, the winter day is clear and slightly cold, with sunshine.
date_attribute.holiday: New Year's Day

2025-01.daily_overview: On the first day of the New Year holiday, Lei Mingxuan spent his time in a warm and harmonious family atmosphere. From the sumptuous family feast meticulously prepared by his mother to the relaxed family entertainment after the meal, the day was filled with the warmth of reunion and beautiful expectations for the new year.

events.name: New Year's Day Family Banquet
events.description: In the morning, Mother Wang Xiuying was already busy in the kitchen, meticulously preparing her son Lei Mingxuan's favorite dishes for the New Year's Day family gathering: classic Shanghai-style braised pork, pan-fried buns, steamed perch, stir-fried shrimp, and several seasonal vegetable dishes. The kitchen was filled with the enticing aroma of the food.

events.name: Family Gathering and New Year's Outlook
events.description: At noon, Lei Mingxuan sat around the table with his parents, Lei Jianguo and Wang Xiuying, enjoying a sumptuous New Year's family feast. Father Lei Jianguo reflected on the hard work and growth of his son's shop over the past year, while mother Wang Xiuying was more concerned about her son's health and daily life details. Lei Mingxuan shared the shop's annual performance and his ideas for expanding online in the new year. The family chatted while dining in a warm and harmonious atmosphere, looking forward to 2025 together.

events.name: Home Entertainment and Relaxation
events.description: After the family dinner, everyone gathered in the living room to watch the New Year's Eve gala, continuing their casual conversation. Lei Mingxuan also fully relaxed, showing his parents the trendy toy collections and interesting anime screenshots saved on his phone. Although his parents didn't quite understand, they were infected by their son's enthusiasm, and the living room was filled with continuous laughter.

events.name: Organizing and Personal Time
events.description: After the family gathering, Lei Mingxuan took the initiative to help his mother clear the table and wash the dishes, demonstrating his thoughtfulness toward her. He then returned to his room, turned on the computer to check the store surveillance, and after confirming everything was in order, lay down on his bed to browse his phone for a while. He looked through New Year greetings and industry updates on social media, adjusting his mindset for returning to work the next day.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home in Shanghai Pudong
起始状态.心情: Relaxation, Anticipation

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home in Shanghai Pudong
结束状态.心情: Satisfying, warm

2025-01.daily_overview: On the first workday after the New Year's Day holiday, Lei Mingxuan quickly switched gears and immersed himself in the annual financial organization of his shop. Meanwhile, his personal plans for the new year also began to take shape. He started reading historical novels and preliminarily set health goals. In the evening, he went to bed slightly later due to the excitement of setting these goals.

events.name: Prepare annual accounts
events.description: Lei Mingxuan sat in his home study, turned on the computer, and opened the folder containing receipts. He began systematically organizing the electronic accounts, bank statements, purchase invoices, and various expense vouchers for the clothing store for the year 2024. While cross-checking the data, he reflected on the revenue growth brought by the business recovery in the second half of the year, preparing for the upcoming tax filing.

events.name: Start Your New Year Reading Plan
events.description: Before going to bed at night, Lei Mingxuan leaned against the headboard and took out the newly purchased first volume of "The Ming Dynasty: Those Stories" to start reading. Beginning with Zhu Yuanzhang's impoverished origins, he was quickly captivated by the book's humorous and vivid narrative style as well as the complex fates of its characters. He decided to use the fragmented time before sleep each night and during the midday hours while minding the shop to follow through with this book series, treating it as a way to recharge his knowledge for the new year.

events.name: Set New Year's Health Goals
events.description: Considering his slightly overweight condition (BMI 27.04) and the life goal of "developing a regular fitness habit within five years," Lei Mingxuan wrote down his specific targets for the first quarter of 2025 in his phone memo: to keep his weight under 79 kilograms and reduce his body fat percentage. He initially planned to engage in aerobic exercise (such as running or playing ball games) at least twice a week, and began consciously tracking his diet while cutting back on unnecessary late-night snacks.

events.name: Contact childhood friend to discuss fitness.
events.description: Excited about setting a health goal, Lei Mingxuan contacted his childhood friend Zhang Wei via WeChat, sharing his weight loss plan and asking for fitness advice. Zhang Wei recommended some local gyms, and the two agreed to check them out together over the weekend. Lei Mingxuan felt highly motivated.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home in Shanghai's Pudong
起始状态.心情: Clear-headed and ready to get to work.

结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled and looking forward to the new plan.

2025-01.daily_overview: Today's work revolved around "reviewing the past and planning for the future." Lei Mingxuan not only consulted on tax matters but also conducted an in-depth annual business review and market analysis after the store closed, laying a solid foundation for tomorrow's annual strategy meeting. Due to work pressure, he felt slightly irritable.

events.name: Consultation on Annual Tax Matters
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan connected with financial manager Xu Feng via WeChat video call. He showed Xu Feng the preliminary annual accounting data he had organized and inquired about the specific operational procedures for the final settlement of business income, the possible tax rates, and an estimate of the additional tax amount that might need to be paid. Xu Feng provided professional advice and reminded him to prepare the relevant materials.

events.name: Prepare annual review materials
events.description: After closing the shop for the night, Lei Mingxuan did not go home immediately. He stayed alone in the store, categorizing the sales records for the entire year of 2024 by quarter and product type, organizing financial statements and inventory reports, and compiling and printing out customer feedback that he had recorded in his phone. These materials will serve as the core basis for tomorrow's personal annual review meeting.

events.name: Analyze market trends
events.description: After organizing the internal data, Lei Mingxuan turned on his computer and browsed several industry public accounts he regularly follows, social media posts from fashion influencers, and trend reports from mainstream e-commerce platforms. He focused on analyzing which styles sold well in 2024, which elements were becoming popular, what new moves the main competitors had made, and whether the live-streaming e-commerce model was suitable for his store. He recorded the key insights in his digital notes, forming a preliminary judgment of the market for 2025.

events.name: Emotional fluctuations due to work pressure
events.description: During the review process, Lei Mingxuan felt anxious and slightly irritable about the store's online transformation. He adjusted his emotions through deep breathing and decided to seek advice from friends tomorrow to alleviate the pressure.

起始状态.心情: Focused, with a slight sense of work pressure.

结束状态.所处地点: Shop A-208, inside a shopping mall on Century Avenue, Pudong New Area
结束状态.心情: Deep in thought, prepared for tomorrow's meeting but slightly fatigued.

2025-01.daily_overview: On Sunday, Lei Mingxuan shifted his focus to personal health management. He not only resumed his regular exercise routine but also set more specific monthly goals based on measurement results. Additionally, he began utilizing technological tools to assist in implementation, marking the official launch of his health improvement plan.

events.name: Community Gym Resumes Exercise Sessions
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan changed into his sportswear and walked to the community gym near his home. It was his first workout session after the New Year's Day holiday. He started with a 20-minute slow jog on the treadmill for a warm-up, feeling that his cardiovascular function had declined somewhat, but his body gradually became more active.

events.name: Reflections on Physical Fitness Tests and Health
events.description: After completing his workout, Lei Mingxuan used the body fat scale at the gym for a measurement. The results showed a weight of 80.2 kilograms, with his body fat percentage still in the high range. This data gave him a clear view of the challenges ahead in achieving his health goals and strengthened his resolve to turn "regular exercise" from an idea into concrete action.

events.name: Develop the fitness and diet plan for this month.
events.description: Based on the measurement results, Lei Mingxuan refined his goals for January in his phone memo: complete at least two gym sessions per week (one cardio plus strength training, and one pure cardio), and reduce his weight to below 79 kilograms. At the same time, he began consciously recording his three daily meals and controlling his intake of carbohydrates and fats during dinner.

events.name: Download the diet tracking app
events.description: To track his diet more scientifically, Lei Mingxuan searched for and downloaded a well-reviewed diet recording app from the mobile app store. He spent some time on the initial setup, entering his height, weight, and weight loss goals, after which the app automatically generated his recommended daily calorie intake.

events.name: Start the first day's dietary record
events.description: During dinner at home in the evening, Lei Mingxuan deliberately asked his mother to serve him less rice. After the meal, he opened the newly downloaded app and entered the contents of his three meals for the day—baozi and soy milk for breakfast, takeout from a restaurant for lunch, and home-cooked dishes including braised pork for dinner—estimating the approximate portions. Looking at the calorie analysis provided by the app, he gained a clearer understanding of "what he had eaten."

起始状态.所处地点: At home in Shanghai's Pudong district
起始状态.心情: Relaxed, planning to start a healthy lifestyle

结束状态.所处地点: At home in Shanghai's Pudong district
结束状态.心情: Action-oriented and confident in health plans

2025-01.daily_overview: On another day off, Lei Mingxuan focused on the financial planning and strategy formulation for his store. After completing tax payments, he carefully adjusted the cash flow budget and held an important personal annual meeting, establishing a clear development direction for the store in the new year. In the evening, his weight slightly increased due to a small gathering.

events.name: Adjust the quarterly cash flow budget
events.description: In the morning, with the remote assistance of financial manager Xu Feng, Lei Mingxuan paid the additional tax required for the 2024 annual business income settlement via online banking. After completing the payment, he immediately opened the financial software in his store office and recalculated the cash flow for the first quarter of 2025, taking into account this expense and the upcoming deposit for the spring order to be paid to supplier Zhou Tao. He confirmed the procurement plan only after ensuring sufficient operating funds and emergency reserves were set aside, demonstrating a significantly enhanced awareness of financial planning.

events.name: Develop the next day's training plan
events.description: During the lunch break, Lei Mingxuan opened the health app on his phone to review his exercise records from the previous day. To implement his twice-weekly fitness plan, he carefully outlined the specific training routine for Monday, January 6: 30 minutes of treadmill cardio (target heart rate zone), along with a combination of core and upper body strength training, and set a reminder on his phone.

events.name: Store Annual Review and Strategic Planning Meeting
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan held a "personal board meeting" inside his shop. He systematically reviewed the 2024 operational data, market analysis notes, and customer feedback, conducting an in-depth analysis of the strengths (such as high customer loyalty among regulars), weaknesses (insufficient online exposure), and market opportunities (the rise of China-chic trends and personalized customization). After several hours of contemplation and deliberation, he ultimately formulated a detailed business plan for 2025: the core focus is to explore opening an online branch, strengthen WeChat community marketing, and optimize the product line by adding trendy IP collaborations. For these three directions, he set clear quarterly Key Performance Indicators (KPIs), feeling that his work objectives had never been more clearly defined.

events.name: Staying up late for a small gathering with friends
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan met up with his childhood friend Zhang Wei for a late-night snack, trying out a newly opened barbecue restaurant. They chatted until quite late, which resulted in a slight weight gain due to the meal and a delayed bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Stay calm and prepare to handle important financial matters.

结束状态.所处地点: Study at home in Shanghai's Pudong district
结束状态.心情: Full of strategic vision and drive, yet slightly fatigued.

2025-01.daily_overview: At the start of the new workweek, Lei Mingxuan efficiently handled practical matters such as tax filing and supplier communication while strictly adhering to his fitness plan. In the evening, he also exchanged ideas about online operations with professionals, making it a day that balanced both action and planning.

events.name: Complete the annual tax filing.
events.description: In the morning, under the remote guidance of financial manager Xu Feng once again, Lei Mingxuan logged into the Individual Income Tax APP. Following the prepared data, he step by step filled out and submitted the 2024 Annual Business Income Settlement and Payment Declaration Form. The system-calculated tax supplement amount was close to the estimated figure, and he calmly confirmed and completed the payment, thus concluding an important annual task.

events.name: Confirm Spring Procurement Payment
events.description: After completing the tax filing, Lei Mingxuan proactively contacted Zhou Tao, a supplier in Hangzhou, via WeChat based on the adjusted cash flow budget from the previous day. Both parties communicated and ultimately confirmed the details of the procurement order for the next batch of spring goods, including the payment schedule (deposit payment) and method, ensuring that the financial arrangements were closely aligned with the production plan.

events.name: Implement the Gym Training Plan
events.description: After work in the evening, Lei Mingxuan went directly from the shop to the community gym. He first completed his planned 30-minute aerobic run on the treadmill, adjusting the incline and speed to reach his fat-burning heart rate, feeling refreshed after sweating. Following that, he used the equipment for strength training targeting his abdomen, chest, and back. Although his muscles felt somewhat sore, he completed the planned sets.

events.name: Record Training Experiences and Plan for Advancement
events.description: During post-training stretching, Lei Mingxuan felt a long-lost sense of fulfillment. He meticulously recorded the training items, duration, and subjective feedback ("cardiovascular fitness improved, upper body strength needs enhancement") in his health app. On his way home, he was already contemplating whether to increase the weight slightly or introduce new exercises like dumbbell rows for the following week.

events.name: Consultation on Online Operation Plan
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan held an online video call via WeChat with Wang Lei, a university classmate who works as a product manager at an e-commerce company in Hangzhou. He shared the preliminary plan for online branch expansion and community marketing, drafted during the annual meeting, with Wang Lei to seek professional feedback. Wang Lei provided practical suggestions on platform selection, user profiling, and traffic acquisition strategies, and recommended several operational tools suitable for small shop owners. This exchange gave Lei Mingxuan a more concrete understanding of the technical pathways for digital transformation.

起始状态.心情: Pragmatic and methodical

结束状态.心情: Fulfilled, slightly weary yet content.

2025-01.daily_overview: On Tuesday's workday, Lei Mingxuan was primarily occupied with external communications. He arranged a game with friends for the following evening's leisure activity while translating the annual strategy into specific procurement requirements. He also initiated preliminary discussions with suppliers from two regions regarding spring new products and attempted a brisk walk in the morning to maintain energy.

events.name: Morning brisk walking maintains vitality.
events.description: After getting up in the morning, Lei Mingxuan took a 15-minute brisk walk near his home to awaken his body, maintain daily activity levels, and enjoy the fresh morning air.

events.name: Challenge to a Billiards Match
events.description: During the lunch break, Lei Mingxuan mentioned Han Dong and Qin Lang in the WeChat group "Pudong Billiards Squad" to ask if they were available for a game tomorrow evening. They responded quickly, and the three agreed to meet at their usual billiards hall at 8 p.m. the next day for a few rounds of American eight-ball.

events.name: Communicate Spring New Product Development Intentions
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan contacted Hangzhou supplier Zhou Tao and Guangzhou supplier Wu Fang (Fang Jie) via phone calls and WeChat. He no longer simply placed orders; instead, he translated the product line optimization directions identified in the annual review—"increasing national trend elements" and "introducing more designer collaboration accessories"—into specific procurement requirements. He communicated these with the suppliers, inquired whether they had relevant resources or recommendations, and officially initiated the development process for the 2025 spring collection.

events.name: Reading and Industry Research
events.description: During a lull in customer flow while minding the shop in the evening, Lei Mingxuan took out "The Ming Dynasty: Those Events" and continued reading about Zhu Yuanzhang's journey of establishing the Ming Dynasty. Meanwhile, he also browsed some articles on his computer about "Case Studies of Online Transformation for Small and Micro Physical Stores," accumulating knowledge for future changes.

起始状态.心情: Smooth, communication status

结束状态.心情: Relax and look forward to tomorrow's event.

2025-01.daily_overview: A vibrant social scene on a weekday evening. Lei Mingxuan engaged in an exhilarating match of billiards with his friends, discussing tactics and techniques. After the game, they enjoyed a barbecue supper while chatting about life. Meanwhile, he also attentively noticed network issues at his parents' home and decided to resolve them personally. Due to the late-night snack, his weight increased slightly.

events.name: Billiards Matches and Tactical Exchanges
events.description: After work, Lei Mingxuan went straight to the pool hall. After meeting up with Han Dong and Qin Lang, the three began several rounds of American eight-ball matches. Lei Mingxuan was in excellent form tonight, with sharp thinking. He not only made several impressive long shots in succession but also employed clever defensive plays during stalemates to trouble his opponents, earning praise from his fellow players. After the matches, they gathered around the table, replaying highlights on their phones and engaging in lively discussions about position control, break-out strategies, and psychological tactics. The atmosphere of exchange was highly enthusiastic.

events.name: Golf Buddies Barbecue Late-Night Snack
events.description: After a satisfying tactical discussion, the three of them grew hungry and moved to a familiar barbecue stall near the billiards hall. They ordered skewers, beer, and fried noodles, and the conversation shifted from billiards to their recent work updates, the latest anime releases, and Han Dong’s newly changed car. Qin Lang shared some interesting anecdotes from Hangzhou’s internet industry, while Lei Mingxuan complained about the mall’s recent new regulations, with laughter and cheerful chatter continuing throughout.

events.name: Discovering network issues at home
events.description: After returning home in the evening, while eating fruit with his parents, Lei Jianguo casually mentioned that his mobile phone sometimes lagged when browsing news in the bedroom, and Wang Xiuying also noted that her tablet occasionally buffered while streaming dramas in the living room. Lei Mingxuan immediately picked up his phone to test the Wi-Fi signal in several rooms and found that the signal strength in his parents' bedroom and the corner of the living room was indeed weak. He decided on the spot to help his parents upgrade their network equipment over the weekend to improve their internet experience.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the evening event

结束状态.心情: Socially satisfied, slightly fatigued yet content.

2025-01.daily_overview: The rainfall reduced outdoor activities, so Lei Mingxuan focused his energy on indoor work and planning. He broke down the annual strategy into actionable plans and made procurement preparations to resolve the home network issue. Due to slight physical discomfort, he went to bed early.

events.name: Refine the annual action plan
events.description: In the shop, Lei Mingxuan further refined the strategic plan formulated during the annual meeting on January 5. He created a detailed quarterly action plan, breaking down major objectives such as "exploring online branches," "planning community content," and "launching spring new products" into specific tasks. For each task, he clearly defined the responsible person (primarily himself), deadlines, and required resources. He then synchronized the plan into both his computer and mobile phone calendars, making the grand blueprint actionable.

events.name: Research and place an order for a Mesh router.
events.description: During work breaks, Lei Mingxuan researched solutions for Wi-Fi signal coverage in large homes through e-commerce platforms and digital forums. He compared several mainstream tri-band Mesh routers, taking into account the layout of his parents' home, budget, and ease of use. Ultimately, he selected a well-reviewed, cost-effective brand set, placed an order online, and had it shipped directly to his parents' address, planning to install it over the weekend.

events.name: Going to bed early due to physical discomfort.
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan experienced a slight headache, likely due to recent work-related stress. He decided to postpone his exercise plan and go to bed early to restore his energy.

events.name: Reading and Following Up on Orders
events.description: Before going to bed, he continued reading "The Stories of the Ming Dynasty," which had reached the period of Zhu Di. Meanwhile, he followed up on WeChat with Feng Xiaoyu, a regular customer from Suzhou, regarding the corporate team-building order she had inquired about, and sent some supplementary materials.

起始状态.心情: Calm and well-planned

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study in Shanghai's Pudong District
结束状态.心情: Methodical, with a sense of control but slight discomfort.

2025-01.daily_overview: Friday was a fulfilling and productive day. Lei Mingxuan immersed himself in the world of historical novels, successfully secured a corporate order, attended an online lecture to enhance his professional knowledge, and spent the evening installing and setting up a new home network for his parents. During the lunch break, he also tried skipping rope to stay active.

events.name: Jump Rope at Noon to Stay Energized
events.description: During the lunch break, Lei Mingxuan performed a 10-minute skipping rope exercise in the backyard of the shop to maintain his daily physical activity and relieve work stress, feeling somewhat rejuvenated afterward.

events.name: Immersive Reading of Historical Novels
events.description: After finishing a day's work, Lei Mingxuan comfortably leaned against the headboard at home and read *The Ming Dynasty: Those Things* for about an hour and a half. The story had reached the crucial chapter where Zhu Di launched the "Jingnan Campaign." The intense historical scheming and vivid depictions of warfare captivated him so deeply that he almost lost track of time, completely immersing himself in the dramatic events of centuries past.

events.name: Contact and finalize corporate custom orders
events.description: During the day, regular customer Feng Xiaoyu formally inquired via WeChat about the customization needs for her Suzhou company's team uniforms and souvenir gifts. Lei Mingxuan communicated with her in detail over the phone and WeChat regarding the team size, budget, style preferences, LOGO printing requirements, and delivery timeline. He promptly assessed the compatibility of his supply chain, contacted supplier Zhou Tao to confirm the fabric and printing techniques for the polo shirts, and selected matching small gifts by referring to the accessory catalog provided by Wu Fang. In the afternoon, he compiled and produced a detailed quotation and design mockups, which he sent to Feng Xiaoyu. After a second round of communication and minor adjustments, the contract details were largely finalized that evening. This efficient and professional response earned the client's trust.

events.name: Attend an online textile industry lecture
events.description: At 8 p.m., Lei Mingxuan entered the online live broadcast room of the Textile Industry Association, for which he had registered in advance, right on time. While checking the day's accounts in the shop's backend system, he listened to the lecture on his phone. The instructor systematically explained the trends in popular fabrics for the Spring/Summer 2025 season, as well as the characteristics and identification methods of new environmentally friendly fabrics, such as coffee yarn and marine recycled fibers. Lei Mingxuan diligently took notes on key points in his notebook, feeling that the information would be highly beneficial for future product selection and communication with suppliers.

events.name: Installing and Configuring a Mesh Network for Parents
events.description: After the evening lecture concluded, Lei Mingxuan returned to his parents' home and began installing the new router. Following the floor plan, he placed the main node on the TV cabinet in the living room and a child node at the entrance of his parents' bedroom. He connected the network cables, powered on the devices, and then used a mobile app to complete the setup of the main router and the pairing of the child node step by step. The debugging process went smoothly, and the mobile app indicated that the entire house had achieved good signal coverage.

起始状态.心情: Positive, looking forward to the weekend.

结束状态.心情: A great sense of accomplishment, balancing work, study, and family.

In the afternoon, he planned the next day's family day activities with his family and finalized the corporate order for the Suzhou company. He maintained a balanced and orderly work-life routine, with a slight weight gain attributed to family activities.

events.name: Guiding Parents on Using the New Network
events.description: On Saturday morning, Lei Mingxuan once again visited his parents' home. He connected the smart TV, his parents' mobile phones, and tablets to the new Wi-Fi network one by one, optimizing the connection settings to ensure stability. He patiently demonstrated to his parents how to check signal strength, switch network names, and restart devices when encountering simple issues—such as a device failing to connect—ensuring they could use the technology with ease.

events.name: Testing Network Speed and Home Entertainment
events.description: After completing the network setup, Lei Mingxuan accompanied his parents to test the internet speed with their mobile phones in the bedroom and living room corners where the signal used to be the weakest. Now, even 4K high-definition videos play smoothly without any lag. The family of three sat in the living room and watched an old movie seamlessly using the newly upgraded network, enjoying the enhanced home entertainment experience. Wang Xiuying, his mother, was overjoyed. Seeing his parents' satisfied smiles, Lei Mingxuan felt deeply content and gratified.

events.name: Planning a Weekend Family Day
events.description: During lunch, Lei Mingxuan discussed the next day's arrangements with his parents. His mother mentioned wanting to go out for a walk since the weather was nice, while his father said the sofa cushions at home were worn out. Lei Mingxuan proactively suggested, "How about we go for a walk and enjoy the sunshine at Century Park tomorrow morning, and then visit the nearby home furnishing store in the afternoon to look at cushions and rugs?" His parents happily agreed. He then checked the vehicle's fuel level and confirmed the opening hours of the park and the store.

events.name: Finalize Enterprise Order Details
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan made the final minor adjustments to the order proposal for the Suzhou company based on Feng Xiaoyu's feedback. He contacted supplier Zhou Tao to reconfirm the fabric inventory and printing details, and adjusted the matching of souvenir accessories according to Wu Fang's suggestions. After consolidating all the information, he prepared the final version of the quotation sheet, renderings, and electronic contract, which he then sent to Feng Xiaoyu. After Feng Xiaoyu confirmed everything was correct, the corporate order worth 40,000 yuan was officially finalized.

events.name: Staying up late video chatting with friends
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan had a video chat with his friend Li Na from Hangzhou, sharing recent updates and amusing stories. They talked until quite late, which caused him to go to bed later than usual.

起始状态.所处地点: At parents' home in Shanghai Pudong
起始状态.心情: Relax, with the ease of solving problems.

结束状态.所处地点: At my home in Shanghai Pudong
结束状态.心情: Satisfied, with harmonious family relationships and achievements in work.

2025-01.daily_overview: Sunday was a heartwarming family day. Lei Mingxuan drove his parents to enjoy the winter sunshine and family bliss at Century Park, then accompanied them to complete their shopping at a home furnishing store, taking the initiative to cover the expenses. In the evening, he handled the important payment of the deposit for spring procurement.

events.name: Century Park Family Walk
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan drove his parents to Century Park. Under the warm winter sun, the family strolled leisurely along the lakeside. Wang Xiuying, the mother, admired the lake view and the remaining reeds, while Lei Jianguo, the father, chatted with his son about national affairs and community news. During a break on a bench midway through their walk, the mother mentioned again that the sofa cushions in the living room really needed to be replaced, as the colors had faded.

events.name: Accompanying Parents for Home Furnishing Purchases
events.description: After the walk, Lei Mingxuan took the initiative to drive his parents to a nearby large home furnishing store. Inside the store, he patiently accompanied them as they browsed through the dazzling array of home goods, carefully comparing different styles, materials, and colors of sofa cushions and rugs. He fully respected his parents' aesthetic preferences, offering suggestions only on material comfort and cost-effectiveness. In the end, the family jointly selected several cotton-linen cushions with harmonious styles and comfortable seating, along with a beige short-pile rug. When it was time to check out, Lei Mingxuan stepped forward to pay with his card. Although his parents verbally insisted it wasn’t necessary, their faces were lit up with gratified smiles.

events.name: Furnish a new home, refresh the living room
events.description: After returning home from shopping, Lei Mingxuan and his father worked together to replace the old cushions, lay down the new carpet, and arrange the new cushions in place. After tidying up, the living room instantly took on a fresh look, appearing more cozy and bright. Wang Xiuying, the mother, looked at the newly decorated living room and repeatedly praised it.

events.name: Pay the deposit for spring procurement
events.description: In the evening, after settling his parents in, Lei Mingxuan returned to his own room to handle work matters. He reconfirmed with Zhou Tao, a supplier in Hangzhou, via WeChat the types, colors, quantities, and final prices of the fabrics required for the spring new collection. After carefully verifying the electronic contract and confirming there were no errors, he transferred the order deposit to Zhou Tao’s company account via online banking, emphasizing the importance of ensuring quality and starting production on time. Completing this substantial payment marked the official launch of the execution phase for the 2025 spring collection launch plan.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed and joyful, ready to spend time with family.

结束状态.所处地点: Study at Home in Shanghai's Pudong District
结束状态.心情: Warmth, the sense of fulfillment from practicing filial piety.

state.今日运动: Take a walk in the park for about an hour.

2025-01.daily_overview: The new workweek began with steady customer flow at the store. Lei Mingxuan utilized the gaps in between to continue reading historical novels while simultaneously advancing the confirmation of spring accessory orders with suppliers in Guangzhou, managing both tasks in an orderly manner. In the evening, he attempted a slow jog to maintain his exercise routine.

events.name: Midday Reading and Reflection
events.description: During the afternoon when customer flow in the shop was sparse, Lei Mingxuan sat behind the cash register, continuing to read "The Ming Dynasty: Those Events." He read about Zhu Di's consolidation of power after seizing the throne, including the establishment of the Grand Secretariat and the relocation of the capital to Beijing. This led him to draw parallels between the ancient political strategies described in the book and the formulation of tactics in modern business competition, feeling that history always offers unique perspectives for reflection.

events.name: Confirm Accessories Purchase Order
events.description: He connected with Guangzhou supplier Wu Fang (Sister Fang) via WeChat video call. While referencing the electronic sample catalog she had sent, he confirmed the key jewelry samples for the season, packaging details, and final wholesale prices one by one. Based on his store's sales projections and his assessment of spring trends, Lei Mingxuan determined the purchase quantity for each jewelry item. The communication proceeded smoothly, and both parties quickly reached an agreement. Lei Mingxuan then paid a deposit to Wu Fang's trading company via an online payment platform, completing the confirmation of the spring jewelry order.

events.name: Evening Jogging to Maintain Vitality
events.description: After work, Lei Mingxuan went for a 20-minute jog in the community streets to maintain his daily exercise routine, relax his mind, and enjoy the tranquility of the night.

events.name: Follow up on the production of the Suzhou order.
events.description: I took a moment to send a WeChat message to supplier Zhou Tao, inquiring about the progress of the fabric printing for Feng Xiaoyu's company order, to ensure that this first major corporate order could be delivered on time.

起始状态.心情: Steady, starting a new week

结束状态.所处地点: At Home in Shanghai's Pudong District
结束状态.心情: Enrichment, reading, and business communication bring dual satisfaction.

2025-01.daily_overview: The rainy day made the shop a bit quiet. Lei Mingxuan actively followed up on the production and logistics progress of various orders and attended the professional lecture in the evening on time. He immediately applied the fabric knowledge he learned to his practical work, demonstrating the ability to put learning into practice. In the morning, he tried fitness exercises to stay active.

events.name: Morning Exercise Routine to Maintain Vitality
events.description: After getting up in the morning, Lei Mingxuan performed a 15-minute exercise routine at home to awaken his body and cope with the rainy weather that prevented outdoor activities, leaving him feeling refreshed and invigorated.

events.name: Follow up on the production progress of Hangzhou fabrics.
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan proactively contacted supplier Zhou Tao to inquire about the progress of cutting and printing for the spring new fabric. Zhou Tao quickly sent several photos via WeChat showing the fabric in the production process at the workshop, indicating that it had entered the printing stage. Lei Mingxuan carefully reviewed the photos and provided more specific requirements regarding the saturation of the printing color for one of the T-shirt designs, hoping for a brighter appearance. He also reconfirmed the shipping date for the first batch of goods with Zhou Tao to ensure timely delivery for the spring launch.

events.name: Attend the online industry lecture on time.
events.description: At 8 p.m., Lei Mingxuan entered the online live broadcast for the textile industry that he had registered for the previous night. While organizing the day's sales accounts in the shop's backend, he attentively listened to the lecturer systematically explain the trends in popular fabrics for the spring and summer of 2025, particularly the characteristics and identification methods of several new functional fabrics (such as moisture-wicking, quick-drying, antibacterial, and odor-resistant). He not only noted down key points in his notebook but also took screenshots of important charts on his phone.

events.name: Apply Lecture Knowledge to Optimize Communication
events.description: After the lecture, Lei Mingxuan reviewed his notes. He highlighted key points such as "How to Easily Identify Fabric Composition" and "Applicable Scenarios for Different Functional Fabrics." It immediately occurred to him that this knowledge could not only enhance his professionalism in product selection but also enable him to discuss fabric characteristics more expertly with his supplier, Zhou Tao, during their next communication. He even considered compiling these insights into handy tips to share with customers interested in material properties in the future.

events.name: Contact logistics to confirm shipping arrangements.
events.description: Before going to bed, he sent a message to Wu Fang in Guangzhou to confirm that the accessories had been packaged and to discuss the specific logistics arrangements. He requested that the shipment be sent using a designated, reliable logistics company and instructed her to provide the tracking number once the items were dispatched.

起始状态.所处地点: At Home in Shanghai's Pudong District
起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to handle follow-up matters.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home in Shanghai Pudong
结束状态.心情: A sense of gain, with knowledge being updated.

2025-01.daily_overview: On Wednesday, the joy of reading began to radiate outward. Lei Mingxuan shared interesting anecdotes from the book with his father and childhood friend, efficiently handled order logistics, and started planning an anticipated weekend shooting experience activity due to a novel invitation from a friend. In the evening, he completed his gym training to align with his health goals.

events.name: Sharing Reading Insights with Father
events.description: During dinner, Lei Mingxuan chatted casually with his father, Lei Jianguo. He excitedly shared the fascinating details he had just read about the scale of Zheng He's voyages to the Western Seas and the intricacies of the Ming Dynasty's officialdom. Although his father was not deeply familiar with the specific historical context, he listened with great interest as his son vividly recounted the stories. The book sparked many fresh topics of conversation between the father and son.

events.name: Complete Order Logistics Confirmation
events.description: He contacted Zhou Tao in Hangzhou and Wu Fang in Guangzhou simultaneously to confirm the final logistics information for the two batches of goods—spring fabrics and accessories—and obtained the tracking numbers. Based on the store's warehousing plan, he coordinated the arrival times to ensure both shipments would reach Shanghai smoothly, making necessary preparations for the upcoming spring collection restocking.

events.name: Planning a Weekend Live-Fire Shooting Activity
events.description: Zhang Wei contacted Lei Mingxuan via WeChat, enthusiastically recommending a newly opened professional shooting range in Fengxian District and asking if he would be interested in experiencing live-fire shooting over the weekend. This proposal instantly appealed to the thrill-seeking aspect of Lei Mingxuan's ESTP personality, and he was highly intrigued. The two immediately began a lively discussion on WeChat about specific timing, costs, and safety precautions. They decided to invite two other mutual friends—Han Dong, a billiards partner, and Xie Fei, a basketball buddy—to join them, planning to organize a small-scale "manly" experience activity.

events.name: Evening Gym Training Session
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan went to the community gym and completed a 60-minute comprehensive workout, including 30 minutes of treadmill cardio and 30 minutes of core and upper body strength training, to support his weight loss plan and improve physical fitness. He felt slight muscle soreness but a strong sense of accomplishment.

起始状态.心情: Ordinary Mind

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom in a home in Shanghai Pudong
结束状态.心情: Pleasant, filled with anticipation for novel weekend activities, and satisfied after exercise.

state.今日运动: 60-Minute Comprehensive Gym Training

2025-01.daily_overview: Workday. In the morning, focus was placed on the sorting and quality control of newly arrived orders from Suzhou enterprises. During the busy intervals of shop operations in the afternoon, awareness was raised and proactive adjustments were made to dietary habits, initiating a round of healthy self-management. In the evening, attention was given to both shop planning and social activity arrangements, reflecting the multitasking capabilities of an individual business owner and a focus on quality of life.

events.name: Enterprise Order Receiving and Sub-packaging
events.description: The batch of team-building apparel and souvenirs custom-made for Feng Xiaoyu's company before the Chinese New Year arrived in Shanghai this morning. Lei Mingxuan carefully inspected the stitching, printed logos, and overall craftsmanship of each garment in the store, and also verified the quantity and packaging of each souvenir item one by one. Following the order form, he sorted and packaged the goods by department or team, attaching labels with department names and contact persons. Looking at the neatly stacked, high-quality products, he felt confident about the successful delivery of this large order. He then contacted the logistics company to schedule delivery to Suzhou for the following morning.

events.name: Sincerely Inviting Dear Friends to Discuss the Blueprint of Our Career
events.description: Considering his close friend Lin Wei's busy schedule, Lei Mingxuan formally extended an invitation via WeChat a day in advance, scheduling a meeting at his home the following morning to thoroughly discuss his long-contemplated plan for upgrading the store. To ensure efficient communication, he spent an entire evening organizing and printing core business data charts from the past year (including monthly sales, average transaction value, top-selling categories, etc.), and gave the final polish to the handwritten draft of his preliminary online operations plan, which was filled with ideas and questions. He aimed to present his thoughts clearly and intuitively.

events.name: Apply what you have learned and explore new possibilities with suppliers.
events.description: Reflecting on the industry lecture he attended a few days ago, Lei Mingxuan felt he had identified a new business opportunity. He immediately contacted his main fabric supplier, Zhou Tao, via WeChat. Without excessive pleasantries, he got straight to the point and asked, "Mr. Zhou, regarding the new fabric blend of ice silk and recycled polyester mentioned in the recent lecture, do you have it in stock or can you develop sample fabrics? I think it would be well-suited for some functional-style summer pieces." He shared with Zhou Tao the market trends he learned from the lecture, which emphasized both environmental sustainability and comfort, and explored the possibility of collaborating to introduce this type of innovative fabric. This was part of his effort to plan ahead for the selection of products for the upcoming spring and summer seasons.

events.name: Planning Weekend Exciting Experiences
events.description: In the golf buddies' group chat, Zhang Wei once again suggested going shooting over the weekend. Lei Mingxuan, the man of action, immediately responded and took the initiative to handle the booking. He quickly found a well-reviewed shooting club in Fengxian District through Dianping, called to confirm the weekend sessions, prices of different packages, safety regulations, and whether reservations were required. After confirming that a group of four was feasible, he decisively booked the introductory experience package for the afternoon of January 18. He then tagged Zhang Wei, Han Dong, and Xie Fei in the WeChat group named "Pudong Golf Kings": "All set, guys. Sunday at 2 p.m., Fengxian Shooting Range. Remember to bring your ID cards, wear loose clothes and sports shoes!" The group chat was instantly flooded with a series of "OK" hand gestures and excited emojis.

events.name: Handling large customer orders
events.description: Shortly after opening in the morning, a regular customer entered the store with several friends. Under Lei Mingxuan's professional recommendations, they purchased multiple new winter clothing items and accessories in one go, with a notably high total amount. Lei Mingxuan carefully confirmed the size and color of each item for the customer, patiently answered questions about fabric and styling, skillfully operated the cash register system, and packaged the goods. Finally, he warmly escorted the customers out, informing them that same-day express delivery within the city would be arranged.

events.name: A Profound Reflection on Dining Out
events.description: During a break after handling a large order, Lei Mingxuan leaned against the cashier counter to drink water while casually scrolling through the payment records and takeout orders on his phone. He noticed that over the past week, due to year-end inventory checks and various social engagements, he had eaten out for almost every meal, mostly indulging in heavy, oily, and salty dishes like hotpot and local Shanghainese cuisine. Rubbing his slightly bloated stomach, he thought of his life goal to "control his BMI," and a strong feeling of "this can't go on any longer" grew within him.

events.name: Actively search for healthy lunch options
events.description: With a determination to change, Lei Mingxuan opened a food delivery app on his phone, set the location to the area near his own shop, and filtered for tags such as "light meals," "salads," and "healthy food." He compared several highly-rated restaurants, carefully examined user-uploaded photos and reviews, and ultimately selected a salad specialty shop that focused on "freshly grilled chicken breast" and "customizable toppings." The reviews praised it for "fresh ingredients" and "a wide variety of dressings." He decided to give this place a try.

events.name: Try a healthy light lunch.
events.description: At noon, Lei Mingxuan walked for about ten minutes to the salad shop located on the backstreet of the mall. The interior of the shop was decorated in a simple and bright style. He ordered a "Signature Grilled Chicken Breast Salad" with additional avocado and chickpeas, and chose the relatively low-calorie vinaigrette dressing. While waiting, he watched the staff in the open kitchen skillfully handling fresh vegetables, feeling quite satisfied.

events.name: A Refreshing Lunch Experience and Sensation
events.description: The salad was quickly served, a large and colorful bowl. The chicken was grilled to perfection—neither dry nor tough, but juicy—and the vegetables were crisp and refreshing. Although the flavor was far less rich and satisfying than the braised pork his mother made or the hotpot he often ate, his stomach felt comfortable afterward, without the usual heaviness that followed dining out. He noticed that while minding the shop in the afternoon, his concentration seemed sharper, without the usual post-meal drowsiness.

events.name: Develop a Healthy Diet Plan
events.description: This positive experience gave Lei Mingxuan a taste of the benefits. On his way back to the store, he walked and thought to himself, "Actually, it wasn't that bad. The key is that my body feels good." He decided to make this healthy dietary choice a regular habit. He took out his phone and created a new note in his memo: "Healthy Lunch Plan: Schedule at least two similar healthy meals (salads, light meals) per week, especially on busy workdays when eating out is more likely. Goal: Reduce digestive burden and support weight management."

events.name: Planning Product Selection for Spring Festival Marketing
events.description: After closing up shop for the evening, Lei Mingxuan did not head home immediately. Instead, he turned on his computer while browsing through his phone. He scrolled through the WeChat public accounts of Vogue Business and Harper’s Bazaar, checked out fashion influencers on Xiaohongshu, and clicked through the WeChat Moments of suppliers Zhou Tao and Wu Fang, searching for inspiration. He paid particular attention to design elements related to the "Year of the Dragon," festive colors for the Spring Festival (such as deep red and warm gold), and clothing styles suitable for New Year gatherings and visiting relatives and friends. At the same time, he also referred to an industry trend brief his cousin Shen Jie had sent him earlier that afternoon. As he reviewed these sources, he quickly sketched and took notes in his notebook, brainstorming how to skillfully incorporate these trendy elements into his store’s Spring Festival merchandise selection.

events.name: New: Temporary Handling of Supplier Delayed Shipment Issues
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan received a WeChat message from Wu Fang, the accessories supplier, informing him that a batch of Spring Festival decorations might be delayed by two days due to logistics issues. He immediately adjusted the store's display plan, prioritizing the showcasing of red-themed products from the existing inventory. Through WeChat, he confirmed alternative arrangements and compensation measures with Wu Fang to ensure the Spring Festival promotional activities would proceed as scheduled.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New Area, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Clear-headed, full of drive in handling corporate orders, and also maintaining a certain vigilance towards health issues.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New Area, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and somewhat rewarding, having completed multiple tasks, and feeling positive about starting a healthy eating plan.

2025-01.daily_overview: On a weekday, which was also the delivery day for corporate orders, Lei Mingxuan personally drove between Suzhou and Shanghai, efficiently completing the goods handover and earning the client's trust along with the final payment. Upon returning to the store, he did not relax but immediately began to materialize the long-considered ideas for the Spring Festival activities, officially finalizing the marketing theme and plan. This day was one of efficient execution, encompassing both the closure of external business and the internal implementation of strategy.

events.name: Personally delivering corporate orders in Suzhou.
events.description: To ensure everything went perfectly, Lei Mingxuan decided to personally drive the packaged goods to Suzhou. In the morning, he loaded several large boxes securely into the trunk and back seat of his family car and set off on the highway. Upon arriving at the industrial park where Feng Xiaoyu’s company was located, he smoothly completed the handover with Feng Xiaoyu and colleagues from the administrative department. Not only did he count the goods, but he also proactively demonstrated the precautions for washing the garments and left several spare hangtags as a precaution. The entire process was professional and seamless, and Feng Xiaoyu praised his attentiveness highly.

events.name: Formally finalize the Spring Festival marketing plan.
events.description: Returning to Shanghai from Suzhou, it was already afternoon. Lei Mingxuan took a sip of water in the shop and immediately took out his notebook. Based on the market research and cost estimates from the previous days, he officially set the theme for the Spring Festival promotion as "New Year Refresh · Dragon Soaring Trend Gifts." Centered around this theme, he quickly drafted the core content: first, "Spend 888 yuan or more to receive a limited-edition custom New Year lucky bag," which would contain Pop Mart blind boxes, accessories, or store coupons; second, "Members enjoy double points, which can be exchanged for limited-edition gifts or large discount coupons"; third, "Launch three limited-edition New Year outfit sets, available for pre-order." He took a photo of the plan and sent it to his mother, Wang Xiuying, and his cousin, Shen Jie, wanting to hear their initial reactions first.

events.name: Receipt of Order Balance Payment and Proposal for Deepening Cooperation
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan received a bank deposit notification on his phone—the 40,000 yuan balance payment for Feng Xiaoyu’s company order had arrived. He immediately sent Feng Xiaoyu a WeChat message: "Payment received. Thank you for your support, President Feng! Pleasure working with you!" Shortly after, he followed up with a longer message: "By the way, have you received the electronic cleaning guide included with the shipment? Also, it occurred to me—if your company needs photography for team-building events or annual meetings after the Chinese New Year, I know a very reliable independent photographer who can offer an internal rate. Feel free to reach out if needed!" He hoped to transform this successful transaction into a longer-term partnership by offering added value.

events.name: Implicit Event: Preliminary Discussion with Mother on New Year Goods Procurement
events.description: During dinner at home, Lei Mingxuan casually asked his mother, Wang Xiuying, "Mom, when do you plan to start buying New Year goods this year? Would you like me to drive you for a big shopping trip this weekend?" His mother smiled and shared her plans and rough budget for the year. Lei Mingxuan expressed his full financial support and agreed to make a detailed shopping list over the weekend.

events.name: New: Adjusted evening exercise plan due to mild lower back discomfort
events.description: Originally planning to go to the gym in the evening, Lei Mingxuan felt a slight soreness in his strained lower back and decided to switch to light stretching and core training at home to avoid aggravating the injury. He consulted rehabilitation videos, performed 15 minutes of targeted exercises, and planned to adjust his routine tomorrow based on how he feels.

2025-01.daily_overview: A vibrant and fulfilling day off. In the morning, I engaged in a high-quality career discussion with a close friend, gaining valuable insights. In the afternoon, I experienced thrilling live-ammunition shooting with friends, fully satisfying my ESTP personality's craving for novelty. The evening concluded with a dinner gathering for reflection, followed by a return to reality as I planned the budget for the upcoming Spring Festival activities. This day perfectly blended deep contemplation with exhilarating experiences.

events.name: Weekend Morning Coffee and Career Conversations
events.description: On Saturday morning, Lei Mingxuan deliberately got up a bit earlier than usual. He tidied up the living room sofa and arranged the printed data charts and the handwritten proposal neatly on the coffee table. Then, he carefully ground the newly purchased Yirgacheffe coffee beans and adjusted the water temperature and flow rate of the pour-over equipment. By the time Lin Wei arrived as scheduled, the rich aroma of coffee had already filled the room. In the comfortable atmosphere, Lei Mingxuan elaborated in detail on his complete vision for upgrading the store into a brand collection shop and opening an online branch. He even candidly shared his concerns about the two major challenges of supply chain management and online traffic acquisition. Lin Wei listened attentively, asking questions and taking notes from time to time. She offered many insightful suggestions from a market perspective and shared a successful case of a similar offline store transitioning online, which made Lei Mingxuan feel enlightened and much clearer in his thinking.

events.name: Organize thoughts and consolidate gains
events.description: After seeing Lin Wei off, Lei Mingxuan washed the coffee cups while reflecting on their earlier conversation. He opened his notebook and solemnly recorded the key points Lin Wei had mentioned, particularly the suggestions about "using hit products to attract traffic and test market response in the early stages" and "finding stable niche brand supply chains." He felt that this conversation was exceptionally valuable, as it not only provided external validation but also clarified the specific directions he needed to explore further in his research.

events.name: Confirm the weekend roller skating activity.
events.description: After a brief rest following lunch, Lei Mingxuan sent a message in the roller skating enthusiasts' WeChat group: "@Song Jia @everyone, Binjiang Road tomorrow afternoon, same time and place?" He soon received responses from Song Jia and several other companions. He also took the opportunity to check the bearings and wheels of his roller skates to ensure they were in good condition.

events.name: Drive to the shooting range
events.description: At one o'clock in the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan met with Zhang Wei, Han Dong, and Xie Fei at the designated location. Then, with Lei Mingxuan driving, the four of them chatted and laughed all the way to the shooting range in Fengxian District. The atmosphere in the car was lively, as everyone discussed the live-action CS and shooting games they had played before, speculating on how strong the real recoil would be, all filled with excitement for the unknown experience.

events.name: Receive professional shooting safety training.
events.description: Upon arriving at the shooting range, the four individuals first entered the theoretical classroom under the guidance of their instructor. With a serious expression, the instructor provided a detailed explanation of the four golden rules of firearm safety, the strictly prohibited behaviors within the range, as well as the basic structure, safety mechanisms, and operational essentials of the pistols and small-caliber rifles they would be using. Lei Mingxuan set aside his joking demeanor and listened attentively, gaining an unprecedented and direct understanding of the power of real firearms and the extreme importance of safe handling.

events.name: First-time Handgun Shooting Experience
events.description: Entering the live-fire shooting range, Lei Mingxuan put on heavy noise-canceling earmuffs and protective goggles, and the atmosphere instantly became solemn. Under the one-on-one guidance of the coach, he held a heavy real pistol for the first time. Following the instructions, he adjusted his stance, gripped the handle firmly with both hands, and aimed through the sights at the target 25 meters away. Taking a deep breath, he pulled the trigger—"Bang!" The loud noise and powerful recoil sent a shock through his entire arm, and his heart pounded violently. After the initial shock, he quickly adjusted his breathing and focused on aiming. The subsequent shots gradually became more stable, and the feedback from hitting the target filled him with intense excitement.

events.name: Experience Precision Rifle Shooting
events.description: After finishing with the handguns, they moved to the rifle shooting positions. The rifles had supports, providing much better stability. Lei Mingxuan lay prone, observing the distant bullseye through the optical sight. The sensation of pulling the trigger felt more controllable than with a handgun, and several consecutive shots formed a tight grouping in the bullseye area. This feeling of precise hits fascinated him deeply, immersing him completely in the dialogue between the firearm and the target.

events.name: Review of Shooting Results and Group Photo
events.description: After the experience concluded, the coaches retrieved their respective target papers for brief commentary. Lei Mingxuan's pistol target showed somewhat scattered bullet impacts, but his rifle target results were commendable. The four grown men excitedly compared their respective "achievements" like children, and took commemorative photos in front of the shooting range's iconic background wall, capturing this rare experience.

events.name: Shooting Experience Review and Dinner Gathering
events.description: The experience ended as evening approached. The four of them drove back to the city and found a familiar barbecue restaurant. After ordering, the conversation immediately returned to the afternoon shooting session. "Did you feel that recoil? My hand still feels a bit numb!" "Did you see my bullseye shot? That was pure luck, haha!" They enthusiastically discussed every detail, sharing the thrill of the adrenaline rush, and agreed to try a shotgun next time they had the chance. Lei Mingxuan felt that this experience greatly satisfied his pursuit of "excitement" and "novelty."

events.name: Prepare a detailed budget for the Spring Festival activities
events.description: After returning home from the gathering, the excitement gradually subsided. Lei Mingxuan recalled the Spring Festival activity plan confirmed during the day and opened his computer to start working on a detailed budget. He listed the items to be purchased, including lucky bag gifts (to be coordinated with Wu Fang), point redemption gifts, as well as the production costs for promotional posters and roll-up banners. He estimated the minimal expenses required for online promotion and preliminarily set sales targets for the activity period. After saving the budget sheet, he planned to begin its gradual implementation starting next Monday.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Relaxed and expectant, preparing for the in-depth conversation in the morning and the stimulating experience in the afternoon.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Satisfaction and tranquility after intense excitement, with the mind filled with new ideas and pleasant memories.

state.今日运动: Shooting Experience (Arm and Core Stability Training), Minimal Walking

2025-01.daily_overview: A leisurely Sunday. In the morning, I enjoyed sports and socializing with my roller-skating companions along the riverside under the warm winter sun. In the afternoon, we gathered at a café for some relaxation. Returning home in the evening, I began advancing the visual design for the Spring Festival activities, moving yesterday's plan into the execution phase. The day was pleasantly spent on exercise, socializing, and light work.

events.name: Binjiang Roller Skating Gathering
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan arrived near the Pudong Riverside Skate Park with his rollerblading gear to meet up with Song Jia and others. Everyone helped each other put on protective equipment and performed simple stretching exercises to warm up. The winter sun felt warm on their bodies, while the breeze from the river was slightly cool yet refreshing. The group skated along the smooth, dedicated rollerblading path, occasionally speeding up for races and practicing slalom moves and simple turns. Lei Mingxuan asked Song Jia for guidance on a basic trick called "Crazy Legs" that he had been wanting to learn recently, and Song Jia patiently demonstrated it several times.

events.name: Casual Recording During Roller Skating
events.description: During the glide, everyone stopped to rest at several scenic platforms with open views, drinking water while admiring the Bund architecture across the river. Lei Mingxuan and his friends took several photos and short videos of each other in motion with their phones, capturing this relaxed and enjoyable moment. He posted a short video of himself trying a new move on his social media feed, captioning it, "Sunday afternoon, riding the wind and waves (literally)."

events.name: A Small Gathering at the Cafe After Roller Skating
events.description: After nearly two hours of skating, everyone was still eager for more, but their stomachs had started to growl. Song Jia suggested heading to a nearby industrial-style café they often visited. The group packed up their roller skates and walked over. Inside the café, they ordered lattes, Americanos, and a few snacks, gathering around a table. The conversation naturally shifted from skating techniques to recently watched anime, Song Jia’s new project at work, and Lei Mingxuan’s plans for the Spring Festival activities at his shop, all in a relaxed and pleasant atmosphere.

events.name: Returning after a small gathering at the café
events.description: After chatting for over an hour at the café, everyone bid farewell and went their separate ways. Lei Mingxuan took the subway home, feeling physically invigorated from the exercise and mentally relaxed from the conversation with friends. He planned to try a longer route for his next rollerblading outing.

events.name: Launch the Spring Festival event visual design
events.description: At home in the evening, Lei Mingxuan contacted a graphic designer he had collaborated with several times via WeChat. He sent the designer detailed information about the campaign theme "New Year, New Look · Dragon Soaring with Trendy Gifts," including the timeline, promotional terms, and his desired style—festive, fashionable, and incorporating Chinese trendy elements as well as Year of the Dragon motifs. He also attached several reference images. Lei requested the designer to produce initial drafts for the event poster and the exterior packaging of the lucky bags, and scheduled a review of the drafts in two days.

events.name: New: Due to staying up late from yesterday's dinner gathering, feeling slightly fatigued today, canceling evening reading.
events.description: Originally planning to read a historical novel in the evening, Lei Mingxuan felt somewhat fatigued and decided to rest early, only briefly browsing news on his phone before falling asleep.

起始状态.心情: Lazy and relaxed, enjoying the leisure of a weekend morning.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai, China
结束状态.心情: Pleasant and peaceful, I spent a day balanced with exercise and social activities while making progress in my work.

2025-01.daily_overview: A new week of workdays begins. Beyond shop duties, reading historical novels sparks cross-disciplinary inspiration; successful corporate orders are reviewed and customer relationships maintained; financial and gift procurement planning for the family's Spring Festival commences; and based on this planning, the shop's featured Spring Festival products are selected. This day exemplifies how the shop owner integrates work, personal growth, and family responsibilities into daily life.

events.name: Cross-Domain Inspiration from Reading Historical Novels
events.description: During the quieter morning hours when customer traffic was low, Lei Mingxuan took out his copy of "The Ming Dynasty: Those Stories" and continued reading. When he reached the part about Zhang Juzheng implementing the "Single Whip Law" to reform the tax system and streamline governance, he closed the book and pondered. He drew a parallel to his own shop's membership points system, wondering if it could also undergo a "reform" to make point redemption more flexible and appealing, or if clearer promotional rules could be introduced to enhance operational efficiency. He noted this idea in his phone's memo app to refine it further later.

events.name: Enterprise Order Review and Customer Relationship Maintenance
events.description: During the lunch break, Lei Mingxuan conducted a quick review of the Suzhou enterprise order completed last week. He summarized the successful practices at each stage—from order acceptance, communication, and production to delivery (such as confirming details in advance and delivering in person to build trust)—as well as areas for future optimization (such as establishing a more standardized template for enterprise order processes). Subsequently, he sent Feng Xiaoyu a carefully crafted thank-you message, once again expressing his pleasure in working together. He also attached several pictures of newly arrived spring items suitable for commuting attire and wrote, "Ms. Feng, please see if there are any styles your office colleagues might like. This will help us tailor our next group purchase more effectively [smiley face]."

events.name: Plan Spring Festival Family Expenditure
events.description: After finishing the inventory of his store's profits from the previous month at home in the evening, Lei Mingxuan began planning his family's Spring Festival expenses. He was well aware that celebrating the Chinese New Year involves significant spending. He decided to allocate a separate portion of the profits as a "Spring Festival Special Fund" for buying gifts for his parents and preparing red envelopes for relatives, elders, and younger generations. He preliminarily set a budget for gifts for his parents (planning to buy some practical and high-quality items), determined the amounts for red envelopes to close elders, and established standards for lucky money for children of his peers, ensuring he had a clear plan in mind.

events.name: Procurement of Spring Festival Fortune Bag Gifts
events.description: Having planned the budget, Lei Mingxuan realized that the small gifts for the lucky bags needed for the event had not yet been purchased. He immediately drove to the familiar Chenghuang Temple Small Commodities Wholesale Market. Inside the market, he moved between various stalls, carefully selecting a batch of affordable and festive items with Chinese New Year elements: humorous red envelopes printed with phrases like "Strike It Rich" and "Good Luck," exquisite zodiac dragon keychains, red Chinese knot ornaments, and some individually wrapped candies. After some bargaining with a familiar wholesale vendor, he happily purchased a large box, enough to fill nearly a hundred lucky bags.

events.name: Select the store's main recommended products for the Spring Festival
events.description: In the afternoon, upon returning to the store, Lei Mingxuan began selecting the main products for the Spring Festival promotion from the warehouse and existing in-store inventory, based on the "New Year, New Look" theme and his recent analysis of fashion trends. He specifically picked out a batch of sweaters, hoodies, and jackets in red, burgundy, and gold, along with some items featuring Chinese-style elements such as dragon patterns and frog buttons, as well as several sets of appropriate outfits suitable for New Year gatherings or meeting parents. He gathered these products and hung them in the store's most prominent "New Year Recommendations" section, then began planning their display arrangements.

events.name: New: Temporary handling of store network failure, delaying evening exercise
events.description: In the evening, the store's cash register system experienced a brief outage due to network issues. Lei Mingxuan urgently contacted IT support, which took over an hour to resolve the problem. As a result, the originally planned gym workout was canceled and replaced with light push-ups and stretching at home.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Stable and ready to tackle the new work week.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai, China
结束状态.心情: Systematically completed multiple planning and procurement tasks, making the arrangements for the Spring Festival clearer.

state.今日运动: Walking and market shopping (approximately 1 hour), transporting goods, 20 minutes of light home training.

2025-01.daily_overview: On a weekday with light rain. In the morning, I focused on selecting a thoughtful Spring Festival gift for my mother, and in the afternoon, I reviewed and finalized the visual design drafts for the Spring Festival activities. Amid the drizzle, I completed tasks filled with warmth and practicality.

events.name: Selecting a cashmere scarf for mother
events.description: Taking advantage of the relatively quiet morning at his shop, Lei Mingxuan drove to the Plaza 66 on West Nanjing Road. He knew his mother, Wang Xiuying, had always loved soft and warm cashmere products but was reluctant to spend too much on them. He lingered and compared items at several high-end brand counters before finally selecting a light beige pure cashmere scarf. It felt incredibly delicate and soft, and its versatile color complemented one’s temperament well. He asked the shop assistant to wrap it carefully, imagining his mother’s delighted expression upon receiving the gift, and couldn’t help but smile.

events.name: Review and finalize the design of the Spring Festival activities
events.description: In the afternoon, the collaborating designer sent over the initial drafts of the event poster and the design for the goodie bag packaging. Lei Mingxuan set aside his current tasks and carefully reviewed them. The overall effect of the poster was good—festive and stylish—but he felt that the store logo could be more prominent, and the font size for the discount information needed to be enlarged to ensure visibility from a distance. The design for the goodie bag packaging featured gold-stamped dragon patterns, which he was quite satisfied with. He sent specific revision feedback to the designer via WeChat. An hour later, the revised drafts were returned. After confirming they were correct, he instructed the designer to send the final versions to the printing factory to begin producing the physical items.

events.name: New entry: Feeling slightly down due to the rainy weather, I made an exception and ordered takeout braised pork for lunch.
events.description: It was raining at noon, and Lei Mingxuan felt somewhat fatigued and low-spirited. He made an impromptu decision to abandon his healthy lunch plan, ordering takeout of Shanghai-style braised pork belly with rice instead. He enjoyed a comforting meal, though he felt a slight sense of guilt afterward.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with the joyful mood of preparing gifts for family.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai, China
结束状态.心情: Satisfied, having advanced two important matters, feeling grounded.

2025-01.daily_overview: Workday. Today's focus is on creating online content for the store. We invited Qian Duoduo, a regular customer and friend, to serve as a model. In the carefully arranged store, we shot New Year-themed outfit content to prepare materials for the upcoming online promotion. By combining work with social engagement, the process was both efficient and enjoyable.

events.name: Invite Qian Duoduo to shoot New Year outfit styles
events.description: Lei Mingxuan made an appointment in advance with Qian Duoduo, a regular customer and friend, inviting her to the store to help shoot New Year-themed outfit photos and short videos. Qian Duoduo readily agreed and brought her own makeup kit. Lei Mingxuan had already decorated a corner of the store with the Spring Festival decorations (couplets, "Fu" characters, and red lanterns) received the previous day, creating a festive atmosphere as the shooting backdrop.

events.name: New Year Theme Content Shooting
events.description: In the afternoon, Qian Duoduo arrived as scheduled. Lei Mingxuan selected several pre-chosen outfits from the Spring Festival main collection for her to try on and coordinate. As they tried on and adjusted the outfits, they discussed which set looked more photogenic and which poses appeared more natural. Lei Mingxuan used his phone and a portable fill light for the shoot, while Qian Duoduo showcased the camera presence she had honed in the new media industry. The shooting process was filled with laughter, and they not only took static outfit photos but also recorded several short demonstration videos and New Year greetings. Qian Duoduo also offered to help him edit the footage briefly using Jianying.

events.name: New addition: Commence planning for a self-driving tour in Western Sichuan (Day 1 of a multi-day event)
events.description: In the evening, inspired by his recent stimulating experiences, Lei Mingxuan began to seriously plan a self-driving tour to western Sichuan as part of his short-term goals. He searched online for routes, the best seasons, and essential equipment, and contacted his childhood friend Li Na (in Hangzhou) to inquire about local conditions, preliminarily deciding to undertake the trip in spring.

events.name: New entry: Due to a busy filming schedule, dinner was a simple affair, and no exercise was undertaken.
events.description: The filming work lasted until late, so Lei Mingxuan only had a convenience store rice ball for dinner and canceled his originally scheduled basketball activity to rest instead.
