2025-01.daily_overview: On a weekday with clear weather, I selected a set of fishing gear tailored to my father's interests as a gift in the morning. In the afternoon, I officially launched the meticulously crafted promotional content for the Spring Festival activities, marking the beginning of online pre-sales. Balancing personal and professional duties, I fulfilled my filial responsibilities while advancing business objectives.

events.name: Selecting Fishing Equipment for Father
events.description: Lei Mingxuan knew that his father Lei Jianguo's greatest hobby after retirement was fishing, yet he still used his old equipment. He specially made time to drive to a well-reputed professional fishing tackle shop in Pudong. With the shop assistant's recommendations, he carefully compared options and finally selected a cost-effective entry-level lure rod and a matching spinning reel for his father, along with basic accessories such as fishing line and artificial lures. He imagined his father leisurely fishing by the river with the new gear when spring arrived and flowers bloomed, feeling that this gift was perfectly suited.

events.name: Launch Online Promotion for Spring Festival Activities
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan carefully compiled the photos taken with Qian Duoduo the previous day, the edited short videos, and the detailed rules of the "New Year Renewal · Soaring Dragon Trendy Gifts" campaign (including details on purchase-with-gift offers, points redemption, and pre-sale information for limited-edition items) into a long, visually rich post. He first published it on the store's social media feed, set the location, and reminded everyone, "Wear new clothes for the New Year, and grab your lucky bag!" Subsequently, he forwarded the same content to several active customer WeChat groups and VIP groups, accompanied by red packets to liven up the atmosphere, officially announcing the launch of the campaign and accepting pre-sale inquiries.

events.name: Add: Continue planning the Western Sichuan self-driving tour (Day 2 of the multi-day event), contact the car rental company
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan further refined the itinerary for western Sichuan, compared vehicle models and prices from different car rental companies, and had an in-depth discussion with Li Na via WeChat regarding attractions along the route and points to note, planning to make the final decision over the weekend.

2025-01.daily_overview: On the last workday before the Spring Festival, the atmosphere began to grow lively. In the morning, I finalized the New Year shopping plan with my mother, and in the afternoon, I efficiently completed the final decorations for the festive ambiance in the shop, officially launching the event. In the evening, I also made plans to meet up with friends over the weekend. Both work and life revolved closely around the theme of the "New Year."

events.name: Discussing the New Year goods shopping list with my mother
events.description: Before heading out in the morning, Lei Mingxuan and his mother, Wang Xiuying, sat in the living room with paper and pen, formally discussing the New Year shopping list. His mother took the lead, while Lei Mingxuan added suggestions and recorded the items. "We need to buy a big, live fish for the New Year's Eve dinner..." "The soy sauce duck your father loves must be bought from a time-honored shop..." "You can go to the supermarket to buy candies and melon seeds, but don’t buy too many..." "Can we reuse last year’s Spring Festival couplets and window decorations, or should we buy a new set?" The mother and son exchanged ideas back and forth, quickly compiling a detailed list and roughly allocating the budget and shopping locations (supermarkets, wet markets, specialty delicatessens).

events.name: Schedule a weekend coffee meeting
events.description: During lunch break, Lei Mingxuan realized it had been a while since he last saw his university classmate Zhao Min. He sent her a WeChat message: "Boss Zhao, are you free this weekend? A new community café has opened in Xuhui, and I heard their coffee beans are quite good. Want to check it out?" Zhao Min replied quickly, and the two agreed to meet on Saturday afternoon.

events.name: Decorate the store for the Spring Festival atmosphere and launch the event.
events.description: In the afternoon, Wang Xiuying, the mother, came to the store specifically to help. Together, the mother and son put up the printed bright red posters in the shop window and prominent spots inside the store, hung red lanterns and Chinese knots, and pasted the character "Fu" and paper-cut decorations on the glass door. The originally fashionable clothing store was instantly filled with a strong festive atmosphere of the Chinese New Year. Once the decorations were complete, the event officially began. Customers attracted by the online promotions gradually came into the store to inquire, and Lei Mingxuan enthusiastically introduced the event and the featured styles, busy yet joyful.

events.name: Added: Completed preliminary planning for the Western Sichuan self-driving tour (cross-day event, day three), and booked a rental car.
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan integrated Li Na's suggestions with his own research, finalized the general route and duration for the self-driving tour in western Sichuan, and booked a car rental service through an app, feeling that a substantive step had been taken toward his short-term goal.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: The busyness and anticipation leading up to the holiday

结束状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Busy yet filled with festive joy, seeing the store refreshed and activities launched, everything feels ready.

2025-01.daily_overview: A clear Saturday in winter. The morning was spent immersed in concluding a historical reading and embarking on a new chapter. In the afternoon, an old friend and I embarked on a delightful coffee shop exploration, where an unexpected taste experience unexpectedly opened a door to a new world for him, sparking a strong curiosity and desire to explore specialty coffee.

events.name: Complete reading the first volume of the historical novel.
events.description: On Saturday morning, Lei Mingxuan slept in a little. After waking up, he leaned against the headboard and finished reading the last page of the first volume of *The Ming Dynasty: Those Years*. Closing the book, he gained a more vivid understanding of the historical context from the founding of the Ming Dynasty to the Yongle era, and developed complex feelings toward the character of Zhu Di. Still craving more, he immediately took out the second volume from the bedside table and turned to the chapter about the Rule of Renxuan.

events.name: Heading to Xuhui Coffee Shop for the appointment.
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan followed the navigation and took the subway to a quiet community in Xuhui District. The boutique café was tucked away among a row of old Western-style houses, with a small yet elegant storefront. He pushed the door open and found Zhao Min already there, waving at him from a seat by the window.

events.name: Exploring new eateries and chatting with friends
events.description: The two placed their orders, with Zhao Min opting for a latte. The barista enthusiastically recommended the seasonal pour-over single-origin coffee to Lei Mingxuan, mentioning an Ethiopian Yirgacheffe described as having notes of citrus and jasmine. Although Lei Mingxuan often drank coffee, he was not very familiar with pour-over methods. His curiosity piqued, he decided to give it a try.

events.name: First Taste of Yirgacheffe Pour-Over Coffee
events.description: The barista was brewing on-site. Lei Mingxuan watched as he meticulously weighed the beans, ground them, and poured water—the entire process resembled a ritual. The coffee was served in a pre-warmed ceramic cup. He first took a whiff, and indeed, there was a fresh floral and fruity aroma, completely unlike the intense caramel and nutty notes of traditional espresso. He carefully took a sip. A bright acidity first struck his palate, followed by a tea-like richness and a lingering sweetness, with almost no bitterness. This pure and layered flavor profile left him feeling both novel and pleasantly surprised.

events.name: Sharing with friends and seeking advice on coffee knowledge
events.description: Lei Mingxuan excitedly shared his feelings with Zhao Min: "This flavor is so unique! It really feels like drinking floral and fruit tea, yet it's definitely coffee." Zhao Min also took a sip and expressed her agreement. Unable to contain his curiosity, Lei Mingxuan asked the barista: "Is this Yirgacheffe processed differently? Why does it taste so distinct from the coffee I usually drink?" The barista patiently explained how the washed processing method contributes to a clean flavor profile and elaborated on the terroir characteristics of the Yirgacheffe region. Lei Mingxuan listened with great interest.

events.name: Bidding farewell and heading back, savoring the novel experience.
events.description: After chatting a bit more with Zhao Min about their respective work and holiday plans, the two bid farewell at the entrance of the shop. Lei Mingxuan took the subway home, his mind still lingering on the unique flavor of the coffee and the knowledge shared by the barista along the way. It felt like discovering an intriguing, uncharted territory.

events.name: Embarking on Beginner Research on Pour-Over Coffee
events.description: Inspired by the afternoon experience, Lei Mingxuan immediately searched online for "beginner's guide to pour-over coffee" after returning home in the evening. He browsed tutorial videos on Bilibili, read recommendations for beginner equipment from bloggers on Xiaohongshu, and studied the differences between hand grinders and pour-over kettles from brands like Hario and Timemore. He realized that he could recreate that sense of ritual and flavor at home, which further deepened his interest. He bookmarked several highly-viewed beginner tutorial videos and began keeping an eye out for entry-level kits on e-commerce platforms.

起始状态.心情: Leisurely and relaxed, enjoying the weekend morning

结束状态.所处地点: 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai

2025-01.daily_overview: The last Sunday before the Spring Festival had the theme of "shopping." Lei Mingxuan accompanied his mother throughout the day, efficiently completing a large-scale purchase of New Year goods, ranging from packaged foods at the supermarket to fresh ingredients at the farmers' market, as if carrying out a mission. It was a dual test of physical stamina and planning ability, as well as an important ritual for him and his mother to prepare for the family holiday together.

events.name: Drive to the supermarket for the first round of shopping.
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan drove his mother Wang Xiuying to a large warehouse-style supermarket in Pudong. They pushed a massive shopping cart and methodically checked items off their list: cases of beverages, beer, elegantly packaged nut gift boxes, chocolates, biscuits, disposable tableware, kitchen supplies, and a set of Spring Festival couplets and "Fu" character decorations. Lei Mingxuan was responsible for carrying the heavy items and frequently used his phone's calculator to tally the total amount, keeping the budget under control. The shopping cart soon piled up like a small mountain.

events.name: Shift to purchasing core ingredients from traditional farmers' markets.
events.description: After leaving the supermarket and delivering the goods that filled the trunk and back seat of the car back home, the mother and son hurried to a large farmers' market nearby. This was the main battlefield for procuring the core ingredients for the New Year's Eve dinner. Wang Xiuying skillfully navigated through the various stalls, using her years of experience to select lively mandarin fish, well-marbled pork belly, fresh local vegetables, and mushrooms. Lei Mingxuan was responsible for carrying the bags, bargaining (though his mother always said he was no good at it), and finally scanning the QR code to pay. The air was filled with the rich aroma of various ingredients and spices mixed together, and the bustling voices created a festive atmosphere full of New Year spirit.

events.name: Organize New Year goods and finalize the New Year's Eve dinner menu.
events.description: The procurement team returned home in the afternoon. Lei Mingxuan and his mother sorted the various New Year goods like ants moving house: frozen ingredients went into the refrigerator, dried goods were stored in the pantry, and snacks and fruits were arranged on the tea table. While organizing, his mother finalized the menu of eight dishes and one soup for the New Year's Eve dinner and discussed the general arrangements for which relatives to invite for meals during the Spring Festival. Looking at the filled refrigerator and storage spaces, Lei Mingxuan felt physically exhausted, but his heart was filled with a sense of fulfillment from contributing to the family and anticipation for the reunion.

events.name: New: Evening roller-skating activity canceled due to procurement fatigue. Rest early and get sufficient sleep.
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan felt extremely fatigued and decided to cancel the originally scheduled roller-skating activity. He took an early shower and rested to regain his strength for the work the following day.

起始状态.所处地点: 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Full of drive and ready to tackle the 'tough battle' of procurement

结束状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Tired but immensely satisfied, seeing the abundant New Year goods, the anticipation for the Spring Festival has reached its peak.

state.今日运动: High-intensity procurement, handling heavy goods, approximately 3 hours of walking.

2025-01.daily_overview: The last working day before the Lunar New Year's Eve. Amidst the operation of the shop, various trivial preparations for the New Year were interspersed: thorough house cleaning and preparing red envelopes with lucky money. Meanwhile, the exploration of a new personal hobby also commenced, as he decisively placed an order for pour-over coffee equipment and beans. Both professional and personal life were in the final sprint and groundwork for the upcoming holiday.

events.name: Place an order to purchase pour-over coffee equipment.
events.description: After researching over the weekend, Lei Mingxuan no longer hesitated. During the morning lull at the shop, he repeatedly compared several entry-level pour-over coffee sets on Taobao and ultimately chose a well-reviewed "beginner's package" that included a hand grinder, a gooseneck kettle, a V60 dripper, and a sharing pot. He liked the feeling of "getting everything done in one go" and decisively placed the order. Now, all that remained was the anticipation of waiting for the delivery.

events.name: Conducting year-end cleaning with parents
events.description: The shop closed early in the afternoon. Lei Mingxuan returned home and joined his parents for the annual year-end deep cleaning. He was responsible for wiping the high windows and light fixtures, while his father cleaned the balcony and organized miscellaneous items. His mother took charge of the thorough cleaning of the kitchen and bathroom. The family worked together, chatting as they tidied up. Though tired, they felt particularly cheerful seeing their home bright, clean, and refreshed. After the cleaning, they put up new Spring Festival couplets on the door, along with paper-cuttings and the character "福" (fortune) on the windows, instantly filling the house with festive atmosphere.

events.name: Prepare red envelopes with lucky money
events.description: After the thorough cleaning, Lei Mingxuan returned to his room with a stack of brand-new, sequentially numbered banknotes he had exchanged at the bank in advance. Following the previously prepared list and amounts, he placed the cash into red envelopes adorned with golden patterns. On the back of some red envelopes intended for younger relatives, he wrote simple blessings. With a thick stack of red envelopes ready, he was all set to distribute them on New Year’s Eve and during the Spring Festival.

events.name: Added: Due to pre-holiday stress, I had a late-night phone call with my childhood friend Zhang Wei to vent, resulting in staying up late.
events.description: In the evening, feeling the pressure from the pre-holiday workload, Lei Mingxuan took the initiative to call his childhood friend Zhang Wei. He poured out his concerns about the preparations for his shop and family matters. Their conversation lasted nearly an hour, causing him to go to bed later than planned.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Busy yet organized, the final workday before the holiday, balancing store preparations with family arrangements.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: The joy brought by cleanliness and order, everything is ready for the New Year.

date_attribute.holiday: Chinese New Year's Eve

2025-01.daily_overview: On Lunar New Year's Eve, a day of family reunion, the entire day is immersed in a rich atmosphere of family warmth. From the morning rituals and the afternoon kitchen symphony, to the sumptuous reunion dinner and the cozy tradition of staying up late to watch the Spring Festival Gala, the day culminates in the heartfelt moment of presenting gifts and red envelopes to parents. It is a day where tradition intertwines with modernity, overflowing with familial affection.

events.name: Completion and Documentation of the First Volume of Historical Fiction Reading
events.description: On the morning of New Year's Eve, while the household was not yet busy, Lei Mingxuan finished reading the final chapter of the first volume of a Ming dynasty novel. He closed the book and briefly recorded in a reading notes app the impressions left on him by several key figures (Zhu Yuanzhang, Zhu Di), as well as his preliminary understanding of the political and military landscape in the early Ming dynasty. He also planned to start reading the second volume during the Spring Festival holiday.

events.name: Assist in preparing New Year greeting gifts
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan helped his parents with the final sorting and packing of some pre-packaged New Year goods (such as fruit gift boxes and health products), making them convenient to carry directly when visiting relatives and friends starting the next day. The family also took the opportunity to reconfirm the order and timing of visiting relatives during the Spring Festival.

events.name: Family collaboration in preparing the New Year's Eve dinner
events.description: From the afternoon onward, the kitchen at home became the liveliest place. Mother Wang Xiuying served as the commander-in-chief and head chef, while father Lei Jianguo was responsible for handling the fish and cleaning the more complex ingredients. Lei Mingxuan took on all the miscellaneous tasks, such as chopping, peeling garlic, and passing seasonings. Braised pork simmered in the pot, the aroma of steamed fish wafted from the steamer, and the filling for dumplings was also ready. The kitchen was filled with steam and enticing scents, bustling with the sounds of busy yet joyful activity.

events.name: Sharing a Bountiful Chinese New Year's Eve Dinner
events.description: As evening fell, a sumptuous New Year's Eve feast covered the dining table: braised pork belly, steamed mandarin fish, poached chicken, stir-fried shrimp, eight-treasure rice, and a family reunion hotpot… The whole family gathered around the table, raising their glasses together and exchanging wishes of "Happy New Year." Lei Mingxuan expressed gratitude to his parents for their hard work and support throughout the year, while his parents wished him prosperity in his business and good health. Everyone chatted and ate, sharing stories from the past year and hopes for the year ahead, creating a warm and harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: Family staying up late to watch the Spring Festival Gala
events.description: After dinner, the family moved to the living room, where the coffee table was filled with candies, melon seeds, and fruits. While enjoying the snacks, they watched the CCTV Spring Festival Gala. Although watching the gala nowadays is more about having it as background noise and the fun of making humorous comments, gathering as a family to discuss the performances and chat about daily life remains an indispensable ritual of New Year's Eve.

events.name: Presenting gifts and red envelopes to parents
events.description: As midnight approached, marking the transition from the old year to the new, Lei Mingxuan brought out two carefully prepared gift boxes and thick red envelopes. He handed the box containing fishing gear to his father, saying, "Dad, you can try out the new rod when spring comes." Then, he presented the cashmere scarf to his mother, adding, "Mom, it's warm and looks good on you." Finally, he gave each of his parents a red envelope filled with a generous amount of cash, saying, "Dad, Mom, this is a small token of my appreciation. Please buy something you like and stay healthy and happy in the new year!" His parents accepted the gifts and envelopes with pleasant surprise, their faces beaming with contentment and joy. His mother’s eyes even grew slightly moist.

events.name: Giving lucky money to younger relatives
events.description: During the family reunion dinner and the New Year's Eve vigil, Lei Mingxuan also extended New Year's greetings to several uncles and aunts who live in the same city and came to visit. He distributed prepared red envelopes containing lucky money to the younger siblings and children present, receiving their adorable blessings and spreading the festive joy of the New Year.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Tranquil, serene, and filled with anticipation for family reunion.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Filled with happiness, warmth, and a sense of fulfillment, the profound joy brought by family affection

date_attribute.holiday: Spring Festival

2025-01.daily_overview: On the first day of the Lunar New Year, marking the beginning of spring, I unpacked the long-awaited coffee equipment amidst the sound of firecrackers in the morning. In the afternoon, I visited my aunt’s home with my parents to extend New Year greetings, enjoying the warmth of family reunion. In the evening, I conveyed blessings to distant relatives and friends through online means. This was the first day of the Spring Festival—a blend of tradition and modernity, with well-wishes shared both offline and online.

events.name: Received the coffee equipment and cleaned it.
events.description: In the morning, the courier delivered the eagerly awaited package of pour-over coffee equipment. Lei Mingxuan excitedly unpacked it, carefully inspecting each item—the coffee grinder, gooseneck kettle, filter dripper, and sharing pitcher. Although they were all basic models, the craftsmanship appeared to be of good quality. Following the instructions, he thoroughly rinsed all the equipment that would come into contact with the coffee (the filter dripper and sharing pitcher) with clean water, then left them to dry in the kitchen, preparing to attempt his first brew either that evening or the next day.

events.name: Visiting my aunt's home to extend New Year greetings
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan and his parents, carrying gifts, went together to visit his aunt's home in another residential area of Pudong to extend New Year's greetings. His aunt and uncle warmly received them, and his cousin Yang Fan, who had returned to Shanghai from Hangzhou for the New Year, was also there. Everyone sat together, chatting while enjoying candies and snacks. Lei Mingxuan and Yang Fan talked the most, discussing topics ranging from Yang Fan's algorithm-related work to Lei Mingxuan's ideas for digitizing his store. Yang Fan offered him some simple technical advice. The two families enjoyed a harmonious and joyful gathering, filled with laughter and cheerful conversations.

events.name: Sending online greetings in the early hours of the first day of the Lunar New Year
events.description: In fact, this action took place in the early hours of the first day of the Lunar New Year, right after the tradition of staying up late to welcome the New Year. Lei Mingxuan returned to his room but did not go to sleep immediately. Instead, he picked up his phone and sent New Year's greetings to his closest relatives and friends who were not with him. He sent customized festive messages and emojis to his cousin Yang Fan in Hangzhou (even though they had met in the afternoon), his cousin Shen Jie (with whom he had arranged to meet the next day), and important friends such as his childhood friend Li Na, high school classmates Chen Hao and Liu Yang, and university classmate Wang Lei. He also engaged in brief online conversations to maintain friendships that spanned across distances.

events.name: New: Due to frequent gatherings during the Spring Festival, weight has slightly increased, and it has been decided to increase exercise starting tomorrow.
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Lei Mingxuan felt that his dietary control had relaxed during the Spring Festival, possibly leading to weight gain, and planned to resume light exercise tomorrow to achieve balance.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy the holiday morning and the fun of unwrapping presents.

结束状态.所处地点: At Home, No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Warm and lively, surrounded by family affection, eager to explore new hobbies.

2025-01.daily_overview: On the second day of the Lunar New Year, the tradition of visiting relatives and friends continues. Today, I went to my uncle’s home to extend New Year’s greetings and had more in-depth conversations with my cousin Shen Jie, who also lives in Shanghai and works in a related profession. Our discussion naturally revolved around fashion and store management, making it both a family gathering and a relaxed exchange among industry peers. The festive atmosphere continued to deepen through family meals and the exchange of ideas among professionals.

events.name: Visiting my uncle's home for a New Year's gathering.
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan's family went to his uncle's house to pay a New Year visit. His aunt prepared a table full of her signature dishes. During the meal, Lei Mingxuan naturally sat next to his cousin Shen Jie, who also works as a buyer in Shanghai. Starting with a critique of the outfits from this year's Spring Festival Gala, they quickly moved on to discuss several domestic designer brands that Shen Jie had recently taken an interest in, predictions for popular colors after the Spring Festival, and the feedback from Lei Mingxuan's store's holiday promotions. Shen Jie offered some professional suggestions on his product selection, which Lei Mingxuan listened to attentively. This kind of industry exchange during a family gathering added more common ground and mutual support to their cousin relationship.

events.name: New: Resume light exercise and engage in home fitness
events.description: After returning home in the evening, to balance his Spring Festival diet, Lei Mingxuan performed a 30-minute indoor morning run (on a treadmill) and core training at home, feeling his body regain vitality.

起始状态.心情: Continuing the leisurely pace of the holiday, preparing to resume family gatherings.

结束状态.所处地点: 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai, China
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and enjoyable, I cherished the time spent with family and gained valuable industry insights.

state.今日运动: New Year's house visits on foot (light activity), 30 minutes of indoor morning running, 15 minutes of core training

date_attribute.holiday: Spring Festival

2025-01.daily_overview: The end of the Spring Festival holiday also marked the final day of January. In the morning, he conducted a review of his health achievements for the month. The significant weight loss brought immense encouragement, prompting him to immediately plan an advanced fitness regimen for the following month. In the afternoon, he immersed himself in the continuation of his historical reading. In the evening, he boldly attempted his first-ever hand-brewed coffee, opening a new chapter in skill exploration. At the same time, he did not forget to extend New Year greetings to friends online and maintained warm interactions with his neighbors. The day was filled with affirmation of the efforts made over the past month and positive planning for the future.

events.name: Monthly Weight Review and Achievement Confirmation
events.description: On a morning at the end of January, Lei Mingxuan stepped onto the body fat scale at home as if performing a ritual after getting up. The number on the screen caught his eye: 78.8 kilograms! Compared to 80 kilograms at the beginning of the month, his weight had dropped by 1.2 kilograms, and his body fat percentage also showed a slight decrease. This tangible data provided him with significant positive feedback, making him truly feel the changes brought about by consciously choosing healthy lunches and occasionally increasing his exercise frequency over the past month.

events.name: Develop an Advanced Fitness Plan for February
events.description: Encouraged by his success, Lei Mingxuan immediately sprang into action. Utilizing the morning, he took into account the upcoming end of the Spring Festival holiday (with its many gatherings) and his subsequent work schedule to draft a more detailed February fitness and diet plan in his phone's notes. The plan included: resuming gym workouts 2-3 times a week after the Spring Festival (incorporating strength training), adjusting his diet to increase protein intake, and adopting a strategy for social gatherings—"prioritize vegetables and protein, control staple foods and alcohol consumption." He felt more confident and clear about the path to achieving his goal of a "healthy BMI."

events.name: Continue reading historical novels
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan nestled on the sofa, continuing to read the second volume of "The Stories of the Ming Dynasty." As he delved deeper into the book, his understanding of Ming Dynasty history gradually deepened, and he increasingly felt that he could draw inspiration for modern life and business from the wisdom and lessons of the ancients.

events.name: First Attempt at Brewing Pour-Over Coffee at Home
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan finally could no longer restrain his curiosity and decided to attempt his first-ever manual pour-over coffee. Following the video tutorial, he carefully measured out 15 grams of coffee beans, ground them using a hand grinder (which required some effort), heated water to 92°C, and then proceeded step by step through warming the cup, distributing the grounds, performing the bloom, and adding water in stages. The process was a bit clumsy, and his water pouring was not entirely even. However, when the brown coffee liquid dripped into the sharing pot and released its aroma, he was filled with a sense of accomplishment. He tasted the first cup of coffee he had ever brewed himself. Although the flavor was not as balanced as that from a café, he could distinctly taste its unique notes, and knowing he had made it with his own hands made it taste exceptionally sweet. This experience filled him with anticipation for his future practice sessions.

events.name: Sending New Year greetings online to maintain social connections.
events.description: In the evening, he sent New Year greetings via WeChat to some friends he hadn't had time to individually greet in the previous days, such as billiard friends Han Dong and Qin Lang, suppliers Zhou Tao and Wu Fang, and financial manager Xu Feng. He also engaged in brief conversations with them to maintain the activity of his social network.

events.name: Neighborhood New Year Greetings
events.description: When going out to take out the trash in the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan encountered his neighbor Aunt Zhu in the alley. Lei Mingxuan took the initiative to greet her with a smile: "Aunt Zhu, Happy New Year! Wishing you good health!" Aunt Zhu also responded cheerfully and insisted on giving him a bag of homemade glutinous rice lotus root candy, saying it was for "sweetness and happiness." This simple neighborhood friendship warmed Lei Mingxuan's heart.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Calm, with anticipation for the results of the monthly review.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Excited, satisfied, and full of curiosity, proud of the progress in health, and passionate about learning new skills.

state.今日运动: Try pour-over coffee (light activity), indoor morning run for 35 minutes.

events.name: Accompanying Mother to Purchase New Year's Goods and Decorations

events.description: After work, I braved the rain to go to the gym for training, including dumbbell presses and leg presses. I reduced the weight and increased the repetitions to focus on muscular endurance, building up physical stamina in preparation for the Spring Festival feasts.

events.name: Continuous Historical Novel Reading and Plot Immersion

The protagonist's maneuvering in the political arena captivated him, and after reading nearly two chapters, he gained a more concrete understanding of the bureaucratic system of the Ming Dynasty.

events.name: Temporarily handling customer inquiries for the store

events.name: Family Dinner and New Year Plans Confirmation
events.description: In the evening, while enjoying a home-cooked meal with my parents, we confirmed the Spring Festival arrangements: the New Year's Eve dinner menu, gifts for visiting relatives, and a post-holiday hot spring trip, all in a warm family atmosphere.

events.name: Confirm the inventory tools and get to bed early for rest.

events.name: Reading Before Bed for Relaxation and Mental Organization

2025-02.daily_overview: On Saturday, I visited an art exhibition in Puxi alone, blending inspiration collection with commercial thinking to provide direction for the store's upgrade. In the evening, I shared the inspiration, and my weight remained stable.

events.name: Plan and visit the West Bund Art Center for an exhibition.
events.description: Book tickets for the 'Between Mountains' exhibition in the morning, plan the public transportation route, carry a canvas bag with a sketchbook and power bank, and take the subway across the river in the afternoon.

events.name: Immersive Exhibition Viewing and Inspiration Sketch Recording
events.description: Captivated by the urban outdoor aesthetics on display, I captured photos of the works with my phone and sketched clothing silhouettes and scene drafts in my sketchbook, with inspiration flowing continuously.

events.name: In-Depth Reflection and Theme Conception for Cafés
events.description: After viewing the exhibition, I ordered a Yirgacheffe pour-over coffee at the café. While savoring it, I browsed through sketches, contemplating how to integrate nature and urban elements into the store's "Urban Micro-Outdoor" theme.

events.name: Organize and share inspirations with friends upon returning.
events.description: On the subway ride back, I tagged photos and sent the most inspiring photos and sketches to my cousin Shen Jie and regular customer Qian Duoduo in the evening to seek their opinions on trends, receiving enthusiastic responses.

起始状态.心情: Anticipation, preparing for the hunt of inspiration

结束状态.心情: Excitement, active thinking, and strong creative drive

2025-02.daily_overview: On the pre-New Year's Eve family mobilization day, the whole family collaborates on a thorough cleaning and festive decorations. In the evening, everyone gathers for a celebratory feast, resulting in a slight weight gain due to the sumptuous dinner.

events.name: Family Collaborative Cleaning and Task Division
events.description: In the morning, the whole family carried out their tasks according to the division of labor: Lei Mingxuan wiped the lamps and tidied the rooms, the mother cleaned the kitchen and bathroom, and the father cleaned the windows and checked the water and electricity, all while chatting as they worked.

events.name: Home Decoration and Atmosphere Creation for Welcoming the New Year
events.description: After cleaning, the entire family puts up Spring Festival couplets, "Fu" character decorations, and paper-cuttings on windows, and arranges narcissus and kumquat plants, filling the home with a festive Spring Festival atmosphere.

events.name: Demonstrating hand-drip coffee for parents and receiving encouragement
events.description: During the afternoon break, I brewed coffee for my parents and explained the steps. Although they found the taste unusual, they offered encouragement and support. My father remarked that it was more intricate than brewing tea.

events.name: Prepare for Annual Store Inventory and Tool Verification
events.description: In the evening, go to the store to export the annual data, print the inventory checklist, and properly place the barcode scanner and logbook to ensure efficient inventory the following day.

events.name: Warm Family Celebration Banquet and Culinary Enjoyment
events.description: In the evening, the mother prepared dishes including braised pork belly. The family gathered around the table to enjoy the meal, reflecting on the day's collaboration and looking forward to the New Year's Eve with warmth and affection.

起始状态.心情: Full of vitality, engaged in household chores

结束状态.心情: Warm and content, with a strong sense of family belonging.

state.今日运动: Moderate activity (house cleaning, moving)

date_attribute.holiday: New Year's Eve

2025-02.daily_overview: On New Year's Eve, the morning was spent on efficient and pragmatic inventory checks at the shop. In the afternoon, the family prepared for the reunion dinner. The evening was dedicated to staying up late and reading, with body weight slightly reduced due to controlled eating.

events.name: Comprehensive Annual Inventory Count and Data Verification for the Store
events.description: In the morning, all apparel and accessory inventories were counted. Barcode scanning was used to verify system data, and records were made of hot-selling items that were out of stock and slow-moving products. Satisfaction was expressed with the refined management, as the accounts and physical inventory were largely consistent.

events.name: Join the WeChat group for the apparel retail industry.
events.description: During the lunch break, I joined the industry group by scanning the QR code shared by Zhao Min, changed my nickname to "[Pudong] XX Apparel - Lei Mingxuan," and browsed the group chat to discover valuable information channels.

events.name: Participation in the Preparation of the Family Reunion Dinner and Ingredient Processing
events.description: In the afternoon, I returned home to help my mother prepare ingredients and set the tableware, while my father adjusted the television in preparation for the Spring Festival Gala. Each of us was busy getting ready for the important meal.

events.name: Sharing the New Year's Eve Dinner and Staying Up Late, While Paying Attention to Father's Health
events.description: In the evening, we enjoyed the New Year's Eve dinner, adhering to a healthy strategy by prioritizing steamed fish and vegetables, while having a small taste of braised pork. While watching the Spring Festival Gala and chatting about daily life, my father mentioned that his ears felt stuffy and his hearing had declined, which Lei Mingxuan took to heart.

events.name: In-Depth Reading and Plot Immersion on New Year's Eve
events.description: After midnight, when his parents had retired for the night, Lei Mingxuan brewed a pot of Pu'er tea and immersed himself in a novel during the tranquil late hours. The palace intrigue depicted in the story stood in stark contrast to the serene stillness outside his window, and he lost himself in reading several chapters.

起始状态.心情: Focus, when dealing with important tasks

结束状态.心情: Peaceful and fulfilling, with steady work and a warm family.

state.今日运动: Light physical activity (inventory counting, household chores)

date_attribute.holiday: Spring Festival

2025-02.daily_overview: On the first day of the Lunar New Year, I started the year with morning aerobic exercise, made post-holiday plans for the shop in the afternoon, discussed historical topics with my father in the evening, and saw a decrease in weight due to exercise control.

events.name: New Year's Morning Aerobic Exercise and Cardiopulmonary Maintenance
events.description: In the morning, I went to the community gym and jogged at a steady pace on the treadmill for 40 minutes. Sweating left me feeling refreshed and invigorated, proving that my health goals were not interrupted by the holiday.

events.name: Develop Post-Holiday Store Operations and Replenishment Plan
events.description: After returning from the sports event, compile two lists based on the inventory data: one for replenishing hot-selling items to Zhou Tao, and another for the discount plan on off-season products for the Lantern Festival promotion.

events.name: Announcement of Spring Festival Store Closure and Holiday Greetings
events.description:
Store Closure Notice

Our store will be closed from the afternoon of Chinese New Year's Eve to the third day of the Lunar New Year. We will resume business on the fourth day of the Lunar New Year.

This notice will be posted at the entrance, shared in customer groups, on social media, and on Dianping.

Wishing everyone a happy and prosperous New Year!

events.name: Commence research on online store expansion (cross-day event initiated)
events.description: Spend the evening preliminarily browsing e-commerce platform tutorials, such as those for Taobao store operations, and consider transitioning the store online to prepare for mid-term goals.

events.name: Discussions and Associations Regarding Historical Topics with My Father
events.description: While reading a novel, I reflected on enterprise management and discussed the national policy of "converting paddy fields to mulberry fields" with my father. Drawing on his experience in state-owned factories, my father remarked that the implementation of policies depends on the people involved, leading to an interesting exchange between father and son.

起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy the beginning of the holiday.

结束状态.心情: Clear thinking, smooth movement, and pleasant communication.

state.今日运动: 40 minutes of aerobic exercise (jogging)

date_attribute.holiday: Spring Festival

2025-02.daily_overview: On the second day of the Chinese New Year, I handled external coordination for the shop and registered for a lecture in the morning, followed by elliptical machine training in the afternoon. In the evening, I continued with online expansion research, and my weight remained well-controlled due to the training.

events.name: Confirm holiday safety arrangements with the mall property management.
events.description: In the morning, I went to the property management office to communicate with Zheng Kai regarding the Spring Festival security and emergency plan for the shopping mall. Zheng Kai reminded me of the opening arrangements on the fourth day of the lunar new year and shared a link to a lecture on retail digital transformation.

events.name: Registration for Industry Seminars and Study Preparation
events.description: Returning home at noon, I checked the lecture details. The keynote speaker, a senior expert, covered topics on private domain traffic and experiential retail. I immediately registered online to apply.

events.name: Gym Elliptical Machine Interval Training
events.description: In the afternoon, I went to the gym and chose the elliptical machine for a 30-minute moderate-to-high-intensity interval training session. I worked up a sweat to burn calories and counteract the effects of consecutive dinner gatherings.

events.name: Continue researching online store expansion (cross-day event continues)
events.description: Continue studying e-commerce platform operations in the evening, focusing on successful cases and common pitfalls, and begin planning a preliminary schedule.

events.name: Prepare Supplier Strategy Communication Materials
events.description: Compile the exhibition inspiration, sales data, and restocking needs for 'Between Mountain Ranges' into a list of talking points in preparation for an in-depth discussion with Zhou Tao the following day.

起始状态.心情: Leisure, planning the day's schedule

结束状态.心情: Well prepared and looking forward to the communication tomorrow.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the third day of the Chinese New Year, I completed key supplier communications to enhance relationships. In the afternoon, I attended a fashion circle gathering to exchange trends. In the evening, I invited my childhood friends for a get-together, and my weight increased due to the gatherings.

events.name: Strategic Video Communication with Supplier Zhou Tao
events.description: In the morning, I had a lengthy video call with Zhou Tao via WeChat at the store, sharing trends in outdoor aesthetics and proposing the need for lightweight spring fabrics and functional textures. Zhou Tao provided feedback on the direction for new product development.

events.name: Organize communication minutes and plan follow-up meetings
events.description: After the video conference, organize the core points, consensus, and action items into an electronic document and send it to Zhou Tao for confirmation. It is proposed to hold a video conference after the Lantern Festival to finalize the spring orders, and Zhou Tao agrees.

events.name: Dining with fashion industry friends and seeking advice on trends
events.description: In the afternoon, at the invitation of Shen Jie, I had dinner with friends from the fashion circle at a fusion cuisine restaurant. I chose grilled chicken breast salad and quinoa rice, and gained inspiration from discussing views on the 'urban outdoor' style.

events.name: Continue online expansion research and set goals (cross-day events to be continued)
events.description: Spend the evening setting preliminary goals for the online store: open a Taobao store and complete the initial product listings within three months.

events.name: Inviting childhood friend Zhang Wei for a small gathering before the holiday
events.description: Contact Zhang Wei via WeChat to finalize plans for a small gathering at a local Shanghainese restaurant in Pudong tomorrow evening. Book a table in advance and look forward to a pleasant conversation.

结束状态.心情: A sense of fulfillment from success in both social life and career.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the fourth day of the Chinese New Year, which coincided with Valentine's Day, I had a meal with my childhood friend Zhang Wei, reminiscing about the past and looking ahead to the future. We practiced healthy eating habits and made plans to play pool after the holiday. As a result of dietary control, my weight has slightly decreased.

events.name: A Pre-Holiday Gathering and Heart-to-Heart Chat with Childhood Friend Zhang Wei
events.description: At 7 p.m., I met Zhang Wei at the local cuisine restaurant. We ordered braised pork and fried shrimp, among other dishes. Zhang Wei shared the joy of becoming a father, while Lei Mingxuan discussed the ups and downs of his shop and his plans for online expansion. We also reminisced about childhood anecdotes.

events.name: Implementing Healthy Dietary Strategies and Sequence Control
events.description: Faced with delicious food, Zhang Wei first drinks soup, then consumes a large amount of seasonal vegetables and oil-braised shrimp, samples a small portion of braised pork, and proactively substitutes tea for alcohol, understanding and supporting the approach.

events.name: Organize and coordinate the post-festival billiards activity.
events.description: As the dinner gathering drew to a close, a billiards match after the Lantern Festival was proposed. Zhang Wei responded positively, and Lei Mingxuan said he would take charge of contacting Han Dong to book the venue. The two sealed the agreement with a high-five.

events.name: After returning home, it sparked a heated discussion in the WeChat group.
events.description: After the gathering, I took the subway home and sent a message in the "Pudong Three Musketeers" WeChat group, saying that I had just had dinner with Zhang Wei but Li Na was missing. This instantly sparked a lively discussion in the group.

events.name: Brief Review of Online Expansion Progress
events.description: Briefly review online research notes before bedtime to confirm specific action steps starting next week.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the last day of the Spring Festival holiday, I spent the morning reading and reflecting at a café, went rollerblading along the riverside in the afternoon, and in the evening, I booked a family hot spring trip and organized my thoughts, ensuring my weight strictly matched the end-of-holiday state.

events.name: Immersed in Reading and Business Reflection at the End of the Holiday
events.description: In the morning, I brought books and my laptop to a quiet café, ordered an Americano, read the chapter about the downfall of the powerful minister in the novel, and recorded my reflections on the balance of shop management.

events.name: Riverside Sports and Photography with Roller Skating Partner Song Jia
events.description: In the afternoon, I met Song Jia at the Pudong Riverside Roller Skating Track. We skated freely along the riverside, feeling the gentle breeze of early spring. We paused to take photos of each other, capturing the moments of our activity and the scenic river views.

events.name: Post-Workout Light Meal Gathering and Sharing Plan
events.description: After roller skating, we ordered freshly squeezed juice and energy bowls at the riverside light meal shop to replenish our energy and share vacation anecdotes. Song Jia mentioned short-distance hiking, while Lei Mingxuan shared his ideas for the shop.

events.name: Book a family hot spring trip as a relaxing gift
events.description: In the evening, I returned home and used an app to compare and book a private hot spring boutique resort in Zhujiajiao, Qingpu, deciding on the weekend as a post-holiday relaxation gift for the whole family.

events.name: Organizing One's State of Mind and Planning Key Post-Holiday Work Priorities
events.description: In the evening, check the store keys and clothing, and plan the work for the first week after the holiday: adjust displays and prepare promotions based on inventory, soak feet while reflecting on the holiday to feel physically and mentally recharged.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the last day of the Spring Festival holiday, Lei Mingxuan actively resumed his fitness routine to prepare for post-holiday life, while also immersing himself in the world of historical novels and staying up late due to video chats with childhood friends. This day served as a transition from vacation to work, involving both physical rejuvenation and the continuation of social connections.

events.name: Resume Gym Training
events.description: As the Spring Festival holiday drew to a close, Lei Mingxuan realized it was time to quickly return to his daily routine. In the afternoon, he visited the community gym near his residential compound in Pudong New Area for his first systematic post-holiday workout. Having taken a relaxed approach to rest and diet during the break, he opted for a moderate-intensity upper-body strength training session, which included bench presses, rows, and shoulder presses. The focus of the workout was to awaken his muscles and regain a sense of exertion, rather than pursuing heavy weights. After the session, he felt some muscle soreness but also a noticeable boost in his spirits.

events.name: Video chatting with childhood friend Zhang Wei to discuss billiards tactics.
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan had a video call with his childhood friend Zhang Wei in his home study. They excitedly discussed new billiards tactics and recent matches. The conversation lasted until late, during which Lei Mingxuan shared his experiences during the Spring Festival and planned to meet for billiards next week. This helped him relax but resulted in a delayed bedtime.

events.name: Writing a Reflection on a Historical Novel
events.description: After the video chat, Lei Mingxuan took some time to read the final chapters of "The Great Ming Dynasty 1566" and drafted the beginning of his reading reflections on his blog. However, due to the late hour, he did not finish and plans to continue tomorrow.

2025-02.daily_overview: The official conclusion of the Spring Festival holiday. In the morning, Lei Mingxuan adjusted his post-holiday diet with his mother, savoring the final moments of family time; in the afternoon, he engaged in thought-provoking discussions with his visiting cousin Shen Jie and handled unexpected supplier matters. The day was filled with warm family interactions, inspiring exchanges, and sudden work tasks.

events.name: Preparing a light dinner with mother
events.description: Considering the greasy diet during the Spring Festival, Lei Mingxuan took the initiative to propose and prepare a light and healthy dinner together with his mother, Wang Xiuying. He was responsible for washing vegetables and preparing salad dressing, while his mother steamed a sea bass. At the dinner table, he exchanged holiday reflections with his parents and announced that he would officially return to work at the shop starting the next day, while also committing to his fitness and healthy eating plan. The dinner was relatively hearty, leading to a slight increase in weight.

events.name: Exchanging reading insights with my cousin Shen Jie
events.description: In the afternoon, my cousin Shen Jie came to visit. Lei Mingxuan excitedly shared with her the recently finished book "The Great Ming Dynasty 1566" and his blog posts. The two chatted from history to business, and Shen Jie offered fresh insights from the perspective of a fashion buyer, which greatly benefited Lei Mingxuan.

events.name: Received an unexpected call from supplier Zhou Tao to discuss spring fabrics.
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan received a call from Zhou Tao, a supplier in Hangzhou, to urgently discuss the delivery time and price adjustment for a batch of spring fabric samples. He quickly handled the order details, demonstrating his business adaptability, though he felt slightly pressured.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the first day back to work after the holiday, Lei Mingxuan got up early to resume his morning jogging routine and immersed himself in the busy tasks at his shop. He handled matters efficiently and gathered information for the future. In the evening, noticing his father’s unusual health condition, he felt a new sense of concern.

events.name: Resuming Morning Runs and Core Training
events.description: To quickly transition into work mode and implement his fitness plan, Lei Mingxuan woke up earlier than usual and went for a 45-minute jog in the community park amidst the morning mist, incorporating interval sprints. After returning home, he performed three sets of planks and crunches to enhance core stability. The sweat helped him regain a sense of control over his body.

events.name: Store Resumption and Annual Planning
events.description: At nine in the morning, Lei Mingxuan arrived punctually at the clothing store located in Century Avenue Mall. He organized the holiday accounts, held a refocusing meeting with the staff, refined the "Urban Outdoor" theme concept, and sketched display layouts. The work was efficient yet intensive.

events.name: Pay attention to industry lecture information
events.description: During the lunch break, Lei Mingxuan browsed industry-related public accounts and discovered a lecture on "New Retail Experience" scheduled for this Saturday. He immediately registered and adjusted his work schedule accordingly.

events.name: Detecting Potential Health Issues in Father and Conducting Preliminary Research
events.description: During dinner, Father Lei Jianguo mentioned issues with his hearing and dizziness. Lei Mingxuan was concerned and suggested getting a checkup after the Lunar New Year, but his father declined. Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan used his phone to look up health information for middle-aged and elderly individuals and recorded it in his memo app.

2025-03.daily_overview: On a rainy Tuesday, Lei Mingxuan primarily worked in the shop, communicating with suppliers about orders and inspecting fabrics in the rain. Feeling slightly fatigued from staying up late the previous night, he skipped his morning run.

events.name: Communicate the details of the spring order with supplier Zhou Tao.
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan discussed the style details with Zhou Tao via WeChat voice call, reaching a preliminary purchasing intention and agreeing to send fabric samples.

events.name: Visiting the fabric market in the rain to inspect materials.
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan drove to the fabric market to compare spring fabrics such as cotton-linen blends on-site, taking photos to prepare for placing orders.

events.name: Attempted home workouts but gave up due to exhaustion.
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Lei Mingxuan originally planned to follow a 20-minute Keep workout session. However, due to exhaustion from the day and the impact of rainy weather, he only warmed up for five minutes before giving up and opting to rest instead.

events.name: Observing industry trends through lurking in online communities.
events.description: Before going to bed, browse the clothing store owner WeChat group and fashion public accounts to maintain industry sensitivity, without actively participating in discussions.

起始状态.心情: Pragmatic yet somewhat weary

结束状态.所处地点: 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Slightly tired but feeling fulfilled.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Wednesday, a workday, Lei Mingxuan handled store sales during the day and participated in his regular basketball activity in the evening. After the game, he had a late-night snack with his teammates, which led to weight gain.

events.name: Daily Store Operations and Display Fine-Tuning
events.description: During the day, we receive walk-in customers and make minor adjustments to the displays, highlighting material combinations to test customer reactions.

events.name: Weekly Fixed Basketball Activity
events.description: From 7:00 PM to 9:00 PM, I played basketball for two hours with my teammate Xie Fei at Yuanshen Sports Center, and we cooperated seamlessly.

events.name: Having barbecue supper with teammates after playing basketball.
events.description: After playing basketball, Lei Mingxuan and Xie Fei had a late-night snack at a nearby barbecue restaurant, chatting about the NBA and life while consuming high-calorie food.

events.name: A brief discussion with my father about hearing condition before sleep.
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Lei Mingxuan inquired about his father's recent situation in a slightly louder voice, noticing that his father leaned in more noticeably to listen, which heightened his concern.

起始状态.心情: Smooth, looking forward to evening exercise.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai, China
结束状态.心情: Feeling refreshed after exercise, but with slightly increased concern for my father.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Thursday, I took a day off to accompany my father for a hearing aid fitting. I was busy all day and stayed up late at night to handle the backlog of orders for the shop. The stress led to irregular eating habits.

events.name: Accompanying my father to the hearing aid fitting center.
events.description: At 9 a.m., Lei Mingxuan drove his father to the professional fitting center in Pudong, having done preparatory research in advance to select suitable options.

events.name: Father undergoes professional hearing assessment and trial fitting.
events.description: At the center, the audiologist's testing for the father revealed moderate high-frequency hearing loss, and he tried on multiple hearing aids to compare their effectiveness.

events.name: Select and purchase a hearing aid for father
events.description: After comparison, the German brand in-the-ear hearing aid was selected, payment was made, and usage instructions were learned, followed by scheduling a follow-up visit.

events.name: Staying up late to handle spring orders for the store.
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Lei Mingxuan stayed up for two hours to handle the backlog of online orders and customer inquiries via computer until late at night.

起始状态.心情: Concerned and focused

结束状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Relieved yet weary, with mounting pressure.

2025-03.daily_overview: Returned to store operations on Friday, followed up on orders, and remotely checked on my father. Attempted to start the day with early morning exercise but was interrupted by work calls. Emotions fluctuated due to stress.

events.name: Follow up on store operations and spring orders
events.description: Handle online inquiries at the store throughout the day, and confirm styles and order details with suppliers via WeChat.

events.name: Remote monitoring of father's hearing aid adaptation.
events.description: During a work break, I messaged my mother on WeChat to inquire about my father's experience using it. My father reported that the sound was clear but noisy, and he is still getting used to it.

events.name: Attempted to follow along with a morning fitness app workout but discontinued.
events.description: At 7 a.m., I attempted to do a 20-minute HIIT workout using Keep, but was interrupted by an urgent client call after 10 minutes and was unable to complete it.

events.name: Evening Brief Review and Stress Relief
events.description: After closing the shop, I reviewed the work of the past week. While progress has been made on the spring plan, concerns about my father's condition weigh on my mind, leaving me feeling somewhat low. I tried to relax by listening to music.

起始状态.心情: Back to the work routine, but with thoughts for my father.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai, China
结束状态.心情: Slightly fatigued, generally stable but with underlying pressure.

2025-03.daily_overview: The store experienced high customer traffic on Saturday, with busy sales throughout the day. I declined an invitation to a roller-skating gathering to prioritize family time. In the evening, I stayed up late handling a customer complaint.

events.name: Weekend Store Busy Day
events.description: After opening in the morning, customers kept coming in. Lei Mingxuan was busy with reception, sales, and handling online orders, with almost no break.

events.name: Handling Customer Complaints Regarding Sizing Issues
events.description: In the afternoon, a customer complained about a size discrepancy. Lei Mingxuan patiently communicated and provided an exchange solution, spending extra time to resolve the issue.

events.name: Declining Social Invitations, Opting for Family Time
events.description: Roller skating partner Song Jia invited for an evening activity, but Lei Mingxuan declined due to considerations for his father and fatigue, suggesting they make plans another time.

events.name: Family Dinner and Observing Father's Condition
events.description: At 7 p.m., I had dinner with my parents and observed that communication improved after my father started wearing his hearing aid, though he occasionally frowned due to noise, which brought me a slight sense of relief.

结束状态.所处地点: 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Contentment after busyness, feeling somewhat reassured about the family situation but weary.

2025-03.daily_overview: Father was suddenly hospitalized due to severe dizziness, causing a drastic change in life. Lei Mingxuan urgently sent him to the hospital and handled the admission procedures, enduring high pressure and no physical activity throughout the day.

events.name: Father suddenly fell seriously ill in the early morning.
events.description: At 7 a.m., when father Lei Jianguo got up, he suddenly experienced vertigo and tinnitus, prompting his mother to make a panicked call for help.

events.name: Return home urgently and call an ambulance.
events.description: Lei Mingxuan immediately closed the shop and rushed home. Seeing his father pale and in pain, he dialed 120 and clearly described the symptoms and address.

events.name: Emergency Hospitalization and Diagnosis of Sudden Sensorineural Hearing Loss
events.description: Transported by ambulance to Renji Hospital, the patient was diagnosed with sudden sensorineural hearing loss in the left ear after emergency and otolaryngology consultations, requiring immediate hospitalization.

events.name: Handling Hospitalization Procedures and Initial Settling In
events.description: Complete the hospitalization procedures and pay the deposit, arrange for father to be admitted to the neurology ward, organize belongings, and provide emotional support.

events.name: Family Emergency Meeting and Task Allocation
events.description: In the evening, I had a simple meal with my mother. Lei Mingxuan took the initiative to assume the primary caregiving responsibilities, and we discussed temporary operational arrangements for the shop.

events.name: On the verge of emotional collapse, briefly shedding tears.
events.description: While alone outside the ward, Lei Mingxuan briefly shed tears due to pressure and helplessness, but quickly composed himself and returned to care for his father.

起始状态.所处地点: Shop A-208, 2nd Floor, a Shopping Mall, Century Avenue, Pudong New District, Shanghai (Store)
起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to start the day's work.

结束状态.所处地点: Neurology Ward, Renji Hospital, Pudong, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Extremely anxious, worried, and stressed

2025-03.daily_overview: On the second day of hospitalization, high-intensity caregiving mode was initiated. Emergency funds were utilized to cover medical expenses, while store operations were coordinated and original plans were canceled. Nighttime caregiving was accompanied by reflections on financial matters.

events.name: Using emergency reserve funds to cover medical expenses.
events.description: In the morning, go to the bank to withdraw 20,000 yuan in cash, pay the hospitalization deposit and fees, check the list, and keep the receipt.

events.name: Coordinate temporary store operation arrangements
events.description: Contact Qian Duoduo and Zhao Min via WeChat to request assistance in looking after the shop, and post a notice regarding adjustments to business hours.

events.name: First round-the-clock hospital accompaniment and shuttling
events.description: During the day, the mother provided care, Lei Mingxuan handled affairs and then went to the hospital to check on the treatment progress, while the father began hormone infusion and hyperbaric oxygen therapy.

events.name: Cancel the self-driving tour plan in Western Sichuan and inform friends about it.
events.description: Informed childhood friends Zhang Wei and Li Na via phone call about the cancellation of the self-driving tour, and received their condolences and support.

events.name: Nighttime Care and Financial Reflection
events.description: During nighttime caregiving, I reflected on the importance of family emergency funds and considered adjusting financial planning to enhance flexibility.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Heavy, filled with a sense of responsibility and pressure.

结束状态.所处地点: Neurology Ward, Renji Hospital, Pudong, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Physically and mentally exhausted, yet persevering to support the family.

2025-03.daily_overview: Tuesday was fragmented by shuttling between the store, the hospital, and home, forcing the postponement of spring plans. The news of my uncle's illness added to the worries, while remote handling of restocking orders continued.

events.name: Fragmented commuting: store - hospital - home
events.description: Open the shop at 7 a.m. to handle urgent inquiries, deliver meals and provide companionship at 10 a.m., process online orders using a laptop in the afternoon, return to the shop for inventory and closing at 5 p.m., and comfort my mother at home in the evening.

events.name: Postpone the Spring New Product Plan
events.description: WeChat notified suppliers Zhou Tao and Wu Fang that the spring selection and order placement have been postponed indefinitely. The suppliers expressed understanding but reminded of the market timing.

events.name: Receiving the news of my uncle's illness has added new worries.
events.description: I received a call from my family at noon, informing me that my uncle needs to be hospitalized for further examination. My mood grew even heavier as I contemplated how to balance visiting him with my other responsibilities.

events.name: Remote Processing of Supplier Replenishment
events.description: During the caregiving break, I communicated with Zhou Tao via WeChat voice messages to urgently place an order for replenishing best-selling styles and entrusted him with recommending reliable new products.

events.name: Attempted simple stretching in the hospital corridor but was interrupted.
events.description: Attempted a five-minute stretching and relaxation session outside the ward in the afternoon, but it was interrupted by a nurse's call and could not be sustained.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Tired but must persevere.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Extreme fatigue and anxiety compound each other, creating a sense of being severely squeezed in terms of time and energy.

2025-03.daily_overview: Emotions were nearing a breaking point. In the evening, confiding in childhood friend Zhang Wei brought support. During the day, the mid-term communication at the hospital indicated stable condition. Although help from friends was politely declined, the mood gradually eased.

events.name: Hospital Companionship and Mid-term Condition Communication
events.description: In the morning, I reported to the doctor about my father's sleep and appetite. In the afternoon, the doctor communicated that the treatment progress was stable, and hearing recovery requires further assessment. The whole family felt somewhat relieved.

events.name: A Confiding Phone Call During Emotional Low
events.description: On the way home in the evening, I proactively called Zhang Wei to provide a detailed account of my father's hospitalization, the difficulties in accompanying him, and the pressure on the shop, engaging in a 40-minute outpouring.

events.name: Obtaining emotional support and advice from friends
events.description: Zhang Wei shared similar experiences to offer comfort, advised paying attention to health and rotating caregiving duties, and offered to help over the weekend.

events.name: Declining a friend's offer of help, yet feeling relieved
events.description: Politely declined Zhang Wei's offer to help at the store, but after sharing the concerns, felt the release of pressure and once again experienced the support of friendship.

events.name: Browsing health knowledge articles before sleep
events.description: Browsing articles on sudden disease prevention on a mobile phone before sleep, one begins to pay attention to health information.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Persistent high pressure, low mood

结束状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: The pressure has somewhat eased, and there is a slight sense of relief after receiving emotional support, but fatigue persists.

2025-03.daily_overview: With his father's condition stabilizing, Lei Mingxuan found a brief respite under immense pressure. His first industry group post resonated widely, and he coordinated with his cousin for assistance while adjusting his social engagements.

events.name: Father's Third Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy and Stable Condition
events.description: Father continues to receive intravenous infusion and hyperbaric oxygen therapy. The doctor stated that the dizziness has disappeared, his mental state has improved, and his condition is stable.

events.name: First time actively speaking in an industry group and receiving feedback.
events.description: During a group discussion on how physical stores can cope with online competition, Lei Mingxuan shared his experience with offline activities on membership days, which received likes and follow-up questions, making him feel professionally recognized.

events.name: Coordinate resources: Contact cousin for assistance and adjust social engagements.
events.description: Contact my cousin Shen Jie to ask her to watch the shop temporarily for half a day this weekend, and confide in my billiards friend Han Dong about the pressure to politely decline this week's match invitation.

events.name: Regular Customers Pick Up In-Store and Engage in Brief Exchanges
events.description: In the morning, regular customer Qian Duoduo came to the store to pick up a trendy T-shirt. A brief conversation about new anime releases and fashion trends left him feeling warm and supported.

events.name: Try using a health app to record your diet.
events.description: In the evening, I began using a health app to record my general diet for the day, initially focusing on tracking nutritional intake.

起始状态.心情: Slightly stable, yet still tense.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: After receiving some external positive feedback and coordinating partial assistance, the sense of pressure has slightly eased.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Friday, relatives and friends showed their care, with neighbors and cousins visiting my father. Shen Jie provided substantial assistance to the shop. In the evening, I candidly shared difficulties in the industry group and received encouragement.

events.name: Visits from Relatives and Friends: The Care of Neighbors and Cousins
events.description: During the day, neighbor Aunt Zhu brought chicken soup to visit at the hospital. In the evening, cousin Shen Jie brought fruit to visit her uncle and communicated with Lei Mingxuan outside the ward.

events.name: Cousin Shen Jie provided substantial assistance to the store.
events.description: Shen Jie proactively stayed at the store to organize shelves, optimize displays, serve walk-in customers, and contacted photographer friends to discuss retaking online product photos for new arrivals.

events.name: Admitting Difficulties in Industry Groups and Gaining Support
events.description: In the evening, a brief explanation of the recent situation was shared in the industry group, which resonated with members. Group friends offered suggestions such as strengthening online pre-sales, and Lei Mingxuan took notes for future reference.

events.name: Dinner Conversation and Gratitude with Cousin
events.description: After closing the shop, I had dinner with Shen Jie at a casual dining restaurant, where we exchanged updates on fashion trends. Shen Jie offered encouragement and agreed to come help again over the weekend, for which Lei Mingxuan expressed sincere gratitude.

events.name: Briefly attempted home workouts but gave up due to fatigue.
events.description: After returning home, I attempted a 10-minute Keep workout, but due to exhaustion from the entire day, I only managed to persist for 5 minutes before giving up and switching to rest.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Saturday, during the final stage of my father's treatment, I will learn about post-discharge care, arrange part-time staff for the shop, communicate with the property manager, and in the evening, organize suggestions from group members to plan future strategies.

events.name: Learning about post-discharge care and preparing for hospital discharge
events.description: After his father completed the final hyperbaric oxygen therapy, Lei Mingxuan learned from the nurse about medication methods and observation points after discharge, organized the items, and scheduled a follow-up appointment.

events.name: Arrange part-time staff for the weekend store operations
events.description: Temporarily hiring university student Xiao Chen for 3 hours of assistance on weekend afternoons through a friend's introduction, with a description of the job responsibilities.

events.name: Communicate Special Circumstances with the Mall Property Manager
events.description: I encountered property manager Zheng Kai at the mall and explained my father's hospitalization situation. Zheng Kai expressed understanding and reminded me of safety precautions.

events.name: Sort out industry group suggestions and plan future strategies
events.description: Review the group chat records in the evening, systematically organize strategies such as strengthening online pre-sales and store cooperation for traffic diversion, and consider suitable solutions to improve operations.

events.name: Slight lower back pain caused by prolonged improper sitting posture.
events.description: In the afternoon, I maintained a bent sitting posture while handling computer tasks in the ward. In the evening, I experienced stiffness and soreness in the lower back muscles and began applying heat to alleviate the discomfort.

起始状态.所处地点: 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Seeing the dawn of discharge, with a touch of anticipation.

结束状态.所处地点: 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Amidst the busyness, there is a sense of control, and a preliminary, vague plan for the future of the shop has taken shape, though there is discomfort in the lower back.
