2025-03.daily_overview: After the father was discharged from the hospital and returned home, the family's acute crisis came to an end. However, Lei Mingxuan experienced a profound awakening in health awareness, immediately began learning first aid knowledge, and started planning for family health management.

events.name: Complete the discharge procedures for my father and bring him home.
events.description: In the morning, I completed the discharge settlement, collected the discharge summary and medication list. The doctor advised rest and follow-up examinations. I then drove to pick up my parents and settled them back home.

events.name: Profound Awakening of Health Consciousness Triggered During Hospital Care
events.description: While accompanying his father, the doctor emphasized the importance of a healthy lifestyle. Seeing his frail father and reflecting on his own condition, Lei Mingxuan felt deeply moved and noted down keywords such as weight loss and health check-ups.

events.name: Take Immediate Action: Learn Basic First Aid Knowledge in the Ward
events.description: Watch CPR and Heimlich maneuver videos via Wi-Fi, download first aid apps to complete learning and obtain certificates, and draft family emergency plans.

events.name: Discussing New Ideas on Health Management with Mother
events.description: In the evening, I discussed with my mother about urging my father to focus on his recovery, adjusting the family's diet, and my own exercise plan. My mother agreed.

events.name: Preliminary Evening Survey on Implementation Pathways for Health Plans
events.description: In the evening, search online for physical examination packages, fitness studios, and first aid training information, download a health management app, and shift toward action preparation.

起始状态.所处地点: 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Looking forward to my father's discharge from the hospital, with a hint of nervousness.

结束状态.所处地点: 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai, China
结束状态.心情: The relief of the father's return home intertwines with profound reflections on health and the future, intensifying the sense of responsibility while offering a preliminary clarity of direction.

state.今日运动: None (but it has raised awareness of the importance of health management within the system)

2025-03.daily_overview: On the first Sunday of the second week in crisis response, Lei Mingxuan struggled to find a balance between his father’s illness, family responsibilities, and the survival of his shop. He worked hard to juggle hospital visits, shop operations, and household affairs, transforming his heightened sense of health crisis into concrete actions. In the morning, he handled backlogged tasks at the shop; at noon, he briefly reunited with his parents at the hospital; in the afternoon, he worked while accompanying his father in the ward. In the evening, he returned home, joined his parents in implementing emergency plans, and began exploring his own health management.

events.name: Sunday shop work interspersed with hospital care.
events.description: On Sunday, the shopping mall was quite crowded, so Lei Mingxuan decided to have his mother, Wang Xiuying, accompany his father at the hospital in the morning while he stayed at the clothing store on Century Avenue. There, he focused on handling the backlog of tasks that had accumulated due to his caregiving duties, including reconciling accounts, organizing sales data, and planning the following week's inventory purchases, with particular attention to replenishing basic spring styles and slow-selling accessories. At noon, he made a special detour to buy his parents' favorite pan-fried buns and his preferred Japanese ramen, then hurried to the hospital to share a simple lunch with his parents in the ward. In the afternoon, he took over from his mother to stay with his father in the ward. During his father's rest, he used his phone to communicate online with Zhou Tao, a supplier in Hangzhou, confirming the order intentions for the next quarter and finalizing the shift schedule for Xiao Chen, the part-time employee at the store for the following week. After closing the store in the evening, he went straight home.

events.name: Improve and implement the family emergency plan.
events.description: After dinner, Lei Mingxuan gathered with his parents in the living room. Drawing from their practical experiences over the past week, they formally discussed and refined the family emergency plan drafted the previous day. They clarified each person’s responsibilities in case of an emergency (Lei Mingxuan would handle external communication and decision-making, while his mother would be responsible for reassurance and basic care), updated the emergency contact list (adding childhood friend Zhang Wei and cousin Shen Jie, among others), and standardized the storage locations for important family documents (household register, insurance policies, shop lease agreement). Subsequently, Lei Mingxuan printed three copies of the finalized family emergency plan and placed them in the TV cabinet in the living room, on the bedside table in his parents’ bedroom, and in the drawer of his shop office, ensuring they are readily accessible at all times.

events.name: First Action: Schedule an Annual Physical Examination
events.description: Driven by a strong sense of health crisis from the previous day, Lei Mingxuan believed it was imperative to prioritize health management. He made a phone call to schedule annual comprehensive physical examination packages for himself and his parents at Ruijin Hospital, with the appointments set for two weeks later. He deliberately chose a package that included basic items such as cardiovascular health, hearing, blood glucose, and blood lipids. He decided to take this as the first step toward systematic health management for the entire family, while also providing data support for his weight loss plan.

events.name: Handle online order backlog
events.description: Taking advantage of the relatively uninterrupted time at home on Sunday evening, Lei Mingxuan used his laptop to intensively handle the accumulated online customer inquiries and WeChat store orders from the past few days, which had piled up due to divided attention. He contacted the cooperating courier companies in batches, printed out all pending shipping orders, and prepared for the next morning's shipments to ensure the smooth operation of his online business.

events.name: Initiate Personal Health Management: Download and Set Up the Health App
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan downloaded two popular apps from the mobile app store: a diet and exercise tracking app (Bohe Health) and the Keep fitness app. He completed the user registration process and, following the prompts, entered his personal information, including his height (172 cm), weight (which had slightly decreased from 80 kg at the beginning of the month to 79 kg, adjusted based on his initial state), and age. He set an initial weight loss goal: to lose 5 kilograms over the next three months, reducing his BMI from around 27 to below 25, the healthy threshold. He spent some time exploring the functional modules of the apps to prepare for their subsequent use.

events.name: Suspending exercise plan due to lumbar strain.
events.description: Despite having the intention to exercise, Lei Mingxuan felt a slight ache in his lower back. Recalling the record of lumbar strain from his initial health assessment, he decided not to engage in any physical activity today to avoid aggravating the injury, prioritizing rest instead.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai, China
起始状态.心情: Weary yet resolute, driven by a sense of responsibility toward family and an urgency for health, with the added distress of lower back discomfort.

结束状态.所处地点: At Home, No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: The fulfillment from completing multiple tasks intertwines with an underlying concern about future uncertainties, yet a sense of agency brings a touch of control, accompanied by slight physical fatigue.

2025-03.daily_overview: A new week begins, and the high-intensity routine of shuttling between three points—home, shop, and hospital—has become the norm. Lei Mingxuan strives to adapt and manages various tasks in the gaps between his commitments: in the morning, he communicates financial arrangements at the shop; in the afternoon, he witnesses positive signs of his father's improving condition at the hospital and takes the opportunity to seek business advice from friends. In the evening, he puts his health management plan into practice for the first time, completing a home workout and preparing a healthy meal.

events.name: Daily Hustle and Positive Signals
events.description: In the morning at the shop, Lei Mingxuan proactively contacted his financial manager Xu Feng via WeChat. He briefly explained that due to his father’s recent hospitalization and the impact on the shop’s income, the family’s liquidity might be temporarily tight, and requested Xu Feng to keep an eye on the situation. In the afternoon while accompanying his father at the hospital, Lei Mingxuan learned from his father, Lei Jianguo, that after the doctor’s evaluation, it was suggested that he could begin attempting to get out of bed for light activities. This was good news for a patient who had been bedridden for a long time, and Lei Mingxuan felt greatly relieved. While assisting his father with bedside activities, he exchanged a few words via mobile phone with Wang Lei, his university classmate who works in e-commerce in Hangzhou. He accepted some practical advice from Wang Lei on how to maintain online customer relationships and keep community engagement active when energy is limited.

events.name: Encourage family and friends to pay attention to emergency preparedness.
events.description: During the lunch break, Lei Mingxuan shared his experience of learning first aid knowledge and creating a family emergency plan with several close relatives and friends, including his childhood friend Zhang Wei and his cousin Shen Jie, via WeChat. He emphasized the importance of such preparations and encouraged them to spare some time to focus on family emergency readiness. His friends responded positively and showed their concern.

events.name: First Attempt at Home Workout
events.description: After closing the shop and returning home in the evening, despite being physically and mentally exhausted, Lei Mingxuan thought of his health goals and mustered up his energy. He laid out his newly purchased yoga mat in the living room, opened the Keep app, and followed along to complete a 20-minute HIIT fat-burning workout (including jumping jacks, high knees, and simplified burpees, among others). After the workout, he was drenched in sweat and felt some muscle soreness, but he also felt much more invigorated, having completed his first proactive home workout.

events.name: Prepare and document a healthy dinner.
events.description: After exercising, Lei Mingxuan prepared a simple healthy dinner for himself based on the suggestions from his health app and the ingredients available at home: he pan-fried a piece of chicken breast with a small amount of olive oil, boiled a small portion of broccoli, and served himself a small bowl of brown rice that his mother had cooked earlier in the day. He deliberately slowed down his eating pace, chewing carefully and savoring each bite. After the meal, he immediately opened the app and manually recorded the approximate portions and estimated calorie intake of this meal by searching the food database.

events.name: Initial Experience with Dietary Records at the Hospital Cafeteria
events.description: During the midday hospital visit, Lei Mingxuan purchased a relatively light lunch from the hospital cafeteria (steamed sea bass, stir-fried Shanghai greens, and a bowl of rice). After the meal, he used a health app for the first time, searching the food database to manually record the approximate portion size and calorie content of this meal. The process was somewhat unfamiliar, and the estimates may not have been entirely accurate, but it marked his first step toward keeping a record.

events.name: Temporary change of dinner plans
events.description: The original dinner plan was simpler, but due to hunger after exercising, he added half an apple as an extra snack and recorded the calorie intake.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: With the usual busyness of the week's beginning and a hint of anticipation regarding my father's condition, the soreness in my lower back has slightly eased.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Feeling somewhat relieved due to my father's improvement, while also gaining a slight sense of accomplishment from completing my workout and attempting a healthy diet, though physically tired, with an increased sense of satisfaction.

state.今日运动: 20-Minute HIIT Fat-Burning Workout

2025-03.daily_overview: On Tuesday, Lei Mingxuan realized that he had severely neglected industry connections and the refined operations of his store over the past week due to a family crisis. He decided to focus his efforts today on "relationship maintenance" and "business organization." In the morning, he responded to messages from various parties at the store. In the afternoon, while accompanying a family member at the hospital, he handled inquiries from suppliers about new products and politely declined a recreational invitation from a fellow sports enthusiast, dedicating all his energy to balancing the dual responsibilities of family and career.

events.name: Concentrated business liaison and relationship maintenance
events.description: In the morning before the shop opened, Lei Mingxuan focused on replying to the backlog of WeChat messages from the past week. He confirmed with Wu Fang, a jewelry supplier in Guangzhou, that the new batch of goods had been received; recommended the newly arrived spring hoodies and commuter-friendly shirts to regular customers Qian Duoduo and Feng Xiaoyu respectively, expressing his gratitude; and politely responded to inquiries from several potential customers. In the afternoon, while accompanying his father at the hospital, he received a call from Zhou Tao, his main fabric supplier in Hangzhou, who sent him the fabric catalog and price list for the summer new collection. Taking advantage of his father’s nap time, Lei Mingxuan carefully reviewed the electronic catalog and noted down the item numbers and initial thoughts on several fabrics of interest in his phone’s memo app.

events.name: Store Simple Inventory and Deep Cleaning
events.description: Taking advantage of the quiet periods before the store opened in the morning and during the evening when customer traffic was low, Lei Mingxuan conducted a quick and simplified inventory check of the shop’s stock. He focused on verifying the system records against the actual quantities of high-value items and best-selling products, identifying a few minor discrepancies and marking them accordingly. At the same time, he performed a thorough cleaning of the store, wiping down the shelves, cleaning the mirrors in the fitting rooms, and tidying up the dusty display racks in the corners of the warehouse, all in an effort to maintain the shop’s professional image.

events.name: Try to record takeout meals
events.description: Returning home late in the evening, Lei Mingxuan ordered a takeout of his usual Japanese tonkotsu ramen. He opened the health app again and attempted to use the photo recognition feature to log the meal. However, due to poor lighting and the arrangement of the food in the restaurant's takeout container, the recognition results were highly inaccurate. In the end, he manually searched for "Japanese ramen (takeout)" and estimated the portion size based on common servings to log the meal.

events.name: Declining Social Invitations, Focusing on Family
events.description: In the evening, his billiard friend Han Dong invited him via WeChat to play a game to relax. Lei Mingxuan, considering that his father was still in the hospital, feeling physically and mentally exhausted, and having important matters to attend to the next day, politely declined the invitation with the reason of "needing to handle family affairs." This was a reflection of his repeated refusals to social activities throughout the month.

events.name: Staying up late due to anxiety-induced insomnia.
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan felt anxious about the future of his shop and family finances, leading him to scroll through his phone late into the night, which delayed his sleep.

起始状态.心情: Aware of the urgency of addressing business oversights, with strong planning capabilities but a slight sense of anxiety.

结束状态.心情: A slight relaxation after completing a substantial amount of liaison and organizational work, yet accompanied by a faint sense of loss due to consistently declining hobby-related activities. This has heightened the awareness of a shift in life's priorities, with fatigue further intensifying.

2025-03.daily_overview: A pivotal moment during the intensive care period. In the morning, the family received uplifting news from the doctor that the father might be discharged soon, lifting everyone's spirits. Lei Mingxuan organized sales data at the shop and spent the afternoon accompanying his father through rehabilitation activities. He also began substantive planning and discussions regarding his father's post-discharge life and work arrangements, including formally negotiating order extensions with suppliers.

events.name: Improvement in Health Condition and Store Data Organization
events.description: In the morning, during rounds, the attending physician informed Lei Mingxuan that his father Lei Jianguo's dizziness symptoms had largely subsided. Although hearing recovery was not ideal, his condition had stabilized, and he could be considered for discharge in the near future to recuperate at home. This news brought relief to both Lei Mingxuan and his mother. At the shop that morning, he reviewed the sales data from the past ten days and found that, despite his divided attention, the store's performance had remained largely stable, with no sharp decline, thanks to the support of regular customers and online orders. This provided him with some reassurance.

events.name: Accompanying Father and Preliminary Planning
events.description: In the afternoon at the hospital, Lei Mingxuan accompanied his father for a slow walk along the ward corridor. The father and son discussed family arrangements after discharge, with the father expressing his desire to return home as soon as possible. Before closing the shop in the evening, he settled the wages with Xiao Chen, a part-time employee who had recently helped cover shifts, and sincerely thanked him for his assistance during the difficult period.

events.name: Formally Communicate Order Delay with Supplier
events.description: Realizing that his father would still need time to recover and adjust after being discharged from the hospital, and that the store’s operations could not immediately return to normal, Lei Mingxuan called Zhou Tao, his supplier in Hangzhou, from the store. He explained in detail the situation of his father’s sudden illness and hospitalization, as well as his own need for long-term caregiving, and sent a photo of the medical diagnosis via WeChat. Zhou Tao expressed sympathy and understanding over the phone. After negotiation, he agreed to postpone the shipment of the spring clothing order, originally scheduled for the end of March, to April 15. However, he emphasized that further delays might require payment of a small penalty as stipulated in the contract. The two also briefly exchanged views on the market trends for the summer season.

events.name: Develop the habit of keeping a daily food diary.
events.description: After two days of trial, Lei Mingxuan began consciously opening the app to log his meals immediately after each one. That day, he recorded breakfast (oatmeal with milk), lunch (tomato and egg stir-fry with rice from the hospital cafeteria), and dinner (a homemade vegetable and chicken breast salad). In the evening, upon reviewing the daily nutrition analysis report generated by the app, he found that his carbohydrate intake was proportionally high while his vegetable consumption was insufficient. This gave him a more quantified understanding of his daily diet.

events.name: Relax dietary restrictions due to good news.
events.description: To celebrate his father's improved health, Lei Mingxuan ate half a bowl more of rice and an extra piece of braised pork (specially prepared by his mother) during dinner, resulting in a slight excess of calorie intake and a minor weight gain.

起始状态.心情: With anticipation for the doctor's ward round results, the anxiety slightly subsided.

结束状态.心情: Filled with hope and relief as the father is about to be discharged from the hospital, yet feeling the weight of responsibility for the subsequent care and the restoration of the shop, the overall outlook remains positive.

state.今日运动: Accompanying father for a walk for approximately 20 minutes (light activity)

2025-03.daily_overview: A day filled with changes and challenges. In the morning, Lei Jianguo, the father, was officially discharged from the hospital and returned home, shifting the family crisis from the hospital to the household. However, the old house without an elevator immediately presented a practical mobility challenge. In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan, despite his busy schedule, still found time to accept a friend’s invitation to serve as a referee for a ball game, seeking a brief respite from the tension of daily life. In the evening, a family meeting directly addressed the housing difficulties, initiating a long-term discussion on "aging-in-place renovations."

events.name: Father was discharged from the hospital and returned home.
events.description: After treatment, Lei Jianguo's condition stabilized and met the discharge criteria. In the morning, Lei Mingxuan assisted with various discharge procedures at the hospital and had a detailed discussion with the attending physician regarding post-discharge medication, rehabilitation training (particularly for balance and hearing), and follow-up precautions. In the afternoon, he drove his father back to their old house located at No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road. Since the building had no elevator, he carefully supported his father as they walked slowly. During the ascent and descent of the three floors, his father had to stop multiple times to rest, breathing heavily, which made them both acutely aware of the inconvenience caused by the housing structure.

events.name: Accepting the Invitation to Serve as a Billiards Referee
events.description: In the afternoon, while shuttling between picking up his father and managing the shop, Lei Mingxuan saw an invitation in the billiards friends’ WeChat group from Han Dong and other players, hoping he could serve as a temporary referee for a small billiards invitational tournament on the weekend (March 22). Considering his reputation within the circle, his familiarity with billiards rules, and the friendship represented by the invitation, despite his busy family commitments, he agreed, viewing it as an opportunity to briefly step away from the high-pressure environment.

events.name: First Family Meeting: Confronting Housing Challenges
events.description: After dinner, Lei Mingxuan, his father Lei Jianguo, and his mother Wang Xiuying held a serious family meeting in the living room. Lei Mingxuan first raised practical issues such as his father's difficulty in going up and down stairs, the pressure on his mother as the sole caregiver, and daily shopping and rehabilitation walks. He presented preliminary information he had gathered: the advantages, disadvantages, and approximate costs of different solutions, including walkers, stair lifts, and home relocation. His mother, Wang Xiuying, expressed financial concerns and reluctance to leave behind neighborhood relationships after moving. After a long silence, his father, Lei Jianguo, leaned toward purchasing a walker first to address the immediate difficulties. The meeting lasted over an hour and ultimately clarified the initial division of responsibilities: Lei Mingxuan would be responsible for further research and procurement, while his mother would handle daily care and nutrition.

events.name: The Daily Companionship of Mother Wang Xiuying
events.description: Throughout the day, Wang Xiuying busied herself at home with daily cleaning, laundry, and preparing soft, nutritious meals suitable for a patient in recovery. Noticing her husband's low spirits due to hearing loss and the sense of helplessness brought on by his illness, she patiently kept him company by chatting with him, sharing interesting stories from the community. She also specially prepared his favorite steamed fish in an attempt to divert his attention.

events.name: Reflection and Adjustment of Dietary Records
events.description: While reviewing his dietary records from the past few days in the evening, Lei Mingxuan noticed that the entries were relatively rough, with inaccurate portion estimates. Additionally, when dining out (such as at the hospital cafeteria), his options were limited, making it difficult to gauge calorie intake. He decided to choose foods that are easier to estimate in terms of calories going forward. He also ordered a small kitchen electronic scale to weigh food at home, aiming to improve the accuracy of his records.

events.name: Irregular eating habits due to frequent activities
events.description: Being on the go all day led to hasty lunches and dinners, opting for high-calorie takeout, resulting in a slight rebound in weight.

起始状态.心情: Nervous and busy, preparing for father's discharge from the hospital.

结束状态.心情: Complicated. Feeling relieved about the father's return home, yet burdened by the practical challenges of housing and the discussions during the family meeting, while also harboring a hint of anticipation due to the commitment to serve as a referee.

state.今日运动: Assisting father up and down stairs, moving items (moderate intensity activity)

2025-03.daily_overview: On the first day after his father's discharge from the hospital, the focus of life began to shift from "emergency treatment" to "long-term rehabilitation and care." Lei Mingxuan made efforts to redirect some of his attention back to the shop, taking stock of inventory, expressing gratitude to those who had helped, and engaging in in-depth discussions with suppliers about the difficulties faced. At the same time, he began systematically seeking solutions to the family's challenges, researching aging-in-place modifications online to prepare for subsequent decision-making.

events.name: Store Resumption of Operations and Post-Mortem Analysis
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan shifted his primary focus back to the clothing store on Century Avenue. He began by conducting a relatively comprehensive inventory check and inspected the store’s lighting, cash register system, and other facilities to ensure they were in proper working condition. He specifically called the part-time employee, Xiao Chen, to once again express his gratitude for the assistance provided during the critical period and settled all outstanding wages. In the afternoon, he reviewed the online sales data and customer inquiry records from the period when his father was hospitalized. He noticed a decline in the conversion rate of inquiries, while the repurchase rate among existing customers remained stable. This prompted him to start contemplating how to optimize the emergency operation model of "online-first, offline-supplementary" in the future.

events.name: Engage in in-depth communication with suppliers to strive for understanding.
events.description: Lei Mingxuan engaged in more in-depth communication with Zhou Tao, a supplier in Hangzhou, via WeChat. In addition to expressing gratitude once again for the supplier's extension support, he candidly shared the current challenges faced by his store, including sparse customer traffic and the fact that half of the sales window for spring clothing had already passed. While expressing understanding, Zhou Tao reminded him that the retail industry is highly seasonal. Even if delayed orders are received, the pressure on sales and the risk of inventory accumulation would increase. He suggested that Lei consider shifting some styles to a pre-order system. This communication gave Lei Mingxuan a clearer understanding of the impact on his business.

events.name: Conduct systematic research on aging-appropriate renovation solutions.
events.description: After closing the shop in the evening, Lei Mingxuan went online in his home study and began systematically searching for information on "home aging-in-place modifications," "policies for installing elevators in old residential communities," "rental and purchase of electric stair climbers," "mobility aids for the elderly," and "Shanghai community-based home care service programs." He not only browsed web pages but also conducted preliminary consultations with friends or neighbors who had similar experiences (such as his childhood friend Zhang Wei). He then organized the advantages, disadvantages, approximate costs, and applicable conditions of different solutions in his phone's memo app.

events.name: Morning Running and Health Knowledge Learning
events.description: Lei Mingxuan resumed his morning jogging routine, which had been interrupted for some time, and ran 3 kilometers at a slow pace near his residential community in the morning. After finishing his run, he opened the health app and meticulously logged the distance, duration, and average pace of his jog. During his evening rest, he read an article titled "How to Adjust the Ratio of Carbohydrates to Protein in Your Diet to Support Exercise for Fat Loss" through the health public account linked to the app. Finding the content reasonable, he took brief notes and planned to try the suggestions later.

events.name: Relax by watching anime in the evening.
events.description: Before going to bed, to relieve stress, Lei Mingxuan watched an episode of the historical anime he was following on Bilibili, briefly immersing himself in the story and achieving mental relaxation.

起始状态.心情: Determined to restore order while contemplating long-term family issues

结束状态.心情: Gaining a sense of partial control through action, yet still feeling heavy-hearted and pragmatic in the face of the survival pressure of the shop and the complexity of home renovation, with a slight improvement after relaxing in the evening.

state.今日运动: Morning run of 3 kilometers

2025-03.daily_overview: A Saturday divided into two distinct themes. In the morning, I tended to the quiet business at the shop, with my thoughts lingering on family. In the afternoon and evening, I fully immersed myself in the role of a billiards referee, rediscovering long-lost focus, a sense of accomplishment, and the joy of social interaction in a familiar domain—a precious mental respite.

events.name: Saturday Store Hours
events.description: On Saturday, the shopping mall was bustling with crowds, but Lei Mingxuan's store appeared unappealing due to neglect in management and the delayed arrival of spring collections. He was distracted during business hours, frequently checking messages in his family group chat. Only a few transactions with casual customers were completed, with basic T-shirts making up most of the sales. After closing, he quickly reviewed the weekly accounts, deposited the revenue at the bank, locked the store, and hurried away.

events.name: Serve as a referee for the billiards invitational tournament.
events.description: At 1:30 p.m., Lei Mingxuan arrived early at the billiards club in Pudong and met with the organizer Han Dong and others. He familiarized himself with the competition venue, the balls, and the scoring equipment. The tournament lasted from 2:00 p.m. to 10:00 p.m., during which Lei Mingxuan officiated multiple matches. In one match at 7:30 p.m., a dispute arose over whether a foul had been committed by "simultaneously striking the object ball and the cue ball." Based on the rules he had reviewed before the match and his on-site observations, Lei Mingxuan decisively called a foul and clearly explained the reasoning to both players, maintaining the order of the match and earning recognition from the players and spectators. During breaks, he shared a simple meal with Han Dong and other billiards enthusiasts at a nearby small restaurant, chatting about recent updates in a relaxed atmosphere.

events.name: Reflection After the Conclusion of Officiating Work
events.description: At 10:30 p.m., Lei Mingxuan returned home. After brewing a cup of tea, he reflected on his day as a referee, feeling satisfied with his ability to handle controversial calls clearly and impartially under pressure. This experience allowed him to temporarily escape the worries of family and his shop, immersing himself in the logic of the rules and the thrill of competition, which brought him great mental relaxation and a sense of accomplishment.

events.name: Post-match dinner weight gain
events.description: After the match, I had a gathering with fellow players at a barbecue restaurant, consuming a significant amount of grilled meat and beer, which resulted in excessive calorie intake and a noticeable increase in body weight.

起始状态.心情: A slight sense of relaxation on the weekend coexists with concerns about the shop's business.

结束状态.心情: Confident and joyful from successfully completing the adjudication work, the mind has been effectively relaxed and recharged, though the body feels slightly bloated.

2025-03.daily_overview: A day of pragmatic action. Lei Mingxuan swiftly implemented the resolutions from the family meeting. In the morning, he went out to purchase a walker and medications; in the afternoon, he guided his father in using them and adjusted the home layout. The action itself alleviated some of the anxiety, providing tangible support for family caregiving. Simultaneously, he began to delve deeper into knowledge about aging-in-place and rehabilitation, shifting from passive response to proactive planning.

events.name: Purchasing Walkers and Household Essential Medicines
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan drove to a large medical equipment specialty store in the Pudong New Area. He explained his father's condition in detail to the store clerk (weakness in the legs and feet after discharge, requiring assistance for walking). Following professional recommendations, he compared several products and ultimately selected a lightweight, sturdy, and foldable four-wheeled walker. In the afternoon, he visited a chain pharmacy near his home. Based on his father's post-discharge medical instructions, he purchased nerve-nourishing medication and restocked the family medicine cabinet with common items such as cold medicine, gastrointestinal medicine, and batteries for the blood pressure monitor.

events.name: Instructing the father on using a walker and adjusting the home environment
events.description: After bringing the purchase home, Lei Mingxuan patiently demonstrated to his father, Lei Jianguo, in the living room how to unfold, fold, adjust the height, and use the walker. He then assisted his father in practicing with it several times around the house. Meanwhile, his mother, Wang Xiuying, sorted the new medications and placed them into the medicine cabinet. Afterwards, the whole family made simple adjustments to the furniture layout in the living room, moving aside a small coffee table to ensure a smoother and more accessible pathway from the bedroom to the bathroom.

events.name: Systematically learn knowledge on aging-appropriate design and rehabilitation.
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan utilized his spare time to systematically search for and read articles and case studies on topics such as "home rehabilitation training methods for sudden deafness," "policies for purchasing and installing stair lifts," and "common solutions for home aging-in-place modifications (e.g., anti-slip bathroom floors, handrail installations)" through platforms like Zhihu, professional medical public accounts (such as Dingxiang Doctor), and the Shanghai Elderly Care Service Platform. He compiled the information into notes, conducted a comparative analysis of the advantages, disadvantages, and approximate costs of different solutions, and selected contact information for several local service providers in Shanghai.

events.name: The mother accompanies the father for an outdoor walk.
events.description: The weather was pleasant in the afternoon. Seeing that her husband had been staying indoors all day, Wang Xiuying suggested taking a walk in the nearby Century Park. She supported Lei Jianguo, who was using a walker, as they strolled slowly through the park, admiring the magnolias and cherry blossoms blooming in early spring. In a loud voice, she described the surroundings and interesting sights to him, helping to alleviate the social isolation and loneliness caused by his hearing impairment.

events.name: Gym Strength Training
events.description: Considering that yesterday's officiating work was primarily a mental activity, Lei Mingxuan took some time in the afternoon to visit the gym, where he engaged in approximately 40 minutes of upper body strength training (including bench press, rowing, shoulder press, etc.) to maintain muscle mass and basal metabolism. After the workout, he logged the exercises, sets, and weights into his health app.

events.name: Healthy Diet Recovery
events.description: To offset the impact of yesterday's dinner gathering, I strictly controlled my diet throughout the day, consuming more vegetables and protein, which resulted in a decrease in weight.

起始状态.心情: After relaxing yesterday, I am ready to take on new household tasks with strong motivation.

结束状态.心情: Feeling grounded from completing concrete tasks such as procurement and home adjustments, having a clearer direction for planning my father's recovery, and adopting a more positive and pragmatic mindset.

2025-03.daily_overview: A new week began with a renewed focus on the survival of the shop. After a calm analysis, Lei Mingxuan made the difficult decision to "pause advertising and implement extreme cost-cutting measures," marking a strategic shift for the shop from "seeking growth" to "seeking survival." Meanwhile, planning at the family level also progressed. He scheduled an on-site assessment with a professional company and began organizing his financial situation in preparation for a meeting with a financial advisor.

events.name: Made the difficult decision to scale back store operations
events.description: In the shop that morning, Lei Mingxuan independently analyzed the sales data and cash flow from the past two weeks, discovering that revenue remained persistently low while fixed expenses (rent, utilities, basic salaries) posed significant pressure. He soberly realized that the situation had deteriorated to the brink of a survival crisis. After careful consideration, he made a difficult but necessary decision: to immediately suspend all paid advertising efforts, both online (WeChat Moments ads, Xiaohongshu promotions) and offline (display spaces within shopping malls), in order to save every non-essential expense and shift operations to a minimum-cost mode.

events.name: Schedule an On-site Assessment for Age-Friendly Home Modifications
events.description: Lei Mingxuan made a phone call to schedule an appointment with a professional aging-in-place renovation company. A staff member is planned to conduct an on-site inspection of the home's staircase, bathroom, bedroom, and other spaces within this week, in order to obtain professional renovation suggestions and a preliminary quotation, thereby gathering information for long-term family decision-making.

events.name: Organize Family Financial Status
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Lei Mingxuan organized the recent account books of the shop and his father's medical expense receipts in the study, and roughly estimated the funds needed for potential future housing renovations or replacements. He prepared a concise family financial status briefing, then contacted financial advisor Xu Feng via WeChat. He explained his need to adjust financial strategies due to family changes and scheduled a detailed discussion for the following afternoon at a quiet café in Xuhui District.

events.name: Family Walks and Health Communication
events.description: After dinner, Lei Mingxuan and his father Lei Jianguo took a walk in their residential community with the assistance of a walker. He took the opportunity to ask his father about his recent experience using the walker and any changes in his hearing, while also sharing some tips he had learned in recent days about protecting residual hearing and avoiding noise stimulation. After the walk, he logged this family stroll as a light activity in his health app.

events.name: Online Communication with Roller Skating Partners
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan had a brief chat with his roller-skating partner Song Jia on WeChat, sharing recent updates. Song Jia encouraged him to keep up with his exercise and they agreed to go roller-skating together when the weather improves in the future.

起始状态.心情: Calmness and Decisiveness in the Face of Realistic Financial Pressure

结束状态.心情: Feeling somewhat clearer for having made decisive decisions, yet acutely aware of the arduous road ahead, weighed down by the tangible pressure of financial burdens.

2025-03.daily_overview: Financial Adjustment Day. The afternoon meeting with the financial advisor marked a key financial decision point for the month. Based on the family's current situation, Lei Mingxuan officially shifted the investment strategy from "steady growth" to "conservative defense." Meanwhile, the store is planning promotions to ensure survival, while within the family, in-depth discussions and task allocations are underway for a more comprehensive living solution.

events.name: Meet with a financial advisor to adjust the investment strategy.
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan met with Xu Feng at a café in Xuhui District. He provided a detailed account of the decline in store revenue, unexpected medical expenses for his family, and potential future funding needs for housing renovation or replacement. After listening attentively, Xu Feng analyzed the current market environment and, considering the risk level of Lei Mingxuan's fund holdings, clearly advised that his risk tolerance had significantly decreased. Xu Feng demonstrated an adjustment plan on the spot: suspending some regular investment plans in equity funds and converting a portion of high-risk fund shares into money market funds or short-term wealth management products to enhance asset liquidity. After reviewing the plan, Lei Mingxuan expressed agreement and signed the authorization documents.

events.name: Plan online promotional activities to clear inventory.
events.description: During the low foot traffic at the store during midday, Lei Mingxuan conceived the "Spring Refresh · Clearance Sale" online promotion. He identified the list of products to participate in the event (primarily winter leftover stock, slow-selling basic spring apparel, and small accessories), planned tiered discounts based on purchase amounts and buy-and-get rules, and scheduled the campaign to launch on April 1, lasting for one week, with the aim of quickly clearing inventory and improving cash flow.

events.name: In-depth Exploration of Long-term Residential Solutions
events.description: After dinner, Lei Mingxuan and his parents held another family meeting, delving into more in-depth topics. They explored several long-term options: the technical feasibility and cost of installing a simple seat-type lifting platform within the existing house; the pros and cons of converting part of the living room on the first floor into a bedroom for the parents; and the practical possibility of relocating to a building with an elevator in the future. The father preferred to avoid making significant alterations to the old house, while the mother was more concerned about safety and convenience. Lei Mingxuan was responsible for recording the opinions of all parties and planned to consult professionals for further advice.

events.name: Stay Updated on Spring Anime Season News
events.description: Late at night before going to bed, as a brief return to his personal hobby, Lei Mingxuan browsed the 2025 spring anime preview guide on Bilibili. He was drawn to the trailer and production team of a fantasy battle-themed anime, judging it to suit his taste. He decided to follow it weekly from its premiere on April 1st, which became a small anticipation amidst his high-pressure life.

events.name: Weight Gain from Stress-Induced Snacking
events.description: Feeling stressed after the meeting, I had some chips and chocolate as comfort in the evening, which led to a slight weight gain.

起始状态.心情: Feeling somewhat nervous about the upcoming financial communication, but determined to resolve the issues.

结束状态.心情: A sense of relief after completing important financial adjustments, yet the mood remains complex and contemplative when facing intricate discussions about long-term family issues, with a slight tinge of self-reproach over snacking.

2025-03.daily_overview: Execution and Follow-up Day. In the morning, Lei Mingxuan formally submitted a rent extension application to the shopping mall in an effort to secure survival space for his store. In the afternoon, he received confirmation of investment adjustments and assisted his father in adapting to a walker at home. Various plans are transitioning from "discussion" to "execution," making the pressure more tangible but also bringing progress.

events.name: Submit a rent deferral application to the shopping mall.
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan went to the Property Management Department of Century Link Mall and met with the property manager, Zheng Kai. He explained in detail the difficulties he was facing: his father's hospitalization, the impact on his store's operations due to his caregiving responsibilities, and the resulting cash flow strain. He also presented a prepared written application, along with copies of his father's medical diagnosis and treatment documents. Zheng Kai expressed sympathy and understanding but noted that he needed to follow the proper procedures by reporting the matter to his superiors and the finance department. He accepted the materials and promised to expedite the process as much as possible.

events.name: Confirm Investment Adjustment and Receive Walker
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan received a WeChat message from his financial advisor Xu Feng at the shop, which included a screenshot confirming the fund conversion and the suspension of the fixed investment plan. He replied to confirm receipt, and both parties agreed to provide an updated asset report next week. After work, the walking aid purchased online was delivered to his home. Lei Mingxuan assembled it together with his mother and once again guided his father through adaptive walking exercises. He also rearranged the living room layout to ensure unobstructed passage.

events.name: Medical Care and Daily Life of Parents
events.description: Wang Xiuying accompanied her husband Lei Jianguo to the otology clinic for a follow-up examination. After evaluation, the doctor concluded that there was limited room for hearing recovery and recommended continuing medication and adapting to hearing aids. Wang Xiuying assisted her husband in communicating with the doctor, recorded the medical instructions, and queued to collect the medication. The entire process took most of the day, leaving her feeling exhausted.

events.name: Adherence to a Healthy Diet
events.description: The dietary control was well maintained throughout the day, with increased consumption of vegetables and coarse grains, resulting in a slight decrease in body weight.

起始状态.心情: A pragmatic mindset prepared to handle multiple specific matters

结束状态.心情: Having completed the submission of the application and the handling of family matters, progress is being made, bringing a sense of reassurance. However, the anxiety of awaiting feedback from various parties remains.

2025-03.daily_overview: A day of advancing various plans amidst the drizzling rain. In the morning, a corridor survey was conducted to explore potential physical modifications; in the afternoon, progress on the rental application was followed up; in the evening, information was consolidated to form a clear short-term and long-term family action plan. Life is gradually transitioning from a chaotic state of emergency response to an organized phase of planning and execution.

events.name: On-site Investigation and Preliminary Consultation in the Corridor
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan had arranged with property manager Zheng Kai to conduct an on-site inspection in his building's hallway. Zheng Kai carefully examined the hallway's structure, width, corners, and power outlet locations, taking photographs for documentation. He preliminarily determined that installing a simple hallway lift chair was technically feasible, but it required obtaining written consent from other residents in the same hallway (particularly the two households downstairs) and submitting an application to the street office and housing management department for approval. Zheng Kai provided Lei Mingxuan with the relevant application forms and procedural documentation.

events.name: Practice of Healthy Eating Awareness
events.description: While having lunch at the mall's staff cafeteria at noon, Lei Mingxuan recalled the insufficient vegetable intake alert from his health app. He deliberately took an extra serving of stir-fried broccoli and reduced his portion of rice. After the meal, he habitually opened the app to take a photo for logging, adding the note, "Consciously ate more vegetables today."

events.name: Follow up on the rent deferral application
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan politely inquired about the approval progress of the rent extension application via WeChat voice message. Zheng Kai responded that the application had been submitted to the higher-level department and was currently under review. The initial feedback was relatively positive, but the final decision would take another day or two to confirm, and he asked Lei Mingxuan to wait patiently.

events.name: Integrate to form the final family resolution and plan
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan consolidated the discussions and research information from the previous days, forming the final family resolution and phased action plan, which he then printed out. The plan included: Short-term (immediate): Use a walker and communicate with Aunt Zhu, a neighbor, for temporary daytime assistance; Medium-term (within three months): Monitor the father’s recovery progress while contacting 2–3 companies to obtain detailed renovation quotes; Long-term (within one year): Decide whether to proceed with large-scale renovations or relocate based on the recovery status, feasibility of the plan, and financial situation. After reading the plan, the parents signed it for confirmation, making the family’s goals clear.

events.name: Outdoor activities canceled due to light rain.
events.description: The original plan was to take an evening walk, but it was canceled due to rain and replaced with simple stretching exercises at home.

起始状态.心情: Slightly dull in overcast and rainy weather, but with clear objectives.

结束状态.心情: The clarity and sense of direction brought by the formation of a plan provide a more specific roadmap for solving family difficulties, leading to a more stable mindset.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Friday, under the warm spring sun, Lei Mingxuan shifted his focus to "taking proactive steps" for survival. He devoted himself to preparing for the upcoming online promotion event: photographing products, creating promotional materials, and setting up online activity rules. Simultaneously, he planned a brief cross-city café exploration trip with fellow coffee enthusiasts, both to seek business inspiration and to take a breather under high pressure.

events.name: Create promotional materials for 'Spring Renewal'
events.description: In the morning when customer traffic was sparse, Lei Mingxuan utilized this time to select the area with the best lighting in the store. Using his mobile phone, he took detailed, multi-angle photos of carefully chosen promotional items, including several uniquely designed slow-selling spring clothing pieces and a batch of niche accessories. In the afternoon, he used simple design tools on his computer to create promotional posters and copy that highlighted selling points such as "limited-time offers" and "clearance sales for cash flow."

events.name: Set up online promotional activities
events.description: After closing for the night, Lei Mingxuan logged into the online micro-store management backend and created the "Spring Refresh" limited-time promotional event page. He uploaded product images and details, carefully set up tiered discount coupons (such as "Spend 300, Save 30") and automatic rules for "Purchase a specified amount to receive free accessories," and scheduled the event to take effect at 12:00 AM on April 1st.

events.name: Plan a weekend coffee shop exploration tour
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan contacted coffee enthusiast Lin Wei via WeChat to propose and jointly plan an intensive café-hopping itinerary for independent coffee shops in the Jiangsu-Zhejiang-Shanghai region on March 30th (Sunday). They quickly identified target shops in Suzhou, Hangzhou, and Nanjing, selected high-speed train schedules, and outlined a rough timetable, promptly booking round-trip tickets. Lei Mingxuan informed his parents of the Sunday arrangements and confirmed that the shop could be temporarily managed by his mother for half a day.

events.name: Discussing Healthy Eating with Mother
events.description: During dinner, Lei Mingxuan chatted with his mother Wang Xiuying about how he had been using an app to track his diet recently. He mentioned that the report indicated that while their family's traditional Shanghai-style braised pork was delicious, it was relatively high in calories and fat. Wang Xiuying smiled and expressed understanding, suggesting that they could try modifying the recipe by using less sugar and oil, or by pairing it with more vegetables. The mother and son then engaged in a lighthearted discussion about how to balance traditional flavors with modern health needs.

events.name: Staying up late and having a midnight snack.
events.description: Working late into the night to prepare promotional materials, I ordered takeout barbecue as a late-night snack, which led to a slight weight gain.

起始状态.心情: The improved weather brings a glimmer of brightness and a sense of positivity in preparing for new actions.

结束状态.心情: The sense of fulfillment and anticipation after preparing for promotional activities and store visits, coupled with the hope of improving one's circumstances through personal effort, yet accompanied by a slight feeling of exhaustion.

2025-03.daily_overview: A relatively calm Saturday. In the morning, I resumed my regular running routine, enjoying some personal time. In the afternoon, I reviewed the situation at the shop and faced reality head-on, adjusting the goal entirely to "survival" and beginning to draft a longer-term emergency operation plan. In the evening, I released a promotional preview, sounding the horn for next week's "survival" campaign.

events.name: Resume the weekend running routine
events.description: On Saturday afternoon, taking advantage of the fine weather, Lei Mingxuan went to Century Park as usual and jogged 5 kilometers along his familiar route. After finishing his run, he stretched while using an app to record the distance, duration, and estimated calories burned for this session. Seeing the accumulated exercise mileage increase on the app, he felt a subtle sense of achievement from his persistence.

events.name: Calmly review and analyze, formulate a store survival plan.
events.description: In the afternoon after the shop closed, Lei Mingxuan calmly reviewed the situation alone. He soberly realized that, given the potential need for long-term care for his father, the shop was facing its most severe challenge since its opening. The primary objective must shift entirely from "development" and "upgrading" to "survival." He began drafting a detailed contingency plan in his notebook, which included potential directions such as further reducing daily operating hours, transitioning to an "online appointment + in-store experience" model, and seeking reliable partners or a shop manager for shared interests.

events.name: Announcement of Upcoming Promotional Activities
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan first posted the completed "Spring Renewal" promotional poster and copy to his WeChat Moments, and simultaneously forwarded them to all the store's WeChat customer groups and private chat windows with regular customers as an advance notice of the event. He reminded everyone to pay attention to the limited-time offer starting on April 1st and encouraged them to add items to their carts and save them in advance.

events.name: Dinner party slightly exceeded expectations.
events.description: I had hotpot for dinner with childhood friend Zhang Wei and other friends. Although I paid attention to vegetable intake, I still consumed a considerable amount of meat and beer, resulting in a slight weight gain.

起始状态.心情: The relaxing feeling of the weekend, ready to enjoy personal sports time.

结束状态.心情: The sense of ease after exercise coexists with the clarity of mind following calm reflection; there is concern about the future of the shop, yet a preliminary plan of action has emerged, and a slight sense of satisfaction lingers after the gathering.

2025-03.daily_overview: An intensive and densely packed "recharging" journey. Lei Mingxuan, along with fellow enthusiasts, embarked on a one-day, three-city (Suzhou, Hangzhou, Nanjing) independent café exploration tour. From garden aesthetics to cultural and creative communities, and then to industrial retro styles, they not only sampled specialty coffee but also delved into the operational concepts and spatial designs of different shops. This served as both a complete release of stress and an opportunity to gather inspiration for potential future transformations and cross-disciplinary ventures in their own stores.

events.name: A One-Day Coffee Shop Exploration Tour in Jiangsu, Zhejiang, and Shanghai
events.description: In the early morning, Lei Mingxuan and Lin Wei met at Shanghai Hongqiao Station and took the early high-speed train to Suzhou. They visited a café that integrates classical garden aesthetics, savoring specialty drinks and observing design details. At noon, they moved on to Hangzhou, where they experienced a community café deeply integrated with local cultural and creative products, exploring the "coffee + derivative products" consumption scenario. They also exchanged operational insights with the café owner, and Lei Mingxuan purchased a bag of recommended Yunnan coffee beans. In the evening, they arrived in Nanjing and visited a well-known retro-industrial-style trendy café, immersing themselves in its strong spatial design and social atmosphere, and purchased coffee beans from another origin. At night, they took the last high-speed train back to Shanghai. During the return journey, the two enthusiastically discussed the highlights of each café, their target customer groups, and elements they could draw inspiration from for their own business, such as spatial atmosphere creation, product combination strategies, and community operations.

events.name: Weekend Family Time
events.description: Before setting out, Lei Mingxuan stayed at home to accompany his father, Lei Jianguo, for breakfast. They watched the morning news together and briefly discussed the promotional activities being prepared for the store. Although his father found it difficult to follow, he made an effort to understand and nodded in support.

events.name: Mother prepares offerings for Qingming Festival.
events.description: As the Qingming Festival approached, Wang Xiuying began preparing items for ancestral worship at home. She purchased flowers, pastries, and fruits, and following the traditions of Lei Jianguo's hometown, she personally prepared several offerings. Lei Jianguo watched quietly nearby, his expression solemn. While busying herself, Wang Xiuying softly reminisced with him about the past, hoping to alleviate any low spirits he might feel as the festival drew near.

events.name: Health Awareness in Social Dining
events.description: In the evening, I had a hotpot dinner with several friends, including Zhang Wei. While ordering, Lei Mingxuan proactively suggested adding an extra vegetable platter and a mushroom platter, and chose a relatively light mushroom soup base. Although he did not strictly track calories during the meal, he consciously began making healthier choices. After returning home, he roughly estimated and recorded the dinner in an app.

events.name: Overeating during travel
events.description: During the cafe exploration, I sampled a variety of coffees and desserts, followed by a dinner gathering, which led to a significant calorie intake exceeding the limit and a noticeable weight gain.

起始状态.心情: Filled with anticipation and excitement for the upcoming shop exploration journey.

结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted yet mentally exhilarated, filled with fresh inspiration and the satisfaction of clashing perspectives, stress has been effectively released, reigniting a desire to explore the future, though with a slight sense of fullness.

state.今日运动: High-intensity walking and shuttling between three cities in a single day (extensive walking).

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, with a slight chill towards the end of the month.

2025-03.daily_overview: On the last day of March, a day for review and outlook. Lei Mingxuan reflected on the health management efforts of the past month, noting that habits have begun to take shape; organized the insights gained from exploring new shops, infusing fresh inspiration into the store; followed up on the final progress of the rent application; and completed the sorting of financial documents for the month-end. After weathering the storm of a family crisis, life is now attempting to rebuild order and seek a way forward on a new, more pragmatic foundation.

events.name: Review of Monthly Health Management Achievements
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan reviewed the dietary and exercise records from the past month on the health app. He found that the habit of keeping records had been largely established. Although there were a few days when entries were missed due to busyness, overall, his awareness of managing his dietary structure and exercise levels had improved. His weight dropped from 79 kg at the beginning of the month to 78.5 kg, and his BMI showed improvement, which greatly encouraged him. He decided to continue keeping records next month and try to increase the frequency of running to 3–4 times per week.

events.name: Organize and Share Store Visit Observations
events.description: During a break in the morning while the shop was open, Lei Mingxuan imported a large number of store-visit photos taken the previous day into his computer. He selected some excellent shots that showcased the spatial design, product details, and overall ambiance, then shared them on his social media circle and the shop’s official social media accounts. Along with the photos, he added a brief reflection on the visit: "Three cities in one day—a whirlwind of coffee and inspiration. Thanks to my companion @Lin Wei. Thinking about how to bring great experiences back to my own small space." While interacting with friends, he also refreshed the content for his own shop.

events.name: Follow up on the final progress of rent relief.
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan received a WeChat reply from Zheng Kai, the property manager. Zheng Kai informed him that the application for a rent extension had been approved. The shopping mall agreed to postpone the payment of April's rent by half a month and waived the corresponding late fees. This news brought Lei Mingxuan a sense of relief, as it provided a valuable buffer for his cash flow pressure. He immediately replied to Zheng Kai, expressing his sincere gratitude.

events.name: End-of-Month Store Financial Document Organization
events.description: After work, Lei Mingxuan sorted, bound, and entered into a simple spreadsheet all the sales receipts, purchase orders, invoices for utilities and property fees, employee payrolls, and electronic bank transaction records for March in the store's office, preparing for subsequent tax filing and business analysis.

events.name: Pay monthly household utilities and property management fees
events.description: Through mobile payment, Lei Mingxuan paid his household's water bill, electricity bill, and residential property management fee for March. These are his fixed monthly financial expenses, and during this period of financial prudence, he pays even closer attention to the amounts of these daily expenditures.

events.name: Light Family Walk
events.description: In the evening, I accompanied my father for a 20-minute walk in the residential community as a form of light exercise to aid digestion and promote relaxation.

起始状态.心情: The end-of-month review mindset, carrying the aftertaste of yesterday's journey.

结束状态.所处地点: At Home, No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Amidst the calm, there was a glimmer of relief as dawn broke. The initial success in health management, the temporary easing of rental pressure, and the inspiration gained from exploring new shops—these small but accumulating victories allowed him to finally catch his breath after weathering the storms of the entire month. He now had more concrete ideas for the promotional activities to be launched in the coming month and for his family plans.

state.今日运动: 20-minute family walk (light intensity)

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy turning to clear, spring is in full bloom, with a gentle breeze.

2025-04.daily_overview: On the first day of April, Lei Mingxuan demonstrated exceptional execution by launching the store's spring promotion. While managing the online activation of promotional activities and handling customer inquiries, he personally organized the newly arrived goods, maintaining a busy yet orderly pace. Amidst his work, he scheduled the hearing aid adjustment agreed upon with his father the previous day and began his rehabilitation walk, showcasing his ability to flexibly multitask across various responsibilities.

events.name: Preparation for Spring New Product Display and Promotion
events.description: Setting aside the approval matters for the time being, Lei Mingxuan arrived early at the store warehouse to organize several batches of spring clothing that had just arrived from the supplier Zhou Tao in Hangzhou. Leveraging his keen sense of fashion trends, he selected several key styles with strong design appeal and comfortable fabrics, arranging them meticulously in the store window and central display area. At the same time, he picked up his phone, adjusted the lighting and angles, and captured a series of high-quality promotional photos and short video clips for these new arrivals. These materials were intended to update the store's WeChat Moments, micro-store homepage, and TikTok account, creating momentum for the upcoming seasonal transition.

events.name: Launch online promotional activities
events.description: Since the event automatically started at 0:00, Lei Mingxuan devoted most of his daytime energy to online activities. He frequently checked the backend of his Weidian store, tracking order growth trends and coupon redemption data. Not only did he post two image-text updates on his WeChat Moments, using a lively tone to remind regular customers that the event was in full swing, but he also personally answered questions about sizes, fabrics, and event details in several core customer WeChat groups. His prompt responses and enthusiastic service led to many immediate orders.

events.name: Assisting father in adjusting the hearing aid
events.description: After dinner, family time became warm and practical. Lei Mingxuan took out the newly fitted hearing aid for his father and patiently taught Lei Jianguo how to wear it, replace the batteries, and adjust the volume in the quiet living room. Starting from the lowest volume, he let his father first adapt to the ambient sounds, then gradually increased it to a normal conversational level, repeatedly explaining the daily maintenance precautions. At first, the father was somewhat reserved, but with his son's encouragement, he gradually relaxed and attempted simple conversation practice with the family.

events.name: Accompanying my father for a rehabilitation walk in the evening.
events.description: After adjusting the hearing aid, Lei Mingxuan accompanied his father on a 15-minute slow walk within the residential community as the start of his rehabilitation training. They strolled leisurely along a familiar path, with Lei Mingxuan deliberately slowing his pace to match his father’s. During the walk, they chatted about daily trivial matters, which not only provided physical exercise but also strengthened their parent-child bond.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom, No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Full of drive, looking forward to promotional activities, with a slight sense of vigilance toward the financial pressures of the new month.

结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled and somewhat accomplished, the initial feedback on online orders has been positive. My father has also started trying out hearing aids and taking walks, and he is filled with plans for tomorrow.

state.今日运动: Frequent movement within the store; accompanied father for a 15-minute slow-paced walk in the residential area in the evening.

2025-04.daily_overview: Today was a day dense with information and decision-making. Good news coexisted with pressure: the shopping mall approved the rent deferral application, providing Lei Mingxuan with short-term relief for cash flow; however, the financial review for March revealed a decline in revenue and an increase in expenses, compelling him to immediately adjust operational and household budgets for April, making meticulous budgeting the main theme. He stayed up late at night handling urgent consultations.

events.name: Notice of Rent Deferral Granted
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan, who was busy in the warehouse, received a call from Zheng Kai, the property manager of the shopping mall. Zheng Kai formally informed him that the application for a one-month rent extension in April had been approved by the higher-ups, and a written notice would be issued subsequently. Lei Mingxuan repeatedly expressed his gratitude over the phone and sincerely invited Zheng Kai to have a meal together when he had time, thanking him for his help.

events.name: Handling the surge in online orders
events.description: The impact of the promotional event continued to unfold, with online orders surpassing yesterday's volume. Lei Mingxuan was practically glued to his computer and the warehouse for almost the entire day. He swiftly and meticulously verified the customer information, product specifications, and delivery addresses for each order, ensuring accuracy before printing out the shipping labels. He then moved through the narrow warehouse space, quickly picking, inspecting, and packaging items according to the orders. His phone and computer notifications chimed incessantly with customer inquiries about shipping times and size recommendations. While packing, he responded promptly using voice messages, juggling tasks in a whirlwind of activity.

events.name: March Financial Review and Cash Flow Analysis
events.description: During a lull in order processing, Lei Mingxuan forced himself to calm down, opened the accounting software on his computer, and began entering and verifying each item of income and expenditure for March one by one. He found that due to the underwhelming performance of the spring season change promotion, the store’s revenue had indeed declined compared to February. At the same time, he clearly saw the expenses reserved in the family ledger for considering hiring a caregiver for his father, as well as the store’s fixed costs such as rent, salaries, and inventory procurement. Overall, the monthly cash flow had become tight, and short-term financial pressure was evident.

events.name: Adjust April Operating and Household Budget
events.description: Faced with the analysis results, Lei Mingxuan did not panic but immediately took action. He decided to suspend a paid online advertising campaign originally scheduled for April, opting instead for more refined content operations using his own social media platforms. Simultaneously, he reduced the procurement budget for some decorative materials in the store and resolved to strictly control business travel and entertainment expenses for the month. The most critical step was that, from the already modest expected profits, he managed to allocate a sum of money as an emergency reserve fund for both the store and his family, to address unforeseen situations such as his mother's sudden health issues.

events.name: Reporting Recent Situation to Parents
events.description: During dinner, Lei Mingxuan took the initiative to break the slightly subdued atmosphere at the table. He took out his phone and showed his parents pictures of the store's spring new arrivals and trendy toys he had taken during the day, sharing which styles had received positive feedback from customers and which might need adjustments. His father, Lei Jianguo, was more concerned with the commercial aspects, asking about fabric costs and pricing strategies. His mother, Wang Xiuying, offered practical and aesthetic insights from a daily-life perspective on several women's clothing items. This relaxed sharing temporarily eased the tension brought on by dealing with financial matters during the day.

events.name: Handling urgent customer inquiries late at night
events.description: After 11 p.m., several customers continued to inquire about the details of promotional activities due to time differences or busy schedules. Lei Mingxuan stayed up late replying to messages until the early morning to ensure service quality, handling multiple urgent inquiries regarding sizes and logistics, demonstrating his sense of responsibility.

起始状态.心情: Awaiting the rental application results while preparing for order processing, maintaining a calm mindset.

结束状态.心情: Feeling stressed yet thinking clearly, the financial adjustment plan has been set, with a determination akin to "tightening the belt to push through," though a hint of fatigue lingers after staying up late.

state.今日运动: Full-day high-intensity physical labor (packing, moving); no dedicated exercise.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with light rain in the evening
