2025-04.daily_overview: On the eve of the Qingming Festival, Lei Mingxuan balanced his life between business affairs and family traditions. He successfully resolved the rental agreement, efficiently handled the shipment of the first batch of event orders, and accompanied his mother in preparing for the ancestral worship ceremony the following day. The pace was intense, yet everything remained under his control, reflecting his dual responsibilities as the family pillar and shop owner. In the evening, exhausted, he attempted a brief home workout.

events.name: Sign the Rent Deferral Supplementary Agreement
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan took some time to visit the property management department of the shopping mall to meet with Zheng Kai. He carefully reviewed the supplementary agreement terms regarding the extension of the April rent payment deadline to April 30. After confirming that everything was correct, he solemnly signed his name. This agreement provided him with valuable time for financial turnover.

events.name: Process active order shipments
events.description: He neatly arranged the large number of parcels that had been packed the previous day, and the pre-arranged courier arrived on time to pick them up. Lei Mingxuan scanned each tracking number one by one, synchronized the logistics information to the shop's backend, and simultaneously sent shipping notifications to each customer via WeChat. In the afternoon, he posted a message with an image on his Moments: "The first batch of treasures has set off on the delivery truck! Thank you for your support, everyone. Please keep an eye out for your packages~" He also attached a photo of the parcels piled up like a small mountain, further boosting the momentum of the event.

events.name: Inventory Stocktaking and Replenishment Communication
events.description: After several days of sales, the inventory of some best-selling items is running low. Lei Mingxuan quickly took stock of the remaining inventory and updated the status of out-of-stock items to 'pre-sale' or 'restocking' on the online store. He immediately contacted his main supplier, Zhou Tao, via WeChat to discuss the possibility of urgent restocking and estimated the subsequent demand based on sales data. In the store, the foot traffic had also increased due to the promotional activities, requiring him to handle online inquiries while simultaneously attending to in-store customers.

events.name: Accompanying mother to prepare offerings for the Qingming Festival
events.description: In the evening, after closing the shop, Lei Mingxuan did not go directly home. Instead, he drove to pick up his mother, Wang Xiuying, and together they went to a large wet market and a time-honored incense and candle shop near their home. His mother skillfully selected the flowers, fresh fruits, traditional pastries, and incense, candles, and joss paper needed for the ancestral worship ceremony, while Lei Mingxuan followed alongside, responsible for carrying the items and making payments. During the preparations, his mother chattered on about some family stories and the rituals of ancestral worship. Lei Mingxuan listened quietly, occasionally interjecting with questions, as they both immersed themselves in the atmosphere of the upcoming traditional ceremony.

events.name: Try Home Core Training
events.description: After returning home in the evening, despite feeling exhausted, Lei Mingxuan attempted to perform a 10-minute core strengthening workout using the Keep APP to maintain his physical fitness. However, due to insufficient energy, the session was only partially effective, and he managed to complete only some of the exercises.

起始状态.心情: Relatively calm, primarily focused on handling specific matters.

结束状态.心情: Slightly fatigued yet inwardly fulfilled, having completed multiple tasks, I now feel a solemn preparedness for tomorrow's Qingming Festival, with the attempt at fitness bringing a subtle sense of satisfaction.

state.今日运动: Walk to purchase sacrificial offerings; attempt a 10-minute home core workout.

date_attribute.weather: During the Qingming Festival, the rain falls in a continuous drizzle, with a light misty rain persisting throughout the day.
date_attribute.holiday: Qingming Festival

2025-04.daily_overview: During the Qingming Festival, Lei Mingxuan suspended most of his commercial activities and spent the entire day with his parents, following the tradition of ancestor worship and tomb sweeping. It was a family ritual filled with warmth and remembrance, but his mother's day-long exertion had accumulated to its peak at this moment, sounding an alarm for the family's health. In the evening, he urged his mother to rest early out of concern.

events.name: The mother prepared the ancestral worship items alone (supplementary event).
events.description: Early in the morning, Wang Xiuying, the mother, got up and began the final washing, organizing, and arranging of the sacrificial offerings purchased the day before. She carefully wiped the fruits, arranged the pastries on plates, and sorted the incense, candles, and joss paper into their respective categories. This series of tedious and physically demanding preparatory tasks was almost entirely completed by her alone, while Lei Mingxuan and his father attended to some of their own matters in their respective rooms.

events.name: Handling Online Orders and After-Sales Service
events.description: Although on holiday, the online operations of the store could not come to a complete halt. Lei Mingxuan utilized fragmented time in the morning to process newly generated orders and began receiving the first batch of customer feedback upon delivery. He proactively handled individual after-sales requests regarding size discrepancies or delivery delays, swiftly coordinating exchanges or reassuring customers. Meanwhile, he shared several screenshots of positive reviews from customers who had received their orders on his social media feed, accompanied by the caption: "Seeing everyone love our spring collection makes all the hard work worthwhile! Only two days left in the promotion—don’t miss out!" This cleverly helped maintain the momentum of the campaign.

events.name: Ancestral Worship Ceremony at Home
events.description: Around ten in the morning, the entire family set up a simple altar in the living room, placing photographs of their ancestors and various prepared offerings. Led by father Lei Jianguo, each family member washed their hands, offered incense, and bowed in turn, silently expressing their remembrance and respect for the departed relatives. Mother Wang Xiuying remained busy throughout the process, constantly replacing tea and adjusting the positions of the offerings to ensure the ceremony was solemn and thorough.

events.name: Visiting the family cemetery to pay respects at the graves.
events.description: In the afternoon, the light rain continued as Lei Mingxuan drove his parents to the family cemetery located in Pudong. Holding umbrellas, the family cleared the weeds around the tombstone that had been dampened by the spring rain, carefully wiped away the water stains and dust on the tombstone, rearranged fresh flowers and offerings, and performed a simple ritual. The slippery steps and frequent bending movements made Wang Xiuying, the mother, visibly fatigued, and her breathing became somewhat labored.

events.name: Family Dinner and Memories
events.description: After returning from the tomb-sweeping visit, though physically exhausted, Wang Xiuying, the mother, insisted on cooking and prepared a more sumptuous dinner than usual, which, of course, included Lei Mingxuan’s favorite Shanghai-style braised pork. During dinner, the sound of light rain pattered outside the window, while the warm glow of indoor lights filled the room. The family chatted as they ate, and the conversation naturally turned to the stories of the deceased elders. The atmosphere was warm yet tinged with a gentle melancholy, and the bond of family was strengthened through reminiscence.

events.name: Mother feels unwell after exertion.
events.description: After all the ancestral worship activities had concluded, Wang Xiuying, the mother, finally breathed a sigh of relief. However, she soon experienced noticeable lower back pain and bouts of dizziness. Attributing it to her age and the exhaustion from the day’s work, she wanted to rest early. Lei Mingxuan and his father sensed something was amiss and persuaded her to check her blood pressure. The home electronic blood pressure monitor showed that her blood pressure reading was indeed elevated. This result put the entire family on edge, and they decided to let her rest properly first and observe her condition again the following day.

起始状态.心情: Solemn and dignified, preparing for ancestral worship.

结束状态.心情: Worry and self-blame intertwine, creating anxiety over the mother's health condition, prompting deep reflection on the arrangements for family care.

state.今日运动: Walking and light labor during tomb sweeping; no specialized exercise.

2025-04.daily_overview: The sudden spike in my mother's blood pressure struck like an alarm bell, completely shattering the tranquility of the holiday. Lei Mingxuan swiftly transitioned from his role as a son to that of a family crisis manager. He accompanied her to seek medical care, convened a family meeting, and promptly initiated a series of concrete measures—hiring a part-time helper, purchasing daily necessities, and researching insurance options—demonstrating strong initiative in addressing the dual pressures of family health and caregiving. He stayed up late into the night researching insurance plans.

events.name: Home Blood Pressure Monitoring for Mothers with Elevated Blood Pressure
events.description: Early on Qingming Festival, Wang Xiuying still felt dizzy, so Lei Mingxuan immediately used the home electronic blood pressure monitor to measure her blood pressure again. The reading confirmed that her blood pressure remained elevated, exceeding her usual normal range. The family atmosphere instantly grew tense.

events.name: Accompanying mother to the community hospital for medical consultation
events.description: Lei Mingxuan did not hesitate for a moment and immediately accompanied his mother to the nearby community hospital. The doctor inquired in detail about her recent fatigue, sleep patterns, and emotional state. Based on the examination, the doctor concluded that her blood pressure fluctuations were primarily related to recent exhaustion, anxiety, and insufficient rest. The doctor prescribed some auxiliary antihypertensive medication and strongly advised her to reduce her household chores, ensure adequate rest, and adjust her emotional state.

events.name: Hold an emergency family meeting.
events.description: After returning home from the hospital, Lei Mingxuan felt that he could no longer delay. He organized a formal family meeting in the living room. He first informed his parents of the doctor's diagnosis and recommendations, then candidly analyzed the current caregiving pressures facing the family: his father needed rehabilitation support, his mother was handling almost all the household chores, and he himself was too busy with his shop work to be fully available. He clearly pointed out that this model was unsustainable and must be changed immediately. During the meeting, his mother initially insisted that she could manage, but under the insistence of her son and husband, she eventually accepted the reality that external assistance was needed.

events.name: Decided to hire an hourly worker
events.description: Based on the consensus reached at the family meeting, Lei Mingxuan made an immediate decision on the spot to hire a reliable part-time housekeeper through a formal domestic service platform. The housekeeper would visit regularly every week, primarily responsible for cleaning and simple meal preparation, thereby relieving his mother from the burden of heavy daily household chores. This was the most direct and effective solution he had devised to alleviate his mother's stress.

events.name: Purchasing daily necessities for the family
events.description: To allow his mother to rest completely, Lei Mingxuan did not go straight home after closing the shop. Instead, he made a detour to a large supermarket near his home. Following his mother’s usual shopping list, he purchased enough rice, oil, tissues, cleaning supplies, and fresh fruit to last a week. He carried all the bags home by himself, sorted them, and put everything away.

events.name: Begin researching supplementary medical insurance.
events.description: This sudden health incident involving his mother made Lei Mingxuan acutely aware of the health risks associated with his parents' advancing age. That evening, after settling his parents in, he sat down at the computer in his study and began earnestly searching for and comparing commercial supplementary medical insurance products tailored for middle-aged and elderly individuals. He realized that relying solely on basic medical insurance might not be sufficient, and that it was essential to build a more robust financial safety net for his family's health needs.

events.name: Staying up late to study insurance plans.
events.description: Unfamiliar with the insurance terms, Lei Mingxuan delved into different products until late at night, comparing the coverage and premiums of multiple plans, which delayed his sleep time.

起始状态.心情: Worry, anxiety, filled with concern for the mother's health

结束状态.心情: Resolute and determined, under immense pressure but with clear objectives, equipped with a well-defined action plan, and an unprecedented sense of responsibility, though slightly fatigued after staying up late.

2025-04.daily_overview: Sunday is designated as the day for family communication and emotional reconciliation. Lei Mingxuan personally prepared a family feast, and in the warm atmosphere of the dinner, he systematically reported to his parents on the financial status of the shop, the specific plan for hiring part-time workers, and the adjustments to the family budget. Through candid communication, the entire family reached a high level of consensus on the steps to address the current crisis, strengthening their confidence to overcome the difficulties together. In the evening, they engaged in short-term exercise to alleviate stress.

events.name: Communicating Financial Overview with Parents
events.description: During dinner, Lei Mingxuan proactively briefed his parents on the store's operational performance for the month. He mentioned that due to promotional activities and seasonal factors, there had been fluctuations in revenue. However, expenses had been controlled through budget adjustments. He specifically noted that emergency funds for the family had been set aside, reassuring them not to worry excessively about recent financial concerns.

events.name: Accompanying my father for hearing practice
events.description: After the meal, Lei Mingxuan played a classic excerpt from Shanghai opera, which was his father's favorite in his youth, with the volume set to a moderate level. After listening, instead of directly commenting on how well his father had heard it, he engaged in a lively discussion with his father about the storyline and vocal characteristics of the opera. This allowed his father to naturally recall and express his thoughts in a relaxed state, effectively completing hearing and speech rehabilitation exercises in an unobtrusive manner.

events.name: Purchasing ingredients to prepare a home-cooked feast
events.description: On Sunday morning, Lei Mingxuan declined a friend's party invitation and made a special trip to the vegetable market. He carefully selected high-quality pork belly for making Shanghainese braised pork, fresh seasonal vegetables, as well as pastries and fruits that his parents enjoy, determined to cook a meal himself that evening to let his parents feel his sincerity.

events.name: Personally cooking a family banquet
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan tied on an apron and busied himself in the kitchen. He meticulously followed the "secret recipe" passed down by his mother to prepare the braised pork, simmering it slowly over low heat. At the same time, he stir-fried several refreshing seasonal vegetables. He carefully arranged the dishes on plates and set the dining table, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere for the meal.

events.name: Family Dinner and In-depth Communication
events.description: At the dinner table, the family enjoyed Lei Mingxuan's cooking in a harmonious atmosphere. Seizing this opportunity, Lei Mingxuan formally and thoroughly reported to his parents on the recent true financial status of the shop, including revenue, costs, and cash flow, and officially proposed his decision to hire a part-time helper to share his mother's household chores. He elaborated on the budget (to be covered from his shop's profits), service frequency, and scope of work, sincerely seeking his parents' final opinion.

events.name: Jointly discuss adjustments to the family budget
events.description: After listening to Lei Mingxuan's report, his parents were not only moved but also took the matter seriously. The family of three sat together and discussed how to adjust the household budget as if they were holding a meeting. They deliberated on how to reasonably arrange the new fixed expense of hiring a part-time domestic helper while ensuring their basic quality of life and maintaining their original savings plan. They also estimated the potential working capital the shop might require in the coming months. This discussion made the family's financial management more transparent and collaborative.

events.name: Confirm the follow-up action steps
events.description: Before the conversation concluded, Lei Mingxuan and his parents clarified the next steps: Lei Mingxuan would take full responsibility for contacting and screening part-time domestic helpers, while his parents agreed to include this new expense in the household budget and adapt to the new rhythm of family life. All decisions were made in a calm and rational atmosphere.

events.name: Evening attempt at upper limb training using the Keep APP.
events.description: To relieve stress and maintain physical fitness, Lei Mingxuan took some time in the evening to perform a 15-minute upper body strength training session. Guided by the Keep APP, he completed simple push-ups and dumbbell exercises, feeling a slight sense of release.

起始状态.心情: The plan is clear: to enhance communication and alleviate family tensions through a home-cooked meal.

结束状态.心情: A sense of relief and warmth, the achievement of family consensus brings immense security, making one feel that family members are comrades fighting side by side. The attempt at fitness brings a slight sense of satisfaction.

state.今日运动: Grocery shopping and kitchen work; attempted a 15-minute upper limb training session on the Keep app in the evening.

2025-04.daily_overview: As the new week began, Lei Mingxuan simultaneously wrapped up and initiated two matters: the spring promotion campaign for his store concluded successfully, and he proceeded with customer maintenance; meanwhile, he swiftly implemented the family resolution made over the weekend by successfully hiring part-time housekeeper Aunt Li and completing the trial work period. His efficient execution was once again demonstrated, marking the beginning of a new chapter in the family management model. In the evening, he accompanied his father for a walk to support his recovery.

events.name: Closing of Promotional Activities and Customer Maintenance
events.description: Today marks the final day of the spring promotion campaign. Lei Mingxuan processed all remaining orders and confirmed that all packages had been dispatched. He posted a message of gratitude on his social media feed to announce the successful conclusion of the event and previewed upcoming new product releases. More importantly, he meticulously categorized the dozens of customers' WeChat accounts added during the campaign, sending personalized thank-you messages to each and inviting them to join the store’s exclusive membership benefits group. This laid the groundwork for future private domain traffic operations.

events.name: Research and screen domestic service platforms
events.description: During a work break, Lei Mingxuan quickly browsed the apps of mainstream domestic service platforms such as Daojia and 58 Daojia on his phone. He focused on comparing the service reviews, price transparency, insurance coverage, and contract procedures for hourly workers across different platforms, and preliminarily selected a platform with a good reputation and standardized processes.

events.name: Communicating with Mother about Hiring an Hourly Domestic Worker
events.description: After dinner, Lei Mingxuan sat down and had an in-depth conversation with his mother, Wang Xiuying. He explained in detail the necessity of hiring a part-time domestic helper (as required by the doctor and decided in a family meeting) and outlined the preliminary plan regarding the service frequency (every Monday, Wednesday, and Friday afternoon, three hours each time) and the scope of work. Initially, his mother did feel it was a waste of money and was uncomfortable with having a stranger in the house. However, persuaded by Lei Mingxuan's argument that "your health is the family's greatest asset," she eventually agreed to give it a try.

events.name: Place an order to schedule a trial session for an hourly housekeeper.
events.description: After obtaining his mother's consent, Lei Mingxuan immediately placed an order on the selected platform, paid the initial service fee, and scheduled a trial session with a highly-rated and experienced caregiver, Auntie Li, for that very afternoon. He specifically noted his requirements: to focus on assessing the thoroughness of cleaning and the communication attitude.

events.name: Hourly worker Aunt Li came for a trial work session.
events.description: In the afternoon, Aunt Li arrived on time. Lei Mingxuan and his mother received her at home. Aunt Li was straightforward in character and efficient in her work. After quickly understanding the basic situation of the household, she began her first service, cleaning thoroughly from the living room to the kitchen. With permission, she also prepared a simple dinner. Both Lei Mingxuan and his mother were satisfied after observing her work and decided on the spot to hire Aunt Li for the long term.

events.name: Invite friends to play ball for relaxation
events.description: After dealing with a day of heavy affairs, Lei Mingxuan felt the need to relax. He contacted his billiards friend Han Dong via WeChat and easily arranged a game for the following evening. They agreed to meet at their usual spot to play a few rounds and catch up on recent events.

events.name: Taking a walk with my father in the evening.
events.description: After dinner, Lei Mingxuan accompanied his father on a 20-minute slow-paced walk in the community garden as part of the rehabilitation training, during which they chatted and relaxed to strengthen their parent-child relationship.

起始状态.心情: Aim to simultaneously handle both the closing of the shop and new family matters.

结束状态.心情: The satisfaction of achieving success on both fronts: the store event concluded successfully, and a crucial step was taken in resolving the family issue, bringing a slight sense of relief.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise; accompanied father for a 20-minute walk in the evening.

2025-04.daily_overview: Entering the post-promotion period, Lei Mingxuan shifted his focus to review analysis and internal adjustments. He evaluated the event data and formally established the hourly service agreement. In the evening, he temporarily detached himself from the high-pressure state of recent days through a spirited game of billiards and a late-night snack, restoring the social and recreational vitality characteristic of an ESTP.

events.name: Review Spring Promotion Activity Data
events.description: After the promotional campaign concluded, Lei Mingxuan opened the data analysis report on his Weidian backend and spent the entire morning carefully reviewing it. He tallied key metrics such as the total transaction volume, average order value, coupon redemption rate, and number of new customers during the campaign, comparing them with data from the same period before the event. He found that while sales had increased significantly, the profit margin had been reduced due to discounts and complimentary gifts. At the same time, the effectiveness of online traffic generation exceeded expectations. He preliminarily assessed that the campaign was successful in clearing inventory and attracting new customers, but more precise profit accounting would be needed in the future.

events.name: Confirm Long-term Hourly Worker Service Agreement
events.description: After the trial period proved successful, Lei Mingxuan confirmed a long-term service agreement with Aunt Li through the platform, scheduling regular visits every Monday, Wednesday, and Friday afternoon. He set up automatic recurring payments on the platform and calculated the new monthly fixed expense, reminding himself once again to strictly adhere to the adjusted family budget.

events.name: Informing Father About the Hourly Helper Arrangement
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan specifically sought out his father, Lei Jianguo, for a conversation, formally informing him that the part-time housekeeper, Aunt Li, had been confirmed and would begin providing regular weekly services. He explained to his father that this arrangement was intended to alleviate his mother's burden in the long term and ensure the sustainable operation of the household. After listening, his father nodded, expressing understanding and support for his son's arrangement.

events.name: Playing billiards with my friend Han Dong
events.description: After finishing his shift at the shop, Lei Mingxuan took the subway to the billiard hall where he had arranged to meet Han Dong. The two immediately entered "battle mode," focusing intently on positioning and shots in a game of eight-ball. The sounds of cue strikes and cheers for successful shots intertwined, punctuated by casual conversation—Han Dong shared an amusing story about repairing a vintage car, while Lei Mingxuan vented about unexpected family matters during the Qingming Festival and discussed the plot of a new anime he was following. This was their way of unwinding and connecting as friends.

events.name: Late-night Snack Chat After the Game
events.description: After finishing a few rounds of pool, both of them still felt unsatisfied and, as usual, headed to the familiar barbecue stall near the pool hall. While enjoying skewers and drinks, their conversation expanded from pool techniques to their respective career perspectives, as well as new interesting shops that had recently opened in Shanghai. This kind of stress-free social interaction completely relaxed Lei Mingxuan's tense nerves.

events.name: Take the initiative to do the dishwashing chores.
events.description: It was already quite late when Lei Mingxuan returned home after having a late-night snack, but seeing his mother still tidying up the kitchen, he immediately stepped forward to take over the dishes and urged her to rest. He put on an apron, carefully washed all the utensils, wiped down the stovetop, and fulfilled his promise to lighten his mother's burden through action.

events.name: Chatting with Parents in the Evening
events.description: After washing up, Lei Mingxuan went to the living room and watched the local news with his parents for a while. His mother mentioned that the flowers at their neighbor Aunt Zhu’s house were blooming beautifully, while his father brought up the news that the old noodle shop at the entrance of the alley might be changing owners. The family chatted idly about the most ordinary changes in their community—simple yet warm.

起始状态.心情: Calm, analytical, prepared for activity review.

结束状态.心情: Relaxed and content, social needs are satisfied, stress is effectively released, and new ideas for tomorrow's work have emerged.

state.今日运动: Playing billiards for approximately 1.5 hours is considered a moderate-intensity recreational activity.

2025-04.daily_overview: After several days of handling external affairs and engaging in high-intensity social interactions, Lei Mingxuan entered a phase of reflection and preparation today. He quietly sorted out the shop's requirements in preparation for an important meeting with suppliers the following day, while also beginning preliminary research on long-term health security for his family, demonstrating his proactive approach. At night, he stayed up late studying an insurance course.

events.name: Topics for the Meeting with Suppliers
events.description: After closing for the night, Lei Mingxuan did not rush to leave. Instead, he sat down in the small office at the back of the shop. He opened his notebook to review the sales data and customer feedback for the recent spring collection, compiling a list of bestsellers and slow-moving items. Based on his observations of the market, he drafted the key topics to be discussed in the video conference with Zhou Tao the next day: first, confirming replenishment and minor adjustments for current orders; second, inquiring about fabric trends for the upcoming season (early summer); and third, focusing on discussing his long-considered preliminary ideas for the shop’s digital transformation, hoping to seek advice from this experienced supplier.

events.name: Sharing Interesting Stories with Fellow Players (Supplementary Events)
events.description: During the lunch break, Lei Mingxuan shared a short video in the "Billiards Squad" WeChat group, capturing a brilliant comeback shot from his game with Han Dong the previous night. He tagged Qin Lang, a fellow player based in Hangzhou, and jokingly remarked, "[Shanghai team temporarily leads by one point]." The group immediately buzzed with excitement, as Qin Lang, unwilling to concede, challenged him to a rematch in the next Hangzhou-Shanghai showdown. Such lighthearted interactions help keep his social circle lively and engaged.

events.name: Preliminary Study on Parental Insurance Products
events.description: Utilizing fragmented time in the evenings, Lei Mingxuan downloaded several insurance comparison apps on his phone and began carefully browsing medical and accident insurance products targeted at middle-aged and elderly individuals. He focused on whether the coverage included follow-up treatments for common chronic conditions such as hypertension, hospitalization allowances, and the compensation limits for accidental medical expenses. After an initial screening, he identified two to three products that appeared to offer good value for money and prepared to seek further consultation.

events.name: Temporary Insurance Course
events.description: To gain a deeper understanding of the insurance terms, Lei Mingxuan found an online basic insurance knowledge course late at night and studied until 1 a.m., which delayed his sleep. This reflects his thirst for knowledge and his emphasis on family protection.

起始状态.心情: Calm, focused, entering a state of planning and preparation.

结束状态.心情: After deep reflection, I have developed a preliminary framework for tomorrow's meeting and family security planning, feeling more in control of the situation. However, I am slightly fatigued after staying up late.

2025-04.daily_overview: Today was a day of both harvest and initiation. A high-quality communication with supplier Zhou Tao provided valuable market trend insights and encouragement for the online transformation, offering clear direction for Lei Mingxuan. Simultaneously, he translated his care for family into concrete actions: accompanying his father for a follow-up medical appointment, initiating father-son recovery walks, and finalizing and purchasing supplemental health insurance for his parents, demonstrating exceptional execution.

events.name: Consider the online transformation of the store
events.description: While reviewing the store's customer flow in the morning, Lei Mingxuan increasingly felt the limitations of relying solely on offline waiting for customers. By searching keywords such as "short video marketing for physical stores" on his phone, he gained a preliminary understanding of the value of private domain traffic and content e-commerce. He downloaded several well-known commercial knowledge payment apps, briefly browsed a few course introductions on online operations for physical stores, and began to consider the idea of systematic learning.

events.name: In-depth video conference with supplier Zhou Tao
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan held a one-hour video conference with Zhou Tao from Hangzhou in the shop's office. In addition to smoothly finalizing the details of the replenishment for the spring orders, Zhou Tao proactively shared a key piece of information: recently, in the Jiangsu-Zhejiang-Shanghai region, there has been a noticeable increase in demand for fabrics and ready-to-wear garments that blend functionality and fashion, known as the "outdoor techwear" style. Lei Mingxuan immediately connected this with his own customer base and personal interests, feeling greatly inspired. He also took the opportunity to candidly express his idea of trying to open an online store to expand sales channels. Zhou Tao not only expressed support but also offered valuable advice from a supplier's perspective: starting with the shop's existing distinctive accessories, classic basics, and collaborative niche designer items would be a lower-risk way to test the waters.

events.name: Summarize Meeting Key Points and Update Orders
events.description: As soon as the meeting concluded, Lei Mingxuan promptly recorded the key discussion points, the consensus reached, and the keyword "outdoor functional style" in his electronic notes. Based on the meeting outcomes, he swiftly updated the purchase order for Zhou Tao on his computer and sent the final version via WeChat, demonstrating efficient professionalism.

events.name: Accompanying father for a follow-up hearing examination
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan temporarily closed his shop for two hours to accompany his father, Lei Jianguo, to a hospital in Pudong New Area for a follow-up hearing examination. He had a detailed discussion with the doctor regarding his father's recent adaptation to the hearing aid and rehabilitation progress. The doctor provided some guidance for subsequent home training. Although the recovery is slow, there are signs of improvement, which has given the entire family confidence.

events.name: Launch the Father-Son Rehabilitation Walking Program
events.description: After dinner, Lei Mingxuan acted on his previous idea and invited his father for a walk in the residential garden. He deliberately slowed his pace, fully accommodating his father’s slower gait due to knee discomfort. The father and son strolled leisurely along the familiar path, chatting casually about various topics—from an interesting customer who visited the shop today to the newly planted saplings in the neighborhood. The 30-minute walk was not particularly strenuous, but it held significant meaning for his father’s emotional recovery and their communication. Lei Mingxuan decided to make this activity a regular routine.

events.name: Consult and Determine Parental Insurance Plans
events.description: Through the connection of financial manager Xu Feng, Lei Mingxuan engaged in a detailed WeChat communication with a professional insurance agent. He focused on inquiring about the previously screened products and truthfully informed the agent of his mother's recent blood pressure fluctuations. The agent recommended a medical insurance product that is relatively friendly to hypertensive patients. After carefully studying the terms, Lei Mingxuan felt that the coverage met his expectations.

events.name: Purchase Insurance Online for Parents
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan provided his parents with a brief explanation of the finalized insurance plan, emphasizing its role as supplementary coverage. After obtaining their consent, he carefully filled out his parents' insurance information on his mobile phone using the application link sent by the agent, completed the health declaration, and made the online payment for the first-year premiums of both policies. The moment the payment was completed, he felt a slight easing of the pressure on his shoulders.

events.name: Schedule a comprehensive physical examination for yourself
events.description: While dealing with his parents' health issues, Lei Mingxuan also thought of himself. He realized he could no longer claim to be "healthy" based on mere feelings. That same evening, he made an online appointment for a comprehensive health checkup package at a medical examination center affiliated with a top-tier hospital in Pudong, scheduled for late April. He was determined to use objective data to assess and plan his health.

起始状态.心情: With anticipation and focus, ready to attend an important meeting and handle multiple family matters.

结束状态.心情: A sense of fulfillment and steadiness following action, with progress on multiple fronts including information acquisition, family care, and risk prevention, leading to greater confidence about the future.

state.今日运动: Accompany father for a 30-minute slow-paced walk after dinner.

2025-04.daily_overview: The drizzly weather slightly slowed the pace. Lei Mingxuan focused on implementing plans based on yesterday's achievements: beginning to outline the initial concept for an online store and confirming his parents' insurance policies. Both work and personal plans progressed steadily, making it a day of building on past efforts and consolidating ideas. He also started filming the first short video clips in preparation for the online transition.

events.name: Plan the Preliminary Scheme for the Online Store
events.description: Inspired by the meeting with Zhou Tao, Lei Mingxuan began to concretely plan the online store. He researched the entry requirements and operational rules of platforms such as Taobao and Douyin Shop, feeling that Douyin Shop better aligned with his idea of attracting traffic through content creation. Simultaneously, he selected a batch of uniquely designed, cost-effective accessories, classic T-shirts, and shirts from the inventory system to serve as the first batch of trial products for the online store. He also started brainstorming how to shoot more storytelling short videos for these products.

events.name: Confirm and Save Parents' Electronic Insurance Policies
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan received the electronic insurance policy sent by the insurance company via email. He meticulously verified the policy number, insured party information, coverage responsibilities, and effective date word by word, confirming that everything was accurate. He encrypted and saved the electronic policy file to a cloud drive, printed a hard copy, and handed it to his parents after returning home in the evening. He briefly reminded them once again of the key coverage details and the contact information for claims.

events.name: Start shooting the first short video material.
events.description: During the shop's idle hours, Lei Mingxuan attempted to shoot a short video about the spring collection using his mobile phone. The video showcased the clothing's styling and details, accompanied by simple voiceover narration. This marked his first practical step in transitioning to online operations. Although his techniques were still unpolished, it represented a substantial move forward.

起始状态.心情: Steady, with a pragmatic mindset of turning ideas into reality.

结束状态.心情: A sense of stability is steadily advancing, initial directions for online transformation have been identified and put into practice, family security measures have been implemented, and with the weekend approaching, there is a slight sense of relaxation.

2025-04.daily_overview: The weekend morning began with self-investment, as Lei Mingxuan enrolled in an online operations course to stockpile ammunition for his career transition. In the afternoon, a carefree skating session with his rollerblading companions along the riverside in spring allowed him to fully release the pressures of work and family, rediscovering the free-spirited soul who loves the outdoors and socializing. The evening conversation with his parents brought a deeper family issue to the table. He also captured rollerblading video clips for online promotion.

events.name: Register for the Online Operations Course
events.description: In the morning, after comparing options, Lei Mingxuan ultimately selected a series course package on a business learning platform that included short video content creation and WeChat private domain operations, and completed the payment. He briefly reviewed the course schedule, which covered everything from shooting techniques and script planning to methods for boosting community engagement, all of which seemed highly practical. He decided to start systematically studying for one hour every evening beginning next week.

events.name: Parents mentioned the difficulty of climbing stairs.
events.description: After a family dinner, everyone was relaxing in the living room. Lei Jianguo, the father, glanced at the staircase and sighed inadvertently, "This old house doesn't have an elevator. Going up and down the stairs is becoming more and more difficult." Wang Xiuying, the mother, chimed in, "Yes, I feel breathless after just two flights now." Though the words were spoken casually, they struck a chord with the listener. Lei Mingxuan looked at his parents, and his heart sank. He began to seriously consider the long-term issue of improving their living conditions.

events.name: Sharing new anime series with girlfriend (implicit event representation)
events.description: The spring anime that Lei Mingxuan has been following has been updated. After watching it, he immediately shared exciting clips from the latest episode and his own comments with his girlfriend Lin Wei via WeChat. The two of them engaged in a lively discussion about the plot development for over ten minutes. This is one of the ways they maintain their emotional connection in their daily lives.

events.name: Research on new outdoor functional wind-resistant products
events.description: Recalling the trend mentioned by Zhou Tao, he took advantage of his free time over the weekend to search for several online stores of outdoor and trendy brands. He studied the specific design elements and styling methods of "outdoor techwear" items, considering how to incorporate them into the next season's product selection for his own store.

events.name: Concern about mother's lower back discomfort
events.description: Seeing his mother Wang Xiuying rubbing her waist after mopping the floor, Lei Mingxuan quickly stepped forward to ask what was wrong. His mother said it might be a bit sore from bending over for too long yesterday. Lei Mingxuan helped her sit down, poured a glass of warm water, and reminded her that Aunt Li would come tomorrow, so she should leave such heavy tasks for her. He urged his mother to get plenty of rest.

events.name: Confirm the roller skating activity for the next day.
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan confirmed the specific time and meeting location for the next day's spring riverside roller-skating activity with Song Jia and other partners in the "Pudong Roller-Skating Squad" WeChat group. He also checked his roller skates and protective gear, preparing for the long-awaited outdoor event.

events.name: Spring Riverside Roller Skating Activity
events.description: On Saturday afternoon, the sun was shining brightly. Lei Mingxuan, Song Jia, and five or six other roller-skating friends gathered at the dedicated roller-skating track along the Pudong Riverside. After changing into their gear and putting on headphones, the group glided joyfully along the riverbank in the spring breeze, admiring the fresh greenery and blooming cherry blossoms on both sides. They paused occasionally to take photos and share laughs. Amidst the sweat and exertion, the pressures of work and the trivialities of daily life were temporarily left behind, replaced only by the exhilaration of movement and the joy of friendship.

events.name: Shooting rollerblading short video footage
events.description: During the roller skating event, Lei Mingxuan specifically asked a partner to help film a short video of himself skating. He planned to edit it for online promotion of his store to showcase a vibrant image.

events.name: Post-roller skating partner gathering
events.description: After skating for over two hours, everyone was starving, so we went to a restaurant near the riverside known for its creative cuisine. As we ate and chatted, the conversation shifted from skating techniques to amusing anecdotes about work and travel plans, making for a relaxed and enjoyable time.

events.name: Share the Highlights of the Event
events.description: Upon returning home, Lei Mingxuan enthusiastically selected several of the best rollerblading photos and a short video taken today. He added the caption "Spring breeze for miles can't compare to having you while rollerblading! Spring at the Pudong Riverside is simply amazing!" and shared them on his social media feed and rollerblading group, capturing the wonderful weekend afternoon.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, expectant, with a strong sense of autonomy over the weekend.

结束状态.心情: Thoroughly enjoying and satisfied, the dopamine released from exercise brought him joy, yet his parents' sighs about climbing stairs also planted a seed of long-term contemplation in his heart.

state.今日运动: Riverside roller skating for about 2 hours, which is a moderate-to-high intensity aerobic exercise; shooting short video materials.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with temperatures continuing to rise.

2025-04.daily_overview: Sunday continued the weekend's liveliness and reflection. The morning was filled with the warmth of parent-child activities, while the afternoon brought continued enjoyment of outdoor roller skating. However, a minor twist of the left ankle during skating led to a pause in physical activities. The challenges his parents face with climbing stairs prompted him to begin researching possibilities for improving their living conditions, marking the start of a substantive exploration into long-term family life planning.

events.name: Mother's persistent exhaustion (supplementary incident)
events.description: Despite having Aunt Li, the hourly housekeeper, to share the burden, Wang Xiuying, the mother, still felt drained from the continuous days of worrying about her father and the family, compounded by the exhaustion from the ancestral worship rituals a few days earlier. She forced herself to finish some scattered household chores before Aunt Li arrived, but her movements were noticeably slower than usual. After dinner, she retired to her room early. Lei Jianguo, the father, saw this and felt both heartache and helplessness.

events.name: Research on Improving Housing Conditions Program
events.description: Concerned about his parents' difficulty climbing stairs, Lei Mingxuan spent his free time in the afternoon researching on his phone and computer. He focused on two main areas: first, the approximate housing prices and taxes involved in purchasing a second-hand apartment with an elevator and a good community environment in Pudong New Area; second, the latest policies, application procedures, and estimated costs for installing elevators in old residential buildings in Shanghai. He noted the preliminary findings in his memo.

events.name: Accompanying father in natural sound identification
events.description: On Sunday morning, Lei Mingxuan accompanied his father for their second rehabilitation walk in the residential garden. This time, he consciously guided his father to listen to the surrounding sounds: "Dad, listen, those are sparrows chirping." "Are there children playing soccer over there?" As the father and son strolled slowly, they discussed the sources of these sounds, making the walk more enjoyable while also training the father's auditory attention.

events.name: Continue to enjoy roller skating and socializing
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan went out again and enjoyed another relaxed riverside skate with his rollerblading companions. The breath of spring was so captivating that one could hardly tear themselves away. The dual satisfaction of exercise and social interaction served as an important way for him to regulate the rhythm of his life.

events.name: Suffered a mild left ankle sprain while roller skating.
events.description: During the roller skating activity, Lei Mingxuan slightly sprained his left ankle due to uneven ground, resulting in swelling and pain. He immediately stopped exercising and applied ice to the injury. The doctor advised him to rest for a week and avoid weight-bearing activities, which affected his exercise plan.

起始状态.心情: Relax, with thoughts about the future of the family

结束状态.心情: I enjoyed the leisure of the weekend, but the sprained ankle brought inconvenience. The idea of improving my parents' living environment has become increasingly clear, and I feel a sense of responsibility for planning the family's long-term future.

state.今日运动: Skating for approximately 1.5 hours in the afternoon; however, exercise was suspended after the sprain, with only ice pack treatment applied.

2025-04.daily_overview: In the new week, Lei Mingxuan's activities continued to revolve around "planning" and "health." He scheduled a physical examination for the end of the month, turning health management into concrete action. In the evening, he formally proposed to his parents the idea of either moving to an elevator-equipped apartment or making aging-friendly renovations to their current home, marking the beginning of discussions on a major family decision. Due to an ankle sprain, he avoided strenuous exercise and only accompanied his father on a slow walk.

events.name: Select and schedule a health checkup for yourself
events.description: After some comparison, Lei Mingxuan ultimately chose a medical examination center in Pudong that has a deep collaboration with a top-tier hospital. He called to inquire in detail about the differences between various packages. Considering his sedentary lifestyle and irregular eating habits, he selected a comprehensive package that includes basic examinations, tumor marker screenings, and cervical and lumbar spine assessments. He successfully scheduled his medical check-up for the morning of April 30th.

events.name: Formally propose the idea of improving living conditions
events.description: After dinner, Lei Mingxuan earnestly presented his ideas to his parents about improving their living conditions. Drawing from his research over the past two days, he provided a detailed analysis of two options: directly purchasing a second-hand apartment with an elevator, or retrofitting their current home for aging-in-place, with a focus on installing an elevator. He outlined the pros and cons of each approach, the approximate budgets involved, and the long-term benefits for enhancing the family’s quality of life, particularly the convenience it would bring to his parents in their later years. Upon hearing this, his parents were initially surprised and concerned about the significant expense. However, seeing how thoroughly their son had considered the matter and recognizing his genuine concern for their well-being, they did not outright reject the proposal. Instead, they fell into thoughtful consideration.

events.name: Accompanying Father in Slow-Paced Rehabilitation
events.description: Due to an ankle sprain, Lei Mingxuan avoided strenuous exercise but still accompanied his father for a 15-minute slow walk within the residential community as part of his rehabilitation training, while continuing their father-son conversation.

起始状态.心情: Be pragmatic and prepared to advance personal health plans and family-related topics.

结束状态.心情: A sense of relief mingled with slight unease, as the major issue has been raised, ushering in a new phase of family joint decision-making. The weight of responsibility on my shoulders feels more tangible now, while the discomfort in my ankle slightly dampens my mood.

state.今日运动: None; avoid exercise due to ankle sprain, only accompany father for a 15-minute slow walk.

2025-04.daily_overview: Lei Mingxuan took the first step in his systematic self-improvement journey by enrolling in an online operations course, marking a shift in his work focus from "maintaining the status quo" to "actively seeking change." Meanwhile, after a night of discussion, the family housing issue reached a preliminary consensus and was established as a long-term family goal. While addressing immediate challenges, the main thread of life began paving the way for a more distant future. In the evening, he accompanied his father on a rehabilitation walk to align their day's end.

events.name: Start learning online operation courses
events.description: At nine o'clock in the evening, the shop closed, and Lei Mingxuan returned to his home study. He opened a mobile app and began the first lesson of a short video course titled "Creating Viral Content from Scratch: Equipment and Composition." As he watched the video, he took notes in a dedicated notebook, jotting down key points such as "lock exposure and focus when shooting with a phone" and "the rule of thirds composition is suitable for product displays." Whenever he encountered an inspiring idea, he would pause to consider how he could better showcase the texture of his shop's clothing through still photography. The 45-minute learning session made him feel as though he had entered a completely new field—both unfamiliar and full of challenges.

events.name: Confirm Medical Examination Appointment
events.description: He received a confirmation call from the medical examination center, where his personal information and precautions were verified once again, with particular emphasis on the fasting requirement.

events.name: The family has reached a preliminary consensus on improving their living conditions.
events.description: After a night of reflection, the parents' attitudes had noticeably softened by breakfast. Mother Wang Xiuying remarked, "Your father's legs aren't as strong as they used to be." Father Lei Jianguo also sighed, "If we could have an elevator, your mother would find it much easier to go up and down the stairs when grocery shopping." This led the three of them to reach a preliminary consensus: improving their living conditions could be seriously considered and advanced as a long-term family planning project. Seizing the moment, Lei Mingxuan proposed that they could next gather more information separately—for example, visiting nearby elevator-equipped residential complexes together over the weekend or consulting companies that install elevators for a preliminary assessment, without rushing into an immediate decision. This pragmatic suggestion was met with approval from his parents.

events.name: Implement household waste classification
events.description: Before heading out in the morning, Lei Mingxuan took a moment to separate the kitchen and living room waste into dry and wet categories, then disposed of it in the designated sorting bins downstairs.

events.name: Accompanying my father for a rehabilitation walk in the evening.
events.description: After dinner, despite some lingering discomfort in his ankle, Lei Mingxuan insisted on accompanying his father for a 30-minute slow walk in the residential garden as part of his daily rehabilitation training, focusing on companionship and relaxation, fully aligning with the goal of concluding the health regimen.

起始状态.心情: With the excitement of embarking on a new learning plan and the anticipation of progress on family-related issues

结束状态.心情: Enriched and purposeful, learning brings the satisfaction of acquiring new knowledge, while progress on family matters fosters a sense of cohesion through shared efforts, and plans for the latter half of the month become clearer.

state.今日运动: Accompany father for a 30-minute walk after dinner; no dedicated fitness routine.

events.name: Deepen the Study of Short Video Scripts
events.description: After closing his shop for the night, Lei Mingxuan continued learning about short video operations through a mobile app. He focused on mastering the techniques of writing sales-driven short video scripts, grasping core elements such as opening hooks, product showcases, and calls to action. Drawing inspiration from a newly arrived printed T-shirt in his store, he drafted a script outline, contemplating how to highlight its design features and fabric advantages within 15 seconds.

events.name: Launch Home Improvement Information Consultation

He contacted his cousin Shen Jie (to consult on the high-end residential market), his neighbor Aunt Zhu (to inquire about policies for installing elevators in old residential complexes), and financial advisor Xu Feng (to schedule a discussion on large-scale financial planning) via WeChat. He politely explained the situation, arranged for further in-depth discussions, and initially established an information network.

events.name: Daily Store Operations and Interaction with Regular Customers
events.description: During the day, Lei Mingxuan handled the shelving and display adjustments for the spring collection at the shop. A regular customer, Qian Duoduo, dropped by to pick up a pre-ordered Pop Mart blind box. The two briefly discussed recent anime releases, and Qian Duoduo also tried on several new items, offering feedback on the outfits.

events.name: Evening Rehabilitation Walk
events.description: Due to a mild left ankle sprain still in recovery, Lei Mingxuan has switched to taking a 30-minute slow walk in the community garden, accompanied by his father. This maintains his daily low-intensity aerobic activity while helping to relax nerves that have been strained from studying and planning.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with anticipation for the new day of learning

结束状态.心情: Enriched, gaining new insights into online operations and family planning.

2025-04.daily_overview: Lei Mingxuan focuses on skill consolidation and family care, seeking balance amidst busyness through practical filming and patiently assisting his father, embodying a pragmatic and gradual approach to life.

events.name: Review short video shooting techniques
events.description: Instead of advancing to new lessons, Lei Mingxuan utilized his lunch break to review his notes on filming and scriptwriting from the previous days in the back warehouse of the shop. After returning home in the evening, he took out his phone and collectible figurines as props to practice shooting still-life videos, focusing on composition and camera movement. He then played back the footage to analyze shortcomings, such as insufficient lighting causing blurred details, thereby reinforcing his learning outcomes.

events.name: Assisting the father in hearing aid adaptation training
events.description: After dinner, Lei Mingxuan deliberately simulated a phone call scenario, guiding his father Lei Jianguo to answer the call and adjust the hearing aid volume, helping his father adapt to recognizing sounds from a slightly greater distance and under electronic audio effects. From initially being unable to hear clearly to gradually catching key words, both father and son felt a sense of progress, and their relationship grew even more harmonious.

events.name: Handle spring inventory for the store
events.description: During the day, Lei Mingxuan organized the spring inventory in the store, applying discounts to slow-moving items. At the same time, he confirmed the arrival time of the next batch of outdoor functional fabrics with supplier Zhou Tao via WeChat to prepare for upcoming promotions.

events.name: Home-Based Light Upper Limb Training
events.description: Due to an unhealed ankle sprain, Lei Mingxuan switched to performing a 20-minute upper body and core workout in his living room, using the Keep app for guidance, to maintain basic physical fitness and avoid putting weight on his ankle.

events.name: Temporary Friend Gathering Invitation
events.description: In the evening, billiards friend Han Dong sent a last-minute WeChat invitation to play pool. Lei Mingxuan declined due to a foot injury and a busy schedule but agreed to arrange a match for the following week after recovering, demonstrating flexible adjustments in social activities.

起始状态.心情: Focused, planning the day's review and training.

2025-04.daily_overview: Amidst the intertwined pressures of family caregiving and anxiety over shop transformation, Lei Mingxuan demonstrated a balance between responsibility and emotional release by meticulously reminding his mother to take medication, confiding in his childhood friend late at night, and secretly planning a birthday surprise.

events.name: Remind mother to take antihypertensive medication.
events.description: During dinner, Lei Mingxuan noticed that his mother, Wang Xiuying, had forgotten to take her antihypertensive medication. He immediately reminded her, went to the kitchen to pour a glass of warm water, handed the pills to her, and watched her take them, ensuring that her health management was properly addressed.

events.name: Seeking Support from Childhood Friends Due to Stress
events.description: After finishing work at the shop and returning home, Lei Mingxuan felt physically and mentally exhausted due to his mother's recent poor health, his father's strenuous caregiving efforts, and the uncertainties surrounding the shop's transformation. Realizing he needed to confide in someone, he reached out via WeChat to his most trusted childhood friend, Zhang Wei, briefly explaining that he was feeling down and wanted to talk.

events.name: Late-night conversation at a prearranged izakaya
events.description: Leiming Xuan and Zhang Wei quickly reached a consensus and decided to go to a familiar izakaya in Pudong that stayed open late into the night. Leiming Xuan arrived first, secured a table, and waited for Zhang Wei, preparing for an in-depth conversation.

events.name: Deep Communication and Mutual Assistance with Zhang Wei
events.description: The two sat down at an izakaya and ordered sake and side dishes. Lei Mingxuan detailed the recent pressures he was facing: his mother's health condition, the hardships of his father's caregiving, anxiety over the shop's transformation, and uncertainty about the future. Zhang Wei listened patiently, offering comfort and affirmation, and provided practical advice based on his own experiences (such as communication skills with parents and breaking down transformation steps). He also shared amusing parenting anecdotes to lighten the mood.

events.name: End of Late-Night Conversation and Gratitude
events.description: After their late-night conversation, Lei Mingxuan felt much more at ease, his stress relieved, and he expressed gratitude for Zhang Wei's company and advice. The two settled the bill, bid farewell, and each took a taxi home.

events.name: Secretly Planning a Birthday Surprise for Mother
events.description: During the lunch break at the shop, Lei Mingxuan secretly contacted his father Lei Jianguo, his cousin Shen Jie, and their neighbor Aunt Zhu via WeChat and phone calls, proposing the idea of planning a birthday surprise for his mother Wang Xiuying. They initially agreed to hold a warm dinner at home and assigned tasks: Lei Mingxuan would be responsible for the main dishes, Shen Jie would bring the cake, and Aunt Zhu would prepare the desserts.

events.name: Due to slightly excessive eating and drinking at the gathering.
events.description: During the conversation at the izakaya, Lei Mingxuan unconsciously consumed more side dishes and sake, resulting in slight overeating, which laid the groundwork for weight gain.

起始状态.心情: Feeling slightly fatigued, concerned about family matters.

结束状态.心情: Relieved, feeling lightened through confiding and the support of friendship.

state.今日运动: No outdoor exercise was conducted due to light rain and a busy schedule.

2025-04.daily_overview: On his day off, Lei Mingxuan had an in-depth conversation and date with his girlfriend Lin Wei, elevating their relationship from casual companions to life partners who face real-life challenges together, while also reflecting on their friendship and advancing their studies.

events.name: Prepare for an in-depth date in advance
events.description: The day before the date, Lei Mingxuan carefully considered the topics for discussion, including how to candidly share with Lin Wei the pressures from his family and his career anxieties. He reserved a private room in advance at a highly-rated Japanese tea house in Jing'an District to ensure a quiet and intimate atmosphere. He also reviewed his recent notes on online operations studies, preparing to share his progress.

events.name: The Appointment at Lin Wei's Teahouse Begins
events.description: Lei Mingxuan arrived at the Japanese teahouse ahead of the scheduled time to wait for Lin Wei. After Lin Wei arrived, the two settled into an elegant private room, ordered tea and snacks, and enjoyed a relaxed and warm atmosphere. They first chatted about recent work and amusing moments in daily life, creating a comfortable setting for deeper conversation.

events.name: Openly Share Pressure and Progress
events.description: Lei Mingxuan proactively initiated the conversation, candidly sharing with Lin Wei the recent pressures from his family (parental expectations, concerns about property replacement), his anxiety regarding the transition as an individual store owner, and his preliminary progress in learning online operations. He expressed his uncertainty about the future and sense of responsibility.

events.name: Lin Wei provides emotional support and advice.
events.description: Lin Wei listened attentively, offering full understanding and empathy. She first affirmed Lei Mingxuan's efforts emotionally to alleviate his anxiety. Then, drawing on her professional background, she proposed specific creative suggestions, such as leveraging social media content marketing, planning online pop-up events, or collaborating with KOLs. The two engaged in a lively discussion regarding the feasibility of these ideas.

events.name: Discussing future cohabitation plans
events.description: The conversation naturally transitioned to personal life, with both parties earnestly discussing the possibility of a shared future. This included considerations such as whether to continue living with parents or to purchase a new property to establish a smaller family unit, as well as corresponding financial planning (savings goals, management of shared expenses). This marks a significant step toward a more pragmatic phase in the relationship.

events.name: End of the Date and Deepening of the Relationship
events.description: After several hours of in-depth conversation, the two left the teahouse in the evening. Lei Mingxuan escorted Lin Wei home, and upon parting, both felt their relationship had grown closer and more solid, transitioning from casual companions to partners capable of facing challenges and planning for the future together.

events.name: Reviewing the Date and Thanking My Childhood Friend
events.description: The next day, Lei Mingxuan recalled the conversation from the previous night with a heart full of gratitude. He once again expressed his thanks to Zhang Wei via WeChat, mentioning that the talk had made him cherish their friendship more and provided him with ideas for handling problems. The two agreed to meet up again next time.

events.name: Mild cold symptoms
events.description: Due to staying up late the night before and the change in weather, Lei Mingxuan felt slight discomfort in his throat and decided to rest early to avoid worsening the condition.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to and preparing for an important appointment.

结束状态.心情: Steady, warmed by deepening relationships and support, yet slightly weary.

events.name: Determine the Key Promotion Focus for the 55 Shopping Festival
events.description: Lei Mingxuan reviewed the sales data from the previously planned "Urban Outdoor" theme campaign with his cousin Shen Jie, analyzed the trend of outdoor functional wear on social media, and considered the store's inventory. Ultimately, he decided to focus the promotional efforts for the "55 Shopping Festival" on outdoor functional wear items to attract younger customer groups.

events.name: Prepare the Merchant Association Sharing Program
events.description: After receiving the monthly merchant networking event notice from Zheng Kai, the mall property manager, Lei Mingxuan organized the preliminary activity plan into clear key points, preparing to share them with other store owners at the meeting and seek collaboration opportunities.

events.name: Review the conversation with Lin Wei and proceed
events.description: The day after their meeting, Lei Mingxuan organized Lin Wei's suggestions for store transformation, contemplated how to integrate them into the action plan, and once again expressed his gratitude via WeChat, agreeing to maintain communication and advance the discussed topics in the future.

events.name: Accompanying parents to inspect the first residential community
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan drove his parents to the first target residential community. They communicated with the property management, visited the model units and public areas, focusing on experiencing the elevator operation, barrier-free facilities, apartment layout and lighting, as well as the community's green environment.

events.name: Lunch Exchange and Inspection Impressions
events.description: At noon, a family of three had lunch at a local Shanghainese restaurant near their residential area. During the meal, they discussed their views on the first residential community. The parents expressed satisfaction with the environment but also voiced concerns about the high housing prices and property management fees.

events.name: Accompanying parents to inspect the second residential community
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan drove his parents to the second target residential community to conduct an on-site inspection, comparing it with the first community in terms of apartment layout design, surrounding amenities (such as markets and hospitals), and price differences.

events.name: In-depth discussion of future plans on the way home
events.description: On the drive home after the property viewing, the family continued their in-depth discussion. Although housing prices remained the biggest obstacle, the parents expressed that after seeing the properties in person, they had a more concrete vision for improving their living conditions. Lei Mingxuan promised to continue monitoring the market and researching loan options. The family reached a preliminary consensus on their future plans.

events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan felt that the pain in his ankle had largely subsided. He attempted a 15-minute slow walk in the residential garden to test his recovery and prepare for subsequent physical activities.

events.name: Preparing for Family Monthly Review and Planning
events.description: Approaching the first monthly review, Lei Mingxuan reflected on his father's use of the walker over the past month, summarized the progress of inquiries regarding the lift chair (including cost estimates and the difficulty of communicating with neighbors), and began considering the family assets and loan capacity that would need to be assessed if replacing their home with an elevator-equipped one were to be put on the agenda. He documented these observations in preparation for a family meeting discussion.

events.name: Design promotional rules for the 55 Shopping Festival

He also reminded his father at appropriate moments to pay attention to the direction and content of different speakers' speech, assisting in his hearing rehabilitation.

events.name: Schedule a Meeting with a Financial Manager
events.description: Lei Mingxuan contacted financial manager Xu Feng via WeChat to schedule a meeting on the afternoon of April 25. In preparation for an in-depth discussion, he organized recent household income and expenditure details, store operation data, and preliminary ideas regarding property replacement in advance.

events.name: Family Meeting Confirms Weekend Inspection Plan
events.description: After dinner, Lei Mingxuan held a family meeting with his parents at home to discuss several residential communities selected through online screening. They ultimately decided to focus on inspecting two newly built communities that best met their requirements over the weekend, and planned the driving routes and key points for the visits.

events.name: Organize field notes and consider follow-up actions

His mother occasionally chimed in to express concern about fund safety, creating a harmonious family discussion.

events.name: Resuming Light Running

2025-04.daily_overview: During the rainy days, Lei Mingxuan delved into content planning and community operations, communicated with mall property management regarding event registration, and refined joint marketing details, shifting his work focus toward the integration of online and offline efforts.

events.name: Learning Target Audience Content Planning
events.description: Lei Mingxuan learned how to conduct content planning and topic selection based on the interests of the target audience (young trendsetters). The course provided multiple case studies, and he combined his own hobby of collecting trendy toys to consider whether he could produce a series of content on "unboxing trendy toys + outfit recommendations" to attract like-minded groups.

events.name: Begin learning community operations positioning
events.description: Lei Mingxuan began studying the first lesson of the community operations module, focusing on understanding the value of WeChat communities for physical stores and how to position store communities (such as VIP benefit groups, new product preview groups, or interest-based exchange groups). He compared the advantages and disadvantages of different positioning approaches and initially leaned toward establishing an exchange group centered around trendy toys and outfit sharing.

events.name: Communicate with the mall property management for event registration.
events.description: Lei Mingxuan went to the shopping mall's property management office to communicate with the property manager Zheng Kai about the "Double Five" Shopping Festival activity plan. He submitted the activity filing application and discussed the possibility of including the store's activities in the mall's unified promotional materials (such as official account articles and navigation screens). He received support from Zheng Kai.

events.name: Refine the details of joint marketing cooperation
events.description: Based on the intentions reached at the fellowship meeting, Lei Mingxuan communicated with the owners of the café and the accessory store via WeChat or phone calls to refine the design of the co-branded special drinks, the plan for gifts with purchases, and the division of labor for promotional materials. The collaboration details were finalized to ensure coordinated execution of the event.

events.name: Formal Report on the May Day Promotion Activities
events.description: Lei Mingxuan located the property manager Zheng Kai in the shopping mall and formally reported the promotional activity plan for the May Day holiday period. This included potential increases in customer flow and the temporary placement of promotional display stands, ensuring the activities complied with the mall's management regulations to avoid any subsequent issues.

events.name: Home Core Training
events.description: Due to rainy weather, Lei Mingxuan performed a 30-minute core workout in his living room, including planks and sit-ups, in preparation for subsequent HIIT training.

起始状态.心情: Focus, ready to delve deep into the new module.

结束状态.心情: Confident due to smooth communication and clear planning.

2025-04.daily_overview: Lei Mingxuan fine-tuned his father's hearing aid settings, finalized the store's promotional rules, designed promotional materials, and purchased ingredients and gifts for his mother's birthday surprise, demonstrating meticulous and thorough preparation skills.

events.name: Fine-tuning the father's hearing aid program
events.description: Based on recent training sessions, Lei Mingxuan had in-depth discussions with his father regarding the experience of using hearing aids in different scenarios. He also consulted the user manual and attempted to make simple program adjustments to the hearing aids to optimize sound clarity in noisy environments.

events.name: Finalize the promotional rules for the 55 Shopping Festival
events.description: In the clothing store, Lei Mingxuan finalized the tiered discount rule of 'spend 500, get 80 off; spend 1000, get 200 off' based on previous sales data and market forecasts. He also selected several popular trendy blind boxes as complimentary gifts. Meanwhile, he calculated the total budget for this event to ensure it remained within a controllable range.

events.name: Preliminary Draft of Promotional Graphic Design
events.description: At home, Lei Mingxuan utilized design software to create promotional graphics for social media platforms such as WeChat Moments and Xiaohongshu, as well as initial drafts of promotional posters for in-store display. These designs integrated the store's style with the theme of the "55 Shopping Festival," highlighting core selling points like "spend-and-save discounts" and "trendy collectible giveaways" to capture attention.

events.name: Purchase birthday surprise items for mother
events.description: After closing the shop, Lei Mingxuan went to supermarkets and shopping malls to carefully select ingredients such as pork belly and seasonings needed for making braised pork. He also purchased a previously chosen brand of massage device at an appliance store as a birthday gift, ensuring all items were fully prepared to set the stage for the surprise dinner the following day.

events.name: First Attempt at HIIT Training
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan performed a 20-minute high-intensity interval training at home, including jumps and squats. He found it challenging for the cardiovascular system but effective, and plans to gradually increase the frequency.

结束状态.心情: Anticipation, joyful due to the completion of procurement and smooth preparation.
