2025-04.daily_overview: Amidst his busy schedule, Lei Mingxuan relaxed with a spa treatment, completed a medical check-up appointment, ensured the store's inventory was in order, and planned a warm birthday surprise for his mother, achieving a balance between family warmth and personal respite.

events.name: Inspired to Book a SPA Experience
events.description: During his routine communication with supplier Zhou Tao, Lei Mingxuan heard a recommendation for professional SPA relaxation methods and learned about a highly reputed Japanese Zen-style SPA. Intrigued by this, he searched for information on Dianping, reviewed evaluations and pricing, and ultimately decided to book a 90-minute session for April 28th.

events.name: Schedule a comprehensive physical examination at the end of the month.
events.description: Lei Mingxuan scheduled a comprehensive physical examination for April 30 through a mobile app. In accordance with the requirements, he maintained a light diet and fasted the night before to prepare for obtaining objective health data.

events.name: Accompany the mother and observe her condition.
events.description: After closing the shop in the evening, Lei Mingxuan returned home early and accompanied his mother Wang Xiuying in the living room, watching TV and chatting. While sharing interesting stories from the shop, he paid close attention to his mother’s mental state, speech, and behavior, confirming that she had no other recent health issues and ensuring the birthday surprise would proceed smoothly.

events.name: Confirm supplier's new product inventory.
events.description: Lei Mingxuan contacted Hangzhou supplier Zhou Tao and Guangzhou supplier Wu Fang via WeChat and phone respectively to confirm the arrival time and inventory quantity of the new 'Urban Outdoor' style series, ensuring sufficient supply of key products during the promotional period, and communicated regarding potential replenishment procedures.

events.name: Prepare in advance for mother's birthday dinner.
events.description: At four in the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan closed his clothing store early and returned home. He began busying himself in the kitchen, handling ingredients and meticulously preparing his mother’s favorite Shanghai-style braised pork belly, along with several other home-style dishes. Meanwhile, he set the dining table, arranged the utensils, and created a warm atmosphere for dinner.

events.name: Family Gathers to Plan a Birthday Surprise
events.description: In the evening, Father Lei Jianguo, cousin Shen Jie (bringing a birthday cake), and neighbor Auntie Zhu (bringing fermented glutinous rice balls) arrived at the Lei household one after another. While Wang Xiuying was out for a walk, everyone quickly completed the final arrangements, hiding the cake and gifts, and awaited the return of the main character.

events.name: Warm Birthday Dinner and Celebration
events.description: Wang Xiuying returned home to find her family and neighbors gathered together, with a sumptuous feast laid out on the table. As dinner began, everyone raised their glasses to celebrate her birthday. After the meal, Shen Jie brought out the birthday cake, and everyone sang "Happy Birthday." Lei Mingxuan presented her with a massage device as a gift and expressed his gratitude to his mother. Deeply moved, Wang Xiuying wore a happy smile on her face.

events.name: After-Dinner Chat and Family Warmth
events.description: After dinner, the family and Aunt Zhu gathered together to enjoy fermented glutinous rice balls with sweet rice wine, chatting about daily life and sharing recent anecdotes, creating an exceptionally warm and harmonious family atmosphere. Afterwards, everyone helped clear the dishes and tidy up the kitchen, bringing the pleasant evening to a close.

events.name: Due to slightly excessive food intake during the birthday dinner.
events.description: During the birthday dinner, Lei Mingxuan unconsciously ate more braised pork and cake, resulting in slight weight fluctuations.

起始状态.心情: Busy yet orderly, preparing surprises and coordinating efforts.

结束状态.心情: Happiness lies in the satisfaction derived from a mother's affection and family reunion.

state.今日运动: None, focusing on preparation and celebration

2025-04.daily_overview: On his day off, Lei Mingxuan delved into community management, booked a spa appointment, purchased promotional gifts, and met with his financial manager to adjust asset allocation, thereby enhancing his financial security.

events.name: Hierarchical Management Methods for Learning Communities
events.description: Lei Mingxuan learned how to categorize community members (such as core fans, regular customers, and potential clients) and acquired basic methods for setting group rules, cultivating administrators, and maintaining community engagement. He thought of regular customers Qian Duoduo and Feng Xiaoyu, believing they could become core members to assist with operations.

events.name: Schedule and confirm SPA treatment
events.description: During a work break, Lei Mingxuan contacted the selected Japanese Zen-inspired SPA center via phone to inquire about specific service hours, package details, and therapist availability. Based on his schedule, he successfully booked a 90-minute session for the afternoon of April 28, which included aromatherapy bathing, Japanese shiatsu, and essential oil massage.

events.name: Purchase promotional gifts with full purchase
events.description: According to the plan, Lei Mingxuan procured customized trendy socks, portable storage bags, and other complimentary gifts through online channels, which were then shipped back to the store for packaging and labeling. This ensured an ample supply of gifts with exquisite packaging, thereby enhancing the overall customer shopping experience.

events.name: Meeting with a financial manager to discuss asset allocation
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan met with Xu Feng at a quiet café in Xuhui District. He detailed the recent increase in household expenses (such as hiring a part-time housekeeper and purchasing insurance), fluctuations in store revenue, and potential plans for property replacement. Xu Feng analyzed the current market environment and Lei Mingxuan's risk tolerance.

events.name: Adopt the recommendation and sign the fund conversion agreement.
events.description: Xu Feng recommended reducing the proportion of high-risk equity funds and increasing allocations to money market funds and short-term wealth management products, in order to enhance asset liquidity and safety and ensure a financial safety cushion for the family. Lei Mingxuan reviewed and signed conversion agreements for some of the funds, formally initiating the asset reallocation process.

events.name: Confirm the follow-up steps for financial management operations.
events.description: Xu Feng submitted the signed agreement for system processing and sent an operation confirmation along with the estimated completion time to Lei Mingxuan via WeChat. Lei Mingxuan confirmed the relevant information on his mobile phone and followed the instructions to complete necessary subsequent steps, such as identity verification, ensuring the adjustment proceeded smoothly.

events.name: Weekend Roller Skating Activity
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan went to the Pudong Riverside Roller Skating Track for a 45-minute leisure roller skating session, enjoying outdoor exercise to promote weight loss.

起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy studying on your day off.

结束状态.心情: Peace of mind, grounded in clear financial planning.

state.今日运动: It takes about 20 minutes to walk to the café; 45 minutes by rollerblading.

events.name: Plan and design online community activities
events.description: Lei Mingxuan learned how to plan online community activities to enhance engagement, such as flash sales, lucky draws, topic discussions, and offline store visit invitations. Leveraging the upcoming May Day holiday, he conceived a preliminary small activity called "Holiday Outfit Sharing to Win Coupons," which he plans to pilot in the community.

events.name: Adjust store displays to create a promotional atmosphere.
events.description: Lei Mingxuan led the staff in readjusting the store layout, concentrating outdoor functional-style items in prominent display areas. They also posted promotional posters, set up roll-up banners, and hung promotional flags to create a strong shopping festival atmosphere and attract customers’ attention.

events.name: Accompanying father to watch a program and discuss it.
events.description: After dinner, Lei Mingxuan accompanied his father in watching a current affairs commentary television program. Following the broadcast, they discussed the content of the program, focusing on practicing the ability to capture key information in a slightly noisy background environment to assist in his father's hearing rehabilitation.

events.name: Conduct a thorough house cleaning
events.description: On Sunday, with the shop closed, Lei Mingxuan took the initiative to conduct a thorough cleaning of the home. He was responsible for vacuuming the living room carpet and sofa, dusting the furniture, and clearing away debris and fallen leaves from the flowerpots on the balcony, ensuring the living environment remained tidy.

events.name: Engage in deep family conversations with parents.
events.description: On a Saturday evening in mid-April, Lei Mingxuan deliberately refrained from scheduling any other social engagements and prepared a sumptuous dinner of Shanghainese cuisine at home with his parents. After the meal, the three engaged in an extended and in-depth conversation. Lei Mingxuan shared his future upgrade plans for the shop and also listened to his parents' advice on family and life, thereby strengthening their emotional bond.

events.name: Plan product display during promotional periods
events.description: After the store closed, Lei Mingxuan walked around the premises alone, observing and planning the product displays for the promotional period. He decided to place the new "Urban Outdoor" series at the most prominent spot near the store entrance and design a dedicated "Gift Display Corner" to attract customers' attention with trendy blind box toys.

events.name: HIIT Training

events.name: Head to a Japanese Zen-style SPA center.

The entire process lasted 90 minutes, during which he focused on the physical sensations, achieving a state of deep mental relaxation.

2025-04.daily_overview: On the last day of the month, Lei Mingxuan completed a comprehensive health check-up and received the results. He accompanied his father in reviewing the rehabilitation progress, conducted a final inspection of the store, and shifted focus from health management to scientific optimization, reflecting a continuous improvement mindset toward life.

events.name: Go to the medical examination center to complete a comprehensive check-up.
events.description: Lei Mingxuan arrived at the medical examination center on an empty stomach at the scheduled time. After registering at the front desk, he completed a series of procedures in sequence, including blood drawing, ultrasound, electrocardiogram, chest X-ray, internal and external medical examinations, vision and hearing tests, and body fat analysis. The entire process lasted approximately three hours.

events.name: Quickly Browse Electronic Medical Examination Report
events.description: After the physical examination, Lei Mingxuan received the electronic version of his medical report through a mobile app. He quickly reviewed the key indicators and found that his weight and body fat percentage data were not ideal, with his BMI still falling within the overweight range. This prompted him to consider adjustments to his subsequent health management plan.

events.name: Reviewing Monthly Rehabilitation Progress with Father
events.description: Lei Mingxuan reviewed the training progress of the entire month together with his father, acknowledging his father's efforts and improvements (such as feeling less strain in the knees), and planned the key practice directions for the next month, providing his father with continued confidence in recovery. Their father-son relationship grew even more harmonious.

events.name: Exchanging Impressions and Making Arrangements During an End-of-Month Stroll
events.description: On the last day of April, after finishing their walk, Lei Mingxuan and his father sat on a garden bench to rest. Lei Mingxuan asked his father about his feelings over the past month. His father mentioned that his knees felt more comfortable than before, his mood had improved significantly, and he enjoyed the daily walks and conversations with his son. Lei Mingxuan also felt more energetic due to the regular walks. The two agreed to maintain this good habit going forward.

events.name: Final Check and Staff Arrangement Before Promotion
events.description: On the day before the promotional event, Lei Mingxuan conducted a final inspection in the store, verifying all items on the preparation checklist. He clarified the key tasks, promotional scripts, and rules for distributing free gifts to the only staff member (or temporary helper) during the May Day holiday, ensuring flawless execution at the operational level.

events.name: Final preparations for the holiday promotion
events.description: To prepare for the 55 Shopping Festival, Lei Mingxuan conducted an inventory check and arranged promotional materials in the shop one day in advance. He also scheduled holiday shifts for the store staff to ensure the smooth progress of the festival promotions, while making time for his personal vacation to balance work and rest.

events.name: Perform HIIT training in the evening.
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan performed a 30-minute high-intensity interval training at home, including burpees and squats, to enhance cardiovascular function and fat-burning efficiency, in accordance with the exercise plan for concluding a health regimen.

events.name: Rehabilitation Walking
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan accompanied his father for a 30-minute slow-paced walk in the residential garden to reinforce their daily routine.

起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous, preparing for the physical examination and final check-up.

结束状态.心情: Reflection and Planning: Resolved to Optimize Health Based on Medical Examination Data, and Feeling Assured About Being Prepared for the Promotion

2025-05.daily_overview: Today marks the opening day of the Double Five Shopping Festival and the first day of the Labor Day holiday. In the evening, he reunited with his family and insisted on taking a recovery walk, enjoying a moment of holiday warmth, though he felt physically fatigued.

events.name: Leading the first-day promotion of the shopping festival.
events.description: As an important annual promotional event, Lei Mingxuan has been stationed in the store since it opened. He personally explains the activity rules to customers, highlights the [Urban Outdoor] style product series, and observes customer reactions. With the increase in foot traffic, he simultaneously handles cashier duties, answers inquiries, and organizes merchandise, grabbing a quick convenience store rice ball for lunch.

events.name: Enjoying a Labor Day dinner with family and taking a recovery walk
events.description: After closing for the night, Lei Mingxuan returned home to have dinner with his parents, and his mother prepared Shanghai-style braised pork. After the meal, he insisted on accompanying his father for a 30-minute walk in the residential garden to aid digestion and strengthen family bonds, though his legs felt sore and swollen from standing all day.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied with the first-day promotional results, but physically exhausted.

2025-05.daily_overview: On the adjusted day off, the arrival of the medical examination report shattered Lei Mingxuan's self-perception, as multiple indicators exceeded the standard, leaving him shocked and prompting deep reflection. He immediately purchased equipment to make changes for his health while advancing the renewal of his store's lease.

events.name: Received and reviewed the medical examination report.
events.description: Upon receiving the electronic medical report this morning, I was deeply impacted by the findings of elevated total cholesterol, LDL, elevated uric acid, and a diagnosis of mild fatty liver disease. This prompted me to reflect on my dietary habits and exercise routine.

events.name: Procuring Equipment and Ingredients for Health Transformation
events.description: His proactive nature led him to immediately order a pair of professional sports shoes and purchase healthy ingredients such as oats, chicken breast, and broccoli at the supermarket, replacing snacks.

events.name: Preliminary communication regarding store renewal matters
events.description: In the afternoon, I communicated with Property Manager Zheng Kai via WeChat regarding the lease renewal notice, and gained an understanding of the minor rent adjustments and the mall's business format adjustment plan.

events.name: Staying up late researching health information
events.description: Due to anxiety and determination, I researched fat loss exercises and diet plans online late into the night.

起始状态.心情: The Laziness of a Day Off

结束状态.心情: Shocked, concerned, but secretly determined to change

Lei Mingxuan handled daily operations at the shop during the day, followed by pre-match billiards practice and purchasing themed display materials in the evening. 2025-05.daily_overview: Match day. Experienced promotion, intense battles, and defeats, but gained friendships, experience, and enjoyable gatherings; new store arrivals set the stage for next week's work; weight slightly increased due to dining out.

events.name: Departing for a billiards competition.
events.description: I got up early in the morning to polish my cue, put on a sports polo shirt, and took the subway to the Yuanshen Sports Center competition venue, listening to music along the way to get into the zone.

events.name: Successfully advanced to the next round in the first match.
events.description: In the first round against a young enthusiast, I secured a smooth victory by leveraging solid fundamental skills and a steady mindset, advancing to the next round. The effectiveness of systematic training was evident.

events.name: Regrettably Defeated in the Second Round of Intense Battle
events.description: In the second round, facing an experienced veteran, the match remained closely contested until the deciding frame. A crucial missed shot into the middle pocket led to defeat, after which I shook hands with my opponent.

events.name: Post-Match Viewing and Exchange
events.description: They joined up with Han Dong, who had advanced, and Qin Lang, who had come from Hangzhou, to watch high-level players compete, study cue techniques and tactics, and engage in low-voiced discussions.

events.name: Post-match dinner and analysis session among golf buddies
events.description: In the evening, I had dinner with Han Dong and Qin Lang at a barbecue restaurant, where we reviewed the gains and losses of the match, exchanged views on players' styles, and Lei Mingxuan shared his psychological state after making mistakes. The frustration of winning and losing dissipated amid our candid conversation.

events.name: New Product Arrival Notification Received

I replied to confirm and arranged for store staff to receive the shipment.

结束状态.心情: Although there is regret over the loss, there is greater joy in gathering with friends and enjoyment in the process of the competition, reflecting a broad-minded attitude.

events.description: During work breaks, organize the family's home purchase financial estimates, list the total down payment amount, monthly payment range, and ranking of total property prices, and plan the schedule for on-site property viewings.

2025-05.daily_overview: The last Friday before the Dragon Boat Festival was filled with a sense of preparation, socializing, and pre-holiday arrangements. In the afternoon, tactical drills were conducted for the basketball match, while the evening was spent enjoying a nostalgic pool gathering with childhood friends. My mother purchased festive ingredients, and the family took a practical step forward in the house-swapping plan by contacting an agent. The gathering led to a slight increase in weight.

events.name: Targeted Tactical Drills Before Basketball Games
events.description: During the afternoon basketball activity, we practiced fast break positioning, spot-up shooting coordination, and zone defense rotation with teammates such as Xie Fei, simulating key free-throw scenarios while emphasizing proper form and discipline.

events.name: Friday Billiards Gathering with Childhood Friend Zhang Wei
events.description: After the shop closed in the evening, I played a game of American eight-ball with Zhang Wei at the pool hall. Our skills were evenly matched. While playing, we discussed the shop's theme and fitness plans. Zhang Wei shared stories about his work and amusing anecdotes about his child.

events.name: Barbecue Night Snacks and Nostalgic Conversations After Billiards
events.description: After playing billiards, we went to a barbecue restaurant to order skewers and beer. The conversation extended to childhood anecdotes like stealing grapes, discussing future collaborations or gatherings of the 'Pudong Three Musketeers,' and the late-night snack concluded in a relaxed atmosphere.

events.name: Mother purchases ingredients for the Dragon Boat Festival.
events.description: Mother went to the vegetable market and supermarket to purchase glutinous rice, bamboo leaves, pork belly, and other ingredients for making zongzi, as well as live fish and seasonal vegetables, ensuring that tomorrow's reunion dinner will be abundant and delicious.

events.name: Formally Contacting a Real Estate Agent

events.name: Staying up late to handle store promotion planning.

date_attribute.holiday: Dragon Boat Festival

2025-05.daily_overview: The warm and peaceful Dragon Boat Festival was centered around family throughout the day. In the early morning, the mother prepared traditional delicacies; during dinner, the family gathered to share updates and plans; after the meal, the next steps for the housing relocation were finalized. Morning runs and rehabilitative walks were carried out, keeping the health plan on track.

events.name: Weekend Morning Run
events.description: In the early morning, Lei Mingxuan conducted a 50-minute moderate-intensity steady-paced run on the running track along the Pudong Riverside. He used a fitness app to record his pace and distance, enjoying time alone for reflection, and has seen significant improvements in his physical fitness.

events.name: Mother is preparing the family feast for the Dragon Boat Festival.
events.description: In the early morning, the mother busies herself in the kitchen, washing bamboo leaves, wrapping fresh meat zongzi and red bean paste zongzi, and stewing braised pork. The aroma fills the air, forming an essential part of the family's festive rituals.

events.name: Dragon Boat Festival Family Reunion Dinner
events.description: Returning home punctually in the evening, I found the dining table filled with dishes such as zongzi, braised pork, and steamed fish. Raising a glass, I expressed gratitude to my parents and updated them on the progress of the shop lease renewal and health plan. My parents were pleased and offered their encouragement.

events.name: Casual Conversation in the Living Room and Future Planning
events.description: After dinner, they moved to the living room to enjoy fruit and watch television. Lei Mingxuan showed his parents the communication records with the real estate agent and discussed the house viewing plan for the following week, adding a touch of shared planning to the warm family gathering.

events.name: Recuperative Evening Walk
events.description: Taking a 30-minute slow-paced walk with my father in the residential community garden after dinner, engaging in conversation to relax the mind and aid digestion, has become a daily routine.

events.name: Adapt to and affirm the new dietary pattern
events.description: During dinner, the proportion of steamed fish and vegetables was increased. We discussed our feelings about the new dietary pattern, noting that our stomachs felt more comfortable. Mother agreed to continue researching healthy recipes to support Lei Mingxuan's long-term goals.

events.name: Responding to a Friend's Holiday Greetings
events.description: During the day, I replied to numerous WeChat messages from friends and clients extending Dragon Boat Festival greetings, while also sending personalized wishes to business partners and close friends to maintain an extensive social network.

起始状态.心情: The languid ease of a holiday morning, anticipating the warmth of family and delicious food.

结束状态.心情: A heart filled with warmth, tranquility, and contentment, feeling the bonds of family and the strength of support, filled with anticipation for the house viewing and a shared, determined resolve for the future.

state.今日运动: 50 minutes of morning jogging on weekends, 30 minutes of rehabilitation walking.

2025-06.daily_overview: Lei Mingxuan achieved a health milestone, hosted his cousin for a family dinner, finalized activities with the property management, initiated an inspection in Hangzhou, settled sales commissions, and formally discussed the pop-up store concept, advancing multiple objectives across various dimensions.

events.name: Monthly Health Data Measurement and Review
events.description: Morning gym body fat scale measurement: weight 77.5 kg (goal achieved), body fat percentage decreased, reviewing this month's endurance improvement experience.

events.name: Set new health goals for the next stage
events.description: Set a new challenge in the APP: maintain a stable weight of 75 kilograms, and incorporate explosive power exercises into strength training to improve basketball performance.

events.name: Cousin Yang Fan Visits the Store for a Dialogue Between Technology and Fashion
events.description: In the afternoon, take Yang Fan to visit the themed corners and the technology fabric brand, discussing the integration of technology into everyday fashion, which is both in-depth and interesting.

events.name: Family Dinner of Cousins and Cross-Industry Exchange
events.description: In the evening, I had a creative fusion cuisine dinner with Yang Fan and Shen Jie, where we shared insights on technology, fashion, and store operations, sparking cross-disciplinary inspiration.

events.name: Confirm the details of next month's event with the property manager.
events.description: Zheng Kai visited the store at noon to discuss the final arrangements, confirming an 8.8% discount across the board and the required reporting materials.

events.name: Launch the Hangzhou Independent Coffee Shop Investigation Plan
events.description: Through community screening, select high-quality coffee shops in Hangzhou, contact Yang Fan and Wang Lei to inquire about the gathering time, and prepare for the inspection.

events.name: Settle and pay the sales commission for the theme corner
events.description: In the evening, the sales revenue and profit were calculated, and Shen Jie's commission was paid via mobile banking, with a note of thanks attached.

events.name: The concept of the Hangzhou pop-up store was first formally proposed.
events.description: Late at night, I had a WeChat call with Zhou Tao to discuss the cooperation model, time window, and risk-return analysis for the summer pop-up store. We agreed to conduct a detailed analysis next week.

events.name: Evening Roller Skating Leisure
events.description: In the afternoon, I enjoyed a one-hour leisure skating session with Song Jia along the Binjiang Roller Skating Path, using it as a way to relax and socialize while savoring the summer evening.

起始状态.所处地点: 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Full of energy, excited about the rich arrangements, and looking forward to the health measurements.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Extremely fulfilling, highly rewarding, and slightly fatigued, with multidimensional gains in health, family, and business.

2025-06.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, Lei Mingxuan returned to his daily routine after bidding farewell to relatives and friends. He handled store collaborations and participated in basketball activities, but the intense exercise caused mild muscle soreness, which affected his condition the following day.

events.name: Bid farewell to my cousin and stay in touch
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan bid farewell to his cousin Yang Fan, who was about to return to Hangzhou, via WeChat. He thanked him for his visit over the weekend and reminded him to travel safely. In the following days, they would continue sharing articles and maintaining interaction on topics such as technology empowering physical stores.

events.name: Review and Settlement of Cooperation with Shen Jie
events.description: After receiving Shen Jie's transfer in the morning, Lei Mingxuan called her to review the sales data. They found that the co-branded items received positive feedback, while the pure casual styles performed moderately. They agreed to refine the direction for selecting autumn collaboration products.

events.name: Daily Store Operations and Inventory Replenishment
events.description: During the lunch break, Lei Mingxuan checked the inventory and placed an urgent restocking order with Hangzhou supplier Zhou Tao to prepare for the weekend sales peak.

events.name: Online Discussion on the Concept of Hangzhou Pop-up Store
events.description: After closing the shop in the evening, I held a video conference with Zhou Tao and Qin Lang to discuss the idea of a pop-up store in Hangzhou. We analyzed it from both supply chain and consumer perspectives, and agreed to collect data before exploring deeper collaboration models.

events.name: Wednesday Night Basketball with Xie Fei and Others
events.description: A high-intensity basketball game was held at 8 p.m. After the match, I had barbecue and chatted with fellow players to relieve stress. However, the intense exercise resulted in mild soreness in the muscles of my right leg.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with the drive of a new week beginning.

结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled yet somewhat fatigued, with the initial onset of muscle soreness.

2025-07.daily_overview: On the first workday of July, Lei Mingxuan sorted through the lingering social engagements from the weekend while actively pursuing new business opportunities and mall events. His day was spent on the daily operations of the shop, communicating with the property manager, and making initial contact regarding a distant project. It was a mix of familiar busyness and the arrival of new challenges to ponder.

events.name: Share the warmth of the gathering and extend the social connection.
events.description: In the morning, on his way to open the shop, Lei Mingxuan shared photos from his gathering with Zhang Wei the day before in the "Pudong Three Musketeers" WeChat group via his phone. Li Na, who was in Hangzhou, immediately joined the discussion, and everyone chatted enthusiastically about the fun moments from the gathering and their recent updates. Lei Mingxuan also recalled the Disney guide Zhang Wei had mentioned, thinking it might be useful for regular customer Feng Xiaoyu, who has a child. He then sent the organized guide link to Feng Xiaoyu via WeChat, adding a note: "This guide was prepared by Zhang Wei earlier—quite detailed. Sending it for your reference." Feng Xiaoyu quickly replied with thanks, and the two briefly chatted about their children's summer arrangements, extending the warmth of their friendship.

events.name: Proactively communicate intentions regarding mall promotional activities
events.description: Around 10 a.m., Zheng Kai, the property manager of the shopping mall, was conducting his routine inspection. Seizing the opportunity, Lei Mingxuan proactively approached him and offered a cigarette (though Zheng Kai does not smoke). After exchanging a few casual words, Lei steered the conversation to the main topic. "Manager Zheng, does the mall have any unified summer promotion plans for July?" Zheng Kai nodded, took out his phone to check internal notifications, and briefly introduced the "Summer Shopping Carnival" event scheduled for mid-to-late July, which included discounts for reaching certain spending thresholds, prize draws, and possible extended nighttime business hours. As Lei listened, he mentally calculated the details and inquired thoroughly about the registration process, cost-sharing rules, and promotional resource support. Zheng Kai mentioned that the specific plan details would be distributed in a couple of days and advised Lei to keep an eye on the property management notification group. This proactive communication laid the groundwork for Lei Mingxuan’s subsequent development of a participation plan.

events.name: Received the proposal for collaboration on the Hangzhou pop-up store and conducted preliminary consideration.
events.description: During a lull in the afternoon customer flow, Lei Mingxuan received a lengthy WeChat message and a PDF file from Zhou Tao, a supplier in Hangzhou. Zhou Tao proposed that a cultural and creative park in Hangzhou, with which he collaborates, plans to launch a "trendy market" targeting young people during the summer vacation. He mentioned that there was a favorable stall available and asked whether Lei Mingxuan would be interested in collaborating to open a one-month summer pop-up store. Zhou Tao elaborated on the cooperation model (he would handle venue negotiations and some local coordination, while Lei Mingxuan would be responsible for goods and operations), estimated daily foot traffic, cost-sharing arrangements, and marketing support provided by the park. Lei Mingxuan was intrigued by this unexpected proposal. He carefully reviewed the plan and became particularly interested in the points of "testing the Hangzhou market," "enhancing brand awareness," and "leveraging the prime summer season." After closing in the evening, instead of heading home immediately as usual, he sat in the store's lounge area, studying the plan on his computer for a long time, repeatedly weighing the project's appeal and potential risks.

events.name: Daily Store Operations and New Product Listings
events.description: As usual, Lei Mingxuan arrived at his store located in Century Avenue Mall at 9:30 a.m. He rolled up the shutter door, turned on the lights, and started the cash register system and music player. Following his routine, he took a walk around the store to check whether the shelves were neatly arranged and the floor was clean. Several boxes of new arrivals from the previous night were piled at the entrance of the storeroom, so he began unpacking them. This batch consisted of new summer T-shirts and shorts. According to the outfit combinations he had previously planned, he ironed the clothes smooth and displayed them together with matching accessories from the jewelry section on prominent display tables and mannequins. Meanwhile, he turned on the computer to review the previous day’s sales records and inventory alerts, mentally calculating the day’s sales targets and the products that needed special promotion.

events.name: Insomnia due to project excitement, adjusting evening walks
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Lei Mingxuan found it difficult to fall asleep due to his excitement about the Hangzhou project. The originally planned walk was replaced by a 20-minute stroll within the residential complex, during which he contemplated the project details, leading to him staying up later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Steady, with a slight sense of anticipation for the new beginning in July.

结束状态.心情: Excitement and apprehension intertwine, stirring thoughts with new opportunities.

state.今日运动: Commute by walking to and from the subway station, and take a 20-minute evening walk in the residential area.

date_attribute.weather: Persistent high temperatures, muggy weather, with slight haze.

2025-07.daily_overview: On Wednesday, Lei Mingxuan devoted his energy to systematic knowledge acquisition and complex project evaluations. During the day, he utilized fragmented time at the shop to contemplate the pros and cons of the Hangzhou pop-up store. In the evening, he began delving into short video operations, unlocking a new skill set. His daily rhythm, filled with reflection and learning, felt particularly enriching.

events.name: Study short video operation systematically in the evening.
events.description: After dinner, Lei Mingxuan declined his parents' invitation to watch TV and returned to his study to open a paid short video operation course on his computer. He studied the core content of the first phase regarding account positioning, including how to analyze one's own strengths, identify target audiences, and create a differentiated persona. Combining his identity as the "owner of a trendy clothing store," he began brainstorming how to integrate the daily operations of his physical store, his product selection insights, and his personal hobbies such as trendy toys and rollerblading to craft the image of a "fun-loving, trendsetting young Shanghai entrepreneur." He created a new document to outline the themes for his first practical shoot, such as "quick unboxing of new store arrivals" or "urban outdoor outfits after work," and briefly listed the necessary equipment for filming, including a smartphone and a tripod, along with the key points for the script.

events.name: Assessing the Challenges of Summer Operations and Off-Site Projects
events.description: Taking advantage of the relatively low customer flow during the midday period, Lei Mingxuan did not rest. Instead, he pulled up sales data and customer flow records from July and August of the previous two years on his computer for analysis. He found that although the Shanghai store performed well overall during the summer, there was a noticeable difference between weekends and weekdays, and sales relied heavily on promotional activities. At the same time, he kept pondering the matter of the pop-up store in Hangzhou. He took out his notebook and began jotting down ideas, listing the potential challenges of operating in a different location: with a weekly workload of 56 hours, how could he manage both the Shanghai and Hangzhou stores? How much would logistics costs increase? Was hiring temporary staff in Hangzhou reliable? How could remote management be handled? Were the rental costs and profit-sharing ratios truly cost-effective? He compiled a preliminary list of pros and cons, with the advantages being market expansion and brand exposure, and the disadvantages being management complexity and risks. This list helped concretize his thinking.

events.name: Learn the theory of short video account positioning
events.description: After closing the shop, Lei Mingxuan did not leave immediately. Instead, he sat down in the rest area and continued watching short video lessons on his phone. This session focused on how to find one’s content differentiation. Combining the "small business owner" persona he had conceptualized during the day, he contemplated how to distinguish himself from other self-media accounts that solely focus on fashion or store visits. Perhaps he could incorporate practical insights into store management or showcase personal aspects of his life, such as playing billiards or rollerblading, to make the content more multi-dimensional. He realized that creating content should not solely revolve around selling products but should also provide value or entertainment.

events.name: Analyzing Competitor Accounts and Learning Content Planning
events.description: After finishing his evening theoretical class, Lei Mingxuan did not rest. Instead, he opened the Douyin and Xiaohongshu apps. Following the course recommendations, he extensively searched for and followed a batch of high-quality accounts of the same type (clothing store owners, fashion bloggers). Like a market researcher, he carefully analyzed the content structure of these accounts: How long are their videos usually? How do they capture attention at the beginning? Are their topics centered around new products, styling tips, or lifestyle? What is their interaction data (likes, comments)? He specifically noted down a few video ideas that he found particularly relatable or creative. At the same time, he studied the techniques from the course on how to identify trending topics, such as leveraging hot trends or creating content around holidays or seasons. He felt his mind had been opened up, no longer in a state of confusion.

events.name: Staying up late due to obsession with coursework, neglecting exercise.
events.description: Lei Mingxuan was captivated by the short video course and studied late into the night, canceling the originally planned evening exercise at the last minute, which resulted in insufficient sleep.

起始状态.心情: Focus, prepare to begin the assessment of a new day's study and work.

结束状态.心情: The mind is enriched with a preliminary framework for short video operations, yet there remain doubts about the Hangzhou project, accompanied by a slight sense of fatigue.

state.今日运动: Ran 3 kilometers in the morning (moved to early morning to avoid high temperatures), but did not exercise in the evening.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny and hot during the day, with thundershowers in the evening bringing brief coolness.

2025-07.daily_overview: Thursday's activities were marked by pragmatism and social acumen. Lei Mingxuan proactively leveraged his network to conduct market research for the Hangzhou project, while in the evening, he planned an important social engagement with his girlfriend. Through both online and offline information gathering and emotional communication, he paved the way for potential new endeavors and relationship development.

events.name: Consult relatives and friends in Hangzhou to obtain local information.
events.description: Considering the feasibility study of the Hangzhou project, Lei Mingxuan decided to seek help from his circle of friends in Hangzhou. In the morning, he sent WeChat messages to his university classmate Wang Lei (an internet product manager), high school classmate Chen Hao (an internet product manager), and cousin Yang Fan (an algorithm engineer). Instead of directly mentioning the project, he approached them in a consultative tone, inquiring about the situation of that cultural and creative park: "Hey, I’d like to ask about a place. How’s the popularity at XX Cultural and Creative Park these days? Are the surrounding consumers mainly students or white-collar workers? Are there any special activities in the park during the summer vacation?" The replies from the three gradually came in, providing highly valuable information: Wang Lei said the park is a popular check-in spot with many young people and abundant summer activities; Chen Hao mentioned that there are quite a few internet companies and universities nearby, indicating strong purchasing power; Yang Fan offered a more rational analysis of the online promotional reach of the park. This firsthand information greatly strengthened Lei Mingxuan’s confidence in the quality of customer traffic in that area.

events.name: First Formal Project Communication with Zhou Tao
events.description: After receiving relatively positive feedback from his friends, Lei Mingxuan felt somewhat reassured. Around nine o'clock in the evening, he proactively sent a WeChat voice call invitation to Zhou Tao. Once the call connected, he skipped excessive pleasantries and got straight to the point, raising the concerns he had listed during the day—particularly issues such as management distance, logistics costs, and personnel recruitment—one by one to Zhou Tao. Zhou Tao had clearly also prepared thoroughly. He further explained the specific support policies provided by the park management (such as partial management fee waivers and joint promotional efforts), offered more detailed estimated customer flow data, and proposed a collaboration detail: Zhou Tao could help coordinate a local part-time store manager candidate to handle daily on-site management, while Lei Mingxuan would supervise and make decisions remotely through online channels. This conversation made Lei Mingxuan feel that the other party was genuinely sincere, and the collaboration model became clearer to him.

events.name: Discussing a Family Dinner with Childhood Friends with My Girlfriend
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan had his routine video call with his girlfriend, Lin Wei. After chatting about the day's trivial matters, his tone became more serious: "Weiwei, there's something I'd like to discuss with you. I want to invite my childhood friend Zhang Wei and his family for a meal this weekend—his wife and child will be coming too. I was thinking... you could join us as well, so you can meet them properly. What do you think?" Lin Wei paused for a moment on the other side of the screen before breaking into a smile: "Sure, I've been wanting to meet your childhood friend for a while." Lei Mingxuan was delighted to hear this and proceeded to introduce Zhang Wei's family in detail, specifically mentioning that they have a five-year-old son. The two began enthusiastically discussing the details of the gathering. Considering there would be a child, they agreed it would be best to find a restaurant with a spacious environment, preferably one with a children's play area or at least a child-friendly atmosphere. After searching on Dianping for quite some time, they finally settled on a well-reviewed local cuisine restaurant and tentatively scheduled the dinner for the evening of July 5th (Saturday). This decision made Lei Mingxuan feel that their relationship had taken another step forward.

events.name: Adjusting exercise schedule due to late sleep from communication excitement.
events.description: The extended conversation with Zhou Tao left Lei Mingxuan in high spirits, prompting him to take a spontaneous 40-minute brisk walk in the residential area to calm his excitement, which resulted in him going to bed later than planned.

起始状态.心情: Positive, ready to initiate research and communication

结束状态.心情: Feeling grounded and full of anticipation, the project prospects have become clearer, and there are new developments in my emotional life, leaving me slightly excited.

state.今日运动: Take a 40-minute brisk walk in the residential community in the evening.

2025-07.daily_overview: Friday is the day for action implementation. Lei Mingxuan put his ideas into practice by not only starting to learn video editing skills but also quickly finalizing important family dinner arrangements for the weekend and consulting his fashion expert cousin for advice. The progress in various matters made him feel efficient and satisfied.

events.name: Hands-On Learning of Video Editing Fundamentals
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan decided to no longer just "watch" the course but to start "doing." He downloaded the Jianying app on his phone and tablet, following the course step by step to familiarize himself with the basic interface. He attempted to import materials he had casually shot earlier with his phone, such as the store environment and clothing details, to practice the most fundamental editing operations: how to split clips, adjust their order, add simple transition effects, insert subtitles, and include background music. Although his first practice video was only 15 seconds long and appeared quite rough, the sense of accomplishment upon completing it left him exhilarated. He realized that video editing was not as difficult to get started with as he had imagined.

events.name: Finalize and schedule a family dinner.
events.description: During the lunch break, Lei Mingxuan, following the plan discussed with Lin Wei the previous night, personally called the selected Shanghainese restaurant. He specifically mentioned that there would be a child in the party and requested a relatively quiet table or one near the small play area inside the restaurant. After successfully reserving a private room for 6:30 p.m., he immediately contacted his childhood friend Zhang Wei. "Wei, are you free on Saturday evening? Bring your wife and nephew along—let’s get together. I’ve already booked the place. Also… my girlfriend Lin Wei will be joining us." Zhang Wei readily agreed over the phone, his tone carrying a happy laugh for his friend: "Sure! Finally getting to meet your better half—we’ll definitely be there!" The two briefly caught up on recent happenings during the call, both looking forward to the upcoming gathering.

events.name: Consulting cousin Shen Jie on fashion content trends
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan arranged to meet his cousin Shen Jie, a buyer for a fashion brand, at a trendy café in Jing'an District that she recommended. Lei Mingxuan got straight to the point, showing her the accounts of several fashion bloggers he followed on his phone and sharing his idea of trying his hand at short videos. "Jiejie, from the perspective of a professional buyer, what kind of clothing content do young people enjoy most nowadays? How can short videos be both stylish and not overly commercial?" True to her expertise, Shen Jie stirred her coffee while offering very specific suggestions: for example, he could try practical "one garment, multiple styles" outfits, "cosplay-inspired outfits" based on popular TV dramas or anime characters, or film "take you to Shanghai's niche boutique shops" Vlogs. She also pointed out that authenticity and the "shop owner's" personal charm were crucial, avoiding the feel of a hard sell. Finally, she said cheerfully, "Bro, if you need someone to appear in your first video or want some styling advice, just let me know!" This consultation helped Lei Mingxuan clarify his content direction.

events.name: Having dinner with girlfriend temporarily, changing the original plan.
events.description: In the evening, Lin Wei made a spontaneous suggestion to have dinner together, which Lei Mingxuan gladly accepted. They dined at a newly opened Japanese ramen restaurant, discussing the details of the weekend gathering, which resulted in shortening the originally scheduled evening study time.

起始状态.心情: With clear objectives, we are prepared to implement all plans.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and rewarding, with both skill acquisition and social engagements progressing smoothly, resulting in a pleasant state of mind.

state.今日运动: Focus on indoor learning and task arrangements, with temporary cancellation of physical activities.

2025-07.daily_overview: Saturday was a day brimming with emotional warmth and business decisiveness. During the day, I welcomed regular customers at the store, enjoying the pure pleasure of running the business. In the evening, a significant moment in the relationship unfolded—my girlfriend met my core childhood friend’s family for the first time and received high approval. Meanwhile, an important decision regarding career expansion quietly settled in my heart.

events.name: Receiving the regular customer Qian Duoduo and sharing common interests.
events.description: In the afternoon, Qian Duoduo, a regular customer, breezed into the shop like a gust of wind. "Brother Xuan, got any good stuff lately?" Lei Mingxuan greeted her with a smile, pulling out a co-branded hoodie featuring popular anime elements and several T-shirts with innovative designs from the new arrivals to recommend to her. As they browsed the clothes, the two naturally chatted about the latest updates in anime storylines, with Qian Duoduo excitedly sharing an unboxing video of trendy toys she had seen on Bilibili. In the end, Qian Duoduo selected two hoodies and a new series blind box from Pop Mart. Lei Mingxuan skillfully packaged the items and, at checkout, specially gave her an exclusive coupon for the new product category. "Thanks, Brother Xuan! Let me know when you get new anime merchandise next time!" Qian Duoduo waved goodbye as she left. Such relaxed and pleasant buying and selling interactions made Lei Mingxuan feel at ease.

events.name: Prepare and attend a family gathering.
events.description: Around four in the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan closed his shop early, went home to take a shower, and changed into a decent casual suit (neither too formal nor too casual, yet showing respect). He sent Lin Wei a WeChat message to remind her of the time, and Lin Wei replied that she was already prepared and had even bought a set of cute stickers as a gift for the child. The two met at the agreed-upon subway entrance, and Lei Mingxuan drove to the restaurant. On the way, he once again briefed Lin Wei on Zhang Wei’s personality (steady and loyal), his wife’s situation, as well as the child’s approximate age and topics that might interest them, hoping to help Lin Wei integrate more quickly.

events.name: Family Dinner: Lin Wei Successfully Integrates into the Inner Circle
events.description: At 6:30 p.m., in a private room of a local Shanghainese restaurant, Lei Mingxuan, Lin Wei, Zhang Wei and his wife, along with their 5-year-old son, gathered around a table. Initially, there was a slight sense of restraint, but Lin Wei, poised and graceful, took the initiative to chat with Zhang Wei’s wife about topics of interest to mothers, such as parenting experiences and Shanghai’s school district housing, conducting herself appropriately and naturally. She also brought out prepared stickers and quickly bonded with the child, who took an instant liking to this beautiful aunt. The atmosphere during the meal was relaxed and pleasant, with Zhang Wei and Lei Mingxuan reminiscing about childhood mishaps, laughter filling the room. While Lin Wei took the child to the restroom, Zhang Wei patted Lei Mingxuan on the shoulder and whispered, "Brother, you’ve got good taste! Lin Wei has a wonderful personality—generous and sensible. She suits you perfectly." This recognition from a longtime close friend warmed Lei Mingxuan’s heart and filled him with pride.

events.name: Reviewing the dinner gathering, strengthening relationships.
events.description: After the dinner gathering, Lei Mingxuan drove Lin Wei home. In the car, both of them felt satisfied with the evening's event. Lei Mingxuan relayed Zhang Wei's private high praise of him and said sincerely, "Weiwei, you performed exceptionally well today. I am extremely happy and proud." A blush spread across Lin Wei's cheeks as she shared her own impressions from her conversation with Zhang Wei's wife, finding her very amiable and discussing the cuteness of their child. This successful meeting not only officially integrated Lin Wei into Lei Mingxuan's innermost childhood social circle but also deepened their trust and mutual understanding, with their relationship noticeably warming. After returning home, reflecting on the entire day, Lei Mingxuan made an important decision in his heart: the pop-up store project in Hangzhou was worth a try. It was a great opportunity to test the limits of his abilities.

events.name: Slight weight gain due to excessive eating during gatherings.
events.description: The dinner was sumptuous, and Lei Mingxuan consumed a considerable amount of high-calorie food. He temporarily canceled his evening exercise and went directly to rest.

起始状态.心情: Feeling lighthearted and joyful, looking forward to the evening gathering.

结束状态.心情: Happy, content, and full of strength, achieving success in both social life and relationships, and determined about a new career direction, though slightly fatigued.

2025-07.daily_overview: Sunday was a blend of relaxation and planning. In the morning, Lei Mingxuan continued to savor the afterglow of the previous day's gathering by interacting with friends online, solidifying social connections. In the afternoon, he devoted his full attention to systematically planning his short video account, transforming scattered ideas into a clear action framework to thoroughly prepare for the content creation of the following week.

events.name: Consolidate the outcomes of the gathering online.
events.description: After waking up late in the morning, Lei Mingxuan posted several photos of the delicious food and group photos taken during last night's gathering in the "Pudong Three Musketeers" WeChat group (avoiding frontal shots of Lin Wei and the child). He wrote, "Had a great time gathering yesterday. Thanks to Brother Wei and his family for the hospitality!" Zhang Wei quickly replied, "We're all family—no need for formalities. Your wife is wonderful. Let's get together again next time!" Li Na, who is in Hangzhou, also chimed in to express her envy and insisted that arrangements must be made for the next gathering when she returns to Shanghai. This lighthearted online interaction marked a perfect conclusion to Lin Wei's debut in Lei Mingxuan's inner circle of friends and laid the foundation for more shared activities in the future.

events.name: Clarify the content direction and persona for short videos
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan shut himself in his study, took out his notebook, and began systematically organizing the content direction by combining insights from his recent studies, consultations with Shen Jie, and his own repeated reflections. He ultimately identified several core sections: 1. Daily Store Life (new product unboxing, display techniques, interesting interactions with customers); 2. Trendy Outfit of the Day (OOTD) (tailored to different scenarios, such as work, dates, and sports); 3. Shanghai Local Lifestyle Exploration (trendy toy shops, niche cafes, popular roller-skating spots); 4. Personal Hobby Documentation (billiards matches, roller-skating vlogs, trendy toy collection sharing). He attempted to tie these together with a core persona—"a genuine shop owner who loves fun and trends, is rooted in Shanghai, and runs a small store." This persona combines professionalism (fashion), lifestyle appeal (hobbies), and regional affinity (Shanghai).

events.name: Complete the initial drafts of the account positioning document and content calendar.
events.description: After clarifying his thoughts, Lei Mingxuan opened a computer document to systematize his previously fragmented ideas. He drafted a detailed account positioning document covering persona, target audience, content direction, visual style, and posting frequency. Next, he attempted to plan a content calendar for the next two weeks. He decided to start with what he was most familiar with for the first video, setting the theme as "A Clothing Store Owner's Summer Monday," documenting everything from store opening preparations and customer interactions to personal time after work. For this theme, he outlined simple shooting timelines and scenarios.

events.name: Outline for the First Short Video Script
events.description: With the theme and schedule in place, Lei Mingxuan began drafting the outline for the shooting script of "A Clothing Store Owner's Summer Monday." Following the format taught in the course, he conceptualized the opening (greeting at the store entrance and introducing himself), the process (quickly showcasing the store-opening routine, organizing inventory, using visual language to highlight clothing details, and engaging in brief, natural interactions with customers), and the conclusion (scenes of going to a billiards hall or taking a stroll along the river after work, emphasizing the theme of "work-life balance"). He also drafted a few lines of spoken commentary, contemplating how to narrate them in a relaxed, natural, and conversational tone. Although it was only an outline, this marked the transition of his short video plan from the "thinking" phase to the actual "doing" stage.

events.name: An evening walk to adjust one's mood
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan took a half-hour walk with his father in the community park, discussing health progress to alleviate the guilt from overeating the previous day.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed and comfortable, basking in the afterglow of yesterday's success.

结束状态.心情: With a clear mindset and full of creative desire, I am eager to embark on this new video attempt, feeling calm and composed.

2025-07.daily_overview: The new week begins with significant decisions. Lei Mingxuan has officially decided to launch the Hangzhou pop-up store project and completed the contract signing through remote collaboration. Meanwhile, the first-week review of short video learning has provided him with a clearer understanding of his strengths and weaknesses. Both work and study have entered a new phase.

events.name: After comprehensive evaluation, it has been decided to initiate the Hangzhou project.
events.description: After careful consideration over the weekend, taking into account the opinions of family and friends, market research, and the cooperation details provided by Zhou Tao, Lei Mingxuan made his final decision in his study. He believed that, despite the challenges of remote management, this collaboration could effectively test the Hangzhou market, leverage the traffic of the cultural and creative park to enhance brand visibility, and the cooperation model with Zhou Tao would help share risks. Without further hesitation, he sent a lengthy message to Zhou Tao via WeChat, formally expressing his intention to cooperate. He also drafted a list of specific cooperation terms requiring further input from Zhou Tao, including a detailed investment budget table, profit-sharing calculation methods, and detailed rights and responsibilities of both parties. He requested Zhou Tao to refine and return the list as soon as possible to facilitate the next steps.

events.name: Clarify Cooperation Intentions and Preliminary Framework with Zhou Tao
events.description: In the afternoon, Zhou Tao replied to the WeChat message, expressing his delight at Lei Mingxuan's positive response. The two spoke directly over the phone, and during their nearly hour-long conversation, they clarified the broad framework of their collaboration: the project was named "Trend Flowline" Summer Pop-up Store, scheduled to run from August 1 to 31, with the location set in that cultural and creative park in Hangzhou. They preliminarily agreed on the investment ratio (with Lei Mingxuan taking the majority share, responsible for merchandise and major operational costs, while Zhou Tao contributed venue resources and partial local coordination as his share), the profit-sharing model (based on the investment ratio), and their respective areas of responsibility. After hanging up the phone, Lei Mingxuan felt a surge of excitement mixed with pressure. He sent messages to his parents, Zhang Wei, and Lin Wei, informing them of his decision to launch a summer pop-up store project in Hangzhou, officially embarking on this new challenge.

events.name: Finalize supply details and contract terms with Zhou Tao
events.description: In the evening, to ensure efficient progress, Lei Mingxuan held a video conference with Zhou Tao. They discussed in detail the styles (primarily the summer best-sellers from Lei Mingxuan’s store and some new designs tailored for the Hangzhou market), quantities, supply timelines, and logistics arrangements for the first batch of goods. Zhou Tao also presented a revised draft of the cooperation agreement, which had been adjusted according to Lei Mingxuan’s requirements. The two reviewed the agreement clause by clause and reached a consensus on key terms, including the profit-sharing ratio, payment milestones, and handling procedures for unsold inventory. Ultimately, both parties finalized the contract.

events.name: Review of the First Week's Short Video Learning
events.description: While awaiting the contract, Lei Mingxuan reviewed his short video learning from the past week. In a document, he summarized his gains: clarifying the account positioning and the "small boss" persona, organizing content direction, and mastering basic editing operations. At the same time, he honestly listed shortcomings and issues: he might still appear unnatural in front of the camera, lacked skills in lighting and audio during filming, and had no mature ideas on how to more naturally integrate content with store sales. He recorded these problems, planning to focus on overcoming them in the next phase of practical learning. Finally, he backed up all related documents to a cloud drive.

events.name: Confirm and sign the cooperation agreement online
events.description: Just before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan received the final version of the electronic contract sent by Zhou Tao. He carefully reviewed every clause and, after confirming that everything was correct, solemnly signed his name through the electronic signature platform. A few minutes later, Zhou Tao's side also completed the signing. Both parties exchanged scanned copies of the signed contract and agreed to arrange for the mailing of the officially stamped documents the following day. The effectiveness of this contract marked the transition of the Hangzhou pop-up store project from a concept to a legally binding execution phase. Lei Mingxuan properly stored the contract documents, feeling the weight of responsibility on his shoulders grow a little heavier.

events.name: Dietary control disrupted due to project pressure.
events.description: Under significant decision-making pressure, Lei Mingxuan consumed a considerable amount of snacks during dinner, canceled his exercise plan at the last minute, and went straight to rest.

起始状态.心情: Be cautious, prepare to make important decisions.

结束状态.心情: Feeling both excited and a strong sense of responsibility, taking a new step in my career, achieving phased results in my studies, and experiencing a slight sense of anxiety.

state.今日运动: None (Focusing on decision-making, communication, and review throughout the day, with excessive eating)

2025-07.daily_overview: Tuesday's theme was planning and preparation. Lei Mingxuan arranged the itinerary for the weekend's field trip to Hangzhou, while also initiating and leading a warm family discussion to determine the preliminary plan for the National Day family trip. The advancement of the project and the planning of family life proceeded in parallel, reflecting his sense of responsibility as a member of the family.

events.name: Planning a weekend inspection trip to Hangzhou
events.description: After the cooperation agreement was signed, conducting an on-site inspection of the venue became a top priority. Lei Mingxuan decided to make a trip to Hangzhou in person over the upcoming weekend (July 12–13). In the morning, he booked high-speed train tickets via the 12306 App for Saturday morning to Hangzhou and Sunday afternoon back to Shanghai, and reserved a convenient hotel near the industrial park. Subsequently, he contacted Zhou Tao, Wang Lei, Chen Hao, and his cousin Yang Fan via WeChat, informing them that he would be in Hangzhou over the weekend and hoping to meet for detailed discussions. He compiled an inspection checklist, including verifying the venue dimensions, observing nearby competitors, and discussing local operational support details with his friends, ensuring that the trip would be efficient and purpose-driven.

events.name: Discussing the National Day family travel plans with parents
events.description: During dinner, seeing both his parents present, Lei Mingxuan brought up the topic: "Dad, Mom, the National Day holiday is coming up soon. It's been a long time since our family went out together. I've had a lot of projects at the shop lately, but I’ll definitely be free during the holiday. How about we take this opportunity to go on a short road trip around the area for a few days?" The suggestion immediately sparked his parents' interest. His mother, Wang Xiuying, was the first to agree, saying it was boring to stay at home all the time. His father, Lei Jianguo, was more practical and asked where they wanted to go and whether the roads would be congested.

events.name: Showcase destinations and spark family discussions
events.description: Lei Mingxuan had come prepared. He took out his phone and showed his parents the photos and travel guides he had previously saved of Suzhou gardens, Tongli ancient town, as well as Hangzhou’s West Lake and Longjing Village. "Suzhou has a strong cultural atmosphere, with its gardens and ancient towns, perfect for a leisurely visit. Hangzhou, on the other hand, offers beautiful natural scenery—strolling by West Lake and having tea in Longjing Village is more relaxing," he explained. Looking at the photos of West Lake, his mother said she preferred Hangzhou’s landscapes, while his father was more interested in Suzhou’s garden architecture. Both also expressed concerns about the crowds during the holiday and the fatigue of driving.

events.name: Reach a consensus on family travel arrangements and allocate tasks accordingly.
events.description: After a lively discussion, the family ultimately reached a consensus to travel together. Although the destination (either Suzhou or Hangzhou) has not been finalized yet, the goal of "a family road trip during the National Day holiday" has been set. The parents unanimously agreed that Lei Mingxuan, who "travels more frequently," would take primary responsibility for the detailed itinerary planning, hotel reservations, and pre-trip vehicle inspections. They, in turn, would be responsible for preparing travel supplies and offering suggestions. This discussion created a harmonious family atmosphere and assigned Lei Mingxuan a new family task.

events.name: Arrange the production of visual promotional materials for the pop-up store.
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan contacted a freelance graphic designer he had previously collaborated with and shared the theme of the pop-up store, "Trend Flowline," along with the main visual color scheme (summer vibrant orange and blue contrast) and promotional copy (highlighting "Trend Collection from Shanghai"). He requested the designer to create digital posters for online promotion (WeChat and Xiaohongshu), short video cover templates, and physical posters for offline display in the park. Additionally, he booked a freelance model he knew, planning to shoot a set of street-style look photos for the pop-up store’s first batch of key styles next week, which will be used for promotional purposes.

events.name: Complete the formal signing and archiving of the cooperation agreement
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan received the original copy of the formal cooperation agreement, which had been couriered by Zhou Tao and already bore the official seal of the other company. After carefully verifying its contents, he solemnly signed his name in the Party A section and affixed the store's official seal. Once the signing was completed, he mailed one copy back to Zhou Tao and placed the other copy, along with the electronic version from the previous day, into a dedicated project file folder for safekeeping. With this, all legal procedures were completed, and a weight was lifted from his mind, allowing him to fully devote himself to the project's execution.

events.name: Early bedtime adjustment due to smooth planning
events.description: The family discussion was pleasant, and Lei Mingxuan felt relaxed, going to bed early to make up for the lack of sleep in the previous days.

起始状态.心情: Methodically prepared to handle multiple planning matters.

结束状态.心情: Feeling warmth and a sense of responsibility, the family travel plan brings new anticipation, and the mood remains steady.

state.今日运动: Did 20 minutes of core training at home in the evening following Keep.

2025-07.daily_overview: On Wednesday, Lei Mingxuan began taking concrete actions for the Hangzhou project, starting with the selection of the first batch of goods and placing supplementary orders. Meanwhile, he continued to deepen his video editing skills and initiated information gathering for his National Day travel plans during work breaks. The new project, personal learning, and family plans progressed simultaneously, creating a compact yet well-organized pace of life.

events.name: Select the first batch of goods for the pop-up store and replenish accessory orders.
events.description: With the cooperation agreement taking effect, inventory preparation became the top priority. Lei Mingxuan carefully selected summer clothing suitable for the tastes of young people in Hangzhou from his own store's stock. He leaned toward choosing T-shirts, shorts, skirts, and several lightweight shirts with strong design appeal, bright colors, and comfortable fabrics. At the same time, he believed accessories were key to enhancing outfit coordination and increasing the average transaction value. He contacted Wu Fang, an accessories supplier in Guangzhou, via WeChat video call. He explained the Hangzhou pop-up store project to her, sent the selected clothing images, and requested her to recommend and match a batch of new summer accessories—such as statement earrings, layered necklaces, and woven straw hats—based on the clothing styles. He immediately placed a replenishment order.

events.name: Systematically learn video editing software operations
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan decided to systematically learn the advanced features of Jianying. After closing his shop, he opened the professional version of Jianying (which offers more powerful functions) on his laptop. Following the tutorial step by step, he learned how to create a new project, build a material library, and import video and image materials such as the shop environment and clothing details transferred from his phone. He familiarized himself with the functions of each panel in the workspace, laying the foundation for more complex editing tasks in the future.

events.name: Practice Core Video Editing Skills
events.description: After mastering the basic operations, Lei Mingxuan began practicing core editing techniques. He selected a previously recorded, rather lengthy store inspection video to practice how to precisely cut out redundant and dull sections, retaining only the highlights. He also experimented with adjusting the playback speed of different clips, such as speeding up footage of organizing clothes and slowing down shots that showcased clothing details, to control the overall rhythm of the video. Finally, he tried adding appropriate transition effects (like dissolves and flash whites) between different clips to make the video flow more smoothly and naturally. After several practice sessions, he felt significantly more in control of the editing process.

events.name: Collect information on alternative options for family travel during the National Day holiday.
events.description: During the midday break, Lei Mingxuan recalled the family decision made the previous night and opened his computer and phone to begin gathering detailed travel information for Suzhou and Hangzhou during the National Day holiday. He looked up the weather conditions from previous National Day periods (typically clear and pleasant autumn weather), estimated crowd levels and ticket reservation policies for popular attractions (such as the Humble Administrator’s Garden in Suzhou and West Lake in Hangzhou), compared the locations and prices of hotels across different price ranges, and also noted some local delicacies and leisure activities suitable for elderly family members in both cities. He organized the preliminary information into a simple comparison table, planning to discuss it further with his parents over the weekend.

events.name: Announcing the Launch of the Pop-up Store Project to the Team
events.description: During the afternoon when customer flow was low, Lei Mingxuan called Xiao Liu, the only full-time staff member (and his trainee for the assistant store manager position), to the break area. He formally announced to Xiao Liu that the Hangzhou pop-up store project had been launched and briefly conveyed the key points of the cooperation agreement and the project timeline. He told Xiao Liu that the stable operation of the main store in Shanghai would be crucial over the next month, and there would also be tasks related to preparing inventory and coordinating for the Hangzhou store that would require his assistance. Lei Mingxuan encouraged Xiao Liu to view this as an opportunity for learning and taking on more responsibilities. After hearing this, Xiao Liu felt both pressure and motivation, expressing his full commitment to cooperation. This internal briefing ensured that the core team remained aligned with the same information.

events.name: Morning rope skipping canceled due to weather.
events.description: The originally planned morning rope skipping was temporarily canceled due to overcast weather and cool winds, and was replaced with light indoor stretching.

起始状态.心情: Full of energy, ready to commence project execution and deepen skills

结束状态.心情: Steady progress is being made, with tangible advancements in both goods and studies, and a focused state of mind.
