2025-07.daily_overview: Thursday's schedule balanced daily operations, forward-looking inventory preparation, skill refinement, and long-term life planning. While handling routine store matters, Lei Mingxuan also made preparations for autumn business and family travel safety, demonstrating a pragmatic and thoughtful approach.

events.name: Processing Online Orders and Inventory Counting
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan first handled several accumulated same-city flash delivery orders on the store's WeChat Mini Program, checking addresses, preparing goods, packaging, and contacting the flash delivery courier for pickup. In the afternoon, taking advantage of it not being a weekend, he conducted a quick cycle count of the store's best-selling summer items such as T-shirts and shorts, verifying whether the physical inventory matched the records in the computer system. After the inventory check, he compiled a list of items requiring replenishment from the Hangzhou supplier Zhou Tao (primarily to restock popular styles for the Shanghai store) and sent it to Zhou Tao via WeChat.

events.name: Proactively contact suppliers to obtain autumn information.
events.description: Although business is booming in the summer, as the shop owner, Lei Mingxuan must think ahead. He proactively contacted Zhou Tao via WeChat, not only sending a restocking list but also asking, "Mr. Zhou, has your company released the fabric and style trend catalog for this autumn and winter yet? If there are any good sample garment materials, could you send them to me first? I need to plan the autumn collection in advance." This forward-looking and proactive communication allows him to seize the opportunity to secure high-quality inventory early.

events.name: Analyzing the Shot Language of Popular Short Videos
events.description: While studying editing techniques in the evening, Lei Mingxuan paid special attention to the camera work in fashion-related short videos. He searched for several highly-liked outfit vlogs on Bilibili and Douyin and watched them repeatedly. He focused on analyzing: how the creators used handheld follow shots, low-angle upward shots, and other camera movements to showcase the overall silhouette and dynamic effects of the clothing; how close-up shots were used to capture fabric texture, print details, or accessory highlights; and how background music coordinated with the rhythm of scene transitions to create a fashionable, energetic, or relaxed atmosphere. He meticulously noted down all these observed techniques in his notebook, contemplating how to apply them to his own videos.

events.name: Schedule a Comprehensive Vehicle Maintenance and Safety Inspection
events.description: Considering the upcoming National Day family road trip, daily commuting, and occasional short business trips, Lei Mingxuan felt it necessary to conduct a thorough maintenance and safety inspection of the family car. He contacted He Zhiqiang, the owner of a car repair shop he had known for many years, via WeChat. "Master He, my car is about due for maintenance. Also, I might take my parents on a long trip during the National Day holiday, so I’d like to ask you to help with a comprehensive inspection, especially on key parts like the tires and brakes, to see if anything needs replacing. When would be convenient?" He Zhiqiang replied promptly and scheduled an appointment for July 15 (next Tuesday) to bring the car in. Lei Mingxuan noted this in his phone calendar.

events.name: Mild discomfort from an old ankle injury in basketball.
events.description: During the post-work basketball activity, Lei Mingxuan experienced a slight recurrence of an old injury to his right ankle. The pain was tolerable, but he temporarily canceled subsequent physical activities and went to bed early to rest.

起始状态.心情: Be pragmatic and prepared to handle both daily and planned affairs.

结束状态.心情: Everything seems to be progressing according to plan, and I feel reassured about long-term arrangements such as vehicle maintenance, but I am slightly concerned about the discomfort in my ankle.

state.今日运动: After work, I went to the community basketball court and played basketball for one hour with Xie Fei and others, but I did not engage in any additional exercise due to ankle discomfort.

2025-07.daily_overview: On Friday, Lei Mingxuan commenced his on-site investigation trip in Hangzhou. After arriving in Hangzhou in the morning, he conducted an in-depth site inspection of the pop-up store location with his partner Zhou Tao in the afternoon, gaining the most direct insight into the project's implementation. In the evening, he did not forget his social engagements in Shanghai, making arrangements for the weekend gathering with friends.

events.name: Depart for Hangzhou for project inspection.
events.description: Lei Mingxuan took the 8 a.m. high-speed train from Shanghai Hongqiao Station and arrived at Hangzhou East Station one hour later. He took a taxi to the hotel he had booked near the cultural and creative park, checked in, and rested briefly in his room. He reviewed the list of venue-related issues he was to discuss with Zhou Tao in the afternoon, and checked the tape measure, notebook, and power bank he had brought with him, ensuring he was fully prepared for the on-site inspection later that day.

events.name: Conduct on-site inspection of the pop-up store location and discuss the renovation
events.description: At two o'clock in the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan met with Zhou Tao, the supplier (now a project partner), in front of the reserved pop-up store space in the cultural and creative park. This was an open area of approximately 30 square meters, located beside the main thoroughfare of the park, with favorable foot traffic flow. Lei Mingxuan took out a tape measure and, together with Zhou Tao, carefully measured the length, width, and height of the space, as well as the positions of the columns. They inspected the number of power outlets on the walls, the locations of network interfaces, the lighting conditions, and the positions of fire exits and sprinkler heads. Following this, the two engaged in a lively discussion about the interior design style: Lei Mingxuan wanted to highlight "trendy collections" and "Shanghai elements," proposing to use neon tubes for the store's logo, install a mirrored wall, and set up several flexible metal shelves; Zhou Tao, on the other hand, offered suggestions from the perspective of local aesthetics and cost control. They also made a preliminary estimate of the approximate cost range for materials and labor, forming an initial renovation plan and budget framework.

events.name: Organize a weekend gathering with friends
events.description: Returning to the hotel in the evening, Lei Mingxuan thought about his plans after going back to Shanghai over the weekend. He sent a message in the WeChat group named "Weekend Dining Buddies": "Guys, I'm heading back to Shanghai this weekend. Are you free on Sunday evening? Let's get together? @Zhao Min @Song Jia." Considering that his university classmate Zhao Min lived in Minhang, he specifically searched for a newly opened fusion restaurant with good reviews near her home and shared the link in the group to gather opinions. Zhao Min and Song Jia responded quickly, confirming the dinner for Sunday evening. Lei Mingxuan then completed the restaurant reservation on his phone.

events.name: Rest and adjustment due to ankle discomfort
events.description: Due to lingering mild discomfort from an old ankle injury, Lei Mingxuan canceled his evening exercise, rested in the hotel with ice therapy, and went to bed early to facilitate recovery.

起始状态.心情: Focus and anticipation for a business trip with a mission, with slight discomfort in the ankle.

结束状态.心情: The site conditions are satisfactory, which is both substantial and intuitive, giving us greater confidence in the project's implementation. At the same time, we look forward to the weekend gathering with friends, and the ankle condition has improved.

state.今日运动: Walking inspection in Hangzhou Cultural and Creative Park for nearly 2 hours, but no additional exercise.

2025-07.daily_overview: Saturday was a day dedicated to establishing a support network and integrating information. Lei Mingxuan hosted a gathering for local friends in Hangzhou, successfully building a network of "local contacts" for project operations. In the afternoon, he organized the findings from the site visit and developed an action plan. Upon returning to Shanghai in the evening, he promptly shared the updates to ensure seamless progress in the project.

events.name: Hosting a banquet for friends in Hangzhou to build a local support network.
events.description: At noon, Lei Mingxuan hosted a lunch at an authentic local cuisine restaurant in Hangzhou, inviting his university classmate Wang Lei, high school classmate Chen Hao, and cousin Yang Fan. During the meal, he provided a detailed introduction to the pop-up store project he was collaborating on with Zhou Tao, sharing specifics about yesterday’s site inspection and the renovation ideas. He candidly said, "The project is set to launch in August, but since I’m based in Shanghai, I can’t oversee it daily. That’s why I’ve invited you all today—I’d like to ask for your help. Once the store opens, if any of you happen to be in the area and have time, please drop by and take a look. Check things like foot traffic, whether the product displays are appealing, and how the staff are doing. You don’t need to manage anything—just visit as friends and give me some honest 'customer feedback' afterward." All three friends readily agreed, with Wang Lei jokingly adding, "Don’t worry, Brother Xuan, we’ll make sure to complete our 'undercover' mission!" After this meal, an informal operational support network of "remote management + assistance from local friends" was preliminarily established.

events.name: Organizing Field Notes and Drafting Follow-up Plans
events.description: After lunch, Lei Mingxuan returned to the hotel. Instead of resting, he opened his computer and began organizing the insights gained from his trip to Hangzhou. He compiled the photos of the venue taken the previous day, the measured dimensions, the key points of the renovation discussed with Zhou Tao, and the suggestions offered by his friends today (such as noting the difference in foot traffic between weekends and weekdays in the park) into a document. He drafted a brief project progress report and an initial version of the follow-up action plan, clearly outlining several tasks that needed to be initiated immediately upon returning to Shanghai: finalizing the renovation plan and finding a construction team, launching the recruitment of local store staff in Hangzhou, preparing a detailed list and logistics plan for the first batch of inventory, and establishing a regular communication mechanism with Wang Lei and others (such as creating a small group chat).

events.name: Return to Shanghai and synchronize information with the team.
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan returned to Shanghai by high-speed rail. After having dinner at home, he made a WeChat voice call to Xiao Liu, a staff member in Shanghai, to share the key outcomes of his trip to Hangzhou: the venue conditions were favorable, local friends were willing to provide support, and the renovation and recruitment efforts needed immediate follow-up. He instructed Xiao Liu to start assisting with compiling the list of the first batch of goods to be shipped to Hangzhou from the following Monday. This timely information sharing ensured that the Shanghai team was kept informed of the project's progress and prepared them for the collaborative work in the next phase.

events.name: Slight weight gain due to social dining
events.description: Due to the substantial intake from the banquet in Hangzhou, Lei Mingxuan canceled his exercise session at the last minute and opted for rest instead. His ankle has largely recovered.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to preparing to discuss major plans with friends, with the ankle condition improving.

结束状态.心情: The relaxation and satisfaction after completing the task, along with the establishment of a local support network, have significantly alleviated his anxiety about operating in a different location, bringing him a pleasant mood.

state.今日运动: After dining with friends in Hangzhou, I walked back to the hotel, covering approximately 1.5 kilometers without engaging in any high-intensity exercise.

2025-07.daily_overview: Sunday is a day dedicated purely to leisure and social activities. Lei Mingxuan temporarily set aside his work and enjoyed a relaxing summer evening filled with sports, laughter, and an outdoor movie under the starry sky with his girlfriend and roller-skating friends. This allowed him to completely unwind his tense nerves and further strengthened his relationship with Lin Wei within their shared social circle.

events.name: Organize and participate in the Binjiang roller skating activity
events.description: At half past five in the evening, the sun slanted westward, and the temperature dropped. Lei Mingxuan, his girlfriend Lin Wei, his roller-skating partner Song Jia, and two other friends from the circle gathered at an entrance to the cycling path along the Pudong Riverside. They greeted each other, and Lei Mingxuan helped Lin Wei check whether her protective gear was properly worn. After a brief warm-up, the group set off skating along the riverside path. Lei Mingxuan led the way at the front, occasionally speeding up and turning back to check on the others. The river breeze brushed against their faces, and the setting sun cast a golden glow over the Lujiazui skyline. As they skated, they chatted and laughed loudly, enjoying a relaxed and carefree atmosphere.

events.name: Riverside Roller Skating and Sunset Appreciation
events.description: After skating for about an hour, everyone stopped to rest at a viewing platform, admiring the river scenery under the sunset glow and the first glimmers of brilliant lights on the opposite bank. Lei Mingxuan took out his phone to take group photos for everyone, while Song Jia shared a newly discovered rollerblading route she had recently found. Although Lin Wei was a beginner, with the encouragement of Lei Mingxuan and Song Jia, she skated better and better, gradually blending into this small group.

events.name: Discover an open-air cinema and purchase snacks.
events.description: When they were ready to head back after the break, they noticed that outdoor movie screening equipment was being set up on the lawn of the nearby Riverside Park. The screen was already hung, and warm-up music was playing. Lei Mingxuan’s eyes lit up, and he suggested, "Hey, how about watching an outdoor movie before going back? The atmosphere is perfect!" The proposal was met with unanimous agreement from everyone. The group skated over to the park's snack shop, bought a pile of snacks like chilled drinks, popcorn, and potato chips, and carried them toward the screening lawn.

events.name: Watch an open-air movie and enjoy the starry summer night sky.
events.description: Everyone found a spot on the lawn with a good view, spread out a picnic mat (which Song Jia had brought along), and sat down on the ground. A classic old comedy film was being screened. As the stars gradually became clearer and the river breeze blew gently, everyone enjoyed snacks while watching the movie, occasionally exchanging quiet comments about the plot or sharing lighthearted critiques. Lin Wei leaned against Lei Mingxuan, while Song Jia and other friends chatted about interesting stories from work and daily life, planning to organize a longer cycling route for their next outing.

events.name: End of Event and Online Sharing
events.description: After the movie ended, everyone helped clean up the trash and bid each other farewell. Lei Mingxuan and Lin Wei took a taxi home together. During the ride, Lin Wei mentioned how much fun she had that day and how nice it was to meet Song Jia and the others. After returning home, everyone reported their safe arrival in the WeChat group. Song Jia was the first to share several wonderful photos and short videos taken that evening, which received numerous likes and replies as everyone reminisced about the beautiful and fulfilling summer night. This event not only allowed Lei Mingxuan to relax and unwind but also helped Lin Wei further integrate into his hobby-based social circle.

events.name: Due to the casual eating habits associated with roller skating activities
events.description: Having consumed a considerable amount of snacks during the event, Lei Mingxuan canceled his evening walk and went directly to rest.

起始状态.心情: Feeling lighthearted and looking forward to the outdoor activities in the evening.

结束状态.心情: Relaxed, joyful, and content, I spent a perfect summer weekend in a state of complete ease.

state.今日运动: Riverside roller skating for about 1.5 hours, moderate intensity

2025-07.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, Lei Mingxuan quickly switched from weekend leisure mode back to work mode. He initiated the recruitment process for the Hangzhou store, continued to deepen the planning of short video content, and sought more specific creative suggestions from his professional cousin, driving all tasks to progress in depth.

events.name: Launch Recruitment for Hangzhou Pop-up Store Staff
events.description: The Hangzhou project has entered the execution phase, and recruiting short-term (one-month) in-store sales staff is a critical step. In the morning, Lei Mingxuan posted recruitment information on platforms such as "BOSS Zhipin" and "51job," as well as in local Hangzhou part-time WeChat groups and Douban groups. The job requirements were clearly stated: candidates must have experience in clothing sales, be familiar with fast-fashion trends, possess strong communication skills, and be able to commit to full-time work for one month during the summer. He provided Zhou Tao’s WeChat as the initial screening contact, while he himself would be responsible for the final video interviews. That afternoon, he began receiving applications from candidates in Hangzhou.

events.name: Excellent Short Video Case Narratives in Deep Learning
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan did not casually browse videos. Instead, he selected 2-3 "viral" videos from clothing store owner accounts that he considered exemplary for an in-depth review. He took out his notebook and analyzed them frame by frame: What hook (suspense, visual impact, direct question) was used in the first 3 seconds of the video to capture attention? How did the narrative progress through scene transitions and voiceovers in the middle? How did the ending guide interaction (likes, comments, clicking the shopping cart)? He identified some common patterns in narrative structure and began drafting a more detailed and engaging script outline for his own store's first video, "A Day in the Life of a Clothing Store Owner." He contemplated how to use the camera to effectively tell the daily story of a "small business owner."

events.name: Consult cousin Shen Jie for specific short video ideas.
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan arranged to meet his cousin Shen Jie at a quiet café in Jing'an District. This time, he came with more specific questions. He showed Shen Jie several cases he had analyzed and his preliminary script ideas, then asked, "Jiejie, from a professional perspective, if I were to shoot my first video, would it be better to simply document a day's routine or to focus on a specific theme, such as a challenge like 'creating three different looks for various occasions with 500 yuan in the store'? Are there any particular trending elements recently—like a specific color, fabric, or style—that are sure to attract attention?" Shen Jie offered highly professional advice, suggesting that challenge-based content tends to be more engaging and shareable. She recommended "dopamine colors" and "outdoor functional style" as recent popular trends. She also agreed that if he filmed a challenge video, she could appear as a model or guest judge. This consultation made Lei Mingxuan's content ideas more actionable.

events.name: Feeling pleased due to smooth progress in recruitment.
events.description: After receiving the job application resume, Lei Mingxuan felt optimistic about the project's progress and temporarily added evening HIIT training to break through the plateau, but felt slightly fatigued.

起始状态.心情: Quickly switch to work mode and prepare to tackle recruitment and creative challenges.

结束状态.心情: The recruitment launch has brought substantial progress. The discussion with Shen Jie has clarified the creative direction, giving a sense of strong momentum, though with slight fatigue.

state.今日运动: Did 20 minutes of HIIT training at home in the evening (first attempt, aiming to break through the weight plateau).

2025-07.daily_overview: Tuesday's routine blended daily habits, work coordination, skill development, and life maintenance. Lei Mingxuan immersed himself in the world of historical novels during his commute, communicated with the mall property manager about store promotions, studied more professional video shooting techniques, and sent his beloved car for comprehensive maintenance to prepare for future long-distance travel.

events.name: Reading historical novels during the commute
events.description: On his morning subway ride to the shop, Lei Mingxuan, as usual, put on his headphones, opened the reading app on his phone, and continued with the late Ming dynasty historical novel he was following. The noise of the carriage was shut out, and he became completely immersed in the protagonist’s struggle for survival in a turbulent era, navigating each step with caution. The book’s depiction of ancient bureaucratic rules and the intricacies of human psychology occasionally reminded him of the people and situations he encountered in his own business, sparking some cross-temporal reflections. This fixed period of reading during his commute was a rare moment of tranquility and self-recharge before the start of each day.

events.name: Communicating with the mall property manager regarding store promotions
events.description: In the morning, Zheng Kaizhao, the property manager of the shopping mall, came for his routine inspection as usual. Lei Mingxuan showed him the electronic version of the pre-designed promotional poster for the "Summer Clearance" event and formally submitted the activity application. "Manager Zheng, our store plans to hold a clearance sale next weekend. We intend to put up the posters at the entrance and in the window display. Would that be acceptable? Also, have the detailed rules for the mall's 'Summer Shopping Spree' been released yet? Our store would like to sign up." Zheng Kaizhao reviewed the content of the poster and indicated that there were no issues, promising to assist with the filing process. He also informed Lei Mingxuan that the detailed plan and registration form for the mall-wide event had already been shared in the merchant group chat and reminded him to download and fill them out. The two exchanged a few more words about the recent foot traffic in the mall, with Zheng Kaizhao noting a noticeable increase in family-oriented customers during the summer vacation period.

events.name: Contact the accessories supplier to follow up on the autumn new products.
events.description: During the lunch break, Lei Mingxuan recalled placing an order for autumn accessories with Wu Fang in Guangzhou and followed up via WeChat: "Fang, regarding the autumn accessories we ordered earlier, when can they be shipped? If possible, please send me the confirmed product images and the final quotation first, so I can plan for inventory and pricing." This kind of timely follow-up communication helps ensure a smooth supply chain and prevents delays in subsequent sales.

events.name: Research on the Shooting Techniques of Food Exploration Short Videos
events.description: During his evening study sessions, Lei Mingxuan shifted his focus from fashion vlogs to store exploration videos. He studied how popular store exploration bloggers guide viewers "into" a space through first-person camera movements, how they use natural light or fill lights to make food and products appear more appealing, and how they capture lively interactions between shop owners and customers to add a sense of warmth and authenticity. He reflected that if his own account were to feature store exploration content in the future, it should not only showcase visually appealing storefronts but also delve into the stories behind them and the human touch of the shop owners. This, he thought, might resonate with his identity as a "small business owner."

events.name: Send the vehicle for comprehensive maintenance and safety upgrades.
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan drove his family car to He Zhiqiang's Auto Maintenance Center in Minhang District as scheduled. Master He personally received him and, after hearing about Lei Mingxuan's plan to take his parents on a self-driving trip during the National Day holiday, conducted a preliminary inspection of the vehicle. He provided a detailed list of maintenance and upgrade recommendations: routine oil and four-filter replacement, a full vehicle fluid check, and an assessment of brake pad and tire wear. Considering the safety of long-distance driving, Master He strongly recommended replacing the two rear tires that had reached the wear limit, installing a real-time tire pressure monitoring system, and upgrading the dashcam. Lei Mingxuan found the suggestions reasonable, confirmed all the items on-site, and paid a deposit.

events.name: Vehicle Deep Maintenance and Tire Replacement
events.description: After handing the car over to Master He, the maintenance work commenced immediately. The technicians at the service center first performed routine maintenance: replacing the engine oil, oil filter, air filter, cabin air filter, and brake fluid. They then conducted a comprehensive inspection of the chassis, suspension, braking system, lights, battery, and other components. Following this, they began installing the four new tires that Lei Mingxuan had agreed to replace, carrying out meticulous dynamic balancing and four-wheel alignment to ensure precise tire installation and stable vehicle performance. The entire maintenance and upgrade process was expected to take most of the day, and Lei Mingxuan planned to return the next day to pick up the car once it was completed. This step added significant assurance for the safe travel of him and his family.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, with a sense of daily rhythm

结束状态.心情: Stable and thorough, daily affairs, skill acquisition, and long-term arrangements have all been properly handled, resulting in a sense of contentment.

state.今日运动: 3km morning run (fresh air on a rainy morning)

He persisted with his rehabilitative walk but experienced slight discomfort in his ankle, prompting him to adjust the intensity of his exercise. In the morning, he deepened his investment research. During the midday break, he was pleasantly surprised to find his stocks showing floating gains. In the evening, he and his girlfriend Lin Wei planned a cozy date at home.

events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan took a rehabilitation walk in the garden of the Zhangyang Road residential area. Due to slight discomfort in his ankle, he slowed his pace and walked for only 20 minutes, focusing on the sensation in his ankle while chatting with his father about the operation of their shop.

events.name: Deepen investment research
events.description: In the morning at the home study, based on market insights into collaborations between consumer brands and anime IPs, I researched the public financial reports of two consumer brand companies and one apparel company, with particular attention to trends in collaborations with domestic anime.

events.name: Pleasant Surprise of Unrealized Stock Gains
events.description: In the afternoon, I opened my mobile securities app and found that the technology stocks and domestic trend consumer stocks I held had surged significantly. The unrealized gains in my account exceeded 10% for the first time. Excitedly, I took a screenshot and consulted my financial advisor Xu Feng for follow-up operational advice.

events.name: Discussing weekend date plans with girlfriend

2025-08.daily_overview: On Monday morning, Lei Mingxuan felt his ankle had improved and arranged to go rollerblading along the riverside. However, after a sudden afternoon rain shower, the ground became slippery. While trying to avoid pedestrians, he accidentally fell and suffered a moderate sprain to his right ankle. After receiving urgent medical treatment, he returned home to rest, adjusted the work arrangements at his shop, and felt quite discouraged.

events.name: Skating Companions Wanted along the Riverside
events.description: In the morning, I contacted my roller-skating partner Song Jia on WeChat to arrange an afternoon activity at the roller-skating track along the Pudong Riverside. I overlooked the weather forecast's warning of afternoon showers, as I was solely focused on resuming my exercise routine.

events.name: Slipping and falling on wet road surfaces after rain
events.description: While gliding along the riverside in the afternoon, I lost balance on a slippery section while trying to avoid a pedestrian crossing the path, resulting in a severe sprain to my right ankle. Unable to stand, Song Jia stepped forward to assist me.

events.name: Emergency Medical Diagnosis
events.description: Song Jia assisted in arranging a car to the community hospital's emergency department. An X-ray ruled out a fracture, but the diagnosis was a moderate ligament sprain in the right ankle with significant swelling. The doctor recommended strict immobilization and rest for two weeks.

events.name: Adjust the store work schedule
events.description: In the evening, I reluctantly contacted the mall property manager Zheng Kai and regular customers Qian Duoduo and Feng Xiaoyu to inform them that I need to rest at home due to a foot injury. I arranged for part-time staff member Xiao Zhang to increase his working hours to handle daily operations.

events.name: Parental Concerns and Care
events.description: Upon returning home, the parents were deeply concerned. Mother Wang Xiuying applied an ice pack to reduce swelling and urged proper rest, while father Lei Jianguo assisted with household chores, highlighting the family's support.

起始状态.心情: Feeling relaxed and happy, looking forward to the outdoor activities this afternoon.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom in a home in Shanghai's Pudong district
结束状态.心情: Feeling depressed, in pain, and self-reproachful, frustrated by the recurrence of injury, and anxious about the future.

We contacted agencies such as Lianjia and Centaline for initial discussions on entrusting them with the listing.

events.name: Reflection on Exercise Safety and Fitness Programs
events.description: During the afternoon rest period, I reflected on the roller skating accident and realized the risks of being overly aggressive. I decided to focus on venue and equipment safety after recovery, integrating fitness with scientific rehabilitation methods. I recorded these thoughts in my phone's memo.

events.name: Initiate a discussion on a self-driving trip to Western Sichuan in a friends' group chat.

2025-08.daily_overview: The heavy rain on Friday caused severe water leakage in the old family house, prompting Lei Mingxuan and his father to carry out emergency repairs. This incident led the family to formally decide to replace the house with an elevator-equipped one during a family meeting. In the evening, a surprise birthday party for the mother was successfully held, moving her to tears and bringing the family's cohesion to its peak.

events.name: Severe water leakage was discovered in the old house.
events.description: In the evening, I heard the sound of dripping water from my study. Using a cane to investigate, I discovered extensive water stains on the bedroom ceiling, peeling wall paint, and water accumulation on the floor. Upon checking other rooms, I found that the top-floor leakage had worsened due to the heavy rain.

events.name: Emergency Rescue with Father
events.description: Immediately call Father Lei Jianguo to rush back in the rain, work together to catch rainwater with basins and buckets, and clean up the accumulated water with rags and mops to prevent further damage. The heavy rain makes it temporarily impossible to inspect the roof.

events.name: Hold a family meeting to establish a home replacement plan.
events.description: After dinner, the family reached a consensus to officially launch the plan to replace their current home with an elevator-equipped apartment. To raise the down payment, they prioritized selling the idle property in Minhang District. Lei Mingxuan will be responsible for subsequent in-depth communication with real estate agents and arranging property viewings.

events.name: Mother Wang Xiuying's Surprise Birthday Banquet
events.description: The birthday surprise party planned with my father, cousin Shen Jie, and girlfriend Lin Wei was held at the scheduled restaurant in the evening. My mother was tricked into the private room, where she was greeted with blessings from relatives and friends. Lei Mingxuan presented her with a cashmere scarf and a family electronic photo album, delivering a speech of gratitude.

起始状态.心情: Feeling somewhat dull due to the heavy rain and staying at home.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom in a home in Shanghai's Pudong
结束状态.心情: Complex yet resolute, the pressure of a family crisis intertwines with the warmth of a birthday celebration, clearly defining the shared goal of changing homes.

2025-08.daily_overview: On the last day of August, Lei Mingxuan cautiously resumed roller skating to experience a long-lost sense of freedom, noting an improvement in the stability of his legs. In the evening, he reflected quietly in his study, reviewing the eventful month of August—from an unexpected injury and family crisis to scientific rehabilitation and the establishment of shared goals—feeling deeply moved and motivated to look ahead.

events.name: First cautious return to roller skating after injury
events.description: In the afternoon, after the ankle was essentially pain-free, I wore a full set of protective gear and went to the Riverside Roller Skating Track. I skated in a straight line at a very slow and steady pace for 20 minutes, focusing on body balance and ankle sensations, without pursuing speed or technique, and took active breaks.

events.name: Upper Limb Strength Training and Core Training
events.description: In the morning, I used resistance bands and small dumbbells at home to perform shoulder, arm, back, and abdominal muscle training for 30 minutes to maintain muscle vitality, strictly following the rehabilitation therapist's guidance to avoid putting pressure on the ankle.

events.name: Ankle Rehabilitation Training
events.description: Perform ankle proprioception training such as single-leg standing and flexibility exercises like ankle pumps twice daily, once in the morning and once in the evening, to promote recovery and prevent re-injury.

events.name: A Quiet Moment for Reflection and Looking Ahead
events.description: Brewing tea in the study at night to reflect on August: setbacks from a sprain, the warmth of a girlfriend's care, a water leakage crisis, the touching moments of a birthday celebration, the establishment of a goal to change apartments, initial success in investments, a shift toward scientific recovery, writing future reflections in a diary, cherishing emotional connections, and steadily advancing plans.

As an entrepreneur, Lei Mingxuan seized the intervals during shop operations and the time after closing to simultaneously advance interest-based learning, social activities, and important family asset planning. Today, the ankle issue transitioned from injury management to a new phase of rehabilitation, coffee learning officially set sail, and multiple plans progressed in parallel, creating a life rhythm that is both compact and filled with a sense of control.

events.name: Hospital Ankle Follow-up Appointment
events.description: Lei Mingxuan went to the hospital in the morning for a follow-up examination of his ankle injury. After a careful check-up, the doctor confirmed that the ligaments were healing well and the swelling had largely subsided. The doctor officially informed him that he could begin gentle rehabilitative activities, such as active range-of-motion exercises for the ankle in all directions, and gradually resume daily walking and light household chores. However, he must strictly avoid strenuous activities such as running and jumping for at least three to four more weeks. Upon hearing this news, Lei Mingxuan breathed a sigh of relief, feeling that he was one step closer to returning to the sports field.

events.name: Start SCA Barista Foundation Course
events.description: After closing the shop for the evening, Lei Mingxuan returned to his home study. With the excitement of exploring a new field, he logged into the SCA Barista online learning platform for the first time. He officially began the first module of the beginner-level course. The content covered the origin and spread of coffee, as well as the core differences between the two main coffee bean varieties, Arabica and Robusta, including their preferred growing environments, bean characteristics, and typical flavor profiles. He attentively watched the instructional videos and completed the online multiple-choice test at the end of the chapter, achieving a good score. This process satisfied his curiosity as an ESTP for new knowledge and fulfilled his need for theoretical preparation before hands-on learning.

events.name: Accept the invitation to serve as a referee for the billiards tournament.
events.description: While glancing at his phone in the shop that afternoon, Lei Mingxuan received a WeChat invitation from the organizer of the local pool club he frequented, asking if he would be willing to serve as a temporary referee for a small 8-ball invitational tournament the following week. He readily agreed, seeing it as an opportunity to support the hobbyist community and participate in the competition from a different perspective. He then briefly communicated with the organizer to confirm the specific time, venue, and format of the tournament, with a particular focus on discussing several contentious details in American 8-ball rules, such as the right to continue shooting after potting a ball on the break and the handling of stalemate situations. Afterward, he retrieved a previously saved rules document from his phone to review.

events.name: Received the monthly wealth management report and scheduled a communication.
events.description: Financial advisor Xu Feng sent the August investment market analysis report and a summary of the performance of his personally held funds to Lei Mingxuan via WeChat. The report indicated that the overall market experienced fluctuations, with his technology-themed funds showing significant volatility. In the message, Xu Feng suggested arranging an online meeting in the near future to review the account allocation based on the latest market conditions and personal goals. Lei Mingxuan replied to acknowledge receipt and planned to take time in the next couple of days to carefully review the report.

events.name: Family Meeting Discusses Plans for Home Replacement
events.description: After dinner, Lei Mingxuan sat down with his parents, Lei Jianguo and Wang Xiuying, in the living room for a formal and in-depth discussion on the important matter of purchasing an elevator-equipped apartment to improve their living conditions. He presented a pre-prepared summary of the family's financial situation, analyzing their existing three properties (one for self-occupancy and two for rent), family savings, as well as the income streams of himself and his parents. They preliminarily agreed on the total budget for the purchase, the ideal location (still prioritizing Pudong for the convenience of managing the shop and maintaining the parents' social circle), and possible loan options. Father Lei Jianguo placed greater emphasis on the quality of the property and the community environment, while mother Wang Xiuying was more concerned with the convenience of daily life and future neighborhood relations. This meeting marked the entry of the family's asset optimization plan into the substantive decision-making phase.

events.name: Daily Store Operations and Customer Service
events.description: As the shop owner, Lei Mingxuan spent the entire day handling routine tasks at the store: he inspected the newly arrived autumn clothing stock, adjusted some of the displays, attended to several regular customers such as Qian Duoduo, and discussed this week’s sales priorities with the staff. During the relatively quiet midday period, he took the opportunity to browse through several real estate apps on his phone.

events.name: Ankle Rehabilitation Exercise Adjustment
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan performed active range of motion exercises for his ankle but felt somewhat fatigued, reducing the exercise time to only five minutes. This reflects the fluctuations during his recovery period.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom, No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Calm yet expectant, thinking about today's follow-up hospital appointment, hoping to hear good news.

结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled and slightly excited, ankle rehabilitation has entered a new stage, coffee learning has started smoothly, and major family matters have also taken a preliminary direction.

state.今日运动: Only performed 5 minutes of mild ankle range-of-motion exercises as advised by the doctor.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with a brief shower in the evening.

2025-09.daily_overview: Tuesday focused on the execution of personal health management and long-term family planning. Lei Mingxuan attempted to incorporate fitness into his midday work breaks and began conducting practical research and communication for two major family plans: upgrading the car and purchasing a new home. By efficiently utilizing fragmented time to handle multiple tasks, he demonstrated his proactive approach as an entrepreneur and his commitment to actively planning for a better quality of life.

events.name: Noon Gym Self-Training
events.description: Taking advantage of the relatively low customer flow in the shop during the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan arranged for staff to mind the store in advance and went to his regular gym to complete his third independent strength training session of the week. He attempted to shift his training time from the evening to the daytime, finding that he felt more energetic and focused during daylight hours. For this session, based on the plan provided by his coach, he added two sets of planks and Russian twists according to his own feelings, beginning to enjoy the sense of independently controlling his training pace. After the workout, he took a refreshing shower and returned to the shop feeling invigorated.

events.name: Schedule a communication time with the financial advisor.
events.description: After reviewing the monthly report sent by Xu Feng, Lei Mingxuan was somewhat concerned about the drawdown of one of the technology funds. In the afternoon at the store office, he contacted Xu Feng via WeChat, and the two agreed to have a brief video call the following evening to discuss in detail the current market views and possible account adjustment plans.

events.name: Initiate a family car replacement research
events.description: After officially putting the car replacement plan on the agenda, Lei Mingxuan first outlined the family's main requirements for the new car: sufficient space (considering future possibilities), low usage costs, suitability for commuting in Shanghai's urban areas, and occasional short-distance self-driving trips. His first thought was to consult a professional—He Zhiqiang, the owner of a familiar auto repair shop. He called Master He to inquire in detail about the daily maintenance costs, battery lifespan, common issues, and long-term reliability of current mainstream new energy vehicles (particularly pure electric and extended-range models from brands like Tesla and NIO). Based on his repair experience, Master He offered candid advice, suggesting that if home charging is convenient, the daily expenses of a pure electric model are indeed very low.

events.name: Assist in Preparing for a Self-Driving Tour in Western Sichuan
events.description: Zhao Min, a childhood friend, shared in the "Western Sichuan Operation Team" WeChat group the details of the comprehensive self-drive travel insurance she had purchased for the three of them after comparing several insurance companies. The policy included key clauses covering altitude sickness, accidental injuries, and vehicle rescue. At the same time, she compiled an extremely detailed list of supplies to prepare, ranging from personal clothing, toiletries, and high-altitude medication (such as Rhodiola rosea, cold medicine, and gastrointestinal medicine) to portable oxygen tanks, photography equipment, power banks, snacks, and more. Lei Mingxuan carefully reviewed the list and replied, "The preparations are incredibly thorough! I'll use it to check for any gaps and make up for what's missing." He then began considering what additional equipment he might need to bring.

events.name: Online preliminary screening of housing listings
events.description: At home in the evening, Lei Mingxuan conducted a broad preliminary screening on real estate apps such as Lianjia and Beike, based on the budget, location (near the inner ring of Pudong), and layout (three-bedroom) determined during the previous night's family meeting. He bookmarked over a dozen properties that appeared to meet the criteria and shared the links in the family WeChat group, along with brief analyses of their pros and cons. He invited his parents to preview the listings online and discuss which ones were worth including in the weekend's in-person viewing list. His mother, Wang Xiuying, quickly replied, expressing interest in one residential complex located near a food market.

events.name: Handle daily communication with suppliers for the store
events.description: During the day at the store, Lei Mingxuan made a phone call to Zhou Tao, a fabric supplier in Hangzhou, to confirm the arrival time of a batch of autumn clothing fabrics. At the same time, he also communicated with Wu Fang, an accessories supplier in Guangzhou, via WeChat regarding the selection of the next batch of trendy small items.

events.name: Temporarily working overtime to handle store accounting
events.description: Due to a busy schedule during the day, Lei Mingxuan stayed an extra hour at the shop in the evening to handle the backlog of accounting tasks, which led to him staying up late.

起始状态.心情: Feeling energetic, thinking about trying a daytime workout today.

结束状态.心情: Feeling efficient yet slightly fatigued, having completed the workout, several major tasks have made progress, but overtime work has increased the burden.

state.今日运动: Approximately 60 minutes of gym strength training (upper body, core)

2025-09.daily_overview: Wednesday night was dedicated to deep learning and financial planning, though staying up late for investment research. Lei Mingxuan further explored the world's terroir in the ocean of coffee knowledge, while decisively making proactive adjustments to his investment portfolio based on professional advice. From theory to practice, from personal interests to family assets, he demonstrated his pragmatic and eager-to-learn side, though the late night brought fatigue.

events.name: Deepen the understanding of coffee processing methods and origin knowledge
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan continued his SCA barista course studies. The content of the second module opened his eyes: how common coffee bean processing methods (such as natural, washed, honey, etc.) profoundly influence the final flavor in the cup—the vibrant fruity acidity and fermentation notes of natural process, and the clarity and cleanliness of washed process. Next, he learned about the "terroir" map of the world's major coffee-producing regions, from the citrus and jasmine floral notes of Yirgacheffe in Ethiopia, to the nutty and chocolatey tones of Santos in Brazil, and the balanced, mild profile of Colombia. As he studied, he took detailed electronic notes on his computer and imagined how these flavor descriptions would feel on his palate.

events.name: Reviewing Investment Accounts and Formulating Adjustment Strategies
events.description: Before the video call with Xu Feng, Lei Mingxian first logged into the fund investment app to carefully review the net value trends, profit and loss status, and asset allocation of each fund in August. Combining the market insights from Xu Feng’s report and his own recent focus on financial news, he formulated a preliminary adjustment plan: given the increased volatility in the technology sector recently, he considered redeeming some funds from high-volatility technology-themed funds and reallocating them to relatively stable mixed funds focusing on consumer and healthcare sectors, in order to balance the overall portfolio risk.

events.name: Communicate with the financial advisor via video and execute adjustments.
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan had a video call with Xu Feng. He first shared his observations and adjustment ideas. Xu Feng professionally analyzed the current market environment, acknowledged Lei Mingxuan’s considerations for balancing risks, and provided more precise suggestions on which specific fund to switch to and the conversion ratio. Under Xu Feng’s guidance, Lei Mingxuan immediately operated on the app, redeeming a portion of the technology fund and using the proceeds to subscribe to a previously favored consumer healthcare hybrid fund. The entire process was efficient and rational, reflecting Lei Mingxuan’s growing ability to make independent decisions in investment.

events.name: Ankle Rehabilitation Exercises
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan followed the doctor's instructions and performed ten minutes of active ankle range of motion exercises while sitting on the bed, including ankle circles and dorsiflexion-plantarflexion movements, feeling that the joint flexibility was steadily improving.

events.name: Store Operations and Golfer Communication
events.description: During the day at the shop, Lei Mingxuan handled the daily accounts and contacted his billiards friend Han Dong via WeChat to arrange a time to play over the weekend. He also took the time to reply to regular customer Feng Xiaoyu's inquiry about the newly arrived autumn clothing.

events.name: Staying up late to study the investment market.
events.description: Curious about the market trend after the investment adjustment, Lei Mingxuan spent extra time researching financial news and forum discussions online, staying up until late at night and resulting in insufficient sleep.

起始状态.心情: Calm, thinking about discussing investment matters with Xu Feng tonight.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied and clear-minded, yet fatigued; having acquired new knowledge and proactively adjusted financially, feeling an increased sense of control over life, though staying up late has affected energy levels.

state.今日运动: 10-Minute Ankle Rehabilitation Exercises

2025-09.daily_overview: Thursday evening was dedicated to pre-trip preparations and financial wrap-ups, but fatigue set in today due to staying up late the night before. Preparations were made for the weekend's short trip and rollerblading equipment maintenance, while follow-up actions for investment adjustments were completed. Life and hobbies, financial management and leisure coexist seamlessly under Lei Mingxuan's arrangements, reflecting his active and organized lifestyle, though his health condition fluctuates.

events.name: Preparing for Roller Skating Equipment Maintenance
events.description: Thinking about his weekend plan to maintain his roller skates, Lei Mingxuan searched online in his home study in the evening for professional tutorials on cleaning and lubricating roller skate bearings. Following the tutorial, he checked his toolkit to confirm that he had specialized bearing cleaner, lubricant, and disassembly tools. He then retrieved his roller skates, which had been unused for some time, along with spare bearings from the storage room, and placed them together with the tools in a prominent spot in the living room. This prepared the materials for the maintenance work scheduled for Saturday afternoon, and he mentally calculated that he would be able to resume skating once the maintenance was complete.

events.name: Finalizing the weekend itinerary for Moganshan with my girlfriend.
events.description: Lei Mingxuan discussed the weekend self-driving trip to Moganshan in detail with his girlfriend Lin Wei via WeChat. They finalized the departure time, driving route, and booked a room at a highly-rated mountain homestay. They also discussed the items each needed to bring, with Lin Wei reminding him to pack a light jacket as the evenings in the mountains are cool. Lei Mingxuan took responsibility for checking the car's condition and filling up the gas tank. The relaxed conversation was filled with anticipation for a brief escape from the city and enjoyment of nature.

events.name: Execute fund portfolio adjustments
events.description: According to the plan finalized with Xu Feng last night, Lei Mingxuan took some time during the day to complete the final operation of fund conversion on the investment app, and the funds were officially transferred. With the adjustment of the portfolio allocation now in place, he felt that the risk exposure of his investment portfolio had been reduced.

events.name: Set up a new fund fixed investment plan
events.description: After adjusting his portfolio, Lei Mingxuan proceeded to modify his existing regular investment plan within the app. He set a fixed deduction date and amount for the end of each month and enabled the deduction reminder function. This action signifies his decision to adopt a "disciplined investment" strategy, leveraging market fluctuations to continuously accumulate shares at relatively low levels rather than making a one-time investment.

events.name: Organize investment notes and plan the next review
events.description: After completing all operations, Lei Mingxuan compiled his adjustment logic, specific operation records, and some key suggestions from Xu Feng into a dedicated electronic notebook. He also added a to-do item at the end of the note stating "Conduct the next round of review in early October," cultivating a habit of regular investment reflection.

events.name: Store Evening Inventory
events.description: After closing the shop, Lei Mingxuan and the staff conducted a brief mid-week inventory check, verifying the stock of several best-selling autumn clothing items to prepare for the weekend sales peak.

events.name: Skipped ankle rehabilitation exercises due to fatigue.
events.description: Due to staying up late the night before, Lei Mingxuan felt low on energy and made a last-minute decision to skip tonight's ankle rehabilitation exercises, opting instead to go to bed early for recovery.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed but slightly tired, thinking that tomorrow is Friday and there are plans for the weekend.

结束状态.心情: Anticipating and organized, yet physically exhausted, with travel and maintenance matters all arranged, and financial affairs concluded.

state.今日运动: No exercise, resting due to fatigue.

2025-09.daily_overview: Friday is a day for gathering information, strengthening social connections, and advancing multiple plans, though staying up late is often due to social activities. From immersing himself in historical novels to sharing social topics at the gym, from concrete planning spurred by investment gains to strategic thinking about his store’s business, and further to taking practical steps toward a family home upgrade, Lei Mingxuan seamlessly transitions between different roles. His life is rich and filled with upward momentum.

events.name: Immersive Historical Fiction Reading
events.description: Before going to sleep, Lei Mingxuan leaned against the headboard and continued reading the historical novel set in the Ming Dynasty. The story progressed to a decisive defensive battle, where a supporting general he quite admired, in order to buy time for the protagonist to break through the encirclement, resolutely led his troops to cover the retreat and ultimately sacrificed himself heroically. This tragic and mission-driven ending left Lei Mingxuan in a state of prolonged unease. Even after closing the book, he kept reflecting on the personal choices and patriotic sentiments of individuals in turbulent times, which formed an interesting contrast with the free-spirited sense of adventure he admired.

events.name: Share fitness insights with fellow players
events.description: While playing billiards with his regular partner Han Dong at their usual pool hall in the evening, Lei Mingxuan mentioned his recent commitment to consistent strength training. Han Dong expressed admiration for his perseverance and shared his own experience of hitting a plateau in fitness and how he adjusted his diet accordingly. As they exchanged skills on the table, they also discussed their fitness journeys, eventually agreeing to visit the gym together next time to supervise each other’s leg workouts. This conversation made Lei Mingxuan realize that fitness no longer had to be a solitary pursuit—it could be integrated into his social circle and even become a new shared topic of interest.

events.name: Communicating Training Progress with Basketball Teammates
events.description: During an earlier routine gathering with his basketball friend Xie Fei (where the three of them played basketball), Lei Mingxuan also proactively shared his experiences from nearly a month of starting strength training. He mentioned the challenges encountered during training (such as difficulty in feeling the activation of certain movements), positive changes in his body (feeling a more stable core), and how he adjusted his mindset to cope with muscle soreness. As a fitness enthusiast, Xie Fei offered him further encouragement and some practical advice, such as post-workout stretching and protein supplementation.

events.name: Floating Gains in Stocks Lead to Specific Planning
events.description: Thanks to the earlier market positioning, Lei Mingxuan's stock account once saw floating profits approaching 20%. During a break from playing basketball in the evening, he excitedly shared the good news with his fellow player Han Dong and Qin Lang, a friend from Hangzhou who happened to be in Shanghai. He did not stop at mere excitement but began to plan concretely how to use this potential gain: part of it would be allocated to upgrading purchases for the store's autumn and winter collections, introducing higher-quality fabrics; another portion would be set aside separately as a dedicated fund for a self-driving trip to western Sichuan next year, making the travel plan more financially stress-free.

events.name: Analyze the data of the pop-up store in Hangzhou and plan new products.
events.description: In the afternoon at the store office, Lei Mingxuan compiled the sales data for the first month of the Hangzhou pop-up store's opening. He focused on analyzing the sales performance and customer feedback of clothing featuring elements of Western Sichuan travel and outdoor themes, finding that the market response was very positive. Based on this, he drafted a preliminary proposal for a collaborative autumn hoodie collection, including initial design directions (blending urban functionality with natural patterns), estimated cost calculations, and target customer positioning, in preparation for an in-depth discussion with supplier Zhou Tao next week.

events.name: Initiate the on-site property viewing process
events.description: During the lunch break, Lei Mingxuan contacted two well-reviewed real estate agents through an online platform and had a preliminary phone conversation about his family's housing needs and budget. Based on his requirements, the agents quickly screened and recommended the first batch of residential properties that met the criteria. After discussing with his parents, Lei Mingxuan scheduled a concentrated on-site viewing for the weekend.

events.name: Ankle Rehabilitation and Light Activities
events.description: Today, I continued with my ankle rehabilitation exercises and attempted to stand on one foot indoors without wearing roller skates to test my balance. It felt much steadier compared to the previous days.

events.name: Returned late from a gathering with friends.
events.description: After playing basketball, Lei Mingxuan went to a barbecue restaurant for a late-night snack with Han Dong, Qin Lang, and others. They chatted until very late, which led to them staying up late.

起始状态.心情: Relax, Friday mornings are always filled with anticipation for the weekend.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilled and slightly excited, with pleasant social interactions and substantial progress on multiple plans. There is eager anticipation for the weekend, though staying up late has had a slight impact.

state.今日运动: 15 minutes of ankle rehabilitation and balance exercises, billiards activity

2025-09.daily_overview: The entire Saturday was immersed in the nature of Mogan Mountain and the intimate world shared by the couple. This was Lei Mingxuan and his girlfriend Lin Wei’s first overnight short trip. From the relaxed conversations during the self-drive journey to the leisurely mountain hike, and then to the deep conversations during their stay at the homestay, the entire experience flowed naturally and smoothly, greatly enhancing their mutual understanding and intimacy. However, slightly excessive food intake led to a slight weight gain.

events.name: Self-driving to Moganshan
events.description: On Saturday morning, Lei Mingxuan drove to Lin Wei's residence to pick her up, and the two set off from Shanghai to Moganshan. Throughout the journey, Lin Wei was responsible for navigation and selecting a playlist of lighthearted and cheerful music, while Lei Mingxuan focused on driving. The urban scenery outside the car window gradually gave way to the greenery of the countryside. Inside the car, the two chatted about amusing work anecdotes, mutual friends, and their anticipation for the trip. The atmosphere was relaxed and pleasant, as the drive itself was part of the enjoyment of the journey.

events.name: Stay in a Mountain View Homestay
events.description: We arrived smoothly at the pre-booked homestay in Mogan Mountain in the afternoon. The homestay is situated on the edge of a vast bamboo forest, offering a tranquil environment. After checking in, the two of them took a short rest in the room. Upon opening the balcony door, they were greeted by a lush mountain view and the layered peaks in the distance, instantly feeling detached from the hustle and bustle of the city.

events.name: Light Mountain Hiking and Farmhouse Dinner
events.description: As evening approached, the sunlight grew soft, and the two took a leisurely hike along the bamboo forest trail near the homestay. Breathing in the fresh, ion-rich air and listening to the birdsong and the sound of the stream, they felt exceptionally relaxed. After the hike, they enjoyed dinner at a highly-rated local farmhouse restaurant. Dishes such as braised pork with dried bamboo shoots and free-range chicken soup earned high praise even from Lei Mingxuan, a devoted fan of local cuisine, who ended up eating a bit more than intended.

events.name: Night Talks at the Homestay
events.description: After dinner, they returned to the guesthouse and chose not to go out. Instead, they brewed tea on the room's balcony, chatting amidst the mountain breeze and under the starry sky. It was their first time spending the night together away from home. In a state of complete relaxation and detachment from their daily routines, their conversation delved deeper than usual, ranging from future travel plans to perspectives on life. In this natural atmosphere, their relationship quietly grew closer.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to preparing for a short trip.

结束状态.心情: Relaxed and joyful, immersed in the warmth of nature and the intimate world of two, feeling a closer bond, though the slightly excessive dining brings a mild sense of burden.

state.今日运动: Approximately 1 hour of hiking in the mountains

2025-09.daily_overview: Sunday is a day for returning and resuming the routine, though staying up late was necessary to handle some tasks. After enjoying the morning light at the mountain retreat, I returned to Shanghai in the morning. In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan immediately immersed himself in maintaining his personal hobby—meticulously caring for his rollerblading equipment and purchasing new parts for it. In the evening, he and his girlfriend conducted an on-site inspection for a major household purchase (car shopping). The night was spent continuing preparations for the upcoming trip to Western Sichuan and discussing plans for a home upgrade, seamlessly shifting the pace from a leisurely mode back to an efficient planning mode.

events.name: Morning Stroll and Return Journey at Mogan Mountain
events.description: Waking naturally to the birdsong in the morning, the two took a leisurely walk near the homestay, breathing in the freshest air, and then enjoyed a simple, healthy breakfast on the homestay's terrace. After breakfast, they packed their luggage, checked out, and drove back to Shanghai. On the return journey, Lin Wei once again served as the "DJ," as the two reminisced about yesterday's hiking and dinner, discussing future trips to Anji or Qiandao Lake. The journey concluded with pleasant plans for the future.

events.name: Carefully Maintain Roller Skating Equipment
events.description: Returning to his home in Shanghai in the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan immediately began the long-planned maintenance of his rollerblading gear. He set up a small table on the balcony and, while playing his collection of jazz vinyl records, transformed into an "equipment technician." Using specialized tools, he skillfully disassembled the wheels, removed the bearings, and soaked them in cleaning solution. After carefully brushing and drying them, he applied specialized high-speed lubricating oil. Next, he wiped down the inside and outside of the rollerblades with a damp cloth and a dedicated cleaner to remove sweat stains and dust. Throughout the process, he remained focused and enjoyed every moment, reflecting his serious attitude toward his hobby and his emphasis on sports safety.

events.name: Check equipment and order new wheels
events.description: During the cleaning and maintenance process, Lei Mingxuan carefully inspected the wear on the eight wheels and found that one wheel on the right front foot had experienced significant uneven wear due to his habitual force application, which had already affected its grip and smoothness during gliding. He immediately placed an order through his phone at a familiar roller skating equipment online store, purchasing a set of new wheels of the same model as backup replacement parts.

events.name: Looking for roller skating partners to resume practice
events.description: After completing all the maintenance work, Lei Mingxuan felt deeply satisfied as he looked at his freshly restored roller skates. He promptly contacted his skating partner, Song Jia, via WeChat, sending several photos of the skates after maintenance and proposing, "The gear is fully serviced! How about we go for a few recovery laps on the Riverside Skating Path next week on a weekday evening? Let's test the maintenance results." Song Jia quickly replied, agreeing to the suggestion.

events.name: On-site inspection of new energy vehicles with my girlfriend.
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan and Lin Wei visited the offline experience stores of Tesla and NIO. They thoroughly examined the actual interior space, material quality, driving range, and intelligent driving assistance configurations of the Model Y and ES6. They also inquired in detail with the sales staff about Shanghai's latest new energy vehicle subsidy policies, license plate application procedures, and charging pile installation matters. Both were particularly impressed by the spacious interior and material quality of the ES6 and scheduled a follow-up test drive on-site.

events.name: Procurement of Supplementary Travel Equipment for Western Sichuan
events.description: According to Zhao Min's supply list, Lei Mingxuan went to Decathlon in the evening to purchase additional trekking poles and a headlamp. He then bought Plateau Comfort (Gao Yuan An), portable oxygen cylinders, and some common medicines at the pharmacy. After returning home, he checked his DSLR camera and action camera to ensure the batteries were fully charged and the memory cards had sufficient space.

events.name: Family Dinner and House Viewing Review
events.description: At home in the evening, the family of three discussed the two properties the parents had viewed during the day while having dinner. Lei Mingxuan used a tablet to show other alternative property listings newly sent by the real estate agent. After experiencing the properties firsthand, the parents had more specific thoughts: Father Lei Jianguo placed greater emphasis on the tranquility of the neighborhood and the quality of construction, while mother Wang Xiuying was concerned about future elevator maintenance in high-rise residential buildings. Both agreed that the search should focus more on areas with better greenery and more mature communities, such as Century Park and Huamu.

events.name: Handle Urgent Store Orders
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan received a call from a supplier regarding a batch of goods that required urgent handling. He stayed up late replying to emails, which caused him to sleep late.

起始状态.心情: Lazy and content, enjoying the morning light in the mountain dwelling.

结束状态.心情: Full and organized, yet fatigued; the aftertaste of travel lingers; hobby gear has been refreshed; several major matters are steadily progressing forward. Life feels on track, but staying up late has increased the pressure.

state.今日运动: Take a morning walk for about 30 minutes.

2025-09.daily_overview: The start of the new week focused on work review and professionalizing health management, though ankle discomfort necessitated a temporary adjustment. Lei Mingxuan systematically reviewed the first month of operations at the Hangzhou pop-up store, establishing standardized processes for cross-regional business. Simultaneously, he sought professional guidance for ankle rehabilitation and developed a scientific recovery plan. In the evening, he continued to deepen his theoretical knowledge of coffee, progressing from an enthusiast to a quasi-professional.

events.name: Compile the post-event review materials for the Hangzhou pop-up store.
events.description: On Monday morning, Lei Mingxuan concentrated on organizing various operational data from the first month (August) of the opening of the Hangzhou pop-up store in his clothing store office. He compiled sales reports, customer feedback records, and cost breakdowns. Based on this data, he conducted a preliminary analysis of the sales trends of best-selling items (especially clothing featuring elements of Western Sichuan travel), customer profile characteristics, and key operational indicators such as logistics and labor costs. This preparation provided solid discussion materials for the online review meeting scheduled for the afternoon.

events.name: Conduct an in-depth operational review meeting with the Hangzhou store manager.
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan conducted an in-depth review lasting one and a half hours with the manager of the Hangzhou pop-up store via video conferencing software. Both parties analyzed the underlying reasons behind the August sales data item by item, discussed issues frequently raised by customers (such as suggestions regarding the sizing of a particular sweatshirt), jointly identified areas for improvement in inventory turnover efficiency and staffing arrangements during peak hours, and also acknowledged the successes in product selection direction and visual merchandising.

events.name: Go to a sports rehabilitation clinic for an assessment.
events.description: During a break between meetings, Lei Mingxuan visited a professional sports rehabilitation clinic in Pudong. The rehabilitation therapist conducted a comprehensive assessment of his ankle, including joint range of motion, muscle strength, and stability. The evaluation results indicated good recovery progress, but as he was experiencing some discomfort in his ankle that day, the therapist recommended adjusting the training intensity to avoid overexertion. Subsequently, the therapist and Lei Mingxuan jointly developed a detailed rehabilitation plan, which included restorative activities (such as slow walking), targeted ankle stability exercises (such as balance pad training), and a progressive timeline for returning to sports, along with clear guidelines on training frequency and intensity precautions.

events.name: Sharing Travel Experiences with My Girlfriend
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan sorted out some beautiful photos taken during the weekend trip to Moganshan and shared them with Lin Wei via WeChat. The two exchanged their travel experiences on WeChat, both agreeing that this short trip was very enjoyable. It helped them develop a better travel rapport and allowed their relationship to grow more stable and natural in a relaxed environment.

events.name: Deepen the study of coffee roasting and flavor theory
events.description: In the study at home in the evening, Lei Mingxuan continued his SCA course studies. This session delved into more fundamental areas: the basic principles of coffee roasting. He learned how the degree of roasting (light, medium, dark) profoundly alters the acidity, body, and flavor profile of coffee beans. He focused on studying the SCA Flavor Wheel, learning to identify and describe the complex floral, fruity, nutty, chocolate, and even spicy notes in coffee like a professional. He also attempted to use these terms to describe the pour-over coffee he had enjoyed that morning.

events.name: Learn the theory of hand-brewed coffee.
events.description: After completing the baking module, Lei Mingxuan proceeded to study the theory of pour-over coffee. The content covered key variables affecting extraction: the grind size of the coffee grounds, water temperature, coffee-to-water ratio, and how different pouring techniques (such as single-pour and three-stage pouring) influence the uniformity of extraction and flavor profile. He watched demonstration videos of various pour-over equipment (such as V60 and Chemex), sketched diagrams of water pouring paths in his notebook, and completed related theoretical exercises, eagerly anticipating the hands-on practice to follow.

events.name: Reduced exercise due to ankle discomfort.
events.description: Based on the rehabilitation specialist's recommendation, Lei Mingxuan only performed mild ankle exercises today and skipped the regular training session.

起始状态.心情: Focused, but concerned about ankle discomfort.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and rewarding, with clear work review, scientifically adjusted recovery, further progress in coffee knowledge, yet slight anxiety due to ankle discomfort.

state.今日运动: Performed 10 minutes of mild ankle range of motion exercises under the guidance of a rehabilitation therapist.
