2025-09.daily_overview: Tuesday is the day for decision implementation and execution, but an early bedtime was necessary due to fatigue. Based on the previous day's review, Lei Mingxuan and the team finalized the specific optimization strategies for the Hangzhou store in September and documented them in meeting minutes, making work management more systematic. Meanwhile, ankle rehabilitation training officially began at home, and preparations for the Western Sichuan trip entered the final pre-departure check phase, with various plans transitioning from discussion to solid execution.

events.name: Formulate the Optimization Strategy for the Hangzhou Store in September
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan continued the online meeting with the Hangzhou store manager. Based on the conclusions from the previous day's review, they jointly formulated a specific optimization action plan for September. Key decisions included: finalizing the launch of a limited-edition co-branded sweatshirt themed "Autumn Stroll" in late September; optimizing inventory management methods by establishing a safety stock warning mechanism; adjusting the dynamic scheduling system to accommodate weekend peak customer flow; and formally establishing a standard process for conducting data reviews and strategy adjustments at the beginning of each month going forward.

events.name: Send the meeting minutes and synchronize tasks
events.description: After the meeting, Lei Mingxuan promptly compiled the discussion points, decisions made, and specific tasks assigned to each party (e.g., the store manager being responsible for communication on co-branded design, and Lei Mingxuan for supply chain coordination) into a clear meeting summary. He distributed the summary via email and internal communication tools to the manager of the Hangzhou pop-up store and relevant personnel, ensuring information synchronization and laying the groundwork for subsequent execution.

events.name: First Ankle Rehabilitation Exercise at Home
events.description: Upon returning home in the evening, Lei Mingxuan followed his rehabilitation plan and performed his first formal restorative training on the living room carpet. The exercises primarily focused on non-weight-bearing range-of-motion activities for the ankle: slowly drawing circles with the toes, dorsiflexion and plantarflexion, and lateral movements. Following this, he used a resistance band recommended by his physical therapist to perform mild plantarflexion and dorsiflexion resistance training. Throughout the entire process, he carried out the exercises with great diligence, aiming to activate the muscles around the ankle that had become slightly weak due to prolonged inactivity, improve joint flexibility, and prepare for more complex training sessions in the future.

events.name: Final Check Before Traveling to Western Sichuan
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan initiated a final pre-departure check in the "Western Sichuan Operation Team" WeChat group. He tagged Zhang Wei and Zhao Min to confirm everyone's flight information (they were flying to Chengdu), car rental order number, hotel reservation details, and insurance policy number. He specifically reminded Zhang Wei, the primary driver, to check their family vehicle in advance for the trip to the airport the next day, and shared the specific location of the car rental pick-up point near Chengdu Airport along with important notes in the group. The three of them encouraged each other in the chat, with emojis flying around, all filled with anticipation for the upcoming adventure.

events.name: Handle daily store operations and serve regular customers.
events.description: During the day at the store, Lei Mingxuan received regular customer Qian Duoduo and his cousin Shen Jie, who came to browse. Shen Jie provided professional styling suggestions for several newly arrived jackets in the store, while Qian Duoduo purchased a trendy fisherman's hat. Lei Mingxuan also briefly exchanged words with Zheng Kai, the mall property manager, about the upcoming autumn-themed event at the mall.

events.name: Going to bed early due to fatigue
events.description: Having been busy for several consecutive days, Lei Mingxuan felt a lack of energy and decided to go to bed early tonight to recover.

起始状态.心情: The goal is clear, but the body is weary.

结束状态.心情: Steady and full of anticipation, work tasks have been settled, rehabilitation training has commenced, and tomorrow I will set off for the long-awaited Western Sichuan. An early night brings relaxation.

state.今日运动: Ankle Rehabilitation Training (Range of Motion + Resistance Band) Approximately 20 Minutes

2025-09.daily_overview: Wednesday marked "upgrades" and "launches" across multiple fronts: fitness autonomy gained coach approval, entering a new phase; ankle injury was declared fully recovered, with stability training scientifically resumed; the family health care plan was initiated; and substantial communication began with suppliers for the store's autumn collaboration. Lei Mingxuan demonstrated a proactive and enterprising attitude across all aspects of life.

events.name: Obtain fitness coach approval and plan the next phase
events.description: Reviewing his training logs from the past two weeks, which he completed entirely on his own, Lei Mingxuan found that he was now able to execute the plan independently and smoothly. He had become more proficient in using the equipment and mastering the key movements, and the muscle soreness after training had transformed into a familiar sense of "effective workout." He provided a brief update to his coach via WeChat. The coach acknowledged his progress and self-discipline, and they agreed to schedule an in-person reassessment after his return from Western Sichuan next week. This evaluation would determine whether to increase the training weight or introduce new exercises.

events.name: Complete the current cycle of autonomous training.
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan completed the final self-directed training session of the current training cycle at the gym. He felt that strength training had fully integrated into his weekly exercise routine, becoming as stable a part of his life as eating and sleeping. After the workout, he looked at his refreshed self in the mirror and felt a profound sense of fulfillment, mentally and physically prepared for the upcoming trip and the next phase of more intensive training.

events.name: Initiate supply chain communication for the autumn collaboration collection.
events.description: Based on the "Autumn Stroll" co-branded sweatshirt plan finalized in the meeting, Lei Mingxuan contacted the supplier Zhou Tao in Hangzhou. He sent the preliminary design direction and market positioning via WeChat, discussed ideas regarding fabric selection, sampling timeline, and initial production order quantity, and officially initiated the supply chain process for the new product. Zhou Tao replied that he would study the details and provide fabric samples as soon as possible.

events.name: The ankle has healed and specialized stability training has commenced.
events.description: After confirming that his ankle was completely free of pain and discomfort during daily activities and light training, Lei Mingxuan began implementing the advanced components of his rehabilitation plan—specialized stability training. The exercises included single-leg standing balance practice (first with eyes open, then attempting with eyes closed), shifting his center of gravity on a balance pad, and performing squats with a very light kettlebell (he paid extra attention to keeping his back straight and aligning his knees properly to protect his ankle). These exercises made him feel a significant improvement in his control over the ankle.

events.name: Learn the Core Theory of Italian Coffee
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan's coffee course entered the espresso module. He learned about the soul of espresso—the extraction parameters: coffee dose, extracted liquid weight, time, and pressure, as well as how to balance the sour, sweet, and bitter flavors of coffee by adjusting these parameters within the "Golden Cup" range. Next, he studied the theory of milk steaming, including the angle of inserting the steam wand, controlling the amount of air intake, monitoring the temperature, and how to swirl the steamed milk to create a dense microfoam suitable for latte art ("the silky texture of the foam"). Although the theory was complex, the thought of possibly crafting a latte with latte art by his own hands in the future made him thoroughly enjoy the learning process.

events.name: Schedule a Professional Hearing Test for Father
events.description: Concerned that his father Lei Jianguo sometimes turned up the TV volume too high, Lei Mingxuan had been keeping this in mind. Today, through online research and phone consultations, he screened and scheduled an appointment for his father at a reputable professional hearing assessment and hearing aid fitting institution in Pudong New Area, setting a preliminary assessment for this Saturday. During dinner in the evening, he informed his parents of this arrangement.

events.name: Preliminary communication with suppliers regarding co-branding cooperation
events.description: Prior to formally initiating supply chain communication, Lei Mingxuan had actually conducted a brief video conference with Zhou Tao. During the meeting, he shared the sales data of the Sichuan-style clothing from the Hangzhou store and verbally proposed the idea of a joint collaboration for the autumn season. Based on his years of market experience, Zhou Tao immediately provided several fabric options and design suggestions that he believed held potential. Both parties reached a preliminary consensus on the possibility of collaboration, laying the groundwork for today's formal communication.

起始状态.心情: A proactive and action-packed day

结束状态.心情: A sense of fulfillment is abundant, physical condition has reached a new peak, family care is initiated, work collaboration is advancing, and I feel myself growing comprehensively.

state.今日运动: 60 minutes of gym strength training + 15 minutes of ankle stability training

date_attribute.weather: Clear skies, with a comfortable evening breeze.

2025-09.daily_overview: Thursday was spent on steady rehabilitation training, planning novel and anticipated dates, and preparing warm family matters, though an impromptu dinner disrupted the dietary plan. Under scientific training, the body continues to improve steadily, while the relationship with his girlfriend deepens through exploring new experiences together. Care for his father has also evolved from an idea into a concrete plan for a family dinner, reflecting Lei Mingxuan's meticulous attention to every aspect of life.

events.name: Upper Body Training in the Gym Combined with Ankle Rehabilitation
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan conducted a strength training session at the gym focused on strengthening the upper body and core, including seated chest press, lat pulldown, dumbbell shoulder press, and other exercises, while avoiding lower body weight-bearing throughout the session. Before and after the training, under the guidance of his coach, he incorporated resistance band exercises for the ankles and balance pad standing drills, seamlessly integrating rehabilitation elements into his daily fitness routine to continuously enhance ankle stability.

events.name: Leg Recovery Training and Advanced Ankle Exercises
events.description: In another training session, Lei Mingxuan began attempting light-weight, high-repetition recovery exercises using leg fixation equipment, such as leg extensions and leg curls, with a focus on re-establishing neuromuscular connections and feeling the engagement of the target muscle groups, rather than pursuing heavy weights. Before and after the training, he systematically completed ankle exercises such as ankle circles and heel raises, and attempted more challenging stability training by standing on a balance ball.

events.name: My girlfriend suggested watching an immersive drama.
events.description: During their dinner date in the evening, Lin Wei excitedly suggested to Lei Mingxuan that they could experience Shanghai's highly renowned immersive theater production, "Sleep No More," over the weekend. She described how the play has no fixed seating—audiences wear masks and freely explore a five-story space, following different character clues to experience a completely personalized storyline. She felt that this format, which subverts tradition and requires active participation and exploration from the audience, perfectly suited Lei Mingxuan's personality, as he enjoys novelty, excitement, and the freedom to move around. Although Lei Mingxuan had limited knowledge of theater, he was deeply captivated by this description. Out of curiosity and trust in Lin Wei's judgment, he gladly agreed.

events.name: Jointly research performance information and book tickets
events.description: After the proposal was accepted, the two immediately took great interest in using their phones to look up information about the performance of "Sleep No More," including ticket prices, the characteristics of different showtimes, and audience guides shared by netizens. They exchanged the information they found via WeChat, discussing which time slot might have fewer attendees and which classic scenes were must-sees. Lei Mingxuan proactively booked two tickets for the Friday evening show (September 12) on the official ticketing platform. After the payment was successfully processed, he sent a screenshot of the e-ticket to Lin Wei for confirmation.

events.name: Plan the specific arrangements for the performance day
events.description: After booking the tickets, the two began discussing the specific arrangements for the day of the performance. They decided to have dinner together at a local Shanghainese restaurant near the theater after work, then walk to the venue. They also discussed whether to take the subway or a taxi home after the show, ensuring a smooth experience for this novel cultural date.

events.name: Proposing a family dinner to celebrate the father's hearing test results.
events.description: Upon returning home from work, Lei Mingxuan explained in detail to his parents about the Saturday hearing test appointment he had scheduled for his father. To encourage his father and to give the matter a warm start, he suggested having a family dinner on Saturday evening after the test. This would celebrate his father taking the first positive step toward improving his hearing health and also provide an opportunity for the family to further discuss the subsequent hearing aid fitting arrangements. Both parents thought this was a good idea, and his mother, Wang Xiuying, immediately began considering the dinner menu.

events.name: Received fabric samples sent by the supplier.
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan received several physical fabric swatches for sweatshirts, which were sent via express delivery by the supplier Zhou Tao. He unwrapped the package and carefully examined the texture, thickness, gram weight, and color of each fabric sample by touch and observation. He also held the fabrics up to the light to inspect their weaving patterns. Based on the positioning of his store, "Urban Outdoors," and the theme "Autumn Wanderings," he conducted a preliminary mental screening and evaluation to determine which fabrics would be more suitable for creating autumn sweatshirts that combine both fashion appeal and functionality.

events.name: An impromptu meal with fellow players disrupted the dietary routine.
events.description: After training, Lei Mingxuan was invited by his teammate Han Dong to a hotpot restaurant for an impromptu meal. He couldn't resist eating too much spicy food, which disrupted his recovery diet plan.

起始状态.心情: Calm, thinking about today's training and the evening date.

结束状态.心情: Feeling joyful and anticipatory, though with slight regret over the loss of dietary control. Physical training has yielded positive results, and there are novel and interesting weekend plans with my girlfriend. Family matters have also been properly arranged.

state.今日运动: Gym Training (Upper Body/Legs + Core) Approximately 70 Minutes, Including Ankle Stability Training

2025-09.daily_overview: On Friday night, I experienced a groundbreaking cultural event. The immersive theater production "Sleep No More," which I attended with my girlfriend Lin Wei, fully satisfied Lei Mingxuan's ESTP personality traits—craving stimulation, exploration, and freedom of action—through its intense interactivity, puzzle-solving elements, and sensory impact. This date was not merely entertainment but also a profound journey of spiritual resonance and relationship bonding, though staying up late affected my energy levels.

events.name: Pre-Performance Dinner
events.description: After work, Lei Mingxuan and Lin Wei dined at an exquisite local Shanghainese restaurant near the "Sleep No More" performance venue in Jing'an District. They chatted casually while enjoying the meal, building up energy for the upcoming three-hour immersive experience filled with unknowns, creating a date atmosphere that was both ordinary and tinged with a sense of mysterious anticipation.

events.name: Experience the Immersive Theater Production "Sleep No More"
events.description: Arriving at the McKinnon Hotel (the performance venue) at the scheduled time, the two collected their white masks. After the staff explained the rules (wear masks throughout, remain quiet, and explore freely), they were sent in groups into the dimly lit, intricate theatrical setting. Upon entering, following their prearranged strategy of "splitting up to explore and reconvening afterward to share experiences," they each chose to follow different character clues. Lei Mingxuan immersed himself completely, running and weaving through the five-story hotel space, witnessing the actors' highly intense performances up close. At one point, he was even pulled into a hidden room by an actor for a brief one-on-one interaction, causing his adrenaline to surge. He reveled in the thrill of actively "peeking" and piecing together the puzzle.

events.name: Lively Discussion and Sharing After the Performance
events.description: The performance concluded in an atmosphere of suspense. Lei Mingxuan and Lin Wei met at the designated bar area, removed their masks, their faces reflecting both excitement and a hint of weariness. Eagerly, they shared the plotlines they had followed, the thrilling or beautiful scenes they had witnessed, their speculations about the characters' relationships, and those perplexing details. Like piecing together a vast jigsaw puzzle, the information they exchanged allowed each to gain a more three-dimensional understanding of the complex drama, and their discussion was both intense and engrossing.

events.name: Late-night reflections and sharing on social media
events.description: The discussion lasted until late at night before the two reluctantly parted ways. Lei Mingxuan took a taxi home, still immersed in the unique atmosphere of the play and the pleasure of his in-depth conversation with Lin Wei. Upon arriving home, although physically exhausted, his mind remained in an excited state. He had adhered to the theater's rules by not taking photos inside, but he posted a moment on social media with pictures of the theater's exterior and a white mask, captioning it: "An experience that completely breaks the fourth wall. Like having a tense, magnificent, yet fragmented dream. It will take a long time to digest." Soon, friends such as Zhao Min, Qian Duoduo, and Shen Jie liked the post and curiously inquired about it.

events.name: Engage in in-depth negotiations with suppliers regarding cooperation details
events.description: Based on the received fabric samples, Lei Mingxuan held another video conference with Zhou Tao during the day. This communication entered the substantive stage of business detail negotiations. Both parties engaged in in-depth discussions on the two specifically selected fabric types, the preliminary confirmed directions for design draft revisions, cost budgets, minimum order quantities, production cycles, and the initially conceived profit-sharing model. Zhou Tao provided professional suggestions on cost control.

events.name: Review and Adjust Property Sales Strategy with the Intermediary
events.description: Regarding the sale of his own idle property, after several rounds of viewings and gathering feedback from potential buyers, Lei Mingxuan met with the primary cooperating agency manager at a café today. They reviewed the viewing situation and, following discussion, decided to make a slight, rational adjustment to the listing price to enhance its appeal. Simultaneously, Lei Mingxuan agreed to the agency's proposal to increase promotional efforts on online platforms, emphasizing the property's advantages of proximity to the subway and its location within a desirable school district.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the unique theatrical experience in the evening.

结束状态.心情: Thrilled, amazed, and left with endless afterthoughts, I shared an exceptionally unique and profound cultural experience with my girlfriend, feeling that our relationship and spiritual connection have grown even closer, though staying up late has left me feeling exhausted.

state.今日运动: Walking (theater exploration) takes about 2 hours, which involves a considerable amount of physical activity.

2025-09.daily_overview: Saturday is a day for family and personal recharge, though the family dinner involved slightly more food than usual. In the morning, I accompanied my father for a hearing test, initiating an important health improvement plan. In the afternoon, I systematically reviewed coffee theory and completed a mock test at home, making a final push for professional certification. The warm family dinner in the evening strengthened our familial bonds. Meanwhile, the on-site inspection for our family's home relocation continued to progress steadily.

events.name: Accompanying my father for a hearing test.
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan accompanied his father, Lei Jianguo, to a scheduled professional hearing assessment center. The doctor conducted a detailed ear canal examination and a series of hearing tests for his father. The testing process went smoothly, and his father cooperated well. The results confirmed that his father had a certain degree of age-related hearing loss, particularly experiencing difficulty distinguishing speech in noisy environments. The doctor provided a professional explanation and suggested that considering hearing aids could help improve his quality of life. Although his father initially resisted the idea of "wearing a device," his attitude softened after patient explanations from both the doctor and Lei Mingxuan.

events.name: Review coffee theory and complete the simulation test.
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan utilized his break time to systematically review all the theoretical knowledge points of the SCA Barista Foundation course he had studied over the past two weeks in his home study. He revisited the electronic textbook and his own notes. To assess his learning progress, he found the official comprehensive mock test on an online platform and completed it diligently. The test results were favorable, with only a few questions regarding subtle differences in processing methods answered incorrectly. He conducted a focused review of the incorrect questions to ensure a solid grasp of the theoretical knowledge, thereby boosting his confidence for the potential hands-on assessment at the end of the month.

events.name: Preparing to Serve as a Billiards Referee
events.description: Thinking about his role as the referee for the folk billiards tournament the next day, Lei Mingxuan had a brief chat with the event organizer and several familiar participants on WeChat a day in advance, gaining a general understanding of the players' average skill level and the types of controversial shots that might arise. He took out the triangle rack and white gloves, placed them in his bag, and planned to arrive early the next day to familiarize himself with the competition venue.

events.name: Family Dinner Celebrates the Launch of Hearing Improvement Program
events.description: In the evening, Wang Xiuying, the mother, prepared a sumptuous dinner, specially cooking Lei Mingxuan's favorite Shanghai-style braised pork. The family of three sat around the table, enjoying a warm atmosphere. Lei Mingxuan shared the details of the morning hearing test and the doctor's recommendations. His parents listened attentively, with the mother occasionally serving dishes to the father. Everyone was delighted that the father had taken the first positive step toward improving his hearing, and a relaxed smile appeared on the father's face. The conversation at the table was not about the burden of the illness but rather the anticipation of a better quality of life in the future. However, Lei Mingxuan accidentally ate too much braised pork, leading to a slight increase in his weight.

events.name: Discuss subsequent fitting arrangements after the meal.
events.description: After dinner, the family continued to discuss the next steps over tea in the living room. They tentatively planned for Lei Mingxuan to accompany his father to the hearing aid fitting center again next week to try out several different models of hearing aids in person. The final decision would be made based on the experience and pricing. Lei Mingxuan mentioned that he would do his homework in advance and compare several mainstream brands.

events.name: Assist mother in tidying up the kitchen
events.description: After the meal, Lei Mingxuan took the initiative to help his mother clear the table and clean the kitchen. As they worked, the mother and son chatted casually. Wang Xiuying, the mother, once again expressed her satisfaction with her son’s thoughtful preparations, feeling that he had truly grown up and could now be a reliable support for the family.

events.name: Accompanying parents for on-site property viewing (Lianyang/Huamu area)
events.description: Taking advantage of the time before the morning hearing test or in the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan and his parents, accompanied by an agent, focused on viewing two relatively new residential complexes in the Lianyang and Huamu areas. They were very satisfied with one complex's design of separating pedestrian and vehicle traffic, the spacious building intervals, and the environment that allowed them to walk to Century Park. They viewed a three-bedroom apartment on a middle-to-high floor, featuring a fully bright layout with excellent natural lighting. However, the total price slightly exceeded their initial budget, leaving the family somewhat hesitant.

events.name: Hosting evening property viewings alone.
events.description: A potential buyer who made an appointment through Lianjia wished to view the vacant property for sale at Lei Mingxuan's home in the evening. After work, Lei Mingxuan went directly from his shop to the property, where he personally received and accompanied the buyer during the viewing. He provided detailed answers to the buyer's questions regarding the orientation of the house, the duration of sunlight in winter, the property management fee standards, and the property rights term, demonstrating professionalism and patience throughout the process.

起始状态.心情: A sense of responsibility, thinking about accompanying my father for a check-up.

结束状态.心情: Feeling warm and content, I am gratified to have done something practical for my father. The family atmosphere is harmonious, and I have also completed my study tasks, though I feel a slight burden from having eaten a bit too much.

state.今日运动: Walking (accompanying for property viewing and inspection) approximately 1 hour

2025-09.daily_overview: On Sunday, Lei Mingxuan took on a new role in his interest circle—serving as a referee for a billiards competition, which honed his ability to enforce rules and make on-the-spot judgments. Meanwhile, he displayed remarkable composure in the face of short-term fluctuations in the investment market. The family's car replacement plan gained clearer direction after test-driving experiences, and cooperation with suppliers advanced a step further through a memorandum.

events.name: Stay Calm in the Face of Market Volatility
events.description: During the day, Lei Mingxuan noticed a slight adjustment in the investment market, with the floating profits in his fund account retreating by a few percentage points from their peak. Unlike before, he did not feel anxious or rush to take action. Instead, he recalled Xu Feng's advice to "avoid chasing rallies or selling in panic, and focus on long-term trends," choosing to observe the situation calmly. In the evening, while watching financial news at home, he discussed market fluctuations with his father, Lei Jianguo. Drawing on the experience of his generation, his father reminded him, "In investing, one should know when to take profits and secure gains." Lei Mingxuan responded with a smile, "Dad, I know what I'm doing. This is called active risk management, not reckless behavior."

events.name: Serving as referee for the first billiards invitational tournament
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan arrived at the billiards club to serve as the temporary referee for the first 8-ball invitational match. He inspected the table and equipment in advance, organized the players' draw, and clearly explained the key rules of the competition. During the match, he remained fully focused, accurately penalized a break foul and resolved a dispute over the ownership of the object ball, ensuring the smooth flow and order of the game. His performance earned him preliminary recognition from the players.

events.name: Served as referee for the second billiards invitational tournament
events.description: In the afternoon match, Lei Mingxuan, drawing from his morning experience, made calls with greater confidence and decisiveness. He successfully handled a tricky situation: a target ball was frozen to the cushion, requiring a ruling on whether it constituted a "stalemate." After careful observation, he made a reasonable judgment based on the rules and effectively communicated with the relevant players, ensuring the fairness and appeal of the competition.

events.name: Post-Match Socializing and Group Photos
events.description: After the competition concluded, the organizers, participants, and Lei Mingxuan held a brief post-match review and social gathering. Everyone commended his work as a referee, acknowledging his fairness and familiarity with the rules. Lei Mingxuan also shared some technical characteristics of the players he observed from the referee's perspective. Finally, they happily took a group photo and agreed to meet again at the next competition. This experience expanded his role in the billiards enthusiast community from a mere participant to a trusted "one of the organizers."

events.name: Memorandum of Cooperation Intent
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan compiled the key terms agreed upon during the video conference with supplier Zhou Tao a few days earlier—such as the selected fabric model, preliminary pricing range, delivery cycle, and payment method—into an informal yet well-structured memorandum of cooperation intent. He sent it via email to Zhou Tao for confirmation, laying the textual groundwork for the subsequent signing of a formal contract and the initiation of design sampling.

events.name: Test Driving a New Energy Vehicle with My Girlfriend
events.description: Before the afternoon match, Lei Mingxuan and Lin Wei visited the NIO Experience Center as scheduled for an in-depth test drive of the ES6. Lei Mingxuan focused on evaluating the vehicle's acceleration performance, chassis vibration filtering, and the performance of its autonomous driving assistance system on urban elevated roads. Lin Wei, on the other hand, paid more attention to the comfort of the interior and the interactive experience of the smart cockpit. After the test drive, both expressed satisfaction with the overall performance of the ES6, believing it better aligns with their vision of a "family car" compared to the Model Y, making their goal of switching vehicles clearer.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, thinking about today's judging work and test drive.

结束状态.心情: Feeling satisfied and somewhat accomplished, the adjudication work was successfully completed, social interactions within interest circles were enjoyable, the test drive clarified the direction, and market fluctuations can be faced with composure.

state.今日运动: Standing and walking (serving as a referee) for approximately 3 hours.

2025-09.daily_overview: On Monday, Lei Mingxuan temporarily set aside all his daily routines in Shanghai and joined two close friends, flying toward the long-awaited western Sichuan. From the early morning in Shanghai to the evening in Chengdu, this day marked not only a shift in geographical space but also a transition in lifestyle—from a busy entrepreneur, son, and boyfriend to a pure traveler and explorer. The annual core short-term goal officially commenced, with his state aligning with the conclusion of a health-focused period.

events.name: Depart for Chengdu to rendezvous
events.description: In the early morning, Lei Mingxuan checked his luggage (which was filled with outdoor gear and photography equipment), bid farewell to his parents, and headed to Shanghai Pudong International Airport. He met up with his childhood friend Zhang Wei and university classmate Zhao Min there. Although all three were somewhat tired from waking up early for the journey, their faces were lit up with excited smiles. Together, they completed the check-in procedures, passed through security, and began enthusiastically discussing their itinerary while waiting for their flight.

events.name: Arrive in Chengdu and proceed with car rental.
events.description: The plane landed on schedule at Chengdu Shuangliu Airport. After collecting their luggage, the three took the airport shuttle bus to the pre-booked car rental location. At the rental counter, they carefully verified the reservation details, purchased comprehensive insurance, and thoroughly inspected the condition of the rented SUV (including body scratches, fuel level, tires, spare tire, emergency tools, etc.). They then signed the vehicle inspection form to confirm.

events.name: Procure supplies and check into the hotel
events.description: After completing the car rental procedures, they drove to the city center and purchased bottled water, snacks, self-heating rice meals, and fruits needed for the upcoming days at a large supermarket. Subsequently, they arrived at the hotel booked in downtown Chengdu near the highway entrance, checked in, and left their luggage.

events.name: Pre-departure Briefing and Anticipation
events.description: In the evening, the three of them had a simple dinner in or near the hotel room and held a brief "pre-departure meeting." As the main planner, Lei Mingxuan reconfirmed the driving route for the next day, the estimated travel time to the first stop, Kangding, and the weather conditions. They checked their respective equipment, especially the oxygen cylinders and medications. Looking at the winding route of the Western Sichuan Loop on the map, all three were filled with anticipation. They encouraged each other and prepared to face the challenges and scenic beauty of officially entering the plateau the next day.

events.name: Take a rehabilitation walk.
events.description: In the evening near the hotel in Chengdu, Lei Mingxuan conducted a 20-minute rehabilitation walk to maintain ankle stability and engage in low-intensity aerobic activity, in accordance with the training plan for concluding the health recovery phase.

起始状态.心情: Excitement, anticipation, mingled with a hint of drowsiness from rising early for the journey.

结束状态.心情: The excitement at the start of the journey persists, along with the joy of reuniting with friends, filled with boundless anticipation for the unknown adventures ahead and a hint of nervousness about the high altitude.

state.今日运动: Walking, carrying luggage (at airports, car rental locations, hotels), light activity, 20-minute rehabilitation walk.

date_attribute.weather: Shanghai will be sunny turning cloudy, Chengdu will be cloudy, Kangding will be clear, and it will be slightly cool in the evening.

2025-09.daily_overview: Lei Mingxuan achieved his short-term core goal and officially embarked on the long-awaited in-depth self-driving tour of Western Sichuan with his childhood friend Zhang Wei and university classmate Zhao Min. This was the first day, brimming with novelty and excitement. Transitioning from a bustling metropolis to a small plateau town, they immersed themselves in the sense of freedom that self-driving offered and the anticipation of exploring Tibetan culture for the first time.

events.name: Morning Ankle Stability Training
events.description: Before departure, Lei Mingxuan performed a 10-minute ankle stability training at home, such as standing on one foot, to ensure stable condition after recovery from the injury.

events.name: First Day of the Self-Driving Tour in Western Sichuan: Departure and Arrival in Kangding
events.description: To catch the early flight, Lei Mingxuan, Zhang Wei, and Zhao Min set off before dawn. They took the morning flight from Shanghai Pudong to Chengdu Shuangliu Airport. After landing, they quickly picked up the pre-booked SUV. As the main initiator and primary driver of this trip, Lei Mingxuan checked the vehicle's condition before driving his two friends onto the Yaan-Kangding Expressway. Along the way, being an ESTP action-oriented type, he drove steadily while light-hearted music played in the car. The three excitedly discussed the upcoming itinerary. During a rest stop at a service area, Lei Mingxuan took out his phone to record the gradually expanding mountain scenery outside the window. In the afternoon, they successfully arrived in Kangding, located at an altitude of 2,560 meters, and checked into a pre-booked Tibetan-style hotel to begin acclimatizing. After a brief rest, the three eagerly ventured out to explore. They strolled along the roaring Zheduo River, immersing themselves in the strong Tibetan ambiance of this famous "city of love songs." The distinctive shops lining the streets particularly caught the interest of Lei Mingxuan, who owns a clothing store. For dinner, they enjoyed a steaming hotpot of yak meat at a popular local restaurant, fueling up for the upcoming high-altitude journey. Back at the hotel in the evening, as the team leader, Lei Mingxuan reviewed the route and precautions for crossing Zheduo Mountain the next day with his companions and reminded everyone to get plenty of rest.

events.name: Online handling of urgent store orders
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan received a call from a store employee about an online order that needed urgent confirmation. He stayed up late to handle it, which affected his sleep.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Excitement, anticipation, mixed with the busyness and slight nervousness before departure.

结束状态.所处地点: A hotel room in Kangding City, Ganzi Prefecture
结束状态.心情: Satisfied and full of freshness, yet slightly fatigued from staying up late to handle affairs.

state.今日运动: Long-distance driving, urban walking for approximately 1.5 hours, ankle training for 10 minutes

date_attribute.weather: Kangding and Xinduqiao are sunny, with strong winds and low temperatures at the mountain pass, and intense sunlight.

2025-09.daily_overview: The journey encountered its first challenge—crossing the Zheduo Mountain Pass at an altitude of 4,298 meters. With his excellent physical condition and positive mindset, Lei Mingxuan led the team in overcoming difficulties, skillfully navigating between the breathtaking scenery and sudden altitude sickness, demonstrating practical and adaptive capabilities.

events.name: Challenging Zheduo Mountain and Coping with Altitude Sickness
events.description: After breakfast, Lei Mingxuan and his companions drove towards Zheduo Mountain. As the altitude continued to rise, the scenery outside the window grew increasingly magnificent. Lei Mingxuan and Zhang Wei were in good condition, stopping several times at observation decks to capture the winding "sky road" and the continuous snow-capped mountains with cameras and drones. However, upon reaching the mountain pass, Zhao Min began to experience symptoms of altitude sickness, such as headaches and shortness of breath. As the core of the team, Lei Mingxuan immediately decided to shorten their stay at the pass, quickly passing through while constantly comforting Zhao Min. After arriving at Xinduqiao, known as the "Photographer's Paradise," they promptly checked into a hotel, allowing Zhao Min to rest in bed with oxygen support in her room. After settling their companion, Lei Mingxuan and Zhang Wei did not venture far, engaging only in simple activities near the hotel and capturing the picturesque autumn scenery of Xinduqiao with their lenses—golden poplar trees, winding streams, and scattered Tibetan houses. For dinner, they chose to eat light meals in the hotel restaurant while closely monitoring Zhao Min's condition. Based on the actual situation, Lei Mingxuan proactively suggested adjusting the pace of the next day's itinerary to reduce travel and ensure the overall well-being of the team.

events.name: Mild Altitude Headache Discomfort
events.description: Lei Mingxuan himself also felt a slight headache, possibly an early sign of altitude sickness, so he rested early to alleviate the symptoms.

起始状态.心情: Spirited and full of fighting spirit for the challenge of the mountain pass, yet feeling slightly unwell.

结束状态.所处地点: A Hotel Room in Xinduqiao Town
结束状态.心情: Slightly weary yet filled with a sense of accomplishment, transitioning from concern for a companion's health to relief, and feeling enriched after appreciating the beautiful scenery.

state.今日运动: Driving in high-altitude areas, short-distance walking for photography, no additional training.

date_attribute.weather: Xinduqiao, Tagong Grassland, and Moshizha Park are sunny, with warm days and cold nights.

2025-09.daily_overview: After acclimatizing to the high-altitude environment, today's itinerary was relatively relaxed, focusing on an immersive experience of the natural and geological wonders of western Sichuan. Lei Mingxuan's passion for photography and desire for exploration were fully satisfied, and the team atmosphere returned to a state of ease and cheerfulness.

events.name: Visit Tagong Grassland and Moxi Park
events.description: After a night's rest, Zhao Min's altitude sickness had largely subsided. Following the adjusted, more relaxed itinerary, the team drove to Tagong Grassland in the morning. Facing the vast grassland and the majestic Yala Snow Mountain in the distance, Lei Mingxuan felt a sense of openness. He not only took numerous landscape photos but also proactively captured creative portraits of Zhang Wei and Zhao Min integrated into the scenery. In the afternoon, they arrived at the Mosi Park, known as the "Alien Planet." Wandering among the peculiar black-gray stone forests, Lei Mingxuan marveled at the geological wonders crafted by nature, continuously changing angles to capture photos. As an ESTP who enjoys novelty and excitement, this unique experience thrilled him. In the evening, they chose to stay at a well-reviewed guesthouse near Tagong Town, briefly exchanging travel stories with other travelers in the Tibetan-style common area.

events.name: Stayed up late video chatting with girlfriend Lin Wei.
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan had a lengthy video call with his girlfriend Lin Wei, sharing travel experiences, which resulted in a delayed bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Relax and look forward to today's visual feast.

结束状态.所处地点: A room at a homestay in Tagong Town
结束状态.心情: Pleasant, fulfilling, a sense of satisfaction after taking in the beautiful scenery, but slightly tired due to staying up late.

state.今日运动: Grassland hiking sightseeing and Mosh Stone Park walking exploration, totaling approximately 3 hours.

date_attribute.weather: The weather was clear along the route from Tagong to Danba, with moderately strong winds in the canyon. The climate in Jiaju Tibetan Village was mild.

2025-09.daily_overview: The journey shifted from natural landscapes to cultural exploration, delving into the core settlement areas of the Gyarong Tibetans. Lei Mingxuan showed a keen interest in Tibetan village architecture, handicrafts, and the daily lives of the local people. This stemmed both from his observational instincts as a businessman and his curiosity about diverse cultures.

events.name: Heading to Danba and First Exploration of Jiaju Tibetan Village
events.description: Bidding farewell to Tagong, the group proceeded along the valley road toward Danba. Outside the car window, the scenery transformed into the deep Dadu River Valley, with Lei Mingxuan steadily navigating the winding mountain road. In the afternoon, they arrived at Danba Jiaju Tibetan Village and checked into the pre-booked characteristic Tibetan-style guesthouse. The hospitable host welcomed them with butter tea and tsampa, which Lei Mingxuan gladly tried, immersing himself in the authentic Jiarong Tibetan culture. During an evening stroll through the village, the setting sun cast a golden glow over the layered watchtowers and Tibetan houses. He took out his camera to capture the tranquil and vibrant scenes of daily life.

events.name: Visiting the Millennial Ancient Watchtowers in Zhonglu Tibetan Village
events.description: After checking in, they still felt energetic, so the three decided to drive to another famous Tibetan village nearby—Zhonglu Tibetan Village. There, they strolled along the stone-paved paths and observed up close the thousand-year-old watchtowers, known as the "Oriental Pyramids." Lei Mingxuan was curious about the architectural structure and defensive functions of the watchtowers and had a brief conversation with a Tibetan elder who was drying corn at his doorstep. As a marketing planner, Zhao Min discussed the current state of tourism development and cultural preservation in the area with Lei Mingxuan and Zhang Wei along the way, inspiring Lei Mingxuan to think about his shop management from different perspectives.

events.name: Night Talks in Tibetan Villages and Stargazing Reveries
events.description: Returning to Jiaju Homestay, the host had already prepared a lavish Tibetan-style dinner. During the meal, Lei Mingxuan praised the yak meat and wild mushroom soup highly. After dinner, the three of them sat together on the homestay's open-air terrace, gazing at the brilliant Milky Way. In such a tranquil and beautiful atmosphere, Lei Mingxuan chatted with Zhang Wei about childhood memories and amusing stories from Pudong, while Zhao Min excitedly discussed how to incorporate the cultural elements of this place into her future event planning. The homestay owner also joined the conversation, sharing stories about the Tibetan village. Lei Mingxuan listened with rapt attention, feeling that this trip was far more than just about the scenery—it was a profound cultural recharge.

events.name: Temporarily changing the dietary plan
events.description: During dinner, Lei Mingxuan was tempted by the delicious food and temporarily consumed more high-calorie dishes, breaking his daily dietary control.

起始状态.心情: Leisurely, with an eager anticipation for cultural exploration

结束状态.所处地点: A Room at a Homestay in Danba Jiarong Tibetan Village
结束状态.心情: Immersed in warmth, deeply moved by the simple folk customs and magnificent starry skies, yet feeling slightly overfed.

state.今日运动: The drive takes approximately 3 hours, and the hiking tours of the two Tibetan villages take about 2.5 hours.

2025-09.daily_overview: On his final morning in the Tibetan village, Lei Mingxuan bid farewell to the land at his own pace through photography and jogging. He then immersed himself in the local life and engaged in a culturally enriching exchange that offered significant business inspiration.

events.name: Capture the Morning Mist and Sunrise of Tibetan Villages
events.description: To capture the most beautiful moments of the Tibetan village, Lei Mingxuan and Zhao Min deliberately woke up before sunrise and climbed to the viewing platform near their homestay. As the morning mist enveloped the valley like a veil and sunlight gradually illuminated the colorful Tibetan houses, they held their breath and pressed the shutter. Zhang Wei, on the other hand, chose a method more suited to his own rhythm—taking a leisurely jog through the tranquil village to awaken his body through exercise.

events.name: Immerse Yourself in the Life of the Jiarong Tibetans
events.description: After breakfast, guided by the homestay host, the three of them delved into a thorough exploration of the Tibetan village. Lei Mingxuan was particularly interested in the interior structure and lifestyle wisdom of Tibetan dwellings. He was especially captivated by a Tibetan grandmother weaving cloth, and he approached her to chat, purchasing several exquisite handmade trinkets. He planned to bring them back to Shanghai to use as distinctive decorations in his shop or to give as gifts to friends. Meanwhile, Zhang Wei and Zhao Min discussed tourism development and homestay operations with the host, sharing their commercial experiences from Shanghai. This exchange also proved highly beneficial for Lei Mingxuan.

events.name: Bidding farewell to the Tibetan village, we set off on the return journey.
events.description: After lunch, the three of them packed their luggage, took a group photo with the enthusiastic homestay owner, and bid farewell. Lei Mingxuan carefully stored the purchased Tibetan ornaments. As they drove away, he looked back at the beautiful village nestled against the mountains, his heart filled with reluctance and a sense of fulfillment. The vehicle then entered the highway and began heading back toward Chengdu.

events.name: Leisure and Review During Long-Distance Driving
events.description: During the long afternoon drive, Lei Mingxuan, as the driver, took turns with his companions at the wheel while ensuring safety. They reviewed the photos and videos taken over the past few days in the car, excitedly recounting the highlights and amusing moments from the journey. Lei Mingxuan also played his favorite anime soundtrack, creating a relaxed atmosphere throughout the trip.

events.name: Postponing evening exercise due to fatigue
events.description: Upon arriving in Chengdu, Lei Mingxuan felt extremely fatigued and decided to cancel the originally planned light training, opting to rest directly instead.

起始状态.心情: Anticipation tinged with a hint of parting sorrow.

结束状态.心情: A journey filled with a profound sense of fulfillment, coupled with a slight anticipation of returning home, yet accompanied by physical fatigue.

2025-09.daily_overview: The final day of the self-driving tour in western Sichuan was themed around the return journey and reflection. Driving back to Chengdu from the scenic areas and then flying back to Shanghai, the body was weary, but the spirit was filled with the memories and sense of accomplishment from the trip. A farewell dinner served as a perfect conclusion to this remarkable journey.

events.name: Returning to Chengdu marks the official conclusion of the journey.
events.description: In the morning, they set out from the hotel and arrived in downtown Chengdu after the final leg of the journey. After returning the rental car, the three of them checked into a hotel near the airport. In the evening, they found an authentic Sichuan restaurant for a farewell dinner. During the meal, Lei Mingxuan, as the organizer, raised a toast to thank Zhang Wei and Zhao Min for their companionship and trust. They reminisced about the challenges of the trip, such as crossing Zheduo Mountain and Zhao Min's altitude sickness, as well as countless joyful moments. The experience of overcoming difficulties together and appreciating the beautiful scenery deepened their friendship.

events.name: Continuous weight gain due to party dining.
events.description: During the farewell dinner, Lei Mingxuan consumed a significant amount of high-fat foods, leading to a further increase in his weight.

2025-09.daily_overview: The first day back to daily life. Lei Mingxuan needed to switch from "travel mode" to "life and work mode." During the day, he handled necessary tasks after returning from his trip, while in the evening, he shared travel stories with his family and enjoyed the warmth of home.

events.name: Organize the video footage from the trip to Western Sichuan
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan transferred the massive number of photos and videos from his camera and drone to his home computer for preliminary screening and categorized backup. He selected a few of his most impressive landscape shots and group photos of the three, posting them to the WeChat group "Pudong Three Musketeers" and his Moments. They immediately received numerous likes and comments, with many friends inquiring about the travel details.

events.name: Handle backlogged store matters
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan went to his clothing store at Century Avenue Mall. Having been away for over a week, he needed to check on the store's operations, review sales data, and communicate with the staff. At the same time, he began to pay attention to the store's displays, considering whether elements from western Sichuan (such as colors and styles) could be incorporated into the upcoming thematic presentation.

events.name: Having dinner with parents, sharing travel experiences
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan was having dinner at home with his parents, Wang Xiuying and Lei Jianguo. He enthusiastically shared his experiences from western Sichuan with them, showing photos on his phone. His father was particularly interested in the plateau scenery and Tibetan architecture, while his mother was concerned about whether he had eaten and slept well. The family enjoyed a warm and joyful time together.

events.name: Go to bed early to adjust for jet lag.
events.description: Due to jet lag from the trip, Lei Mingxuan felt drowsy and went to bed earlier than usual.

2025-09.daily_overview: Lei Mingxuan efficiently entered a multitasking mode, simultaneously advancing on multiple fronts including family affairs, personal health, interest development, and work preparations. This demonstrates the ESTP personality type's adeptness at handling diverse challenges and focus on practical effectiveness.

events.name: Accompanying father to schedule a hearing test.
events.description: During dinner, Lei Mingxuan had a detailed discussion with his father, Lei Jianguo, about the inconveniences caused by his hearing loss. He presented the information he had previously gathered on a professional hearing center in Pudong, patiently explaining the importance of professional testing and hearing aid trials. After obtaining his father’s consent, he made a phone call on the spot and successfully scheduled a hearing test and hearing aid trial service for the morning of Thursday, September 25. His mother, Wang Xiuying, expressed her support for the decision, reflecting a united and pragmatic family atmosphere.

events.name: Comprehensive Recovery Training After Ankle Rehabilitation
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan went to the gym for his first moderate-intensity comprehensive training session after recovering from his injury. He combined 20 minutes of jogging, strength training on fixed equipment, and core exercises, specifically incorporating ankle stability drills such as single-leg, eyes-closed standing as part of his warm-up and cool-down routines. After the workout, he felt good with no discomfort in his ankle, which greatly boosted his confidence in resuming all his sports activities.

events.name: Review the barista course and schedule the practical assessment.
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan took time to review the online theoretical content for the SCA Barista Skills Foundation level. He contacted the certification center and successfully booked a spot for the offline practical session and assessment on September 28th (Sunday). At the same time, he adjusted the shop's schedule for the 28th to ensure he could participate in the assessment for the entire day.

events.name: Launch the National Day Store Promotion Plan
events.description: During the day at the store, Lei Mingxuan drew inspiration from his trip to western Sichuan and began conceptualizing the promotional theme for the National Day Golden Week. He drafted the idea of combining the [outdoor travel style] with the new autumn collection and made preliminary plans for the layout of the interactive exhibition booth.

events.name: Encountering fellow coffee enthusiasts and establishing a community
events.description: During the lunch break, Lei Mingxuan visited a newly opened specialty coffee shop near the mall to sample their new offerings, where he coincidentally met independent barista Chen Mo and designer Su Qing. The group hit it off immediately due to their shared passion for coffee flavors and latte art, exchanging WeChat contacts on the spot. Lei Mingxuan then conceived the idea of forming a small community for coffee enthusiasts.

events.name: Emotional fluctuations due to work pressure
events.description: While handling multiple tasks during the day, Lei Mingxuan felt some pressure, which led to a slight sense of irritability, but it was alleviated through exercise.

起始状态.心情: With clear objectives, prepared to efficiently handle multiple tasks, yet feeling slightly pressured.

结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled and in control, confident about several upcoming arrangements, with improved mood after exercise.

state.今日运动: Comprehensive gym training for approximately 1.5 hours

2025-09.daily_overview: Preparing for accompanying his father tomorrow, while continuing to advance the conclusion of the trip, health management, and the establishment of new interest communities. Lei Mingxuan's life is returning to normal while continuously incorporating new elements.

events.name: Coordinate store affairs to free up time for accompanying my father tomorrow.
events.description: Lei Mingxuan communicated in advance with several regular customers who had scheduled fittings for the next day, rescheduling their appointments to other dates. He also arranged for staff to manage the store operations throughout the 25th, ensuring he could accompany his father with undivided attention.

events.name: Online Settlement of AA Expenses for Travel in Western Sichuan
events.description: As the financial manager, Lei Mingxuan uploaded the organized Excel spreadsheet of all shared expenses and payment screenshots to the shared document, and initiated the settlement in the [Pudong Trio] WeChat group. He verified each expense detail with Zhang Wei and Zhao Min, ultimately confirming the amount each person needed to contribute. Zhang Wei and Zhao Min promptly transferred their shares to him via Alipay, efficiently completing the financial closure of this group trip. Lei Mingxuan posted a confirmation of receipt in the group and expressed gratitude for his travel companions' cooperation.

events.name: Specialized Physical Training for Hiking in Western Sichuan
events.description: During his evening workout, Lei Mingxuan engaged in more targeted training under the guidance of his coach: 30 minutes on the elliptical machine to improve cardiovascular fitness, along with wall sits and step training to enhance lower-body strength and endurance. He felt his physical fitness was recovering quickly, which gave him greater confidence in adapting to high-altitude trekking.

events.name: Establish the "Caffeine Research Institute" Online Community
events.description: Lei Mingxuan took the initiative to contact Chen Mo and Su Qing, whom he had met the day before, via WeChat, proposing to establish a coffee enthusiasts' community. He created a WeChat group named [Caffeine Research Institute], inviting several new friends as well as old friends Zhao Min and Qian Duoduo, who were also interested in coffee, into the group. Everyone immediately began actively exchanging ideas and chatting in the group.

events.name: Overtime work to handle store system malfunction.
events.description: In the evening, the store's cash register system suddenly malfunctioned. Lei Mingxuan stayed up late contacting technical support to resolve the issue, which caused him to go to bed late.

起始状态.心情: Methodically lay the groundwork for tomorrow's important arrangements.

结束状态.心情: The satisfaction from smooth progress, the fresh social joy brought by community building, but slightly tired due to staying up late.

2025-09.daily_overview: Today was a day filled with warmth and fulfillment. In the morning, I accompanied my father to complete an important matter concerning the quality of life, while in the afternoon, I immersed myself in the world of trendy toy art that I am passionate about. Lei Mingxuan has found a perfect balance between fulfilling family responsibilities and pursuing personal interests.

events.name: Accompanying my father for professional hearing assessment and hearing aid trial.
events.description: Lei Mingxuan drove his father to the scheduled hearing center. Along the way, he eased his father's nervousness with light conversation. In the audiometry room, he carefully observed the various tests conducted by the hearing care professional for his father and recorded key data. When his father tried on the hearing aid and, for the first time, clearly heard the hearing care professional speaking, his expression of surprise and smile brought immense satisfaction to Lei Mingxuan. He consulted in detail with the hearing care professional about the adaptation period, maintenance, and pricing, and his father expressed satisfaction with the effectiveness of one particular model. Throughout the entire process, Lei Mingxuan demonstrated thorough patience and attentiveness.

events.name: Family Discussion on Father's Hearing Improvement Plan
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Lei Mingxuan and his father gave a detailed account of today's experience to his mother, Wang Xiuying, and presented the relevant materials. The family discussed together, preliminarily decided on a plan to officially fit hearing aids for the father, and discussed the cost arrangements. The family atmosphere was warm and pragmatic.

events.name: Immerse Yourself in the Trendy Art Exhibition at Xuhui Riverside
events.description: In the afternoon, after arranging matters at his shop, Lei Mingxuan took the subway to Xuhui Riverside to visit the [Future Archaeology] trendy toy art exhibition, which was highly recommended by his cousin Shen Jie. He immersed himself in the experience, carefully appreciating sculptures by renowned domestic and international designers, particularly the familiar limited-edition Pop Mart pieces. He also captured many futuristic AR interactive installations with his phone. Before leaving the exhibition hall, he purchased a limited-edition blind box co-branded with the exhibition, adding it as a new piece to his collection.

events.name: Share exhibition viewing experiences with fellow collectors in the circle.
events.description: After the exhibition, Lei Mingxuan couldn't wait to share photos from the event and his newly acquired blind box in a WeChat group of fellow collectors while on the subway back to Pudong, sparking a lively discussion among the enthusiasts. In the evening, he also expressed his gratitude to his cousin Shen Jie.

events.name: Staying up late due to excitement
events.description: The excitement of viewing the exhibition and sharing the experience kept Lei Mingxuan from going to bed on time.

起始状态.心情: Attentive and slightly nervous, hoping everything goes smoothly.

结束状态.心情: The warm feeling of being happy for my father intertwined with the excitement of gaining inspiration from the exhibition, making it an immensely fulfilling experience.

2025-09.daily_overview: The workday before the weekend unfolded at a relatively relaxed pace. Lei Mingxuan caught up with old friends, exchanging thoughts and ideas. Meanwhile, the plan for the disposal of a major family asset was officially set in motion, with the online posting of information marking the entry into the practical phase of selling the property.

events.name: Having a meal with childhood friend Zhang Wei, discussing history and business extensively.
events.description: After work, Lei Mingxuan met Zhang Wei at a local Shanghainese restaurant. He excitedly talked about a historical novel he had been reading recently, in which the descriptions of the status and wisdom of ancient merchants reminded him of his own reality as an individual shop owner. The two engaged in an interesting discussion on [the principles of doing business in ancient and modern times]. Although Zhang Wei did not often read historical novels, he listened with great interest, and their friendship deepened through the exchange of ideas.

events.name: Posting idle property sale information across multiple platforms
events.description: Lei Mingxuan collaborated with the selected real estate agency to list the property for sale simultaneously on mainstream platforms such as Lianjia and Beike, as well as through offline branches. He personally participated in reviewing the property description and photos, highlighting the key selling points of the house. As he watched the listing go live, he felt that his family’s plan to upgrade their home had taken a substantial step forward.

events.name: Replenish stock for the National Day promotion.
events.description: During the day, Lei Mingxuan contacted Zhou Tao, a supplier in Hangzhou, to place an additional order for sweatshirts and accessories suitable for autumn outdoor styles based on the National Day promotional theme, ensuring sufficient stock during the event period.

events.name: Self-assessment to confirm physical condition
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan quickly assessed his training experiences over the past week, confirming that his ankle remained completely stable in daily activities and simulated exercises, with no discomfort whatsoever. He was highly satisfied with his physical condition and felt confident about resuming all his sports hobbies and future outdoor adventures.

events.name: Returned late due to drinking at a gathering
events.description: While having dinner with Zhang Wei, Lei Mingxuan drank some alcohol, which led to him returning home late and going to bed late.

起始状态.心情: The relaxed feeling of Friday, looking forward to gathering with old friends

结束状态.心情: The joy of reuniting with old friends coexists with the steadiness of embarking on a major undertaking, though there is a slight discomfort from drinking.

2025-09.daily_overview: The day off was packed with multiple important tasks. In the morning, the focus was on handling the first property showing for the sale of a house, while in the afternoon, the plan for the National Day event was finalized with the mall's property management. Lei Mingxuan, acting as both the coordinator for family affairs and the operator of the shop, efficiently navigated between different roles.

events.name: First-time Reception of Real Estate Prospective Clients
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan went to the vacant property for sale, where he received the first group of clients brought by the real estate agent for a collective viewing. He patiently introduced the condition of the house, the neighborhood environment, and the surrounding amenities, while carefully observing the clients' reactions. He also took note of their common concerns, such as the floor level, natural lighting, and payment methods.

events.name: Communicate with the mall property manager regarding the National Day promotion plan
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan brought the refined National Day promotional activity plan (including the event schedule, booth layout diagram, safety plan, etc.) to the mall property management office for an in-person discussion with Manager Zheng Kai. Zheng Kai carefully reviewed the materials, emphasizing compliance with regulations such as electrical safety and fire escape route provisions, and offered several suggestions for revisions. Lei Mingxuan took detailed notes, and the communication between both parties proceeded smoothly.

events.name: Initial Visit to Prospective Homebuyer Communities
events.description: After discussing the plan, it was still early, so Lei Mingxuan took the opportunity to visit an international community in Pudong, known for its property management, which had been recommended by his cousin Shen Jie. He walked around the perimeter of the community to get a feel for the environment and briefly inquired about the apartment layouts and approximate prices at a nearby real estate agency, using the information as a reference for future home selection.

events.name: Evening Family Home Viewing Review
events.description: During dinner, Lei Mingxuan reported to his parents on the morning's property viewing, the communication results with the property management, and his impressions from visiting the new community in the afternoon. The family briefly discussed the current market feedback and decided to maintain the listing price for observation over a period of time.

events.name: Outdoor sports cancelled due to rainy weather.
events.description: The originally scheduled roller-skating activity was canceled due to light rain in the afternoon, and Lei Mingxuan switched to performing light upper-body training at home instead.

起始状态.心情: A serious attitude in preparation for handling multiple matters

结束状态.心情: The satisfaction of completing tasks in a busy yet orderly manner brings a sense of reassurance regarding the progress of the National Day activities.

state.今日运动: A lot of walking around the city, 20 minutes of upper body training at home.

2025-09.daily_overview: This was a day of reaping certifications and focusing on future plans. In the morning, Lei Mingxuan achieved a milestone on his path toward professionalizing his interests—he passed the SCA Barista Certification. In the afternoon and evening, he shifted his energy toward a major family consumption decision—conducting in-depth research on the plan to replace their car.

events.name: Passed the SCA Barista Skills Foundation Level certification examination
events.description: Lei Mingxuan went to the certification center in Pudong to participate in a full-day offline intensive training and final assessment. Under the guidance of the instructor, he systematically practiced and was assessed on Italian coffee extraction, latte art, and hand-brewing techniques. In the afternoon, he successfully passed both the theoretical and practical exams and received the SCA (Specialty Coffee Association) Barista Skills Foundation Level certificate on the spot. This certification elevated his knowledge of coffee from a hobbyist level to a professional threshold, filling him with a great sense of accomplishment.

events.name: Focus on test-driving preferred models and conduct in-depth comparisons.
events.description: After the assessment concluded, Lei Mingxuan did not take a break. Instead, he took his parents to the automotive district, where he focused on test-driving the two most favored models in their family car replacement plan: the Tesla Model Y and the Li L7. He emphasized experiencing and comparing the driving feel, spatial practicality, and suitability for family travel scenarios. Additionally, he engaged in in-depth discussions with the sales representative regarding financing options and collected detailed information.

events.name: Organize vehicle replacement research materials and formulate a follow-up plan.
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Lei Mingxuan systematically organized the vehicle model information, test drive impressions, and price comparisons he had collected throughout September. He began monitoring owner reviews and promotional updates of his target models on automotive forums, establishing a preliminary timeline and key focus points for the final decision-making process by the end of this year or early next year.

events.name: Sharing the Joy of Certification
events.description: After receiving the certificate, Lei Mingxuan felt delighted. He took a photo of it and shared it with his family and friends in the [Caffeine Research Institute] WeChat group, receiving a wave of congratulations. He began to contemplate how to apply this new skill in his shop or daily life in the future.

events.name: Waking up early due to exam pressure
events.description: To prepare for the assessment, Lei Mingxuan woke up earlier than usual to ensure he was in the best possible condition.

起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous before the exam, yet filled with a desire for challenges.

结束状态.心情: The profound fulfillment and joy derived from the dual gains (certification + research), leading to a clearer vision for future planning.

state.今日运动: Prolonged standing and operation during the assessment, with no additional physical activity.

Finalizing communications with the property management ensured the event's compliance and smooth execution. Meanwhile, he began contemplating rewarding his recent busy schedule with a high-quality leisure activity.

events.name: Finalize the National Day promotion plan with the mall property management.

During the communication, Zheng Kai also shared with him the overall National Day event arrangements and passenger flow forecasts for the shopping mall, enabling Lei Mingxuan to better adjust his own event details and enhance competitiveness.

events.name: Preparation of Materials for Store National Day Activities

He also rearranged some of the product displays to create a festive atmosphere.

events.name: Book a birthday SPA experience for yourself
events.description: Approaching his October birthday and burdened by numerous recent commitments, Lei Mingxuan felt the need to unwind. Through a friend’s recommendation and online research, he selected a highly-rated Japanese Zen-inspired SPA center and booked an experience package after the National Day holiday, treating it as both a birthday gift to himself and a reward after a period of intense work.

events.name: End-of-Month Store Account Inventory
events.description: After closing for the night, Lei Mingxuan stayed alone in the shop to conduct a preliminary inventory of the September accounts, verifying revenue and expenditures in preparation for the official reconciliation at the end of the month. Although the shop was closed for a week during the trip to Western Sichuan, overall sales met expectations.

2025-09.daily_overview: On the last day of September, the atmosphere was characterized by wrapping up the month and preparing for the upcoming holiday. Lei Mingxuan reflected on the pleasant surprises in his investments during the month and made final arrangements for the National Day holiday tomorrow, maintaining a composed and expectant state of mind.

events.name: Morning Run on the Pudong Riverside Promenade
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan followed his new routine by going for a morning run along the Pudong Riverside Promenade. He covered a distance of 3 kilometers at a moderate pace, enjoying the cool autumn air and feeling that his ankle had fully recovered.

events.name: Review of September Fund Investment Performance
events.description: During the month-end reconciliation, Lei Mingxuan found that despite market fluctuations, the fund he adjusted and held in August still had a floating profit of over 15%. He was satisfied with this result and expressed his gratitude to his financial manager, Xu Feng, on WeChat. This experience made him feel that active management is more interesting than simply saving money, but it also made him more deeply aware of market risks.

events.name: Final Arrangement for Store Operations During the National Day Holiday
events.description: Lei Mingxuan confirmed the work schedules, responsibilities, and emergency plans with the staff for the National Day Golden Week to ensure the store operates smoothly during the holiday. He also plans to spend a few days in the middle of the holiday overseeing the store, especially during peak promotional periods.

events.name: Confirm National Day arrangements with family members.
events.description: During dinner, Lei Mingxuan briefly confirmed the arrangements for the National Day holiday with his parents. Having just returned from a long trip, they planned to spend the holiday mainly resting at home, visiting relatives and friends, and possibly taking short trips within Shanghai.

events.name: Organize thoughts, plan for October
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan briefly reflected on the eventful September: he completed a grand tour of western Sichuan, passed the barista certification, initiated two major family plans—selling the house and changing the car—and his father's hearing issues received proper attention... He felt fulfilled and productive. For October, he looked forward to his birthday, anticipated the results of the National Day promotions, and hoped to continue advancing various unfinished goals.

起始状态.心情: The end-of-month summary mindset, with a slight pre-holiday excitement.

结束状态.心情: Peaceful and content, with beautiful expectations for the upcoming holiday and the new month.
