2025-10.daily_overview: On the first day of the National Day holiday, Lei Mingxuan maintained his morning running routine before resting at home and planning personal affairs, including reviewing investments, determining a car purchase budget, and arranging a trip to Suzhou. He also had dinner with his parents.

events.name: Morning Run
events.description: Lei Mingxuan jogged 3 kilometers along the Binjiang Avenue in Pudong, enjoying the cool autumn air and maintaining his exercise routine of three times per week.

events.name: Review Stock Investments
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan checked his stock app and noticed that technology stock prices had declined, causing the floating profits in his account to shrink. Drawing on his ESTP personality, which thrives on seeking opportunities amid change, he reviewed his initial buying rationale and searched for the latest market developments, considering strategies such as cutting losses or averaging down.

events.name: Determine the Budget and Requirements for Purchasing a Vehicle
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan, taking into account his family income and the cash flow of his shop, set the car purchase budget at 200,000 to 300,000 yuan. The requirements included a new energy SUV with solid range and spacious interior, which he noted down in his memo.

events.name: Plan a Suzhou Shop Exploration Itinerary
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan video-called his girlfriend Lin Wei to discuss exploring cafes in Suzhou. They finalized a list of three cafes with distinct styles, booked high-speed train tickets, planned the route, and sent the itinerary to Lin Wei.

events.name: Having Dinner with Parents
events.description: During dinner, Wang Xiuying prepared braised pork. The family of three chatted about their holiday plans. Lei Mingxuan shared his itinerary for Suzhou, while his father reminded him to pay attention to shop safety. The atmosphere was warm and cozy.

However, due to holiday eating habits, his weight increased slightly. He also had a brief phone call with his childhood friend.

events.name: Advance the "Western Sichuan Theme" layout of the store
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan confirmed the plan in the store's work group, contacted suppliers Zhou Tao and Wu Fang to order fabrics and props, designed promotional posters, and coordinated with the advertising company for production, efficiently advancing the preparations.

events.name: Preliminary online screening of preferred vehicle models
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan used the Autohome app to filter new energy SUVs, browsed parameters of models such as the BYD Tang and the AITO M5, and saved the links for future comparison.

events.name: Brief phone call with childhood friend Zhang Wei
events.description: Before going to bed, Zhang Wei called for a casual chat about the holiday and recommended the Xiaopeng G6 model. Lei Mingxuan noted down the suggestion and agreed to discuss it in detail after returning to Shanghai.

events.name: Supplementary Event: Abandoned exercise due to slightly excessive holiday eating.
events.description: Affected by the National Day dinner, Lei Mingxuan felt slightly full and made a temporary decision to postpone exercise, opting instead to rest and read at home.

2025-10.daily_overview: This was a day that balanced career pursuits with personal interests. In the morning, Lei Mingxuan focused on an important business loan application, bringing carefully prepared documents to a face-to-face meeting at the bank. During the lunch break, he researched gaming consoles on his phone, preparing for an upcoming purchase. After work, he shifted his attention to personal life matters. On one hand, he finalized the purchase of a desirable property with the seller and paid the deposit; on the other hand, he immersed himself in planning for an upcoming Japanese anime pilgrimage, engaging in an enthusiastic online discussion with his old friend Gao Yuan about the itinerary, filled with anticipation for new experiences.

events.name: Go to the bank for a business loan interview.
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan, carrying prepared shop documents, financial statements, and personal asset proofs, visited the Huatai Securities branch (the channel recommended by Xu Feng). He engaged in an in-depth face-to-face meeting with the account manager for nearly an hour, detailing his specific plans for using the loan for shop upgrades and renovations (such as space design, brand image enhancement, and online platform development). He confidently answered professional questions regarding shop turnover and future profit projections. The account manager acknowledged his thorough preparation and clear business approach, accepted all the materials, and informed him that initial review feedback was expected in about a week.

events.name: Research on Game Consoles and Game Information
events.description: During a brief midday break at the shop, Lei Mingxuan used his phone to search in detail for the latest prices, performance comparisons, and exclusive game lineups of the PS5 and Xbox Series X. At the same time, he clicked on the promotional video and player reviews of the AAA action role-playing game that Liu Yang had highly recommended, and was deeply captivated by its grand world-building and exquisite visuals. He decided to purchase a gaming console as a reward for his recent progress in fitness.

events.name: Lock in home purchase intent and pay the deposit
events.description: After work, Lei Mingxuan met with the real estate agent introduced by his parents and the seller. Following a final round of detailed negotiations, the entire family was very satisfied with this two-bedroom apartment located in Jinqiao, Pudong, which was relatively new and equipped with an elevator. Lei Mingxuan, representing his family, signed the "Letter of Intent to Purchase" with the seller and paid a deposit of 50,000 yuan, successfully securing this desired property. Subsequently, he began preparing the necessary documents for the subsequent loan application, such as personal income certificates and bank statements.

events.name: Preliminary planning of an anime pilgrimage itinerary in Japan with Gaoyuan.
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan compiled the transportation and opening hours of attractions such as Kamakura High School Station, Akihabara Anime Street, and Suga Shrine—which he had researched online—into a document and shared it in the two-person WeChat group "Anime Pilgrimage Command Center" with Gao Yuan. The two excitedly discussed in the group, initially outlining a seven-day itinerary centered around Tokyo and extending to Kamakura. They agreed that Lei Mingxuan would focus on handling visas and flight tickets, while Gao Yuan would be responsible for delving into information on local limited-edition merchandise and doujin activities.

events.name: Pay partial payment to the supplier
events.description: Approaching the end of the month, Lei Mingxuan made partial payments for the remaining balances of the autumn goods to fabric supplier Zhou Tao in Hangzhou and accessory supplier Wu Fang in Guangzhou via online banking. This was done to maintain good business credibility, and he also communicated with them regarding the sampling schedule for the next batch of winter clothing fabrics and accessories.

events.name: Morning Run Along the Riverside to Adjust Mood
events.description: At 07:15 in the morning, Lei Mingxuan completed a 5-kilometer morning run along the Pudong Riverside Avenue in 28 minutes, enjoying the cool autumn air to alleviate pre-loan application anxiety.

起始状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled and motivated, I have several important tasks to handle today, with a slight sense of tension.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied and full of anticipation, the first step of the loan has been taken, the new home is secured, travel plans are taking shape, and relaxation follows after exercise.

state.今日运动: Ran 5 kilometers along the riverside in the morning, completing it in 28 minutes; walked approximately 4,000 steps during the commute.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny with occasional clouds, afternoon breeze, temperature 19-24°C.

2025-10.daily_overview: Today was a day of balancing shop operations with family care. During the day, Lei Mingxuan was occupied with the daily sales of the shop and the final preparations for the evening coffee sharing session. In the evening, he paused his work to accompany his parents in completing an important family matter—retrieving his father’s adjusted hearing aid. At night, he experienced his first moment of awe in the world of a new game and hosted a small yet delightful coffee sharing session at the shop, skillfully blending his personal interests with business.

events.name: First experience with a highly recommended AAA game.
events.description: Lei Mingxuan used the half-hour after waking up in the morning to download and install the game on Steam. After returning home from closing his shop in the evening, he eagerly launched the game. He spent over an hour meticulously creating his character and was deeply impressed by the cinematic-quality opening animation and the grand, majestic soundtrack. After familiarizing himself with the basic movements and interactions, he felt a strong sense of curiosity about exploring this new world.

events.name: Accompanying father to retrieve and adjust the hearing aid
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan deliberately closed his shop an hour early and drove his parents to the hearing aid fitting center located in Pudong. The audiologist conducted the initial fitting and adjustment for his father, Lei Jianguo, fine-tuning the parameters based on feedback from the actual ambient sound. Lei Mingxuan carefully noted down the key points for usage and maintenance, serving as a communication bridge between his parents and the audiologist while patiently explaining the professional terminology.

events.name: Family Dinner Celebrates Father's Hearing Improvement
events.description: After picking up the hearing aid and returning home, Wang Xiuying, Lei Mingxuan's mother, prepared a table of her signature dishes, including his favorite braised pork. During dinner, the family deliberately spoke at a normal volume. His father reported that he could hear much more clearly than before, and although he was still somewhat unaccustomed to background noise, the improvement was significant. Seeing the long-lost relaxed smile on his father's face, Lei Mingxuan felt deeply gratified and promised to check on his father's usage weekly. He ended up eating more braised pork during the meal, which led to a slight weight gain.

events.name: Procurement and Preparation for the Coffee Sharing Session
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan took some time to visit his regular coffee bean supplier to pick up the pre-ordered Ethiopian Yirgacheffe and Colombian Huilan beans. During the afternoon lull in customer flow, he meticulously set up a corner of the shop: wiping down the pour-over equipment, arranging tasting cups and small snacks, and adjusting the lighting to create a warm atmosphere, making final preparations for the evening coffee gathering with his regular customers.

events.name: Host a small coffee tasting and sharing event at the store.
events.description: At seven o'clock in the evening, the sharing session began as scheduled. Lei Mingxuan invited five or six regular customers, including Qian Duoduo and Feng Xiaoyu. He first briefly introduced the basics of SCA, followed by a live demonstration of hand-brewing techniques using coffee beans with two different roast levels. While savoring the differences between citrus and nutty flavors in the coffee, the group chatted casually about fashion and urban life, creating a relaxed and pleasant atmosphere. Lei Mingxuan skillfully connected this refined and leisurely lifestyle with the [Urban Outdoor] style of his shop.

events.name: Staying up late due to gaming addiction
events.description: After the sharing session, Lei Mingxuan returned home and continued to experience the new game. Captivated by the plot, he played until late at night without realizing it, resulting in insufficient sleep.

起始状态.心情: Calm, looking forward to the first gaming experience and store activities in the evening.

结束状态.心情: Warm and fulfilling, both my father's smile and the success of the sharing session brought joy, though a slight fatigue lingers after staying up late.

state.今日运动: No dedicated exercise; approximately 5,000 steps from walking around and arranging items in the store. Pre-sleep foot relaxation was neglected due to staying up late.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy to overcast with a chance of light rain in the evening, temperatures 17-22°C.

2025-10.daily_overview: The weekend commenced with efficiency and busyness. The morning meeting with the financial advisor provided a calming perspective on investments, followed by the handling of supplementary materials for a loan application. The highlight of the afternoon was the family's first collective car viewing and test drive, during which we purposefully experienced SUVs and MPVs to conduct on-site research for improving our parents' travel conditions. In the evening, a family meeting preliminarily aligned our direction for purchasing a vehicle, though emotional fluctuations due to work stress led to a relaxing game of billiards with Zhang Wei.

events.name: Meeting with Financial Manager Xu Feng to Discuss Market Volatility
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan met with Xu Feng at a quiet café in Xuhui. Xu Feng brought a detailed analysis report, pointing out that the current market adjustment was primarily driven by sentiment, and the fundamentals of the funds held by Lei Mingxuan had not deteriorated. He advised maintaining regular investments and suggested adding some bond funds to balance the risks. Although Xu Feng recommended "staying put," Lei Mingxuan, who was typically action-oriented, felt somewhat conflicted about whether to make manual adjustments while watching the floating losses in his account, and his mood was slightly agitated.

events.name: Received bank notification and supplemented loan materials
events.description: Shortly after parting with Xu Feng at noon, Lei Mingxuan received a call from his bank account manager, requesting supplementary documents to prove the stability of his business operations. These included utility bills for water, electricity, and gas from the past six months, as well as copies of his parents' property certificates as additional asset proof. He immediately instructed his shop assistant to locate and scan the utility bills at the store, while he returned home to retrieve the property certificates. Before 1 p.m., he had sent all the supplementary materials via email.

events.name: Accompanying parents on a test drive of the target SUV model
events.description: In the afternoon, the family drove to a joint-venture brand 4S store in Pudong. Father Lei Jianguo focused on experiencing the softness of the rear seats and the legroom, while mother Wang Xiuying expressed satisfaction with the spacious trunk. Lei Mingxuan took a test drive, experiencing the power of the 2.0T engine and the L2-level assisted driving functions, and inquired in detail with the salesperson about the maintenance intervals and costs.

events.name: Test Drive Comparison of MPV Models
events.description: After leaving the first 4S dealership, they visited a neighboring domestic brand store to experience a popular MPV. The parents were full of praise for the second-row aviation-style seats, but Lei Mingxuan felt after the test drive that the MPV drove like a boat, with less agile handling compared to an SUV. Additionally, since the family rarely travels fully loaded, the third row would likely see low usage.

events.name: The family meeting has preliminarily determined the inclination to purchase a car.
events.description: In the evening, the family of three sat on the living room sofa for a meeting. Lei Mingxuan used a tablet to display the configurations and price comparisons of two cars. The parents leaned toward the SUV because it appeared more [spirited] and had better off-road capability. Considering driving experience, vehicle maintenance costs, and brand reputation, Lei Mingxuan also believed the SUV was more suitable. The meeting concluded that they would visit two other brands to look at SUVs in the same category next week before making a final decision.

events.name: Discussing store optimization suggestions with girlfriend Lin Wei.
events.description: After dinner, Lei Mingxuan had a video call with Lin Wei. Based on her recent observations in the store, Lin Wei suggested brightening the lighting at the entrance to attract more customers and adjusting the height of some hanging rods to create a more visually open space. The two discussed these details for nearly half an hour. Lei Mingxuan found the conversation inspiring and plans to implement the adjustments next week.

events.name: Playing billiards with Zhang Wei to relieve stress.
events.description: Due to high work pressure during the day, Lei Mingxuan invited his childhood friend Zhang Wei to play billiards for an hour at a pool hall in the evening. They chatted while playing, which helped him relax emotionally, but he neglected strength training.

起始状态.心情: Feeling slightly stressed, needing to handle two major matters involving finances and family, with emotional fluctuations.

结束状态.心情: After making the decision, I felt a sense of relaxation. Family matters are progressing in an orderly manner, and my mood improved after playing billiards.

state.今日运动: Test drive, walking, and moving around the 4S store, approximately 4,500 steps; one hour of billiards activity.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with scattered showers, temperature 16-20°C. Outdoor activities require caution.

2025-10.daily_overview: Sunday is a day for exploration and experience. Due to light rain, the originally planned outdoor rollerblading was canceled, so Lei Mingxuan opted for a short self-driven trip to visit shops, seeking cross-industry inspiration. After returning to Shanghai in the evening, he had a cutting-edge VR gaming experience with his childhood friend Zhang Wei. The intense immersion left him exhilarated, and he eagerly shared this novelty within his social circle. That night, he went to bed later than usual due to the overexcitement from the VR experience.

events.name: Self-driving to Nanjing for an Investigation of Cultural and Creative Cafes
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan drove alone to Nanjing. He visited two popular cafes located in the Laomendong and Yihe Road Mansion areas. One combined Republican-era architecture with an independent bookstore, while the other sold a large number of Nanjing-based cultural and creative products. He ordered their signature coffees, carefully observed the spatial design, customer flow, and product displays, and took numerous photos with his phone. He contemplated how to integrate this "cultural landmark + consumption" model into the future upgrade of his own store.

events.name: Experiencing High-End VR Games with Childhood Friend Zhang Wei
events.description: After returning from Nanjing in the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan met up with Zhang Wei at a VR experience center in Xuhui Riverside. The two put on full sets of equipment and selected a two-player cooperative space shooter game. During the nearly one-hour experience, they had to collaborate to solve puzzles and evade attacks inside a virtual space station. The realistic sensation of weightlessness and visual impact thrilled Lei Mingxuan, though he experienced slight dizziness afterward.

events.name: Dinner Discussion on VR Experience and the Future of Technology
events.description: After the experience, the two had dinner at a nearby American-style restaurant. They excitedly reviewed the highlights of the game and discussed the potential applications of VR technology in future entertainment, education, and even social interactions. Zhang Wei joked that in the future, the "Pudong Trio" could play billiards together in VR. For dinner, they indulged in high-calorie burgers and fries.

events.name: Sharing Novel VR Experiences in Social Groups
events.description: After returning home, Lei Mingxuan posted photos and videos of his VR experience in the WeChat group "[Pudong Three Musketeers]" and tagged Li Na, who was in Hangzhou. The group immediately became lively, with Li Na expressing her desire to try it next time she returned to Shanghai, while Chen Hao teased Lei Mingxuan for "[indulging in frivolous pastimes]." Lei Mingxuan then sent a separate message to Liu Yang, who had recommended the experience, thanking him for the suggestion.

events.name: Organize Nanjing Exploration Inspiration Notes
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan imported the photos of the café he had taken in Nanjing during the day into his computer, categorized them briefly, and jotted down a few preliminary ideas in his memo: "Consider collaborating with local illustrators to launch trendy T-shirts with a Pudong theme" and "Could a corner of the shop be turned into a micro-exhibition space?"

events.name: Staying up late browsing technology news due to excitement about VR.
events.description: Overly excited by the VR experience in the evening, Lei Mingxuan browsed more VR and technology news on his phone in bed, which delayed his bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to a short trip filled with exploration and fresh experiences.

结束状态.心情: Excited and inspired, both the technological experiences and exploring shops in different places brought new stimulation, though a slight fatigue lingered after staying up late.

state.今日运动: The physical activity involved in VR experiences is relatively high, equivalent to 30 minutes of moderate-intensity exercise; however, driving to and from Nanjing involves minimal walking.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy to clear, with temperatures rising to 18-24 degrees Celsius.

2025-10.daily_overview: Today is a day filled with milestones. Five years ago on this date, Lei Mingxuan's clothing store opened for business. This year, on the same day, he witnessed the remarkable changes brought by discipline at the gym—his weight and body fat percentage have significantly decreased, and his BMI has entered the healthy range for the first time. This sense of accomplishment far exceeded his expectations. At the same time, a crucial step was taken in the family's asset replacement: the old house was successfully transferred, and a formal contract was signed for the new home. With double blessings, he shared his fitness achievements on his social media circle, receiving a flood of well-wishes.

events.name: Conduct a phased fitness achievement physical test
events.description: After closing the shop in the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan went to his regular gym for a comprehensive physical assessment. The results showed: weight 75.8 kilograms (a decrease of over 6 kilograms since the beginning of the year), body fat percentage reduced from 27% to 22%, and muscle mass increased. What excited him the most was that his BMI finally dropped to 25.7, placing him in the [overweight] rather than [obese] range. The coach highly commended his persistence over the past few months.

events.name: Develop the next phase muscle-building plan with the coach.
events.description: After the physical fitness test, based on Lei Mingxuan's new data, the coach worked with him to set goals for the next three months: to focus on increasing muscle mass in the chest, back, and shoulders to achieve a more upright physique, while ensuring that the body fat percentage does not rebound. A preliminary plan was made for three strength training sessions per week, along with a recommendation to moderately increase protein intake.

events.name: Create and share fitness comparison photos
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Lei Mingxuan retrieved the photo of his round belly taken at the beginning of the year from his phone's cloud storage and combined it with a picture of his toned physique taken at the gym that day. The stark contrast left even him astonished. He posted the comparison on his social media feed with the caption: "[Opened shop on May 20, 2020, 'shed the fat' on October 20, 2025! Grateful for the perseverance. Next stop: muscle building and shaping!]"

events.name: Received likes and encouragement from friends and family.
events.description: After the post was shared on the Moments, the likes and comments quickly exceeded a hundred. Family and friends, including parents, Zhang Wei, Lin Wei, Shen Jie, and Han Dong, all left congratulatory messages. Father Lei Jianguo rarely commented with [Not bad, kid], while mother reminded [Don’t push yourself too hard; make sure to rest]. Business partners and regular customers also gave their likes, with Qian Duoduo commenting, [With this level of discipline, boss, you deserve to make money].

events.name: Complete the transfer procedures for idle real estate.
events.description: In the morning, accompanied by a real estate agent, Lei Mingxuan and the buyer completed the property transfer procedures at the real estate transaction center and paid the relevant taxes and fees. This indicates that the process of selling the old house has been largely completed, and the funds are about to be recovered.

events.name: Sign the new home purchase contract and pay the down payment.
events.description: In the afternoon, after completing the transfer of the old house, Lei Mingxuan and his parents met with the new house landlord and the real estate agent. The three parties formally signed the "Shanghai Real Estate Sales Contract." Lei Mingxuan immediately paid a down payment of over one million yuan via mobile banking, successfully securing the elevator apartment in Jinqiao.

events.name: Celebrating Father's Adaptation to Hearing Aids
events.description: During dinner, Mother deliberately prepared extra dishes. Father was now able to use his hearing aid more comfortably to participate in family conversations, though occasional repetitions were still needed. Watching his parents communicate with ease, Lei Mingxuan felt this was a more tangible reward than any business success. The dinner portion was controlled to align with his weight-loss goals.

events.name: Morning Run Along the Riverside Consolidates Achievements
events.description: At 07:10 in the morning, Lei Mingxuan completed a 5-kilometer morning run along Binjiang Road in 27 minutes to celebrate his successful fitness test and improved athletic performance.

起始状态.心情: Calm yet with a hint of tension, there are several important matters to be addressed today, and I am looking forward to the physical test results.

结束状态.心情: Extremely proud, joyful, and filled with strength, the dual successes in fitness and family matters have brought immense satisfaction.

state.今日运动: Gym fitness assessment and light activity for 30 minutes; 5-kilometer morning run along the riverside, completed in 27 minutes.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with a clear sky and sparse clouds. Temperature ranging from 19 to 25 degrees Celsius.

2025-10.daily_overview: After yesterday's excitement, today was a day of solid progress. The bank loan officer visited the shop in person, and Lei Mingxuan calmly showcased the actual operations. The final payment from the sale of the house arrived, providing a solid foundation for the property exchange. As a reward for achieving his fitness goal, he placed an order for the long-desired PS5 gaming console and that AAA game. Meanwhile, the seeds of online collaboration were quietly sown, though the excitement over the game pre-order led to a slightly later bedtime.

events.name: Hosting a bank loan officer for an on-site inspection of the store.
events.description: At ten in the morning, the bank's credit review personnel arrived as scheduled at Lei Mingxuan's store located in the Century Avenue Mall. Several customers were already browsing at the time. While attending to the customers, Lei Mingxuan introduced the store's positioning, main customer base, inventory turnover rate, and future upgrade plans to the credit officer. The credit officer reviewed the recent sales records (which Lin Wei had helped organize clearly), observed the store's foot traffic and inventory situation, and expressed approval of the store's operational status.

events.name: Begin researching muscle-building training and diet plans
events.description: During the lunch break, Lei Mingxuan didn’t scroll through his phone as usual. Instead, he opened a fitness app to study training plans for the muscle-building phase. He focused on watching videos about chest and back workouts and noted down in his memo a list of ingredients and supplements to purchase, such as chicken breast, beef, and protein powder. He plans to strictly follow the regimen starting next week.

events.name: Confirm receipt of the final payment for the property sale.
events.description: In the afternoon, the notification tone of the mobile banking app sounded. Lei Mingxuan checked and found that the full remaining payment from the sale of his old house had been deposited. He immediately called his father to share the good news and confirmed that the amount was correct. The arrival of these funds completely resolved the pressure of the down payment and subsequent taxes for the purchase of the new house, bringing a sense of relief to the entire family.

events.name: Place an order to purchase a PS5 gaming console.
events.description: As a self-reward for achieving his fitness milestone, Lei Mingxuan placed an order for a disc-drive version PS5 console from the PlayStation official flagship store on JD.com, adding an extra controller and a racing game to his purchase. He did not hesitate when making the payment, believing this joy was worth the investment.

events.name: Pre-order the AAA game recommended by Liu Yang.
events.description: On the same day he purchased the console, he pre-ordered the long-awaited digital deluxe edition of that AAA game on the PlayStation Store. The thought of soon being able to experience its stunning graphics on the PS5 gave him extra motivation at work.

events.name: Online discussion with friends about the new mobile game
events.description: At noon, Lei Mingxuan saw Liu Yang sharing a review of a new anime-style game in the group chat. He clicked on it and watched for a few minutes, captivated by the exquisite character illustrations. The three briefly discussed the gameplay in the group, and Lei Mingxuan decided to download and try the game that evening as a way to pass the time while waiting for his PS5 to arrive.

events.name: Proactively contact the newly appointed promotion manager of the shopping mall.
events.description: Before leaving work, Lei Mingxuan found the WeChat of the new promotion department manager, Su Qing, through the mall's internal contact list. He sent a brief and friendly self-introduction message, mentioning his store and previous experience participating in mall activities, and expressed his anticipation for future cooperation. Su Qing replied promptly with a positive attitude.

events.name: Home strength training was put on hold due to a busy schedule.
events.description: Due to the busy affairs at the shop, Lei Mingxuan neglected the planned family strength training in the evening and only performed simple foot relaxation.

起始状态.心情: Steadfast, the confidence derived from yesterday's achievements carries over into today's work.

结束状态.心情: Calm and content, all matters are progressing according to plan, and I have rewarded myself, though feeling slightly fatigued.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise; approximately 6,000 steps taken during in-store customer service activities; 5 minutes of foot relaxation before sleep.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with slightly stronger winds in the evening, temperature 18-23°C.

2025-10.daily_overview: Today's theme is connection and preparation. Regular customer Qian Duoduo brings valuable collaborative resources, opening doors for online live streaming. Insights from exploring Nanjing's local spots have been systematically organized, forming a future inspiration library. Meanwhile, visa arrangements for the trip to Japan have officially commenced, and the concept for a pop-up event is gradually taking shape in mind. New projects in both life and career are simultaneously sprouting, fueled by late-night explorations in gaming.

events.name: Preliminary discussion on live streaming cooperation with regular customer Qian Duoduo
events.description: In the afternoon, Qian Duoduo visited the store. While trying on clothes, she mentioned in casual conversation that she knew a local outdoor lifestyle influencer named [Shanye Xiaoli], who was quite popular on Douyin and Xiaohongshu. Lei Mingxuan immediately showed great interest, and Qian Duoduo promptly created a group chat with the three of them. In the group, Lei Mingxuan briefly introduced the store's style, and both parties agreed to discuss the details later.

events.name: Communication of Cooperation Intentions with Lifestyle Bloggers
events.description: In the evening, through Qian Duoduo's introduction, Lei Mingxuan held a half-hour video conference with the team of [Shanye Xiaoli]. The blogger was very interested in the [Urban Outdoor] positioning of Lei Mingxuan's store. Both parties preliminarily confirmed a livestream direction themed [Autumn-Winter Outdoor Functional Outfits, Balancing Commuting and Weekend Wear], and agreed to prepare their respective proposals over the weekend before delving into further details.

events.name: Systematically Organize Nanjing Coffee Shop Exploration Notes
events.description: Taking advantage of the quiet afternoon at the shop, Lei Mingxuan systematically organized the photos and scattered thoughts from his store visit in Nanjing last Sunday on his computer. He summarized three key takeaways: 'Creating Narrative through Space,' 'Commercializing Local Cultural Elements,' and 'Regularly Hosting Community Events.' He created a new folder titled [Shop Upgrade Inspiration] and saved all these materials inside.

events.name: Begin preparing the pop-up display layout for the camping theme.
events.description: Inspired by the upcoming collaboration with an outdoor blogger, Lei Mingxuan envisioned creating a small camping-themed pop-up in the store, aligning with the mall’s future events. He took out paper and a pen, and based on the shop’s floor plan, sketched a simple layout. The sketch outlined areas designed to create an atmosphere with tents, kerosene lamps, and folding chairs, while also displaying clothing collections that matched the corresponding style.

events.name: First time entering the game's main city and exploring
events.description: Before going to bed at night, he turned on his computer and launched the AAA game. After completing the tutorial, his character finally entered the magnificent main city. He was captivated by the bustling virtual streets, the diverse architectural styles, and the numerous interactive NPCs in the game. He wandered aimlessly for a long time, accepted a few simple side quests, and became completely immersed in the atmosphere of this otherworldly realm, exploring until late into the night.

events.name: Received and set up the PS5 gaming console.
events.description: In the evening, the courier delivered the PS5 to the house. After returning home at night, Lei Mingxuan excitedly unboxed it and connected the brand-new black console to the living room's 4K TV. After a series of network setups, system updates, and account logins, the machine was finally ready. He only had to wait for the game preload to complete.

events.name: Entrust an intermediary to convey the offer to the new property owner.
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan contacted the real estate agent to formally authorize them to submit his party's official purchase offer to the owner of the Jinqiao property. The first round of written negotiations was conducted regarding the payment schedule (in conjunction with the progress of the bank loan) and the retention or removal of some furniture and appliances in the house.

events.name: The morning run along the riverbank was canceled due to staying up late playing games.
events.description: Due to staying up late exploring games last night, Lei Mingxuan felt fatigued in the morning and canceled the planned morning run, only performing some simple stretches.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful. The new day brings many communication and creative tasks, but there is a slight sense of drowsiness.

结束状态.心情: The sense of connection is strong, offering both new business opportunities and the enjoyment of exploring the virtual world, but fatigue sets in after staying up late.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise, only performed 10 minutes of morning stretching; light activity in the store.

2025-10.daily_overview: A day of balancing work and leisure. Online, detailed discussions were held regarding the collaboration with the influencer's livestream; offline, the venue for future events was inspected with the new mall manager. As a diversion from the busy life, the newly arrived PS5 and games brought intense instant joy, allowing him to reconnect with old friends online and rediscover the fun of multiplayer gaming, though the late-night gaming sessions led to a lack of sleep.

events.name: Confirm weekend car viewing arrangements with girlfriend Lin Wei.
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan contacted Lin Wei via WeChat to confirm their plan to visit car dealerships together on Saturday. He sent Lin Wei the addresses and scheduled test drive times for two new energy vehicle brand 4S stores he had selected, both of which emphasize design and intelligent features. Lin Wei added a brand recommended by her friend, known for its excellent interior craftsmanship. Together, they finalized an inspection route covering three stores.

events.name: Share VR Experience with Lin Wei and Extend an Invitation
events.description: While discussing the car viewing arrangements, Lei Mingxuan mentioned in passing the thrilling experience of playing VR with Zhang Wei last Sunday. He added, "If there are any two-player horror themes or scenic experience options next time, shall we give them a try together?" Lin Wei replied with a smile, "Sure, as long as it doesn't make me too dizzy."

events.name: Survey the pop-up event venue with the mall manager.
events.description: In the afternoon, Su Qing, the mall's promotion manager, and the property manager arrived near Lei Mingxuan's store. The three of them conducted an on-site measurement of the vacant area on one side of the atrium, confirming the location of power outlets and the main direction of pedestrian flow. Lei Mingxuan proposed the idea of creating a pop-up [Urban Camping Corner] there. Su Qing thought the concept was promising and suggested that he submit a detailed proposal.

events.name: Experience a new game for the first time on PS5
events.description: Returning home in the evening, the pre-ordered game had already finished downloading. Lei Mingxuan sat on the living room carpet and started the game with the controller. The PS5’s lightning-fast loading speed and immersive Dolby Atmos effects immediately captivated him. He created an agile character that resembled his own personality, spending over two hours running and fighting in the open world, completely losing track of time.

events.name: Online Discussion with High School Classmates About Initial Gaming Experience
events.description: After playing the game for a while, he shared a photo of the PS5 and the game screen in the [Pudong Three Musketeers] group chat and tagged Liu Yang: "The console and the game have arrived, and the graphics are stunning! Thanks for the recommendation!" Liu Yang and Chen Hao immediately joined the discussion, and the three of them debated over which equipment to prioritize for upgrades in the early stages of the game, creating a lively atmosphere.

events.name: Create a small gaming group and play online with old friends for the first time.
events.description: As the discussion grew more enthusiastic, Lei Mingxuan simply created a new three-person group chat named "Shanghai-Hangzhou Game Retirement Home" and added Liu Yang and Chen Hao. That evening, the three agreed on a time to team up in another popular multiplayer cooperative game. Although their coordination was rusty and they often suffered team wipes, their voice chat was filled with banter and laughter as they blamed each other and cracked jokes, as if they had returned to their student days, playing together until the early hours of the morning.

起始状态.心情: Feeling lighthearted and looking forward to the evening gaming session, but lacking sufficient sleep.

结束状态.心情: Joyful and nostalgic, the thrill of new games intertwines with the warmth of playing online with old friends, yet excessive late nights lead to fatigue.

state.今日运动: No dedicated exercise; all workouts were neglected due to time being occupied by gaming.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy turning to light rain, with temperatures dropping sharply to 15-19 degrees Celsius, bringing a noticeable chill.

2025-10.daily_overview: The sudden drop in temperature signals the arrival of late autumn. Lei Mingxuan is handling multiple follow-up tasks in the cold rain: proactively pushing for loan approval and successfully addressing inquiries, planning for next week's short-distance store visits, and providing ongoing support for his father's hearing aid adaptation. The gaming world has become a warm refuge, where he learns life skills and enjoys simple achievements. However, due to poor weather and fatigue, his exercise routine has been put on hold.

events.name: Proactively follow up on loan approval and address bank inquiries.
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan estimated that there should be progress on the loan approval, so he proactively called the client manager. The manager informed him that the risk control department had concerns about the amount and necessity of the [online marketing system development] item in his budget. Lei Mingxuan was well-prepared. Over the phone, he clearly explained that this budget would be used for the development of a mini-program e-commerce platform and initial promotional efforts. He cited examples from industry peers and outlined the expected return on investment, while also sending a simple market data comparison table to the manager. His professional explanation quickly alleviated the bank's concerns.

events.name: Plan a boutique coffee shop exploration itinerary in Nanjing for next week
events.description: Due to weather conditions, the originally planned weekend outdoor activities have been canceled. Lei Mingxuan has instead begun planning his itinerary for the following weekend. Through a coffee enthusiasts' community, he contacted a seasoned coffee aficionado in Nanjing and obtained a list of five niche specialty coffee shops. He also preliminarily mapped out the driving route and schedule for the round trip.

events.name: Selecting Matching Products for the Camping Pop-up
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan carefully selected a batch of clothing suitable for the outdoor camping theme in the shop's warehouse, based on the previously drawn sketches: olive green work jackets, durable denim shirts, multi-pocket functional vests, along with matching fisherman hats and canvas backpacks. He sorted these items separately and attached a [Camping Theme Selection] label to them.

events.name: Help Father Solve Minor Issues with Hearing Aid Usage
events.description: During dinner, the father mentioned that in the particularly noisy environment of the vegetable market, the amplified sound from the hearing aid was somewhat [harsh]. Lei Mingxuan immediately contacted the audiologist and learned that this was a normal occurrence. He then learned how to temporarily switch to a [noise reduction mode] for his father using a mobile app. In the evening, he patiently taught his father how to operate it on the phone once.

events.name: Learn fishing and mining skills in the game.
events.description: In the evening, perhaps seeking an escape from the day's tedious affairs, Lei Mingxuan did not advance the main storyline in the game. Instead, he found a life skills instructor and learned fishing and mining. He made his way to a picturesque lakeside, where he listened to soothing music and spent nearly an hour fishing intently. He caught several rare species, experiencing an inexplicable sense of relief and healing.

events.name: Follow up on the coffee sharing session and expand the community.
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan posted several wonderful photos from that day's event in the small WeChat group established during the previous coffee sharing session, once again thanking everyone for their participation. He privately messaged two new friends with whom he had particularly hit it off during the event, inviting them into the store's regular customer benefits group, gradually expanding his circle of loyal clients.

events.name: Went to bed early to rest due to cold symptoms.
events.description: Due to a sudden drop in temperature and recent late nights, Lei Mingxuan has developed mild cold symptoms, such as a sore throat, and has decided to rest early to recover his health.

起始状态.心情: Feeling somewhat gloomy due to the weather and the drop in temperature, but the task list is clear, and there is a slight physical discomfort.

结束状态.心情: Calm and in control, all matters were resolved smoothly despite some twists and turns. The game brought relaxation, but fatigue set in after catching a cold.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise was conducted; rest indoors was prioritized due to unfavorable weather and physical discomfort.

date_attribute.weather: Light rain turning overcast, with temperatures remaining low at 15-18°C.

2025-10.daily_overview: On a damp and chilly Saturday, the schedule was packed to the brim. A slight loss in his investment fund prompted deep reflection. In the afternoon, he spent half a day with Lin Wei test-driving cars, and her female perspective offered valuable insights. Meanwhile, multiple future plans were set in motion on the same day—live-streaming scripts, flash purchases, travel arrangements, first-aid training sign-ups—demonstrating his ability to efficiently manage multiple tasks. The evening ended with weight gain due to a gathering.

events.name: Reflecting on the Speculative Mentality in Fund Investment
events.description: In the morning, when checking his fund account, Lei Mingxuan found that the losses had widened a bit further. Although Xu Feng advised him not to make any moves, Lei Mingxuan kept thinking about it on his way to the billiards hall. During the game, he was somewhat distracted and briefly complained to Han Dong that "managing finances is even harder to predict than running a business." After returning home in the evening, he reviewed the situation alone and realized that his initial decision to buy funds was partly driven by a herd mentality and a desire to "make quick money," which contradicted his steady and pragmatic approach to business. He decided to consult Xu Feng more frequently in the future rather than making blind decisions on his own.

events.name: Test-driving the first new energy vehicle with Lin Wei.
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan picked up Lin Wei and headed to the first new energy vehicle brand 4S store. As soon as Lin Wei got into the car, she was drawn to the minimalist interior and the large central control screen. She carefully tested the voice control functions for the air conditioning and music, and made a point of sitting in the back seat to experience the space and seat comfort. During the test drive, Lei Mingxuan focused on the acceleration, while Lin Wei paid close attention to the smoothness of the braking and the performance of the autonomous driving assistance system in following traffic during congested road conditions.

events.name: Discuss and adjust the key points of vehicle inspection during lunch.
events.description: After the test drive, the two found a casual dining spot in the mall. Lin Wei candidly remarked that she felt the car's interior was somewhat "cold and minimalist," lacking a sense of warmth, and that the panoramic sunroof might let in too much sun during summer. Lei Mingxuan noted her feedback, and after discussing it, they decided to focus on examining the interior materials and heat-insulating glass of the dealership they planned to visit in the afternoon. For lunch, they indulged in high-calorie pizza and cola.

events.name: Test drive the second model that emphasizes a sense of luxury.
events.description: The second store visited in the afternoon featured a new energy vehicle from a traditional luxury brand. The exquisite leather stitching inside the car and the solid sound of the closing door left a good impression on both of them. Lin Wei particularly liked its multi-color ambient lighting and refined fragrance system. During the test drive, Lei Mingxuan paid special attention to how the chassis filtered bumps on the road, feeling that it was indeed more stable. However, the price was also noticeably higher.

events.name: Conclude the car viewing and thank Lin Wei.
events.description: After a day of car viewing, Lei Mingxuan drove Lin Wei home. On the way, he sincerely thanked her: "If it weren’t for you today, I might have only focused on the parameters and acceleration, completely overlooking these details." Lin Wei smiled and replied, "Then you owe me a meal." They agreed to discuss further next week after the test drive report from the third dealership was available.

events.name: In-depth discussion with the blogger team regarding the live streaming script
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan communicated with the blogger team again via video conference. Based on his car viewing experience during the day, he came up with the idea of designing specific styling scenarios such as "driving to go camping" and "urban micro-adventures after work" to make the livestream content more narrative. Both sides refined the product presentations and scripts for these scenarios.

events.name: Analysis of the Impact and Countermeasures of Personnel Changes in Shopping Malls
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan briefly reflected on his different experiences dealing with the old and new property managers. Zheng Kai was more casual and easier to work with due to familiarity, while Su Qing was more professional but required formal procedures. He realized he needed to adjust his communication style and planned to formally submit a written proposal for the [Urban Camping Corner] activity to Su Qing next week, aiming to secure resources through professionalism.

events.name: Procurement and Rental of Camping Pop-up Props
events.description: During a break from placing online orders, Lei Mingxuan purchased a batch of warm yellow string lights and artificial vines on Alibaba and a local rental platform. He also rented two off-white teepee tents, a set of folding tables, and four Kermit chairs to create a camping atmosphere.

events.name: Formulate a Preliminary Draft Plan for Japanese Anime Pilgrimage
events.description: He compiled the discussion results with Gaoyuan into a preliminary draft plan, listing the seven must-visit attractions, estimated daily transportation times, and an approximate budget. He sent the draft to Gaoyuan, and the two decided to proceed with passport renewal and visa material inquiries separately next week.

events.name: Register for Red Cross First Aid Training
events.description: Given that he frequently organizes outdoor activities and his shop is also a public space, Lei Mingxuan believed it was necessary to master first aid skills. He found information about upcoming training sessions on the official website of the Shanghai Red Cross, paid the fee online, and successfully registered for a weekend training course scheduled for the middle of next month.

events.name: Weekend family gatherings with lavish feasts
events.description: In the evening, the whole family gathered for a meal at a local Shanghainese restaurant near home to celebrate the week's achievements. They consumed a large amount of braised pork and pan-fried buns, resulting in a significant weight gain.

起始状态.心情: Stay calm, prepare for the intensive schedule, and alleviate cold symptoms.

结束状态.心情: Tired yet fulfilled, having completed extensive research and planning work, with clearer thinking now, though feeling slightly bloated after the dinner gathering.

state.今日运动: Test driving and walking in the 4S store amounted to approximately 5,000 steps; exercise was neglected due to social gatherings and busyness.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy day with a slight rise in temperature, ranging from 16 to 20 degrees Celsius.

2025-10.daily_overview: Sunday is a day for reflection, socializing, and leisure. In the morning, important asset transfer documents were processed. In the afternoon, a salon for regular customers, led by Lin Wei, was held at the shop, creating a warm and cozy atmosphere. In the evening, he immersed himself in the first story dungeon of a new game, experiencing a long-lost sense of achievement, and officially listed it as a long-term leisure hobby. At the same time, he began seriously considering replacing his phone with a new one that could better support his work, and started exercising to regain his ideal weight.

events.name: Signing the formal contract for the sale of the old house
events.description: In the morning, at the real estate agency's office, Lei Mingxuan formally signed the "House Purchase and Sale Contract" with the buyer and received the down payment made by the buyer. The transaction price was slightly higher than the initial listing price, which made him even more satisfied with this asset swap.

events.name: Attend the regular customer styling salon organized by Lin Wei
events.description: In the afternoon, Lin Wei organized a small autumn-winter fashion salon at Lei Mingxuan's store, inviting five or six core female customers, including Qian Duoduo and Feng Xiaoyu. Lin Wei prepared refreshments and shared the season's popular colors and styling tips. Lei Mingxuan supplemented with men's fashion advice and diligently recorded direct feedback from the customers regarding the store's merchandise, such as requests for more sizes and the popularity of certain colors.

events.name: Compile and compare all test drive vehicle information
events.description: After the salon concluded, Lei Mingxuan used the store's computer to compile all the information about the three car models he had test-driven over the past two days (including the two he had previously viewed with his parents). This included details such as configurations, quotations, driving experiences, Lin Wei's evaluations, and his parents' preferences, all organized into a detailed Excel comparison table. He also highlighted the respective advantages and disadvantages of each model.

events.name: Family Gatherings Narrow Down Car Purchase Options
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan invited Lin Wei to join him and his parents for dinner at a local Shanghainese restaurant near their home. During the meal, he shared a compiled comparison table of vehicle models. After discussion, taking into account factors such as budget, brand reliability, ride comfort, and Lin Wei's preference for smart features, everyone unanimously narrowed down the options to the new energy vehicle from a traditional luxury brand they had test-driven last and another well-regarded domestic SUV. It was decided that Lei Mingxuan would handle the final price negotiations the following week. They also controlled their food intake during dinner as part of their weight loss efforts.

events.name: Successfully challenged the game's first story dungeon.
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Lei Mingxuan booted up his PS5. He decided to take on the game's first story dungeon. The intricate level design and intense boss battles in the dungeon kept him fully engrossed. Although he failed once midway, he adjusted his strategy and eventually cleared it, earning generous rewards and a strong sense of accomplishment. This experience also sparked a deep interest in the game's storyline.

events.name: Establish gaming as a long-term leisure activity and set goals.
events.description: After clearing the dungeon, Lei Mingxuan was left wanting more. He realized that he truly enjoyed this immersive experience. Therefore, he set a few small in-game goals for himself: for example, reaching character level 30 by next month and collecting a complete set of the [Wandering Knight] appearance gear. He decided to allocate 1–2 hours of gaming time every night as a way to unwind after work.

events.name: Assess the Necessity of Replacing Work Phones
events.description: While organizing photos of the store's promotional activities, Lei Mingxuan noticed that his two-year-old phone was responding sluggishly, and the photo quality was no longer satisfactory, which affected the effectiveness of his posts on social media platforms like WeChat Moments and Xiaohongshu. He realized that as a crucial productivity tool, it was time to upgrade his phone.

events.name: Sorting out the core requirements for the new mobile phone
events.description: Before going to bed, he listed his core requirements for a new phone in his memo: 1. Top-tier photography and video capabilities (for product photography); 2. Smooth and lag-free performance (for running multiple store management, social media, and payment apps simultaneously); 3. Long battery life; 4. A budget of around 8,000 yuan. He initially shortlisted the latest flagship models from Apple, Huawei, and Xiaomi as potential options.

events.name: Morning jogging along the riverbank resumes the exercise routine
events.description: At 07:30 in the morning, Lei Mingxuan completed a 5-kilometer morning run along Binjiang Road in 27 minutes to burn off the calories from the previous day's gathering, and his weight has started to decrease.

起始状态.心情: Relax, enjoy the slow pace of the weekend, and resolve to restore healthy habits.

结束状态.心情: Social, family, and entertainment needs are well satisfied, with new plans made for the future, and a sense of well-being after exercise.

state.今日运动: 5-kilometer morning run along the riverside, completed in 27 minutes; light in-store activities.

2025-10.daily_overview: The new week begins with in-depth research. To finalize his car purchase decision, Lei Mingxuan searches online for genuine owner reviews. Concurrently, the collaboration with the blogger for a live stream has entered the practical stage of script refinement, and the production of promotional materials has also commenced. The gaming world presents new challenges and strategic discussions with old friends, with both work and leisure rhythms well-balanced, and weight continues to decrease.

events.name: In-depth Research on Owner Feedback for Target Vehicle Models
events.description: During the quiet hours of the day at the shop, Lei Mingxuan would open apps like Autohome and Dongchedi behind the counter, focusing on browsing owner reviews and long-term test articles of the two final candidate car models. He paid special attention to real feedback on [actual range achievement rate], [frequency of minor issues], and [quality of after-sales service], jotting down useful information into his comparison table.

events.name: Refine the live streaming script and scenarios with the blogger team
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan held the third online meeting with the blogger's team. This time, he brought a more specific proposal: designing a three-stage outfit change scenario for [commuting to the subway—office—after-work date]. He even wrote brief plots and dialogue outlines for each scenario. The blogger's director praised him for his creativity, and the two sides finalized 80% of the process.

events.name: Commission the Design of Live Streaming Promotional Materials
events.description: After the script was finalized, Lei Mingxuan compiled the key details, including the live stream theme, time, and core selling points, into a draft. He then sent it to his regular customer Qian Duoduo, requesting her assistance in finding a familiar designer to create promotional materials such as pre-event posters, live stream cover images, and a nine-grid picture set for social media promotion. Qian Duoduo worked with high efficiency, finding a suitable designer and setting up a work group on the same day.

events.name: Study the game boss mechanics and successfully defeat it.
events.description: Tonight, the main storyline of the game progressed to a crucial boss battle. This boss had complex attack patterns, and Lei Mingxuan initially failed repeatedly. Instead of recklessly charging in, he looked up a guide online to understand the boss's weaknesses. After closing up the shop and returning home, he focused intently, adjusted his equipment and skills according to the guide, and after five attempts, finally defeated the boss with a perfect dodge and counterattack, unlocking a new map and feeling an overwhelming sense of accomplishment.

events.name: Online discussion with Chen Hao regarding the game character lineup.
events.description: After defeating the Boss, he excitedly shared the results in the [Shanghai-Hangzhou Game Retirement Home] group chat. Subsequently, he and Chen Hao had a nearly hour-long voice discussion on WeChat, analyzing the skill combinations of different character classes in the game to prepare for more challenging team dungeons ahead. They also agreed to play together online again over the weekend.

events.name: Home Strength Training Recovery
events.description: Before going to bed at night, Lei Mingxuan performed 35 minutes of home upper body strength and core training to align with his muscle-building plan, while his body weight continued to decrease.

起始状态.心情: Focus. Several decisions need to be made this week based on sufficient information, and I feel energetic after exercising.

结束状态.心情: There is the joy of breakthroughs, with substantial progress made both in gaming and work preparation, leaving a sense of fulfillment after training.

state.今日运动: 35-minute home strength training; light in-store activity.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, the weather is warming up with temperatures ranging from 18 to 24 degrees Celsius.

2025-10.daily_overview: Today is a day of harvest and breakthroughs! The long-awaited 500,000 business loan has finally been approved, signed, and disbursed, injecting a strong boost for the store's upgrade. At the same time, the highly anticipated joint live-streaming debut, prepared over many days, was a resounding success, with sales and fan growth far exceeding expectations, achieving a breakthrough from 0 to 1 in online channels. Amidst this double joy, he also discovered an exhibition of interest and completed the final rehearsal before the live stream, reaching his target weight.

events.name: Sign the business loan contract and confirm the disbursement of funds.
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan received a notification from his bank relationship manager that his loan application had been approved. He immediately went to the bank branch and, under the guidance of the relationship manager, carefully reviewed the loan contract clause by clause. After confirming that key terms such as the loan amount, interest rate (4.5% annualized), and the three-year term were accurate, he solemnly signed his name. In the afternoon, he received a text message notification that the loan had been disbursed to his personal account.

events.name: Successfully conducted the first joint live broadcast.
events.description: At 8 p.m., the live stream titled [Autumn/Winter Outdoor Functional Wear] commenced punctually in a temporary studio set up inside the store. Lei Mingxuan was responsible for explaining the fabric and design concepts of the products, while the influencer [Shanye Xiaoli] handled the try-on demonstrations and energized the atmosphere. The two collaborated seamlessly, with the number of viewers peaking at over 3,000 and lively interactions in the comment section. The originally scheduled two-hour live stream was extended by an additional half-hour.

events.name: Stumbled upon exhibition information for [Between Mountain Ranges]
events.description: While browsing Xiaohongshu during his lunch break, Lei Mingxuan was drawn to a post about the [Between Mountains – An Exhibition on the Fusion of Outdoor Aesthetics and Urban Life]. The exhibition was held at the West Bund Art Center, and its theme aligned closely with the positioning of his store and his personal interests. He immediately clicked to learn more about the exhibition dates.

events.name: Schedule a Visit to the Exhibition for Tomorrow
events.description: After reading the exhibition introduction, Lei Mingxuan immediately clicked the link in the post to access the reservation platform and successfully booked a spot for the exhibition on the afternoon of the following day (October 29). He intended to treat this visit as an opportunity for professional learning and inspiration gathering.

events.name: Consult childhood friend Zhang Wei for suggestions on the final vehicle model.
events.description: After work, Lei Mingxuan invited Zhang Wei to dinner and showed him the detailed comparison and prices of the two final car models. As a car owner with years of driving experience, Zhang Wei offered practical advice on aspects such as vehicle costs (insurance, maintenance), second-hand resale value, and the coverage of local service outlets in Shanghai. This further tipped the scales in Lei Mingxuan's decision-making process.

events.name: Final rehearsal with the blogger before the live broadcast
events.description: Two hours before the live broadcast began, Lei Mingxuan and the blogger's team conducted a final full-process rehearsal. They tested all live-streaming equipment and network connections, rehearsed the sequence of product presentations, the timing of coupon distribution, and interactive scripts to ensure everything proceeded flawlessly.

events.name: Release live stream previews and research mobile phone reviews.
events.description: During the rehearsal break, Lei Mingxuan and the blogger posted the final promotional posters and short videos on their respective WeChat Moments and Douyin accounts. After the live broadcast ended in the evening, despite his excitement, he followed the plan and opened Bilibili to watch several in-depth comparison review videos about the iPhone 16 Pro and Huawei Mate 70 Pro, gathering knowledge in preparation for changing his phone.

events.name: Morning jogging along the riverside helps maintain weight loss results.
events.description: At 07:20 in the morning, Lei Mingxuan completed a 5-kilometer morning run along Binjiang Road in 26 minutes to celebrate the successful loan approval and reaching his target weight range.

起始状态.心情: With a mix of anticipation and a hint of nervousness, today is a critical day for both the loan and the live broadcast, and I am in good condition after exercising.

结束状态.心情: Extremely excited and filled with a sense of accomplishment, the loan is secured, the live stream was a success, and my career is now doubly insured! The joy of reaching the target weight.

state.今日运动: Standing and walking continuously for about 2 hours during the live broadcast is equivalent to moderate-intensity exercise; a 5-kilometer morning run along the riverside was completed in 26 minutes.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with warm autumn sunshine, temperature 19-25°C.

2025-10.daily_overview: After yesterday's brilliance, today is a day for reflection and absorption. In the morning, a review of the live-streaming data yielded encouraging results. The afternoon was entirely immersed in the art exhibition [Between Mountain Ranges], where works that blend functionality with aesthetics provided immense inspiration. In the evening, he shared these inspirations with partners and finalized the details for the weekend pop-up event at the mall, while his weight remained stable.

events.name: Review of Live Streaming Data and Results
events.description: The first thing Lei Mingxuan did upon arriving at the store in the morning was to open the live-streaming backend to check the data: total views reached 45,000, likes exceeded 100,000, final sales were locked at 15,800 yuan, and the store's Douyin account gained over 1,200 new followers. He immediately shared the good news with Lin Wei, Qian Duoduo, and the blogger team, and arranged for the staff to start packing and shipping the orders.

events.name: Visit the West Bund Art Center to view the exhibition.
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan entrusted the shop to Lin Wei's care and took the subway to the West Bund Art Center in Xuhui Binjiang. He visited the [Between Mountain Ranges] exhibition and was deeply captivated by the wearable art installations made from high-tech fabrics, furniture designs incorporating outdoor elements, and photographic works exploring the relationship between cities and nature.

events.name: Documenting Exhibition Insights and Reflections
events.description: During the exhibition, he continuously recorded inspirations in his phone's memo: "Can detachable modular design be applied to clothing?", "The role of lighting and materials in shaping the atmosphere is crucial", "What we sell is not just clothing, but an attitude of embracing nature."

events.name: Organize exhibition photos to build an inspiration library.
events.description: After returning home in the evening, he imported nearly a hundred exhibition photos he had taken into his computer and created folders categorized under [Spatial Design], [Material Innovation], [Concept Expression], and so on. These materials will serve as important references for his future communications with interior designers and suppliers.

events.name: Sharing Exhibition Insights with Partners
events.description: After organizing the photos, he selected several of the most impactful works and sent them to his cousin Shen Jie, university classmate Zhao Min, and supplier Zhou Tao, along with his brief comments. Shen Jie quickly replied, mentioning that several designer brands were making similar attempts and that she could make introductions.

events.name: Confirm the final process for the mall pop-up event.
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan held a brief online meeting with Su Qing, the mall's promotion manager, and representatives from the participating pop-up coffee shop and outdoor supplies store. They finalized the hourly schedule for the two-day event this weekend, as well as the material delivery times, safety guidelines, and contingency plans to ensure the smooth execution of the event.

events.name: Weekend Light Hiking Exploration
events.description: As a fitness adjustment, Lei Mingxuan took a 5-kilometer light hike along the Xuhui Riverside Greenway before the afternoon exhibition viewing, enjoying the autumn sunshine as a substitute for his morning run.

起始状态.心情: Pleasant and relaxed, starting a new day with a sense of fulfillment.

结束状态.心情: Enriched and inspired, the art exhibition broadened his business horizons, leaving him feeling refreshed after exercise.

state.今日运动: Approximately 8,000 steps for exhibition viewing; 5-kilometer light hiking on weekends.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with wind in the evening, temperature 18-23°C.

2025-10.daily_overview: The day the funds arrived marked the beginning of meticulous planning. Lei Mingxuan and Lin Wei carefully discussed the specific allocation plan for the 500,000 yuan loan. Meanwhile, he compared car purchase options, explored the maze of gaming choices, sought his cousin’s advice on selecting a mobile phone, and booked a hot spring trip as a reward for his family. Every penny and every decision was directed toward a better life and career, with the goal of maintaining his target weight.

events.name: The operating loan funds have been credited and transferred to the corporate account.
events.description: In the morning, the bank SMS confirmed once again that the loan funds had been credited. Lei Mingxuan logged into his mobile banking app, verified that the full amount of 500,000 yuan was in his account, and promptly transferred it to the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China corporate account of his store. This completed the fund consolidation, ensuring that the funds were used exclusively for their designated purpose.

events.name: Detailed planning with Lin Wei on the utilization of loan funds
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan arranged to meet Lin Wei at a café near the shopping mall. He took out a notebook, which listed the preliminary plan for the use of funds: 1. Paying the remaining balance for autumn and winter goods and pre-ordering fabric for next year's spring collection (approximately 150,000 yuan); 2. Upgrading the store's soft furnishings and purchasing equipment for the coffee corner (approximately 100,000 yuan); 3. Developing an online mini-program store and conducting initial promotions (approximately 150,000 yuan); 4. Reserving funds for emergencies and marketing activities (approximately 100,000 yuan). Lin Wei added some details, and the two reached a consensus.

events.name: Sharing exhibition inspiration with fashion industry peers
events.description: During a break in planning, Lei Mingxuan sent more details from yesterday's exhibition and his own thoughts to Shen Jie and Zhao Min. The three of them created a small group chat for discussion. Zhao Min mentioned that her company is planning a market event in collaboration with an outdoor brand and asked if Lei Mingxuan's store would be interested in participating. This opened up new possibilities for collaboration in his eyes.

events.name: Conduct a detailed comparison of the final two vehicle purchase options
events.description: During the store's lunch break, Lei Mingxuan used the final quotation obtained from the 4S dealership to meticulously calculate the monthly payments, total interest, and overall out-the-door costs for two target vehicle models under different down payment ratios and loan terms. He then compiled the final version of the financial comparison table, preparing the necessary data for the final negotiations over the weekend.

events.name: Solving puzzles and exploring in the game maze
events.description: That evening, the game progressed to a massive underground labyrinth. There were no intense battles here; instead, it was filled with puzzle-solving elements. Lei Mingxuan took great interest in studying the runes on the walls, pushing mechanisms, and searching for hidden treasure chests. It took him over an hour to make his way out, earning rare materials and a strong sense of intellectual satisfaction.

events.name: Consult cousin Yang Fan for professional advice on mobile phone selection.
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan made a video call to his cousin Yang Fan, who works as an algorithm engineer in Hangzhou, to inquire about the actual performance differences and heating issues between different mobile phone chips (A18 Pro vs. Kirin 9100) in terms of image processing and prolonged gaming. From a technical perspective, Yang Fan provided a very objective analysis and suggested that if Lei values photography and ecosystem, he should choose Apple, but if he prioritizes signal strength and battery life, he could wait for the new generation of flagship models from domestic brands.

events.name: Book a weekend family hot spring getaway
events.description: To celebrate the loan approval, the successful live stream, and his father's improved hearing, Lei Mingxuan decided to take his parents and Lin Wei to Wuyi, Zhejiang for a hot spring getaway over the weekend. He compared several resort hotels on a travel app and finally chose one with private hot spring pools, booking two rooms and hot spring tickets for Friday night.

events.name: Muscle-Building Oriented Strength Training
events.description: Before going to bed at night, Lei Mingxuan performed a 45-minute home muscle-building strength training session, focusing on chest and back exercises to kick off his winter muscle gain plan.

起始状态.心情: Be pragmatic. When faced with a large sum of funds, it is essential to plan calmly and maintain a stable state after exercise.

结束状态.心情: Meticulous and full of anticipation, the funds have been allocated with clear purposes, family vacations are already scheduled, and a sense of enhanced strength is felt after training.

state.今日运动: Muscle-building strength training for 45 minutes; light in-store activities.
