2025-10.daily_overview: The last day of October was spent wrapping up various tasks and preparing for a new cycle. Paying supplier invoices maintained a healthy supply chain; contacting the renovation company initiated the upgrade project; a review of October's operations with Lin Wei clarified her core role; and all materials for the weekend pop-up event were inventoried. Meanwhile, personal development plans (barista courses, first aid training) were officially launched, and preparations were made for tomorrow's family hot spring trip. Body weight remained stable at the post-diet level.

events.name: Pay part of the payment to core suppliers.
events.description: According to the financial plan established with Lin Wei, Lei Mingxuan today transferred approximately 80,000 yuan in autumn and winter payment via online banking to Zhou Tao in Hangzhou and Wu Fang in Guangzhou, maintaining a good cooperative relationship and discussing the development direction for the next batch of new products.

events.name: Contact the decoration company to discuss the store upgrade plan.
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan contacted a design studio he had previously engaged with, which specializes in industrial and minimalist styles, to schedule an on-site measurement of the shop for next week. He also conducted preliminary discussions on ideas for creating a [Urban Oasis]-themed space, optimizing the coffee corner, and upgrading the lighting system.

events.name: Review October store operations with Lin Wei and acknowledge her contributions.
events.description: After closing for the evening, Lei Mingxuan invited Lin Wei to have hand-brewed coffee in the shop, where the two formally reviewed the performance for October: successful livestreaming, steady growth in daily sales, and an expanded community of regular customers. Lei Mingxuan sincerely thanked Lin Wei for her comprehensive support in product selection, customer service, and event planning, and explicitly expressed his hope that she would become more deeply involved in the shop’s management in the future, even considering offering her a share of the performance-based dividends. Lin Wei indicated that she would seriously consider the proposal.

events.name: Inventory all preparation materials for the weekend flash event.
events.description: After the debriefing, the two of them went to the warehouse together and checked all the supplies prepared for the weekend [Urban Camping Corner] against the inventory: the rented tents and tables and chairs had arrived, the purchased string lights and greenery were intact, the selected themed costumes had been packed, and the promotional pull-up banners had been printed. They also confirmed the setup time for the following day with Su Qing from the shopping mall.

events.name: Formal Registration for SCA Barista Certification Course
events.description: After conducting an online search during the day, Lei Mingxuan ultimately selected an SCA-certified training institution located in Pudong. He completed the online registration and payment for the primary barista course, which is scheduled for two consecutive weekends in mid-November. He plans to systematically learn about coffee knowledge, with the aim of developing coffee experiences into a distinctive service for his store in the future.

events.name: Preparing for a Hot Spring Day Trip
events.description: After returning home, Lei Mingxuan checked the oil level and tire pressure of the family SUV and refueled it. He and Lin Wei verified the list of items to prepare for their parents on WeChat: swimsuits, bathrobes, common medicines, thermos cups, and so on. The family packed their luggage simply, filled with anticipation for the relaxing weekend trip.

events.name: Complete first aid responder training registration
events.description: Before going to bed, he double-checked the confirmation notification for his Red Cross first aid training registration, along with the class schedule and location, and added it to his phone calendar. Mastering first aid skills is not only a responsibility to himself and his family but also to the customers of his shop and the participants in his activities.

events.name: Ankle and Core Stability Training
events.description: Before going to bed at night, Lei Mingxuan performed a 15-minute ankle-core stability training, including balance pad exercises, to enhance athletic performance and prevent injuries, aligning with the conclusion of the health status.

events.name: Try a cold shower.
events.description: After exercising, Lei Mingxuan tried a 30-second cold shower to promote recovery and boost energy, marking the start of a new healthy habit.

起始状态.心情: Methodical and orderly, today is a day for wrapping up and preparing, and we are satisfied with the end-of-month results.

结束状态.心情: Steady and assured, October concluded successfully, with thorough preparations in place for November and weekend activities, achieving the targeted health status.

state.今日运动: 15-minute ankle-core stability training; attempt a 30-second cold shower; inventory and light handling of materials in-store.

2025-11.daily_overview: This was a weekend centered around family and leisure. In the morning, Lei Mingxuan drove with his family to Wuyi, Zhejiang, embarking on a long-planned family hot spring trip to enjoy a relaxing holiday. Meanwhile, he took advantage of the travel intervals to attend to some personal interests and short-term plans.

events.name: Start Your Home Hot Spring Journey
events.description: On Saturday morning, Lei Mingxuan drove his family car, carrying his parents and girlfriend Lin Wei, setting off from their home in Shanghai's Pudong district towards Wuyi, Zhejiang. Along the way, he played the old songs his father enjoys and the pop music Lin Wei likes, creating a relaxed atmosphere in the car. During a rest stop at a service area, he specifically bought pastries his mother loves. In the afternoon, they arrived at the pre-booked hot spring resort hotel. When checking in, he deliberately chose a room with a good view so that his parents could enjoy the scenery.

events.name: Routine cousin connection.
events.description: While waiting for his family to change clothes in the hotel, Lei Mingxuan had his weekly routine video call with his cousin Yang Fan, who works as an algorithm engineer in Hangzhou. Having seen recent news about adjustments in the technology sector, Lei specifically asked for Yang Fan's opinion. Yang Fan provided an analysis from the professional perspectives of technological development and industry cycles, believing that the long-term logic remained unchanged, though short-term fluctuations were inevitable. This exchange somewhat reassured Lei Mingxuan, who regularly invests in funds, but it also made him aware of his limitations as an individual investor and the need for more systematic research.

events.name: Soaking in Hot Springs and Family Dinner
events.description: After checking in, the family changed into swimwear and headed to the hotel's hot spring area. Father Lei Jianguo relaxed his joints in the warm spring water, exclaiming how comfortable it felt. Mother Wang Xiuying enjoyed the garden scenery while soaking in the spring. Lei Mingxuan and Lin Wei stayed by their side, chatting and helping take photos to capture the heartwarming moments. In the evening, the whole family enjoyed a sumptuous local specialty dinner at the hotel restaurant, during which the parents praised Lin Wei's thoughtful care.

events.name: Online Copy Challenge with Fellow Golfers
events.description: Returning to his room in the evening, Lei Mingxuan canceled the billiards game he had planned with friends in Shanghai. He put on his headphones and focused on playing online games with his high school classmates Liu Yang and Chen Hao. The three of them conducted multiple tactical attempts for the newly opened high-difficulty weekly dungeon in the game. After several rounds of coordination and failures, they finally cleared the dungeon and obtained rare rewards. Excitedly, the trio flooded the WeChat group named "Pudong Three Musketeers" with celebratory messages, savoring the rare moment of victory.

events.name: Check the Double 11 presale before going to bed.
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan lay in bed and habitually logged into apps like Taobao and JD.com to check the pre-sale policies for the latest models of his target smartphones. As a shop owner, he was highly sensitive to promotions. He carefully compared the prices, freebies, and installment offers for different configurations, organizing the preliminary information into his phone's memo app to prepare for future decision-making.

起始状态.所处地点: 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai, China
起始状态.心情: Joyful, filled with anticipation for the family trip

结束状态.所处地点: In a room at a hot spring resort hotel in Wuyi, Zhejiang
结束状态.心情: Relaxed and content, enjoying the warm moments spent with family and Lin Wei.

state.今日运动: No strenuous exercise, primarily hot spring relaxation and walking within the hotel.

2025-11.daily_overview: Continuing to enjoy the leisurely family hot spring trip. In the morning, the whole family took a walk in the mountain forest, and in the afternoon, they drove back to Shanghai. This short trip strengthened family bonds and further integrated Lin Wei, providing a warm and positive start to Lei Mingxuan's busy November.

events.name: Morning Walk in the Mountain Forest
events.description: On Sunday morning, after the whole family enjoyed the buffet breakfast at the hotel, Lin Wei suggested taking a walk along the mountain trail around the hotel. Her parents happily agreed, and everyone strolled slowly along the path, breathing in the fresh air while chatting about daily life and admiring the scenery. Father Lei Jianguo said he felt much more relaxed in his joints, while mother Wang Xiuying was very interested in the plants along the way. Lei Mingxuan served as the photographer, using his phone to capture many heartwarming family photos.

events.name: Consulting Fellow Gaming Enthusiasts
events.description: During a brief rest after returning from a walk, Lei Mingxuan recalled a major and perplexing twist in the game's plot that had occurred after he cleared the dungeon the previous night. He contacted his anime enthusiast friend Gao Yuan via WeChat. The two discussed the matter over a voice call for nearly two hours, during which Gao Yuan shared his analysis of the game's world-building and some advanced player strategies and tips. This provided Lei Mingxuan with fresh insights, reigniting his interest in the upcoming stages of the game.

events.name: Reviewing the Trip and Strengthening Relationships
events.description: Before lunch, Lei Mingxuan and Lin Wei had a private moment together at the tea house in the hotel garden. They privately reflected on their feelings during the trip and shared observations about interacting with each other’s families. Lin Wei said that Lei Mingxuan’s parents’ simplicity and care made her feel warm, while Lei Mingxuan thanked Lin Wei for her thoughtful arrangements that brought joy to his parents. The two discussed in a relaxed manner how to better integrate into each other’s families in the future, and their relationship deepened further as the trip drew to a close.

events.name: Warm Return Journey
events.description: After lunch, the family checked out and drove back to Shanghai. On the way, everyone enthusiastically reminisced about the highlights of the trip. The father remarked that the hot spring soak was well worth it, as his joints felt much more comfortable; the mother praised the hotel's garden and cuisine, and even made plans with Lin Wei to study Shanghainese cuisine together next time. In the evening, they safely arrived home in Pudong, concluding this fulfilling family short trip.

events.name: New addition: Evening drinks lead to staying up late
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Lei Mingxuan shared a few drinks with his parents to celebrate their trip back. As the conversation grew lively, they stayed up later than usual.

起始状态.所处地点: In a room at a hot spring resort hotel in Wuyi, Zhejiang
起始状态.心情: Comfortable, enjoying the relaxed feeling of being on vacation.

结束状态.所处地点: At Home, No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Warm and fulfilling, with both family relationships and intimate connections being nurtured, though feeling slightly fatigued.

state.今日运动: Approximately one hour of walking on the mountain forest trail.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy turning overcast with a slight drop in temperature.

2025-11.daily_overview: Returning to the workweek, Lei Mingxuan swiftly shifted into an efficient multitasking mode. During the day, his primary focus was on store operations and data analysis. In the evenings, he engaged in formal discussions with his parents regarding two significant family plans—purchasing a car and upgrading the store—laying the groundwork for subsequent actions.

events.name: Store Daily Operations and Data Organization
events.description: On Monday morning, Lei Mingxuan arrived at the store on time and first handled the backlog of orders and restocking matters from the weekend. During the afternoon when customer flow was relatively low, he retrieved sales system data from the past three years in the small office at the back of the store and conducted a cross-analysis with the mall’s foot traffic records. He meticulously organized sales growth trends, best-selling categories in autumn and winter, peak customer flow hours on weekdays and weekends, and sketched a preliminary profile of core customers. These data will serve as strong support for his store upgrade plan.

events.name: Study the Fundamentals of Coffee
events.description: During the afternoon break, Lei Mingxuan began learning about coffee knowledge in the store using a tablet. He had enrolled in the SCA Barista Skills Foundation online course and today studied the first module: the three main coffee processing methods (natural, washed, and honey) and their impact on flavor, along with an initial understanding of coffee roasting stages. He took notes while referring to the flavor wheel chart from the course, feeling as if a new world had opened up to him. He began seriously considering the possibility of introducing a coffee corner in the store in the future.

events.name: Family Meeting with Parents: Car Purchase Plan
events.description: After dinner, Lei Mingxuan held a formal family meeting with his parents in the living room. He first proposed purchasing a new car, considering the increased frequency of store restocking and the future convenience for family trips. During the meeting, the three of them clarified the budget for the car purchase (approximately 200,000 to 300,000 yuan) and its primary purposes (balancing store restocking, family outings, and daily commuting). From a practical perspective, his father Lei Jianguo leaned toward a spacious SUV, while his mother Wang Xiuying placed greater emphasis on ride comfort and noise insulation. Lei Mingxuan himself was particularly interested in intelligent driving assistance features. The meeting preliminarily aligned on the general direction.

events.name: Launch online vehicle model research
events.description: After the family meeting, Lei Mingxuan used the evening hours to go online in his study, beginning intensive online research. Based on the needs identified during the family meeting, he focused on several mainstream SUVs and sedans from both joint-venture and domestic brands on professional websites such as Autohome and Dongchedi, as well as platforms like Zhihu and Bilibili. After an initial screening, he meticulously recorded the parameter configurations, reputations, and price ranges of five to six potential models—including the BYD Han, Toyota RAV4 Rongfang, and Volkswagen Tiguan L—in the memo app on his phone.

events.name: Plan the layout for store upgrade
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan’s thoughts returned to the upgrade of his store. Based on the dimensions of his current shop and the vacant one next door, he casually sketched a layout plan for the expanded space in his notebook. He clearly delineated areas for clothing display, a more spacious fitting room, a coffee lounge corner for resting and chatting, and a small zone for shooting short videos of new products, also marking the customer flow path. This vision excited him greatly.

起始状态.所处地点: 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Energetic and ready to tackle the challenges of the new week, yet feeling slightly fatigued.

结束状态.心情: Busy yet clear-minded, with preliminary outlines for two major future plans (buying a car and expanding the store), feeling slightly pressured.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise, commuting and moving around in the store.

2025-11.daily_overview: During rainy days when customer flow remained relatively stable, Lei Mingxuan shifted his focus to skill enhancement and external outreach. He continued his coffee courses and proactively initiated preliminary discussions with both the mall management and regular customers regarding the future development of the shop and potential online collaborations.

events.name: Study of Coffee History and Origins
events.description: After the shop opened in the morning, Lei Mingxuan, noticing the sparse customer flow, seized the opportunity to log into the learning platform and completed the second module of the SCA Barista Certification. He learned about the history of coffee’s spread from Africa to the rest of the world, memorized major producing regions such as Ethiopia, Brazil, and Colombia, and clarified the basic differences between Arabica and Robusta beans. He drew a simple world map in his notes to mark the producing areas, thoroughly enjoying the learning process.

events.name: Initial Communication with the Property Manager
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan took the initiative to visit the mall property management office to meet with manager Zheng Kai. The two chatted over tea in Zheng Kai's office, during which Lei Mingxuan proposed renewing the lease for his store and expressed his hope to expand into the adjacent vacant space for an upgrade and renovation. Zheng Kai indicated that he needed to first report the matter to the mall's promotion department and suggested that Lei Mingxuan prepare a more detailed proposal. He also revealed that the mall plans to create a more youth-oriented themed block next year, which is a positive signal for Lei Mingxuan.

events.name: Schedule a Meeting with the Promotion Manager
events.description: After leaving the property management office, Lei Mingxuan immediately contacted Su Qing, the newly appointed promotion manager of the shopping mall, via WeChat. Adopting a consultative and collaborative approach, he formally requested a meeting to discuss the store upgrade plan and the mall’s event resources. Su Qing responded promptly, and the two successfully scheduled a meeting for the afternoon of November 10.

events.name: Discussing online collaboration with regular customers
events.description: In the evening, Qian Duoduo, a regular customer and friend, visited the shop. Lei Mingxuan discussed with her the effects brought by the previous live stream and delved into how to make online traffic generation a regular practice. From the perspective of new media operations, Qian Duoduo offered many suggestions, such as regular themed live streams and a short video content matrix. The two became increasingly engrossed in the conversation and decided to jointly plan the next phase of online content collaboration strategy.

events.name: Plan the learning path for short videos
events.description: Inspired by his conversation with Qian Duoduo, Lei Mingxuan decided to systematically learn short video planning and editing at home that evening. He searched and saved a series of free professional tutorials on Bilibili and Douyin, covering topics from shooting equipment selection and scriptwriting to introductory video editing software. He initially planned to spend one month mastering the basic skills and producing his first promotional video for the store, aiming to build capabilities for online operations.

events.name: New addition: Mild headache due to stress, early bedtime.
events.description: After studying in the evening, Lei Mingxuan felt a slight headache, likely due to accumulated stress recently, and decided to rest early to regain energy.

起始状态.心情: Pragmatic, ready to advance the plan, but feeling slightly unwell.

结束状态.心情: Full of drive, feeling increasingly clear about the path of store upgrades and digital transformation, with health improving.

state.今日运动: No specialized exercise.

2025-11.daily_overview: This was a day packed with events and challenges. During the day, Lei Mingxuan successfully resolved a customer dispute in the store, demonstrating exceptional business acumen. In the afternoon, he spontaneously signed up for first aid training, reflecting a strong sense of social responsibility. In the evening, he continued preparing for car purchases and store upgrades while enjoying a relaxing moment of online interaction with friends.

events.name: Skillfully Resolving Customer Disputes
events.description: In the afternoon, two young female customers got into a dispute in the store over the last piece of a new hoodie. Lei Mingxuan, who was sorting goods, quickly noticed and proactively stepped forward. He first patiently listened to both sides’ demands (one was a regular customer, Qian Duoduo, and the other was a new customer who came with a friend) and helped calm their emotions. After understanding the situation, he proposed a solution: he reserved the purchase right for Qian Duoduo while registering the new customer for VIP out-of-stock notification, promising to prioritize restocking within a week. He also offered each of them a trendy accessory as an apology. The dispute was quickly resolved, with Qian Duoduo making a satisfactory purchase and the new customer leaving her contact information.

events.name: Review the event and optimize the process
events.description: After seeing off the customer, Lei Mingxuan immediately gathered the on-duty staff for a brief debriefing. He emphasized the importance of proactive service and anticipating potential conflicts, and requested more prominent notifications for in-demand inventory going forward. He realized the need to institutionalize the experience gained from this crisis management incident.

events.name: Encountered by chance and promptly signed up for first aid training
events.description: During the lunch break, Lei Mingxuan happened to see a notice posted by the Shanghai Red Cross Society about a weekend first-aid training course while browsing on his phone. The content covered CPR, AED usage, and wound management, and the training was scheduled over two weekends. He thought about how he often engaged in outdoor activities and that his shop was also a public space, making it essential to master first-aid skills. Without much hesitation, he immediately filled out the information on the official website, selected a batch, and paid the fee online. Afterward, he contacted his mother and the part-time shop assistant to arrange for store duty during the training period.

events.name: Evening Conversation with Father
events.description: During dinner, Lei Mingxuan reported to his parents the process of handling a customer dispute during the day, and both parents praised him for handling it appropriately. After the meal, he presented to his parents the detailed comparative data and preliminary preferences for several car models he had compiled through online research. He specifically sought his father’s advice on vehicle durability and his mother’s suggestions on rear-seat comfort. Based on their input, he decided to start visiting dealerships in person over the weekend.

events.name: A Moment of Relaxation in the Game
events.description: Before going to bed at night, Lei Mingxuan played a game for a while and encountered a funny bug where a character got stuck in the terrain. He immediately took a screenshot and shared it in the "Pudong Three Musketeers" group chat, which sparked teasing and a series of "hahaha" from Liu Yang and Chen Hao. Soon, everyone started sharing their recent amusing experiences in games, creating a relaxed and lively atmosphere in the group and easing the tension he had felt throughout the day.

events.name: Newly Added: Working Overnight on the Store Upgrade Plan
events.description: To prepare the store upgrade plan, Lei Mingxuan stayed up late into the early morning, adjusting the PPT and budget draft, which resulted in insufficient sleep.

起始状态.心情: Maintain a normal mindset and prepare for daily operations, but be aware of sleep deprivation.

结束状态.心情: There is a sense of accomplishment from solving problems and a feeling of fulfillment from learning new skills (first aid), but also a great deal of exhaustion.

state.今日运动: No dedicated exercise, but frequent walking within the store.

2025-11.daily_overview: Following the events of the previous day, Lei Mingxuan shifted his focus today to internal optimization and plan refinement. He formally drafted new service procedures, began conceptualizing the visual style for the brand upgrade in detail, and simultaneously prepared for the weekend car viewing and family meeting.

events.name: Solidification Process: Drafting the Out-of-Stock Registration Specification
events.description: Before opening the shop in the morning, Lei Mingxuan used the computer and integrated the store's membership system to formally draft a proposal titled "VIP Out-of-Stock Registration and Priority Notification Process." He clarified the registration conditions, restocking time limits (e.g., [response within 72 hours]), notification methods (WeChat/phone), and appropriate compensation standards (such as small gifts or discount coupons), transforming yesterday's crisis management experience into an executable standard operating procedure.

events.name: Conceptualize the visual style for the new store
events.description: During his free time in the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan began conceptualizing the brand visuals for the upgraded store based on a hand-drawn layout. He aimed for a style that blended street fashion with minimalist industrial aesthetics. He contacted his cousin Shen Jie, a fashion buyer, via WeChat video to seek professional advice. Shen Jie suggested using a primary palette of premium gray accented with bright orange, with lighting designed to serve both display and ambiance purposes. She also recommended several niche designer brands for reference.

events.name: Communicate upgrade requirements with suppliers
events.description: Before leaving work, Lei Mingxuan contacted Zhou Tao, the fabric supplier in Hangzhou, and Wu Fang, the accessories supplier in Guangzhou, via WeChat. He informed them about the store's plan to upgrade and expand its space, asking whether they could provide more products with stronger design appeal and higher quality. He even explored the possibility of launching exclusive collaborative styles in the future. Both suppliers expressed strong interest and agreed to bring new samples for review next time.

events.name: Family Meeting: Discussing the Decoration Style of the New Home
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan and his parents held another family meeting, this time to discuss the interior design style for their soon-to-be-occupied new home. Lei Mingxuan preferred a modern minimalist style for its ease of maintenance; his mother, Wang Xiuying, hoped for a warm and cozy atmosphere with more warm tones and wooden elements; while his father, Lei Jianguo emphasized practicality and durability. They browsed design examples on a mobile app and eventually decided to base the design on a modern minimalist style, incorporating a sense of warmth through soft furnishings such as sofas, curtains, and decorative paintings, while also reserving ample storage space.

events.name: Plan the weekend car viewing itinerary
events.description: After the family meeting, Lei Mingxuan scheduled test drives at several 4S stores in Pudong for the weekend through car apps and brand official websites, based on the previously selected car models. He shared the model comparison list and appointment times with his parents via WeChat, preparing for the whole family to go out and conduct on-site inspections.

events.name: New addition: Exercise postponed due to fatigue
events.description: Due to staying up late the night before, Lei Mingxuan felt fatigued and decided to temporarily set aside his evening fitness training, opting instead for light rest.

起始状态.心情: Calm, focused on refinement and planning, yet physically fatigued.

结束状态.心情: The thinking is clear, and it feels like various plans are progressing from ideas to concrete steps, but more rest is needed.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise, only mild rest.

2025-11.daily_overview: Friday is the day for information acquisition and social expansion. During the day, Lei Mingxuan expanded his network of potential collaborators at the merchant exchange event in the mall. In the evening, he devoted himself to studying coffee knowledge and finalized his mobile phone purchasing strategy for the Double Eleven shopping festival, preparing for the intensive activities of the weekend.

events.name: Attend the quarterly merchant exchange meeting at the shopping mall
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan arrived punctually at the shopping mall's conference room to attend the quarterly merchant exchange meeting. Promotions Manager Su Qing introduced the mall's key marketing focuses for the fourth quarter and the activity plans for the Christmas and New Year holidays. During the free discussion session, Lei Mingxuan proactively engaged in conversation with the owners of an independent jewelry store and a vintage shoe store located on the same floor. They discovered that their customer bases were similar and their styles complemented each other, leading to an in-depth discussion on the preliminary concept of jointly organizing a pop-up event themed [Vintage Trend Street] in the future. They also exchanged contact information.

events.name: Learning Coffee Extraction Principles
events.description: After closing the shop in the evening, Lei Mingxuan continued his SCA coffee course at home, studying the core principles of extraction. He learned how water temperature, grind size, coffee-to-water ratio, and time affect the flavor of coffee, and compared the differences between various methods such as espresso, pour-over, and French press. Using the simulation tools on the platform to adjust parameters, he visually observed the results of over-extraction and under-extraction, finding it very interesting.

events.name: Finalizing the Double Eleven Shopping Strategy for Device Purchases
events.description: After several days of comparison, Lei Mingxuan compiled all the mobile phone research information before going to bed. His old phone had become noticeably sluggish, affecting both photo-taking and responding to client messages. After weighing factors such as performance, imaging capabilities, price, and brand preference, he narrowed his choices down to two flagship models. He devised a purchasing strategy: prioritize securing the configuration with the greatest discount from the brand’s official flagship store and set up alternative platforms as backups, all set for the start of the Double Eleven shopping event at midnight.

events.name: Explain the New Service Process to Store Staff
events.description: During the brief morning meeting, Lei Mingxuan formally explained the newly established "Out-of-Stock Registration Process" to all staff members. He also simulated standard response steps for similar dispute scenarios through role-playing, ensuring that every staff member understood and mastered the procedures, thereby effectively implementing service optimization.

events.name: New: Temporary change of dietary plan
events.description: Due to the social dinner after the exchange meeting, Lei Mingxuan temporarily altered his healthy dinner plan and consumed a relatively large amount of greasy food, resulting in a slight weight gain.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward, I have plans for both the afternoon exchange session and the evening study.

结束状态.心情: It has been a fruitful experience, expanding business connections while also gaining knowledge, though I feel slightly nervous about tomorrow's arrangements.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise.

2025-11.daily_overview: The entire weekend was occupied by intensive first-aid training. Today marks the first day of the program, during which Lei Mingxuan spent the whole day at the training center studying first-aid theory and practicing CPR. The content was both substantial and practical. In the evening, he had an in-depth discussion with his father about their car-shopping experiences.

events.name: First Day of First Aid Training: Theory and CPR Introduction
events.description: Lei Mingxuan arrived at the Red Cross Training Center early in the morning. In the morning, he studied theoretical knowledge such as the legal principles of first aid, on-site safety assessment, and the responsibilities of rescuers. In the afternoon, the focus was on learning cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR), including assessing consciousness, calling for help, the depth and frequency of chest compressions, as well as key points for opening the airway and performing artificial respiration. He carefully observed the instructor's demonstration of standard procedures.

events.name: First CPR and AED Simulation Practice
events.description: After theoretical learning, Lei Mingxuan and his fellow trainees were divided into groups to conduct CPR practical exercises on manikins under the guidance of instructors. He repeatedly practiced compression techniques and rhythm, striving to meet the standard requirements. Subsequently, he also learned the procedures for turning on an automated external defibrillator (AED), placing the electrode pads, and delivering a shock. Experiencing these lifesaving skills for the first time, he felt both a great sense of responsibility and immense benefit.

events.name: An Evening Walk with Father Discussing Cars
events.description: After the training session, Lei Mingxuan took a walk with his father in the community garden while having an in-depth conversation about cars. He used his phone to show his father the detailed specifications and user reviews of several SUVs and sedans he had filtered through online research. Drawing on his years of driving experience, his father offered specific insights on the vehicles' interior space, practicality, off-road capability, and the long-term reputation of different brands. After discussing, they narrowed down their options for on-site inspections to three SUVs and one sedan.

events.name: Immersive Game Leveling
events.description: In the evening, to relieve the tension from studying during the day, Lei Mingxuan played a video game for a while. The game entered a continuous high-difficulty combat zone where saving progress mid-way was not allowed. He closed the door, put on headphones, and focused all his attention on the challenge. After several failures and adjustments to his strategy, he finally cleared the level in one go. The intense and thrilling process allowed him to temporarily forget his exhaustion.

events.name: Irregular eating habits during the training period
events.description: Due to the tight training schedule, Lei Mingxuan had a boxed lunch provided by the training center, which was relatively greasy and led to a slight weight gain.

起始状态.心情: Serious and slightly curious, looking forward to the first aid training, though it requires getting up early.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling yet slightly fatiguing, I acquired practical lifesaving skills, had rewarding exchanges with my father, but the diet affected my weight.

state.今日运动: First aid training involves a significant amount of standing physical activities, and there is an evening neighborhood walk.

2025-11.daily_overview: On the second day of first aid training, the focus shifted to trauma care and comprehensive drills, with a greater intensity. During breaks in the training, Lei Mingxuan took the time to review coffee knowledge and made a preliminary estimate of the budget for upgrading the shop, making the weekend both intense and productive.

events.name: Day Two of First Aid Training: Trauma Care
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan studied on-site first aid for common injuries, including hemostasis methods for different types of bleeding (digital pressure, pressure bandaging). He focused on practicing various bandaging techniques such as circular bandaging, spiral reverse bandaging, and figure-eight bandaging using bandages and triangular bandages, and conducted simulated operations on the arms and calves of his companions.

events.name: Learn the Heimlich Maneuver
events.description: In the afternoon session, we learned the Heimlich maneuver for airway foreign body obstruction in both adults and children. The instructor provided a detailed explanation of the key operational points for the standing position, lying position, and self-rescue techniques. Lei Mingxuan and his partner practiced repeatedly to ensure correct posture and force application.

events.name: Comprehensive Simulation Scenario Drill
events.description: At the conclusion of the training, the instructor set up simulated emergency scenarios (such as falling and fracturing a bone during exercise, or choking while eating). Lei Mingxuan's group was required to perform a full-process operation, ranging from on-site assessment and calling for help to administering CPR, using an AED, and applying trauma bandaging. He actively participated, collaborated with his teammates, consolidated the skills he had learned, and identified his own shortcomings through the instructor's feedback.

events.name: Coffee Knowledge Stage Review and Assessment
events.description: Returning home in the evening, though exhausted, Lei Mingxuan still persisted in logging into the coffee learning platform. He systematically reviewed the foundational knowledge about coffee beans, processing methods, roasting, and extraction that he had studied over the previous four days, revisiting his notes. Then, in one go, he completed the first comprehensive stage test provided by the online platform, achieving a good score, which boosted his confidence for the upcoming hands-on courses.

events.name: Rough Estimate of Store Upgrade Budget
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan, based on the layout sketch and the visual concepts discussed with Shen Jie, roughly listed the potential costs involved in the upgrade in his notebook: increased rent due to expansion, wall and floor renovations, custom display shelves, coffee corner equipment, initial inventory funds for upgraded goods, etc. He then prepared a preliminary investment budget draft, gaining a clearer understanding of the required funding scale.

events.name: New Addition: Training Fatigue Leads to Exercise Suspension
events.description: Due to the all-day intensive training, Lei Mingxuan felt extremely fatigued, completely setting aside his daily exercise routine to focus on rest.

起始状态.心情: Slightly fatigued but persevering, aware that today is a crucial day for training.

结束状态.心情: Extremely fulfilling and rewarding, having mastered the full set of basic first aid skills while keeping up with other study plans, though physical recovery remains insufficient.

state.今日运动: The all-day first aid training includes extensive hands-on practice with sufficient physical activity, but no additional exercise.

2025-11.daily_overview: The new week began with Lei Mingxuan making progress on several key fronts: he successfully met with the mall's promotion manager in the morning, securing support for the store's upgrade; completed the transfer of ownership for the new house in the afternoon, marking a joyous family milestone; and spent the evening making final preparations for both the Double Eleven shopping festival and the upcoming trip to Japan.

events.name: The First Formal Meeting with the Mall Promotion Manager
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan met with Su Qing, the mall's promotion manager, in her office to present his preliminary proposal. He elaborated in detail on his store upgrade plan, the concept of a multi-brand retail space, and his ideas for collaborating with the mall's themed block activities. From the perspective of the mall's overall promotion strategy, Su Qing expressed support, noting that his plan aligned with the mall's youthful positioning. She also shared some internal resource application procedures and advised him to prepare a detailed proposal. The meeting proceeded very smoothly, laying a solid foundation for subsequent negotiations.

events.name: Complete the transfer procedures for the newly purchased property.
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan went to the real estate transaction center with his parents. They met with the seller and the real estate agent, submitted all the required documents, paid the relevant taxes and fees, and successfully completed the property transfer registration process, receiving the "Receipt of Documents." Legally, this elevator apartment now officially belongs to their family.

events.name: Final Preparations on the Eve of Double Eleven
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan set a sale reminder on the e-commerce page of the target phone and added his desired configuration to the shopping cart in advance. He checked the balances in his Alipay and bank card, confirmed the delivery address (which was filled with the store address for convenient daytime receipt), and ensured everything was ready, waiting only for midnight.

events.name: Discussing Store Image Positioning with Girlfriend
events.description: During lunchtime, Lei Mingxuan and Lin Wei had a brief date at a café near the shopping mall. He excitedly shared the details of his morning meeting with Su Qing and, for the first time, exchanged ideas with Lin Wei about the overall image style and target customer positioning of the upgraded store. From the perspective of a female consumer, Lin Wei offered many nuanced suggestions, and the two engaged in a lively and enthusiastic conversation.

events.name: Family Dinner to Celebrate the Transfer of Property Ownership
events.description: In the evening, the parents prepared a sumptuous table of Shanghainese cuisine to celebrate the completion of the property transfer. During the meal, they enthusiastically discussed furniture selection and room allocation for the new home. Wang Xiuying, the mother, even began planning what flowers to plant on the balcony. The family atmosphere was filled with joyful anticipation for their future life.

events.name: Added: Staying up late due to emotional fluctuations from joy
events.description: Due to the successful property transfer and smooth meeting, Lei Mingxuan was in high spirits and chatted with his family until late, resulting in him going to bed later than planned.

起始状态.心情: Anticipating with a hint of nervousness, there are several important matters to attend to today.

结束状态.心情: Joyful and uplifting, the store upgrade has received crucial support, a major family matter has been successfully settled, bringing multiple layers of satisfaction.

state.今日运动: No dedicated exercise, shuttling between trading centers and shopping malls.

2025-11.daily_overview: On Double Eleven, Lei Mingxuan rationally completed the upgrade purchase of his work phone and leveraged the promotional buzz to plan an offline linkage event for his store. Additionally, he exchanged currency for Japanese yen for his upcoming trip to Japan and met with his financial manager, seamlessly integrating consumption, business operations, and financial planning in an orderly manner.

events.name: Successfully placed an order for a new phone.
events.description: At midnight, Lei Mingxuan promptly began his purchase. Thanks to thorough research and preparation beforehand, he quickly placed an order for the new flagship phone, which emphasizes imaging and performance, at a satisfactory discounted price from the official flagship store of the target brand and completed the payment. He regarded this as a necessary productivity investment to enhance the online operational efficiency of his store.

events.name: The store participates in the Double 11 offline promotion.
events.description: As a brick-and-mortar store owner, Lei Mingxuan naturally did not miss out on the Double Eleven hype. He posted a "Double Eleven Offline Celebration" poster in his shop window and on his WeChat Moments ahead of time, offering limited-time discounts on select autumn and winter collections and launching a gift-with-purchase promotion for orders above a certain amount. On the day, foot traffic in the store was noticeably higher than on regular weekdays, resulting in a small sales peak.

events.name: Exchange Japanese Yen cash
events.description: Taking advantage of the noon break, Lei Mingxuan went to the bank to handle his business. He made an appointment and exchanged a sufficient amount of Japanese yen for two people to use in Japan at a Bank of China branch near his home. Considering potential shopping and dining expenses, he exchanged a slightly larger amount than budgeted and kept the cash separately for safety.

events.name: Consult with a financial manager regarding capital planning.
events.description: After work, Lei Mingxuan arranged to meet with financial manager Xu Feng at a café in Xuhui. He presented the store upgrade plan and budget draft, seeking advice on how to optimize his existing fund portfolio to ensure greater flexibility when funds need to be mobilized in the future, without compromising overall financial security. Xu Feng provided professional recommendations for adjusting the asset allocation.

events.name: Learning the Theory of Italian Coffee and Milk Foam
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan continued his coffee course, moving into the more hands-on module on Italian-style coffee. He studied the structure and working principles of an Italian coffee machine, as well as the parameter standards for brewing a qualified espresso. He then delved into the theory of milk frothing, including the angle of the steam wand, air intake, and temperature control. After watching numerous demonstration videos on milk frothing and latte art, he was eager to give it a try.

events.name: New addition: Staying up late for shopping sprees leads to insufficient sleep.
events.description: Due to the Double Eleven shopping rush, Lei Mingxuan stayed up past midnight, resulting in shortened sleep time and affecting his energy the next day.

起始状态.心情: Slightly weary from staying up late, yet looking forward to the new phone and the store's promotional activities.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied, both rational consumption and store operations have yielded gains, and financial planning has become clearer, but it is extremely exhausting.

state.今日运动: No specialized exercise.

2025-11.daily_overview: Weekday evenings are Lei Mingxuan's designated social time. He engaged in an exhilarating game of pool and a deep late-night conversation with his childhood friend Zhang Wei, which not only strengthened their precious friendship but also facilitated an exchange of professional insights. During the day, he received his new mobile phone and continued making preparations for purchasing a car and planning a trip.

events.name: New phone arrived and data migration completed
events.description: In the morning, the courier delivered the new mobile phone to the shop, and Lei Mingxuan personally signed for it. During the lunch break, he eagerly unboxed it to inspect the device and confirmed it was in perfect condition. Subsequently, using the official migration tool from his old phone, he securely transferred important data such as contacts, shop management apps, social media accounts, and product photos to the new device, completing the initial setup.

events.name: A Billiards Night with Childhood Friend Zhang Wei
events.description: After closing his shop, Lei Mingxuan drove to the pool hall where he had arranged to meet Zhang Wei. The two engaged in a game of American eight-ball, with their skills proving evenly matched. During breaks in the game, they delved into a detailed exchange about their recent lives. Zhang Wei showed great concern for Lei Mingxuan's shop upgrade and his family's home purchase, and from his perspective as a company marketing manager, he shared insights on industry trends such as brick-and-mortar store transformation and online-offline integration. The conversation spanned topics from childhood anecdotes to mid-career planning, unfolding in a relaxed yet profound atmosphere.

events.name: Late-Night Snacks and Hearty Conversations Outside the Billiards Hall
events.description: After playing, the two still felt unsatisfied and found a barbecue restaurant they often visited near the billiards hall for a late-night snack. While drinking beer and eating skewers, they continued chatting about family, potential future collaborations, and even touched upon the topic of Zhang Wei's child's education. Afterward, they each drove home and tentatively scheduled the next family gathering.

events.name: Seeking car purchase advice from fellow golfers
events.description: At the billiards hall, Lei Mingxuan also consulted Han Dong, a fellow car enthusiast, for car purchasing advice. He shared several models from his preliminary selection, specifically inquiring about vehicle noise insulation engineering, the impact of SUV chassis tuning on comfort, and the reliability of common intelligent driving assistance systems. Based on his maintenance experience, Han Dong provided a very practical analysis and reminders regarding maintenance costs.

events.name: Purchasing Travel Supplies for Japan
events.description: During the day, Lei Mingxuan took some time to purchase a portable mobile Wi-Fi device suitable for use in Japan on Taobao. At the same time, he retrieved his DSLR camera, GoPro, and power bank, tested all the devices to ensure they were functioning properly, and cleared the memory cards.

events.name: Social gatherings lead to slight weight gain.
events.description: Due to consuming a significant amount of high-calorie food during late-night snacks, Lei Mingxuan has experienced a slight increase in weight.

起始状态.心情: Feeling peaceful and looking forward to the gathering with old friends tonight, though slightly fatigued.

结束状态.心情: Relaxed and joyful, the in-depth conversation with old friends provided emotional support and new perspectives, while the new phone enhanced the sense of work efficiency, though dietary habits affected body weight.

state.今日运动: The billiards activity lasts approximately 2 hours and is a moderate-intensity recreational sport.

2025-11.daily_overview: Lei Mingxuan has entered the critical stage of plan integration and negotiation preparation. He compiled all preliminary results into a professional "Store Upgrade Proposal" and conducted a productive formal meeting with the property manager. Meanwhile, the itinerary for the trip to Japan has also been finalized.

events.name: Integration of the "Store Upgrade Plan" Completed
events.description: Lei Mingxuan's primary focus today was integration. He consolidated all the materials prepared earlier—including the sales data analysis report, hand-drawn layout sketches, visual style concept images, positive feedback from suppliers, and the preliminary investment budget—into a logically structured "Store Upgrade and Expansion Proposal." Additionally, he created a concise presentation using PowerPoint. This proposal will serve as the core document for his negotiations with the shopping mall.

events.name: Formal Meeting with the Property Manager
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan brought the prepared proposal and held a formal meeting with Zheng Kai in the mall's property management office. He systematically presented the store's past performance, brand upgrade concepts, and specific expansion needs. Zheng Kai acknowledged his planning and preparation while providing a draft of the mall's overall promotional plan for the following year. Both parties engaged in preliminary yet in-depth discussions on core commercial terms, including lease renewal conditions, expansion area, rent adjustment range, and lease term. The negotiations achieved substantial progress.

events.name: Finalize the Japan travel itinerary.
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan once again connected online with his fellow anime enthusiast Gao Yuan from Hangzhou. They exchanged the detailed information each had gathered, resolved questions in the draft itinerary regarding museum reservations and transportation transfers, and finalized the detailed arrangements for each day from their arrival in Tokyo to departure from Osaka. This included morning and afternoon attractions, restaurant options, and modes of transportation, resulting in an actionable travel plan.

events.name: Procurement of Travel Essentials
events.description: On his way home from work, Lei Mingxuan went to a supermarket and pharmacy to purchase travel-sized toiletries, portable skincare products, common medications (cold medicine, gastrointestinal medicine, band-aids), and a foldable lightweight backpack, preparing supplies for the upcoming trip.

events.name: Learning Coffee Equipment Cleaning and Maintenance
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan studied the module on hygiene in the coffee workspace and equipment maintenance from the SCA course. This section covered the daily cleaning and basic upkeep of grinders and espresso machines, which aligned with his philosophy of maintaining store cleanliness and product care from his experience running a clothing store. He grasped the concepts quickly and began envisioning the maintenance standards for the coffee corner in his future shop.

events.name: New Addition: Emotional Fluctuations Due to Negotiation Pressure
events.description: Although the negotiation with the property manager during the day went smoothly, it brought some pressure, causing Lei Mingxuan to experience slight emotional fluctuations in the evening, which he alleviated through studying and planning.

起始状态.心情: Focused, preparing for critical data integration and negotiations, but feeling slightly pressured.

结束状态.心情: Filled with confidence, the store upgrade plan has received positive feedback at the official level, and the travel plan has also been finalized. Everything is under control, and the mood remains steady.

2025-11.daily_overview: Friday unfolded amidst a light drizzle. Lei Mingxuan was primarily occupied with final preparations before his trip: he began packing his luggage and completed the online theoretical exam for his barista certification. Meanwhile, his relationship with the mall's promotion manager was further strengthened through an informal exchange.

events.name: Start packing for the Japan trip
events.description: Based on the weather forecast for late November in Japan, Lei Mingxuan selected thermal underwear, a sweater, a lightweight down jacket, a scarf, a hat, and waterproof shoes from his wardrobe in the evening, and began packing them methodically into a 28-inch suitcase. Following the principle of "placing heavy items at the bottom and rolling wrinkle-prone clothing," he made room for additional items to be added later.

events.name: Complete the SCA Barista Online Theory Examination
events.description: During the afternoon when customer traffic in the shop was sparse, Lei Mingxuan logged into the coffee learning platform and completed the final online theory test for the SCA Barista Skills Foundation certification within the allotted time. The questions covered all the knowledge points he had studied over the past two weeks. He answered calmly and ultimately achieved a passing score, indicating that he was fully prepared in terms of knowledge for the upcoming offline practical training.

events.name: A Brief Café Chat with the New Promotion Manager
events.description: During the lunch break, Lei Mingxuan invited Su Qing, the promotion manager, for an informal brief chat at the Starbucks inside the mall. He further discussed the previously mentioned idea of organizing a themed pop-up event with the neighboring store and inquired about specific details and procedures for applying for the mall's promotional resources. Su Qing provided additional internal information and expressed supportive inclinations. The conversation between the two was relaxed, fostering a more harmonious cooperative relationship.

events.name: My girlfriend helped pack and plan the new home.
events.description: In the evening, Lin Wei, his girlfriend, came to Lei Mingxuan's home to help sort and pack some old belongings in preparation for the upcoming move. As they tidied up, they excitedly discussed the details of the new home's decoration, the functional zoning of each room, and their preferred furniture styles. They infused their shared vision of life into the concrete planning of these items, brimming with anticipation for the future.

events.name: Stay Updated on New Blind Box Product Drawings
events.description: While scrolling through his phone before bed, Lei Mingxuan noticed a new popular series of trendy toys about to be released on the official Pop Mart mini-program. He carefully read the lottery rules, release time, and information about the hidden edition. As an experienced collector, he decided to participate in the online lottery. However, given his many past experiences of "running alongside" without success, he didn't hold out much hope and was merely participating out of habit.

events.name: New addition: Staying up late due to travel excitement
events.description: Excited about the upcoming trip to Japan, Lei Mingxuan stayed up later than planned after packing his luggage in the evening.

起始状态.心情: Steady progress is being made according to plan in all preparations, yet there is a sense of excitement.

结束状态.心情: Everything is in order, travel preparations are complete, studies have passed the assessments, interpersonal relationships are progressing, and I feel good, but I am sleep-deprived.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise was done, but packing and organizing also count as physical labor.

2025-11.daily_overview: The second training weekend focused more on acute condition identification and comprehensive skills. The full day of intensive first aid training made Lei Mingxuan deeply aware of the significant responsibility involved. During breaks in the training, he also remembered a regular customer's birthday, showcasing his attentiveness. In the evening, he had an important conversation with his girlfriend about the future.

events.name: First Aid Training: Identifying Common Medical Emergencies
events.description: At the training center, Lei Mingxuan learned how to identify and handle several common emergencies in the morning, such as syncope, stroke (FAST principle), epileptic seizures, and severe allergic reactions. The instructor explained the key points of symptom identification and the initial response measures to be taken before the arrival of professional medical personnel, using real-life cases. These measures included calming the patient, maintaining an appropriate posture, and avoiding inappropriate medication.

events.name: First Aid Training: Comprehensive Skills Practical Assessment
events.description: The afternoon session was the highlight of the day. Under the guidance of the instructor, Lei Mingxuan, along with other trainees, repeatedly engaged in comprehensive hands-on training of key first-aid techniques, including cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR), the use of an automated external defibrillator (AED), bleeding control and bandaging, and fracture immobilization. Group assessments were also conducted in simulated scenarios. He emphasized the importance of standardized procedures to ensure effective assistance in emergency situations.

events.name: Discover the birthdays of regular customers and record them.
events.description: While scrolling through his social media feed during the lunch break, Lei Mingxuan noticed a post from Qian Duoduo, a regular customer, hinting that her birthday was approaching in a few days. He immediately recognized this as an excellent opportunity to strengthen client relations, quietly noted the date, and began contemplating a birthday gift that would be both thoughtful and not appear overly deliberate.

events.name: A Deep Conversation with My Girlfriend at the Cafe
events.description: After the training concluded, though fatigued, Lei Mingxuan still arranged to meet Lin Wei at a quiet café. In a relaxed atmosphere, the two engaged in their first earnest and candid conversation about marriage, initial thoughts on building a future family, and the direction of their respective career developments. The discussion was free from pressure, more akin to jointly sketching a blueprint for the future, marking a new phase in their relationship where they began planning their lives together.

events.name: Immerse in the Climax of the Game's Plot
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Lei Mingxuan set aside ample time to play games in order to unwind completely. As the main storyline of the game reached its climax, several well-produced and emotionally charged cutscenes unfolded. He turned off the lights, put on headphones, and immersed himself fully in the experience. His emotions fluctuated with the fate of the main characters, providing him with an excellent sense of emotional immersion and temporarily relieving the academic pressures of the day.

起始状态.心情: Be serious and well-prepared for the final first aid skills assessment.

结束状态.心情: Tired but deeply worthwhile, having mastered life-saving skills and taken an important step forward in the relationship with my beloved, my heart is full.

state.今日运动: Full-day first aid training involves significant physical exertion, including numerous squats and compressions, making it a highly demanding activity.

2025-11.daily_overview: It was a tense yet rewarding Sunday. In the morning, Lei Mingxuan completed the final assessment of his multi-day first aid training and successfully obtained the Red Cross First Aid Certificate, which heightened his sense of responsibility. In the afternoon, a sudden surprise arrived—the long-awaited notification for a rare trendy toy lottery draw finally came, making up for his previous disappointments from multiple failed attempts. He shared this joy with his friends and carefully prepared a birthday gift for his regular customer, Qian Duoduo. In the evening, he stood contentedly before his collection cabinet, admiring his new acquisition, and shared his pride in mastering first aid skills on his social media feed.

events.name: Final Assessment for First Aid Training
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan participated in the final assessment of the first aid training at the training center. He first calmly completed the closed-book theoretical exam in the classroom, which covered all knowledge points including cardiopulmonary resuscitation, trauma care, and management of common emergencies. Later, in the practical operation area, facing the randomly selected "simulated traffic accident scene" scenario by the examiner, he demonstrated the entire set of procedures—from scene assessment and calling for help to performing hemostasis, bandaging, and fracture immobilization for the simulated injured person. The process was clear, the techniques were standardized, showcasing his strong practical skills and on-the-spot adaptability.

events.name: Awarded Red Cross First Aid Certificate
events.description: After all assessments were completed, the training instructor announced the results. Lei Mingxuan successfully passed both the theoretical and practical assessments. Witnessed by his fellow trainees, he solemnly received a brand-new Red Cross First Aid Certificate from the instructor. The instructor emphasized the social responsibility of a first aider, and Lei Mingxuan deeply felt that this was not merely a certificate but a weighty commitment. He exchanged experiences and took group photos with several familiar trainees, bringing this special skill-learning journey to a perfect conclusion.

events.name: Sharing Gains and Sense of Responsibility on Social Media
events.description: After returning home, Lei Mingxuan was filled with a sense of accomplishment. He made a cup of tea and posted his first aid certificate on his social media feed with the caption: "Hope it never has to be used, but it's essential to know how. The X-day training has concluded—full of gains and a deepened sense of responsibility." The post quickly received likes and admiring comments from his parents, Zhang Wei, Song Jia, Zhao Min, and many other friends and relatives. Qian Duoduo even commented, "The boss is amazing!"

events.name: Unexpectedly won the lottery for a rare trendy toy.
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan, who was scrolling through his phone, unexpectedly received a text message from Pop Mart's official account notifying him that he had won the lottery. The message indicated that he had obtained the qualification to purchase a long-awaited rare hidden edition. Overjoyed, he completed the online payment almost without hesitation, following the instructions provided. The long-standing "grudge" in his heart was finally released.

events.name: Prepare a birthday gift for the regular customer Qian Duoduo
events.description: Remembering that tomorrow was the birthday of Qian Duoduo, a regular customer and friend, Lei Mingxuan made time in the evening to visit his shop. Considering Qian Duoduo’s usual lively and cheerful style of dressing, he carefully selected a newly arrived, creatively designed scarf with playful prints from the store. He then wrapped it simply in gift paper, planning to surprise her with it the next day.

events.name: Sharing the Joy of Winning the Lottery
events.description: After successfully completing the payment, Lei Mingxuan couldn't wait to share the screenshot of his winning draw in the "Pudong Three Musketeers" WeChat group and several trendy toy collector groups, accompanied by a smug emoji. As expected, the group chats were immediately flooded with a wave of "envy, jealousy, and resentment" along with congratulatory messages. His basketball friend Han Dong sent a message inviting him to play a game to celebrate, while his anime enthusiast friend Gao Yuan began discussing the design details of the item.

events.name: Store Safety Inspection and First Aid Kit Configuration
events.description: Inspired by the daytime training, Lei Mingxuan specifically inspected the firefighting facilities in the shop when he returned to close up in the evening. Following what he had learned, he then ordered a standard first aid kit online for the shop, intending to place it near the cash register. He also planned to provide the staff with brief training on its basic uses to enhance the shop’s safety measures.

events.name: Temporary Morning Run Recovery Attempt
events.description: In the evening, feeling somewhat stiff, Lei Mingxuan decided to go for a 20-minute jog around the neighborhood to alleviate the fatigue from prolonged sitting during the training period. This was his first exercise session after the first aid training, and although his heart rate was slightly elevated, he felt good overall.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Feeling slightly nervous and expectant, thinking about today's first aid assessment.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study, No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New Area, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Fulfilled, proud, and joyful, there is both the solid sense of mastering new skills and the satisfaction of winning a draw and preparing gifts.

state.今日运动: Evening jog for 20 minutes

2025-11.daily_overview: On Monday, Lei Mingxuan refocused his attention on his career. Taking the initiative, he held his first formal negotiation with Zheng Kai, the property manager of the shopping mall, regarding store upgrades and lease expansion. He received positive feedback and submitted a letter of intent. Meanwhile, the family relocation plan was also put on the agenda. In the evening, he held the first family meeting with his parents to preliminarily discuss the details of the move. The busy day was spent intertwining plans for both career and family.

events.name: First Formal Negotiation for Store Upgrade and Expansion
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan took the initiative to meet with Zheng Kai, the property manager of the shopping mall. In the property management office, he systematically explained to Zheng Kai the stable performance of his store in recent years and formally proposed a preliminary idea of incorporating the adjacent vacant shop to upgrade it into a small brand collection store. He presented a hand-drawn rough spatial layout plan, including an expanded fitting area, a reserved coffee corner, and a short video shooting corner. Zheng Kai listened attentively, expressing the mall's support for high-quality merchants to strengthen their operations, and provided an initial rent adjustment proposal along with possible policy support information. They agreed to discuss the contract details further in subsequent meetings.

events.name: Draft and submit a letter of intent for space expansion.
events.description: Following the preliminary consensus reached with Zheng Kai in the morning, Lei Mingxuan drafted a formal "Letter of Intent for Store Expansion and Lease Renewal" in the afternoon at the cashier computer in the store. The document specified key terms such as the intended expansion area, expected rental range, and the start and end dates of the new lease term, along with a brief description of the upgrade plan. Upon completion, he formally submitted it to the mall's property management department via email and in hard copy, marking a substantial step forward in the upgrade plan.

events.name: To identify potential brand partners for upgrading
events.description: During the negotiation breaks, Lei Mingxuan utilized fragmented time to conduct preliminary research and screening of several domestic independent designer brands and niche streetwear brands whose styles aligned with his own store and that he personally admired, using the internet and industry WeChat groups. He recorded their contact information and initial collaboration ideas in preparation for future negotiations on brand introduction.

events.name: First Family Relocation Discussion Meeting
events.description: In the evening, the family of three had dinner together at home. After the meal, Lei Mingxuan, as the main coordinator, convened the first family meeting about moving. They discussed the main reasons for moving (the convenience of an elevator-equipped apartment and improving the parents' living environment), a list of large items to be moved, the general target area for the rental apartment (hopefully in Pudong, not too far from both the new home and the shop), and a preliminary moving budget. Mother Wang Xiuying felt both excited and somewhat sentimental about sorting through old belongings, while father Lei Jianguo was more concerned about the choice of moving company and the costs involved. Lei Mingxuan used the memo app on his phone to record the key discussion points and respective tasks (such as the father contacting the moving company and the mother starting to organize clothing).

events.name: Send birthday wishes and gifts to Qian Duoduo.
events.description: During the lunch break, Lei Mingxuan sent Qian Duoduo a birthday greeting via WeChat, informing her that the gift was ready and she could pick it up at the store anytime or he could deliver it when convenient. Qian Duoduo replied quickly, expressing gratitude and surprise, and arranged to visit the store this weekend.

events.name: Fine-tuning upgrade budget
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan made slight adjustments to the preliminary budget sheet for the store upgrade on his computer, based on the rental plan feedback provided by Zheng Kai. He briefly updated his parents on the negotiation progress via WeChat and began mentally planning the next steps, including contacting renovation and design teams.

events.name: The sports event was canceled at the last minute due to negotiation pressure.
events.description: Originally scheduled for an evening strength training session, Lei Mingxuan decided to take a day off due to mental exhaustion from all-day negotiations and a family meeting, opting only for a 10-minute stretch at home.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: With clear objectives and full drive, ready to tackle the crucial business negotiations.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study Room, No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New Area, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Busy yet gratified, the negotiations have started smoothly, family matters have also been initiated, and everything seems to be progressing as planned, though there is a slight sense of fatigue.

state.今日运动: 10-Minute Stretching

2025-11.daily_overview: Tuesday passed in tranquility and anticipation. Lei Mingxuan finally finished reading the lengthy historical novel that had accompanied him for a long time, gaining a sense of spiritual fulfillment. At the same time, he began earnestly planning his long-awaited pilgrimage to Japan's anime holy sites, excitedly mapping out the itinerary online with his Hangzhou basketball friend and fellow anime enthusiast, Gao Yuan. The daily operations of the shop proceeded as usual, but half of his thoughts had already drifted toward the year-end trip.

events.name: Immersively reading a historical novel
events.description: After closing the shop and returning home in the evening, Lei Mingxuan did not immediately scroll through his phone or play games as he usually did. Instead, he brewed himself a cup of coffee, sat in his study, and finally opened the last few dozen pages of that lengthy historical novel. As the night deepened outside the window, he became completely immersed in the story’s conclusion. By the time he closed the book, it was already late at night, and he felt a profound sense of satisfaction mixed with a faint tinge of loss, as if bidding farewell to a group of old friends. In his phone’s memo, he briefly wrote: "An epic about power, human nature, and choice, where the struggles and flashes of brilliance of ordinary people in the torrent of the times are particularly moving."

events.name: Detailed Planning for Japanese Anime Pilgrimage
events.description: Taking advantage of the low customer flow in the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan sat behind the cash register, using both his phone and computer to search for travel guides to Japan's Kanto region. He initially planned an itinerary covering key locations such as Tokyo, Kamakura, and Akihabara, compiling a detailed checklist of must-visit spots. This included classic filming locations like the Kamakura High School Station from "Slam Dunk" and the Suga Shrine stairs from "Your Name," as well as major anime stores in Akihabara and a list of limited-edition trendy toys he wanted to purchase. He sent the preliminary plan to his anime enthusiast friend Gao Yuan in Hangzhou.

events.name: Finalizing travel intentions online with Gaoyuan
events.description: Gao Yuan quickly replied, and the two excitedly discussed for nearly an hour on WeChat. Gao Yuan supplemented the conversation with information about some niche anime archives and museums. Based on their discussion, Lei Mingxuan swiftly took action, checking flight and hotel prices for December and finding them reasonable. He agreed with Gao Yuan that after confirming their respective vacation schedules, they would finalize and book the flights and accommodations within the week. A spontaneous anime pilgrimage trip was about to take shape.

events.name: Store Winter New Arrivals Organization
events.description: As part of his daily work, Lei Mingxuan organized the newly arrived batch of winter clothing, including thick hoodies, knitwear, and jackets, and adjusted some of the window displays to better align with the early winter atmosphere. He noted that clothing featuring anime collaboration elements was particularly popular among young customers, which further strengthened his intention to introduce related brands in the future.

events.name: Received the first aid kit and placed it in the vehicle.
events.description: The first aid kit purchased for the shop the previous day arrived, and at the same time, Lei Mingxuan’s specialized vehicle first aid kit, bought for his car, was also delivered to his home. In the evening, he carefully checked whether the items in both kits were complete (bandages, disinfectant wipes, tourniquets, etc.), then securely placed the vehicle first aid kit in the designated spot in his car’s trunk. This gave him an added sense of security.

events.name: Morning Run Resumes on Binjiang Road in the Afternoon
events.description: Before the store opened in the morning, Lei Mingxuan went for a 30-minute morning run along the Binjiang Avenue in Pudong, covering a distance of about 4 kilometers. He felt that his cardiopulmonary function was gradually recovering, but his pace remained relatively slow.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Peaceful, with the dual anticipation of having completed one task (reading) and beginning a pleasant endeavor (travel planning).

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study, No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New Area, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: With a sense of spiritual fulfillment and excitement, the satisfaction from finishing a book intertwines with the anticipation of travel.

state.今日运动: Morning run for 30 minutes, covering approximately 4 kilometers.
