2025-11.daily_overview: On Wednesday, new progress was made regarding the store upgrade. Lei Mingxuan formally submitted a written application to the shopping mall, turning his ideas into concrete action. Meanwhile, he scheduled a health check-up, beginning to pay attention to health details that had been neglected due to his busy schedule. The evening was reserved for his regular basketball night, where sweating it out on the court with his teammate Xie Fei served as the best way to unwind after work.

events.name: Formally submit a written application for store upgrade
events.description: Building on the letter of intent submitted yesterday, Lei Mingxuan has prepared a more detailed written application today, formally submitting it to the shopping mall management. The application not only includes the request for expansion and lease renewal but also briefly outlines the upgraded positioning of the store (as a small-scale multi-brand boutique), the expected increase in foot traffic, and mentions preliminary ideas for collaboration with the mall’s marketing department (such as joint promotional events), making the application more persuasive.

events.name: Schedule a Specialized Health Check-up
events.description: Considering his slightly overweight condition and busy lifestyle, Lei Mingxuan decided to undergo a targeted health check-up. Through phone calls and online platforms, he booked a specialized package at a well-regarded private medical examination center for the following Monday. The package focused on items such as blood lipids and fatty liver, and included a doctor's report interpretation. He specifically chose Monday morning to avoid the weekend customer peak at his store.

events.name: Organize Japan Trip Budget
events.description: During the lunch break, Lei Mingxuan roughly calculated the estimated expenses for the trip to Japan (including airfare, accommodation, dining, and shopping) and compared them with his recent income and expenditures. Although it was a significant expense, he considered it worthwhile as a reward for his hard work over the past year and decided to include it as a key expenditure in his December plan.

events.name: Wednesday Night Basketball with Xie Fei
events.description: At half past seven in the evening, Lei Mingxuan arrived punctually at the outdoor basketball court of Yuanshen Sports Center, where he met up with his basketball friends, including Xie Fei. They engaged in two hours of exhilarating competitive play. After the workout, feeling tired yet refreshed, he joined Xie Fei and others at a noodle shop beside the court for a steaming bowl of pork chop noodles. During their casual conversation, Lei Mingxuan learned that Xie Fei’s company was also planning an annual party and might require customized T-shirts. He quietly noted this potential business opportunity.

events.name: Temporary handling of store network malfunctions
events.description: In the afternoon, the store's Wi-Fi suddenly went down. Lei Mingxuan spent nearly an hour contacting the service provider and restarting the equipment, which caused a delay in the scheduled online brand engagement. This left him feeling somewhat frustrated.

起始状态.所处地点: 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Be pragmatic and focus on advancing various plans.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Relaxed and satisfied, work is progressing, feeling physically and mentally refreshed after exercise, and the network issue has been resolved.

2025-11.daily_overview: On Thursday evening, a warm family tea gathering was held. Lei Mingxuan sat with his parents, engaging in a lively discussion about the smart home solutions for their future new residence. From practical smart locks and motorized curtains to mood-setting dimmable lighting, the family shared a concrete and collective vision for the details of their new life. This also served as a rare opportunity for family bonding amid the busy preparations for the upcoming move.

events.name: Discussing the Smart Home Plan for the New House with Parents
events.description: After dinner, Lei Mingxuan brewed a pot of Pu'er tea and sat in the living room with his parents. He took out his phone and showed them several mainstream smart home solutions, focusing on smart door locks, lighting systems controllable via mobile phone, electric curtains, and smart toilet seats. His mother, Wang Xiuying, was particularly interested in the lighting that could change tones to create different atmospheres, imagining festive scenarios. His father, Lei Jianguo, was more concerned about the system's stability, power consumption, and installation complexity, but ultimately expressed approval for the heating and cleaning functions of the smart toilet seat. The three had a preliminary discussion about the budget, brand preference (leaning toward domestic brands), and installation timing (ideally before moving or simultaneously), all in a harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: Follow up on the feedback regarding the mall application.
events.description: During the day at the store, Lei Mingxuan sent a WeChat message to the property manager Zheng Kai, politely inquiring about the receipt of the written application. Zheng Kai replied that it had been received and forwarded to the relevant department for evaluation, asking Lei Mingxuan to wait patiently and assuring him that he would be notified as soon as there was any news.

events.name: Online engagement with potential brand partners
events.description: During his spare time, Lei Mingxuan contacted via WeChat the founder of a designer brand based in Hangzhou, which he had been following for a long time. The two parties held a brief video call, during which they introduced their respective brand philosophies and business models. Lei Mingxuan expressed his intention to incorporate the other party's products as part of the "collective store" concept for his upgraded shop. The other party showed interest and agreed to send samples for review at a later stage.

events.name: Preliminary Screening of Moving Packing Materials
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan browsed packing materials such as cardboard boxes, bubble wrap, and adhesive tape on an online shopping platform. He added several cost-effective options to his shopping cart, planning to finalize the quantities with his parents over the weekend before placing a bulk order.

events.name: Family dinners being sumptuous leads to overeating.
events.description: During dinner, Mother prepared braised pork and pan-fried buns. Lei Mingxuan couldn't resist and ate more than usual, which left him feeling somewhat bloated. He decided to increase his exercise the following day.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Calm, looking forward to the family discussion tonight.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room of Apartment 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New Area, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Warm and full of hope, it feels great to plan the future together as a family, though there is a slight sense of having overeaten.

2025-11.daily_overview: On a damp and chilly Friday, Lei Mingxuan primarily focused on managing his shop and maintaining social connections. He received Qian Duoduo, who came to pick up a birthday gift, further deepening their relationship. Meanwhile, as part of the routine at the end of the month, he began reviewing the shop's accounts and revenue for the month, conducting a financial inventory in preparation for potential shopping and social activities over the weekend.

events.name: Qian Duoduo went to the store to pick up the gift and have a conversation.
events.description: In the afternoon, Qian Duoduo arrived at the shop as scheduled. Lei Mingxuan presented her with the packaged scarf, which delighted her greatly. She tried it on immediately and praised it repeatedly. The two chatted for a while, during which Qian Duoduo shared some interesting anecdotes from her recent work in new media. She also showed Lei Mingxuan several brand short video cases she found particularly creative, which happened to inspire him as he was learning video editing. Before leaving, she also purchased a newly arrived sweater and bid farewell cheerfully.

events.name: Organize monthly store accounts
events.description: As the year-end approaches and the month draws to a close, Lei Mingxuan spent the morning organizing the store's transaction records, procurement costs, and various expenses from November to date on his computer. Thanks to the offline promotions during the "Double Eleven" shopping festival and steady spending from loyal customers, this month's revenue appears quite promising. He roughly calculated the gross profit and began contemplating the procurement plan for December and potential year-end promotional activities.

events.name: Communicate with supplier Zhou Tao regarding spring fabrics
events.description: Considering store upgrades and spring stock preparation, Lei Mingxuan contacted Zhou Tao, a supplier in Hangzhou, via WeChat to inquire about the fabric trends and color palettes that might be popular for the upcoming spring season. Zhou Tao sent some preview materials, and the two agreed to discuss the order in detail after Lei Mingxuan returns from Japan.

events.name: Check Japan Flight and Hotel Price Fluctuations
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan checked the prices of flights and hotels for his trip to Japan in December again and found that they had slightly increased compared to two days earlier. He promptly informed Gao Yuan of the situation, and the two decided to finalize their itinerary and make the booking no later than tomorrow to avoid further price increases.

events.name: Outdoor sports were canceled due to rain and replaced with indoor strength training.
events.description: Originally planning to go for a run in the evening, Lei Mingxuan instead performed a 40-minute strength training session at home due to the rainy and damp cold weather. He focused on upper body exercises, feeling some muscle soreness but also a sense of fulfillment.

起始状态.所处地点: 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai, China
起始状态.心情: Feeling somewhat lazy due to the weather, but aware that there are many matters to attend to.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study Room, No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New Area, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Enriched, social interactions were pleasant, work arrangements were clear, feeling excited about the upcoming finalized trip, and slightly fatigued after exercise.

2025-11.daily_overview: Saturday was a day off, but Lei Mingxuan had a busy and fulfilling schedule. In the morning, he completed the final assessment for the SCA Barista Skills Foundation certification, successfully acquiring a new skill. The afternoon and evening were entirely dedicated to social activities: first, he went on a date with his girlfriend Lin Wei, where they delved into discussions about the new store design and future plans; afterward, he attended a small gathering with friends, and Lin Wei naturally blended into his social circle. Both his romantic and social lives were harmonious, but while packing old belongings, he accidentally sprained his wrist.

events.name: Passed the SCA Barista Skills Foundation Level certification
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan went to the certification center to take the final assessment for the SCA Barista Skills Foundation level. He first successfully completed the theoretical written exam, followed by the practical session, where he skillfully performed a series of actions, including grinding, dosing, tamping, and extraction, in front of the examiner, producing a standard espresso and a latte with dense milk foam. The examiner acknowledged the fluency of his operations and the quality of the final products. After passing the assessment, he received the Barista Skills Foundation certification on-site, bringing him one step closer to his dream of adding a coffee corner to his shop.

events.name: Dating with girlfriend Lin Wei and discussing the new store design
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan met with his girlfriend Lin Wei. He excitedly shared the good news of having passed his barista certification. Over coffee, the two delved into a detailed discussion about the upgraded shop. Lei Mingxuan explicitly stated that the new store must include a designated, well-lit corner specifically for daily short video filming and live streaming. Lin Wei was very supportive and, drawing on her own aesthetic sense, offered specific suggestions regarding the background style and lighting arrangement for the corner. Lei Mingxuan carefully noted these down, intending to compile them into a requirements document.

events.name: Weekend Gathering with Childhood Friends and Companions
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan and Lin Wei attended a dinner gathering with his childhood friend Zhang Wei and several other friends. The venue was a local Shanghainese restaurant. During the meal, Lei Mingxuan introduced Lin Wei to everyone, and the conversation flowed pleasantly. Lin Wei's cheerful and outgoing personality quickly won the favor of the friends. Zhang Wei privately remarked to Lei Mingxuan, "You've got good taste this time." The friends also inquired about the progress of the store upgrade, and Lei Mingxuan briefly shared some updates, creating a relaxed and enjoyable atmosphere.

events.name: Finalize the Japan itinerary and make bookings.
events.description: During a break in the gathering, Lei Mingxuan and Gao Yuan made their final confirmation on WeChat. The two decisively proceeded to book round-trip tickets to Tokyo for early December, along with hotels in Tokyo and Kamakura. With the itinerary officially set, Lei Mingxuan felt a weight lifted off his shoulders and was filled with anticipation for the trip.

events.name: Sprained wrist while packing old belongings
events.description: Before the morning assessment, Lei Mingxuan was helping pack old books at the old house on Zhangyang Road when he slightly sprained his right wrist due to excessive force. He immediately rested and applied ice, experiencing mild pain that affected his subsequent exercise plans.

events.name: Indulgent Eating at Gatherings
events.description: During the evening gathering, Lei Mingxuan consumed a considerable amount of high-calorie food and drank several glasses of beer, feeling that his weight might have increased.

起始状态.所处地点: 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous (due to assessment) yet expectant (due to a date and gathering), with slight discomfort in the wrist.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: A day brimming with a sense of achievement and happiness, skills acquired, love sweet, friendships harmonious, yet slight annoyance brought by a sprained wrist and indulgent eating.

state.今日运动: None, resting due to a wrist sprain.

2025-11.daily_overview: Sunday was a day dominated by family affairs. Lei Mingxuan and his parents officially began sorting through their belongings in preparation for moving. While organizing old items, they unexpectedly uncovered an old photo album filled with family memories. Upon seeing many yellowed, faded, and even stuck-together photos, Lei Mingxuan immediately decided to launch a "Family Memory Rescue Plan" to digitally preserve the images. In the afternoon, he relaxed with his billiards friend Han Dong on the pool table, though a sprained wrist limited his performance.

events.name: Starting the Moving Packing Process: Sorting Through Old Items and Unearthing Old Photo Albums
events.description: In the morning, the whole family began packing some infrequently used items. While organizing old books from his room and the top layer of the cabinet, Lei Mingxuan brought down several heavy cardboard boxes. Upon opening them, he found over a dozen thick family photo albums compiled by his parents over the years. He and his mother, Wang Xiuying, flipped through them together, seeing black-and-white wedding photos of his parents in their youth, yellowed pictures of himself as a baby wearing split pants, and precious images of his late maternal grandparents. Many of the photos had yellowed and faded at the edges, with some even stuck together due to moisture. As his mother looked at the photos and reminisced about the past, her eyes grew slightly moist.

events.name: Decided to launch the family photo digitization project.
events.description: Watching these memories slowly "fade away," Lei Mingxuan immediately proposed to his parents that they should scan all these old photos for digital preservation before moving. His father, Lei Jianguo, thought it was a great idea, and his mother nodded repeatedly in agreement. Lei Mingxuan felt that he had taken on the responsibility of protecting his family's history.

events.name: Research and place an order for a photo scanner.
events.description: Action was taken immediately. That afternoon, Lei Mingxuan temporarily set aside his packing work and went online to research digitalization solutions for family photos in detail. He compared the pros and cons of professional scanning services, mobile apps, and home photo scanners. Considering the large number of photos and the poor condition of some, he decided to purchase a mid-range home high-definition photo scanner. He sought advice from his tech-savvy cousin, Yang Fan, and a regular customer, Qian Duoduo, who works in design and has high standards for image quality. Finally, he selected a well-reviewed model on an online shopping platform, along with a pair of cleaning gloves and an air blower, and promptly placed the order.

events.name: Sunday Billiards Game with Han Dong
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan arrived at his regular billiards hall as scheduled and played two hours of American eight-ball with his friend Han Dong. Due to an unhealed wrist sprain, he primarily used his left hand to shoot, performing averagely, but he felt relaxed after the exercise. During the game, he boasted to Han Dong about his upcoming trip to Japan and shared the story of rediscovering old photos. Han Dong mentioned that his family had a similar situation and thought scanning and preserving them was a good idea.

events.name: Wrist Sprain Recovery Care
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Lei Mingxuan applied an ice pack to his wrist again and avoided lifting heavy objects, feeling that the pain had somewhat subsided.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Ready to engage in physical labor, feeling somewhat fatigued yet with clear objectives, with lingering discomfort in the wrist.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Physically a bit tired, but mentally fulfilled. Initiated a meaningful family project and enjoyed the relaxation from exercise, with the wrist condition improving.

state.今日运动: Played billiards for about 2 hours in the afternoon (primarily using the left hand), and tidied up items, which is considered light labor.

2025-11.daily_overview: On Monday, Lei Mingxuan underwent a specialized health check-up as scheduled. In the afternoon, upon returning to the store, he received the long-awaited physical version of a rare trendy toy and excitedly placed it in his display cabinet. Meanwhile, negotiations for the store upgrade entered the detailed discussion phase, with further clarification of the contract framework in talks with property manager Zheng Kai. Progress was made today in health, hobbies, and career.

events.name: Undergo specialized health check-ups
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan left the shop in the care of the staff and went to the scheduled medical examination center. He completed multiple tests, including blood tests (focusing on blood lipids, blood sugar, and liver function), abdominal ultrasound (to check for fatty liver), and an electrocardiogram. The entire process was efficient, and the environment and service at the examination center made him feel comfortable. He realized the importance of regularly monitoring his physical condition.

events.name: Sign for and arrange the placement of rare hidden edition trendy toys.
events.description: Shortly after returning to the shop from the physical examination, a courier delivered a package. Lei Mingxuan glanced at the sender's information, and his heart began to race—it was the rare hidden edition trendy toy he had won in the lottery! Carefully unwrapping the multiple layers of packaging, he confirmed that the figurine was intact, with flawless design details that shimmered under the light. He couldn't resist holding it and admiring it for quite some time.

events.name: Place the new collection into the display cabinet.
events.description: After closing the shop for the night, Lei Mingxuan brought the new trendy toy home. He carefully wiped the central compartment of the display cabinet with a soft cloth and then solemnly placed this "new addition" inside. Stepping back to admire it, his heart swelled with a sense of achievement and satisfaction from collecting, completely making up for the regret of multiple failed draws before. He took a photo and posted it in the collector's group, once again receiving a wave of "admiration."

events.name: Refine the framework of the new lease contract with Zheng Kai.
events.description: In the afternoon, property manager Zheng Kai proactively visited the store and informed Lei Mingxuan that his upgrade application had initially gained support from the mall management. The two sat down by the small tea table in the store to discuss the framework details of the new lease agreement, buoyed by the good news. Their conversation covered the exact area after expansion, the rent adjustment based on market rates, the extension of the lease term, and the crucial rent-free period for renovations. The negotiation atmosphere was pragmatic and friendly.

events.name: Start scanning family photos (Day 1)
events.description: In the evening, after receiving the photo scanner, Lei Mingxuan eagerly began scanning the first photo album. Together with his mother, they carefully handled the old photographs, scanning approximately 50 images, officially launching the digitization project.

events.name: Pay attention to diet for medical checkups and reduce dinner portions.
events.description: After the physical examination, Lei Mingxuan became more conscious about controlling his diet. For dinner, he only had a vegetable salad and chicken breast, feeling light and refreshed.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight sense of uncertainty about the physical examination results.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study Room, No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New Area, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Feeling light and happy, the physical exam is done and I feel unburdened. I received the collectible I've been longing for, the business negotiations are progressing smoothly, and scanning the photos gave me a sense of accomplishment.

2025-11.daily_overview: On Tuesday, the decision-making process regarding the new home's interior design reached its final stage within the family. Lei Mingxuan and his parents finalized the overall color palette and soft furnishing style for the new home. Simultaneously, he engaged in more in-depth discussions with potential brand partners in Hangzhou online, laying the groundwork for the upcoming store upgrade. In the evening, he immersed himself in the final preparations for a challenging game, enjoying a rare moment of pure entertainment.

events.name: Finalize the home decoration style with parents.
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan brought color chart images and interior design renderings downloaded from the internet to discuss with his parents once again. Thanks to their previous communication, the process was highly efficient this time. Together, they finalized the main color schemes for each room: the living room would feature light gray paired with natural wood tones, the master bedroom would be in off-white, and the secondary bedroom in light blue. Light-colored laminate flooring was chosen for the floors, while curtains would be made of cotton-linen fabric with good light-blocking properties and a warm texture. Wang Xiuying, the mother, raised final requirements regarding the tile colors and storage details for the kitchen and bathroom, ensuring both aesthetics and practicality were balanced. The family reached a high level of consensus on the overall appearance of their new home.

events.name: In-depth video communication with potential brand partners
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan held a second round of communication via video conference with a potential partner brand based in Hangzhou, which focuses on the "urban outdoor" style. This time, the discussion went deeper. Lei Mingxuan introduced his store's customer base and upgrade plans, while the other party provided a detailed presentation of their brand's product line and collaboration model (which may involve consignment or joint operations). Both sides demonstrated strong interest in cooperation and agreed to arrange an in-person meeting to view samples after Lei Mingxuan returns from Japan.

events.name: Preparing for the Final Boss Battle in High-Difficulty Games
events.description: After finishing his official duties for the evening, Lei Mingxuan opened the highly challenging action game he had been playing for a long time. The game was nearing its conclusion, with the final boss battle just ahead. Instead of rushing forward recklessly, he spent the entire evening patiently optimizing his character’s equipment and skill combinations, synthesizing advanced recovery potions, and repeatedly reviewing recordings of previous tough boss fights to summarize combat strategies. With a sense of carefully planned tension and anticipation, he made thorough preparations to face the ultimate challenge.

events.name: Continue scanning family photos (Day 2)
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan took some time to scan another photo album, completing the digitization of approximately 100 photos in total. He noticed that some of the photos required cleaning and carefully handled them using an air blower.

events.name: The wrist sprain has basically recovered, and mild strength training is being attempted.
events.description: The wrist pain has subsided. Lei Mingxuan performed 20 minutes of core training at home, avoiding any wrist loading, and felt well.

起始状态.所处地点: 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Stable, focusing on decisions related to family and work.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study, No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: A sense of relief after making a decision, along with focus and anticipation for the challenges of the game, and a slight fatigue after exercise.

2025-11.daily_overview: On a rainy workday, Lei Mingxuan focused more on financial planning and the future cash flow management of his shop. He met with his financial manager, Xu Feng, to review recent investment performance and adjusted his short-term financial strategy toward a more conservative liquidity management approach, in anticipation of upcoming significant expenses (shop renovation and upgrades). The evening remained his unwavering basketball night, where he released stress through sweat.

events.name: Review investments and adjust strategies with financial manager Xu Feng.
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan met with financial advisor Xu Feng at a café in Xuhui. Lei Mingxuan confided in Xu Feng about the psychological impact of recent stock market fluctuations, comparing them to the stability of his regular fund investment account and feeling that the latter was more suitable for his current situation. Xu Feng analyzed the reasons behind the recent market volatility and provided psychological guidance. More importantly, based on Lei Mingxuan’s disclosure of plans for store upgrades (impending large expenses such as renovations) and family relocation, Xu Feng advised him to shift his investment strategy toward a more conservative, defensive stance in the coming months. He recommended increasing allocations to liquid assets such as money market funds to address uncertain cash needs. Lei Mingxuan agreed wholeheartedly and decided to transfer some of his profits into money market funds next month.

events.name: Research on the specific requirements for short video shooting corners
events.description: Due to the decrease in customer flow in the store caused by rainy weather, Lei Mingxuan had more time to think quietly. Based on previous discussions with his girlfriend Lin Wei, he began to compile a detailed design requirements document for the short video shooting corner in the store. He meticulously listed the required spatial dimensions, the need for natural light and supplementary lighting, the style of the background wall (with replaceable background panels), as well as the necessary power outlets and high-speed network interfaces to be reserved. This document will later be directly handed over to the interior designer.

events.name: Wednesday Night Basketball with Xie Fei
events.description: In the evening, the rain stopped, and the basketball game proceeded as usual. Although the court was somewhat slippery, Lei Mingxuan, Xie Fei, and the others still played with great enthusiasm. After the exercise, everyone went for a late-night snack as usual, discussing year-end plans in a lively atmosphere.

events.name: Organize personal belongings (for moving)
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan sorted out a small box of old clothes and outdated digital products in his room that he no longer needed and could donate or discard, making a little space for the subsequent large-scale packing.

events.name: Added a morning run due to pressure from financial discussions.
events.description: In the morning, to alleviate financial pressure, Lei Mingxuan jogged for 25 minutes in the rain and felt his mood relax.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Feeling somewhat gloomy due to the weather, pondering financial matters.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Relaxed and clear-minded, with new financial plans in place, feeling physically and mentally refreshed after exercise.

2025-11.daily_overview: On Thursday, preparations for the store upgrade continued to progress. Lei Mingxuan began actively screening and contacting renovation design teams to prepare for the upcoming store transformation. At the same time, he also browsed online for warm winter clothing for his parents and himself, reflecting his care for his family. In the evening, he successfully challenged a high-difficulty boss in the game, gaining a great sense of accomplishment.

events.name: Preliminary Screening of Store Decoration Designers
events.description: As the details of the contract with the shopping mall became clearer, Lei Mingxuan began to shift some of his focus toward preparation for the renovation. Through recommendations from friends and online searches, he contacted three or four local design studios or independent designers with experience in commercial spaces, particularly retail stores. He requested their portfolios and preliminary pricing methods, planning to conduct follow-up interviews for comparison.

events.name: Online shopping of warm clothing for parents.
events.description: As the weather grew colder, Lei Mingxuan thought about how his elderly parents were even more sensitive to the cold. During his lunch break, he browsed online and selected a thick down vest for his father, Lei Jianguo, and a cashmere scarf for his mother, Wang Xiuying, placing the order directly to be delivered to their home. Though not extravagant gifts, this thoughtful gesture brought his parents great comfort.

events.name: Conquer challenging games and savor the joy of victory.
events.description: In the evening, after thorough preparation, Lei Mingxuan once again challenged the game's final boss. This time, his controls were precise, his skill combinations seamless, and he perfectly applied the strategies he had previously summarized. After nearly half an hour of intense and fierce combat, he finally defeated the formidable final boss. Watching the completion animation and achievements pop up on the screen, he let out a long sigh of relief, feeling an unprecedented sense of accomplishment and exhilaration. Unable to contain his excitement, he took a screenshot and shared it in the chat group with his friends Han Dong and Qin Lang.

events.name: Pack some books and collectibles.
events.description: After finishing the game and riding the wave of good mood, Lei Mingxuan spent another hour carefully wrapping a portion of his books and several fragile collectible figurines with bubble wrap. He then labeled the boxes in preparation for the move.

events.name: Explore the surrounding greenways on foot in the afternoon.
events.description: During the shop's idle afternoon hours, Lei Mingxuan went for a 6-kilometer hike along a greenway in the outskirts of Shanghai as a rehearsal for weekend hiking, enjoying the winter sunshine.

起始状态.心情: Actively commence preparations for advancing to the next phase (renovation).

2025-11.daily_overview: Friday was a day for wrapping up multiple matters and making new progress. Lei Mingxuan accompanied his father to complete the formal property handover of their old residence, marking the end of an era for the family home. Meanwhile, he received his medical examination report, which showed generally good results but highlighted a few indicators requiring attention. Regarding the store upgrade, he made more refined adjustments to the spatial layout based on feedback from the shopping mall.

events.name: Accompanying my father to complete the property handover of the old residence
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan accompanied his father Lei Jianguo to the old house that had been sold, where they conducted the final handover procedures with the buyer and the property management company. They settled all outstanding water, electricity, and gas bills and formally handed over the keys to the new owner. His father made a point of meeting their old neighbor Aunt Zhu at the entrance of the alley to bid her farewell. Aunt Zhu was somewhat reluctant to see them go and urged them to come back and visit often. As they walked out of the alley, his father turned to take one last look at the old house and fell silent for a moment. Lei Mingxuan patted his father on the shoulder.

events.name: Receive and Interpret the Medical Examination Report
events.description: In the afternoon, the electronic report from the medical examination center was released. Lei Mingxuan carefully reviewed it: weight 75.7 kg (BMI approximately 25.0, nearing the healthy range), slightly elevated blood lipids, a tendency toward mild fatty liver, with other indicators largely normal. The doctor from the examination center provided an interpretation over the phone, reminding him to pay attention to dietary control, reduce alcohol consumption (though he does not drink frequently), and maintain regular exercise. After listening attentively, Lei Mingxuan felt that his exercise regimen over the past year had begun to show results but still required continued effort.

events.name: Fine-tuning Shop Upgrade Space Planning
events.description: Based on the more precise expanded rental area confirmed with Zheng Kai, Lei Mingxuan spent the evening using simple drawing software on his computer to make fine adjustments and refinements to his hand-drawn store space layout. He more precisely delineated the area and positioning of the clothing display zone, fitting rooms, coffee corner, cashier counter, and short video filming corner, striving to maximize space utilization while ensuring a logical flow of movement.

events.name: Celebrated the completion of the old residence handover with family in a simple manner.
events.description: In the evening, Wang Xiuying, the mother, prepared several delicious dishes. The family shared a simple meal as a ritual to bid farewell to their old house. During the dinner, conversations mostly revolved around their anticipation for the new home and the upcoming moving arrangements. The sentimental atmosphere was soon overshadowed by their longing for a new life.

events.name: Try swimming cross-training.
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan went to a fitness center swimming pool in Pudong to try swimming for 30 minutes as an additional cross-training activity, finding the relaxation in the water to be a novel experience.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: With a tinge of complex emotions bidding farewell to the old.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room at No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: A sense of relief mingled with eager anticipation. The old chapter has turned, and the medical checkup results, while sounding an alarm, also point the way forward. Plans for a new life are becoming increasingly clear, and the swimming experience feels refreshingly novel.

2025-11.daily_overview: Saturday was a rest day efficiently utilized for handling multiple tasks. In the morning, Lei Mingxuan purchased ample packing materials and, together with his girlfriend Lin Wei, efficiently organized and packed his personal belongings, particularly his beloved trendy toy collection. In the afternoon, he gathered with friends, including his childhood friend Zhang Wei, and excitedly shared his experiences of completing a video game and mastering first aid skills. Lin Wei's integration into the group was also unanimously acknowledged by his friends. In the evening, the couple also had a preliminary discussion about the possibility of purchasing a car.

events.name: Procurement of Moving and Packing Supplies
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan drove to a nearby large supermarket and a stationery wholesale market. Following the previously prepared list, he purchased sufficient quantities of packing supplies, including cardboard boxes of various sizes, wide adhesive tape, marker pens, bubble wrap, and stretch film, filling the trunk of his car to the brim.

events.name: Packing personal belongings with girlfriend Lin Wei
events.description: In the afternoon, Lin Wei came to help. The two focused on organizing the vast collection of trendy toys and anime merchandise in Lei Mingxuan's room. Lei Mingxuan was responsible for sorting and making decisions (which items to take away and which to temporarily store), while Lin Wei carefully wrapped each item with bubble wrap and neatly packed them into cardboard boxes. During the process, Lei Mingxuan would occasionally pick up a figurine and tell Lin Wei the anime story behind it or the origin of its collection, creating a warm and enjoyable atmosphere. The work was highly efficient, and several boxes were packed by the end of the afternoon.

events.name: Weekend gathering with friends, sharing achievements and skills
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan and Lin Wei attended a dinner gathering with childhood friend Zhang Wei and other friends. During the meal, Lei Mingxuan excitedly shared his experience of clearing that highly difficult game a few days earlier, describing it vividly. He then talked about obtaining his first aid certification and demonstrated the spiral reverse bandaging technique on the spot using a tissue and a pen, encouraging everyone to learn it as well. The friends all found it very cool. Lin Wei listened with a smile beside him, occasionally adding to the conversation and interacting naturally with everyone, seamlessly blending into the circle.

events.name: Preliminary Discussion with Lin Wei on the Vehicle Purchase Plan
events.description: After the gathering, the two chatted on their way home. Lei Mingxuan mentioned that after the store upgrade, he might need to visit suppliers and attend exhibitions more frequently, and it was time to replace the old family car—perhaps considering a new energy vehicle. Lin Wei expressed her support and mentioned that her colleague had a good experience with a certain domestic brand. They agreed that after the busy moving period, they could go for a test drive together.

events.name: Sharing Health Outcomes and Next-Phase Goals
events.description: During the evening gathering, Lei Mingxuan also shared his recent physical examination results with friends, mentioning that his weight and physical fitness had improved but that he still needed to continue working hard. He joked that he might even challenge himself with a half marathon next year, which sparked a wave of cheers and encouragement from his friends. Under the table, Lin Wei gently squeezed his hand in a gesture of support.

events.name: The gathering involved slightly more food consumption, but alcohol intake was kept under control.
events.description: During the gathering, Lei Mingxuan consciously controlled his alcohol intake, drinking only one glass of beer, but he consumed slightly more food than usual, leaving him feeling somewhat bloated.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: The plan is clear, with preparations made to engage in physical labor and social activities.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Tired but very content and happy. Packing has been productive, social interactions have been pleasant, relationships are stable, there are new aspirations for the future (car, health), and the diet feels slightly excessive.

state.今日运动: Packing and organizing is considered light labor, with no dedicated exercise.

2025-11.daily_overview: On the last day of November, spent under the warm winter sun, the theme was "Review and Wrap-up." Lei Mingxuan systematically reviewed and recorded his health management data from the past year and was pleasantly surprised to find that his five-year health goal had been achieved ahead of schedule and exceeded expectations. He naturally planned his next phase of fitness objectives. At the same time, the packing for the entire family was nearly complete. Looking at the packed boxes, he felt a sense of nostalgia for the old home, but even more so, anticipation for the new life ahead. In the evening, he completed the rough cut of the first short video for the store, bringing this busy and fulfilling November to a close.

events.name: The system conducts an annual health review.
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan made a cup of coffee and sat in the slightly empty living room (as many pieces of furniture had already been packed). He opened the memo app on his phone and began systematically reviewing his health journey over the past year (December 2024 to November 2025). He recorded his morning running frequency (averaging 3–4 times per week), weekend fitness activities (basketball and billiards), weight change curve (steadily decreasing from 80 kg at the beginning of the year to the current 75.5 kg, with his BMI entering the 25 range), as well as insights from reducing greasy takeout and increasing vegetable intake in his diet. Looking at these data, a sense of accomplishment welled up inside him.

events.name: Set health advancement goals for the next year
events.description: Based on the review, Lei Mingxuan realized that the original goal of "bringing his BMI within a healthy range within five years" would likely be achieved ahead of schedule. He naturally began to formulate a new goal for 2026: while maintaining aerobic exercise, he would add strength training 1–2 times per week to improve posture and enhance muscle strength; he even listed "completing a half marathon" as a challenging option. He recorded this clear new plan in his memo.

events.name: Complete the final packing tasks for moving.
events.description: In the morning, the whole family mobilized to pack the final batch of daily necessities and miscellaneous items. Lei Mingxuan was responsible for clearly labeling each cardboard box with a thick marker, writing the room name (such as "Lei Mingxuan—Study Books," "Living Room—Decorations") and the category of items to facilitate identification by the movers and proper placement in the new home. Looking at the neatly stacked cardboard boxes in the living room and rooms, the tangible sense of "soon embarking on the journey" grew increasingly strong.

events.name: Sharing Health Outcomes and Future Plans
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan briefly shared the results of his health review and his New Year's goals in the family WeChat group and core social circles such as the "Pudong Three Musketeers." He wrote: "The goals set at the beginning of the year haven’t fallen! I’ve lost 5 pounds, and my stamina has improved a lot. Next year, I want to build some muscle, maybe run a half marathon? [fighting spirit]." Soon, he received a series of likes and encouraging comments from his parents, Lin Wei, Zhang Wei, and other relatives and friends.

events.name: Attempt to produce and roughly edit the first store short video
events.description: Utilizing fragmented time, Lei Mingxuan attempted to edit a 15-second short video for the store using his new phone. The footage consisted of casual shots he had previously taken of the winter clothing displays in the store and customers trying on outfits. He paired these with recently trending background music and simple text labels (such as "New Winter Arrivals" and "Cozy Outfits"). Although the editing was still quite rough, he shared it with Lin Wei and Qian Duoduo, receiving positive feedback like "That’s the vibe!" and "Keep it up!" This boosted his confidence in learning short video operations.

events.name: Hiking with my girlfriend Lin Wei on the weekend
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan and Lin Wei hiked 8 kilometers along the greenways in the outskirts of Shanghai. As part of their regular weekend activity, they enjoyed the warm winter sunshine and the natural scenery.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Calmness, imbued with the ritualistic sense of month-end review and closure.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room at No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai (slightly spacious)
结束状态.心情: Full, proud, and hopeful. Health management has been highly effective, preparations for a new life are complete, new skills have taken their first steps, and post-exercise well-being is felt.

state.今日运动: 8-kilometer weekend hike

2025-12.daily_overview: As the new week began, Lei Mingxuan faced a packed schedule. In the morning, he completed the year-end specialized health check-up and received the welcome news that his fatty liver condition had subsided. In the afternoon, he attended a nutrition consultation. Simultaneously, he made preparations for his upcoming trip to Japan and the family’s relocation. In the evening, he continued the tradition of scanning old photographs, reminiscing about his childhood with his mother. Encouraged by the positive health results, he stayed up a bit later to chat with friends online, making the day both fulfilling and productive.

events.name: Digitization of Family Old Photographs (Day 4)
events.description: Before opening the shop in the morning, Lei Mingxuan continued scanning photos from his infancy and elementary school years in his home study. His mother, Wang Xiuying, sat beside him, reminiscing about amusing anecdotes such as his first steps and his tearful first day at kindergarten. Lei Mingxuan smiled while scanning, saving the photos into a folder titled "My Childhood."

events.name: Year-End Special Health Check-Up
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan drove to a high-end private medical examination center in Pudong New District, where he efficiently completed specialized examinations such as abdominal ultrasound, blood lipid tests, and liver function assessments. The environment was comfortable, and the service was attentive.

events.name: Interpretation of Medical Examination Reports and Health Confirmation
events.description: The test results will be issued on the same day. In the afternoon, a one-on-one consultation with a specialist confirmed the complete resolution of fatty liver, with improvements in blood lipid and blood sugar levels to within the healthy range. The doctor commended the efforts in dietary control and running.

events.name: Personalized Nutrition and Lifestyle Consultation
events.description: A one-hour in-depth consultation with a registered dietitian to describe the lifestyle rhythm of an individual shop owner. The dietitian will customize a dietary adjustment plan (such as healthy choices when dining out) and an exercise plan (how to incorporate workouts into a busy schedule) to consolidate health outcomes.

events.name: Cash Preparation for Japan Trip
events.description: On the way home, stop by a Bank of China branch to make an appointment for exchanging 100,000 yen in cash, and place it in the inner compartment of the travel wallet for use at small shops in Japan.

events.name: Store Travel Arrangement Authorization
events.description: After closing in the evening, I discussed the Japan travel plan with Zheng Kai, the property manager of the shopping mall. I entrusted a reliable part-time university student employee with the daily supervision, handed over the spare key and a checklist of precautions, and set up a remote monitoring app.

events.name: Preliminary Discussion on Father's Birthday Banquet
events.description: After dinner, I discussed with my mother about my father's birthday celebration. We decided to hold a warm family gathering and preliminarily discussed inviting his old workmates and our neighbor, Auntie Zhu. Lei Mingxuan suggested considering a hearing aid as a gift.

events.name: New Home Financial Family Meeting
events.description: Father joined the discussion to confirm the down payment amount for the newly purchased elevator apartment, the sources of funds (family savings, partial contribution from parents, and partial responsibility borne by Lei Mingxuan), and the repayment plan (to be covered by store revenue). Lei Mingxuan is responsible for the payment and loan processing.

events.name: Develop a New Year's Health Implementation Plan
events.description: Compile the advice from doctors and nutritionists, record key points such as [daily protein intake] in the phone memo, and formulate a more specific diet and exercise plan after returning from Japan based on personal life goals.

events.name: Handling Evening Store Orders and Community Interactions
events.description: Spend half an hour before bed handling inquiries in the store's WeChat community, answering regular customers' questions about the sizing of new hoodies, and previewing the upcoming Japanese trendy new arrivals on the Moments feed.

events.name: Relax by chatting with friends online
events.description: Due to favorable health results, I chatted with my childhood friend Zhang Wei on WeChat in the evening, sharing the good news from the medical check-up and our anticipation for an upcoming trip, and went to bed slightly later than usual.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Filled with anticipation and a touch of busyness, ready to tackle the tasks of the new day.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Content and relaxed, health recognized by authority, travel arrangements well made, looking forward to tomorrow's journey.

state.今日运动: Mainly commuting by walking and daily activities, with no specialized exercise.

2025-12.daily_overview: Embarking on a pilgrimage to the sacred sites of Japanese anime. After scanning the final batch of old family photos, I bid farewell to my parents and set off on the journey with great excitement. Upon arriving in Tokyo by flight, I checked into a hotel near Akihabara. Though weary from the long flight, the fresh experience of being immersed in the anime atmosphere quickly dispelled the fatigue, recharging my energy for exploration.

events.name: Digitization of Family Old Photographs (Day 5)
events.description: Before departure, scan photos from middle school years, such as winning the school sports meet and graduation group photos, as well as family daily life photos like weekend dinners. Mother vividly narrates, with Lei Mingxuan sorted into the [My Growth - Middle School] and [Family Life - Daily] folders, and a hasty backup is made.

events.name: Flight to Tokyo and Arrival Check-in
events.description: I departed from Pudong Airport at noon for Tokyo Narita Airport, arriving after approximately three hours of flight. I then took the airport express and transferred to the subway to check into a business hotel near Akihabara. Due to the long flight and jet lag, I arrived in the evening and only bought a bento from a convenience store for a simple meal.

events.name: Informing Family of Safe Arrival and Sharing Itinerary
events.description: In the evening, I sent a message via WeChat from the hotel to inform my parents of my safe arrival and described my first impressions of Akihabara. I also shared the news of my arrival in the group chat with [Pudong Trio] and Gao Yuan. Gao Yuan replied that he would arrive in Tokyo tomorrow afternoon to meet up.

events.name: Relaxing by watching anime movies on the plane.
events.description: During the flight, Lei Mingxuan watched a favorite Japanese anime film to relax and get into the travel mood.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Excited and slightly hurried, about to embark on the long-awaited journey.

结束状态.所处地点: Hotel room near Akihabara, Tokyo, Japan
结束状态.心情: Tired yet excited, being in the holy land of anime, I am filled with anticipation for tomorrow's itinerary.

state.今日运动: A small amount of walking during long-haul flights, and approximately 30 minutes of walking upon arrival to familiarize oneself with the environment.

date_attribute.weather: Tokyo, Japan: clear skies, crisp autumn weather

2025-12.daily_overview: The journey reached its climax with a full day immersed in Akihabara's ocean of anime, from large chain stores to second-hand shops for treasure hunting. Following a checklist and personal aesthetic, I indulged in purchasing planned items and unexpectedly discovered rare collectibles, filling me with immense satisfaction as a collector. The excitement of shopping led me to skip lunch, resulting in slight dizziness, which subsided after taking a break.

events.name: Akihabara Anime Merchandise Shopping Spree Day
events.description: Spent the entire day visiting the Animate main store, Radio Kaikan, and Mandarake branch stores, searching for older merchandise from "One Piece" and "Jujutsu Kaisen" based on a checklist. Delightfully discovered out-of-print "EVA" models and niche trendy collectibles. After carefully inspecting the condition and comparing prices, cautiously purchased several items, and briefly exchanged thoughts with fellow Chinese enthusiasts on Taobao.

events.name: Theme Restaurant Experience and Energy Replenishment
events.description: Lunch was at the "Demon Slayer" themed restaurant, where we tried the [Sun Breathing Blade] omelet rice and [Nezuko] bamboo tube drink, completing the check-in experience. In the afternoon, we visited the anime floor at Yodobashi Camera to purchase additional popular IP merchandise as gifts.

events.name: Organizing Loot and Online Sharing
events.description: Returning to the hotel in the evening, I laid out the spoils on the bed for inspection and took photos, sharing them via WeChat with toy collector Lin Jing, anime enthusiast Gao Yuan, and my girlfriend Lin Wei, receiving envious reactions. I then briefly planned the route to meet up with Gao Yuan tomorrow.

events.name: Dizziness caused by skipping lunch due to excitement from shopping.
events.description: While shopping in the afternoon, I became so engrossed that I overlooked lunchtime, resulting in mild dizziness. After resting and having a snack at a convenience store, the symptoms subsided. This reminded me to pay attention to maintaining regular eating habits.

起始状态.所处地点: Hotel room near Akihabara, Tokyo, Japan
起始状态.心情: Energetic and eager to immerse oneself in the embrace of Akihabara.

结束状态.所处地点: Hotel room near Akihabara, Tokyo, Japan
结束状态.心情: Extremely satisfied yet slightly fatigued, with shopping desires released, gazing at the collection fills one with a sense of happiness.

state.今日运动: All-day walking and shopping, with over 20,000 steps, indicating an extremely high level of physical activity.

2025-12.daily_overview: The journey transitioned from solo exploration to traveling with friends. Hangzhou anime enthusiast Gao Yuan arrived as promised, and the offline meetup was filled with tacit understanding and excitement. Together, they experienced the cultural impact of a maid café, then collaborated to find rare treasures in a vintage store. Shared interests deepened their friendship and doubled the joy of travel. In the evening, feeling slightly bloated from a bit too much food and drink.

events.name: Rendezvous with Fellow Enthusiasts in Tokyo for Lofty Aspirations
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan waited for Gao Yuan, who was flying in from Hangzhou, at a café near the hotel. This was their first offline meeting, and they quickly became familiar with each other after discussing sourcing and goals. Gao Yuan was introverted but spoke enthusiastically about anime, while Lei Mingxuan shared insights on store operations and experiences from the Shanghai Comic Con.

events.name: In-depth Cultural Experience of Akihabara
events.description: Experience an authentic maid cafe, where you can enjoy themed omelet rice and specialty drinks under the cheerful welcome of the maids. Gao Yuan feels shy, while Lei Mingxuan finds the scene novel and amusing, capturing the anime culture setting with a mobile phone.

events.name: Collaborating with Taobao to Secure Rare Treasures
events.description: In the afternoon, we delved into the back alleys of Akihabara, focusing on small shops specializing in rare vintage items. At an underground store, we worked together to find a set of out-of-print Slam Dunk figurines of the Shohoku High School starting five in excellent condition. Excitedly discussing their market value, Lei Mingxuan purchased them, while Gao Yuan bought complementary merchandise. They agreed to showcase their collections to each other.

events.name: Dinner Discussion and Tomorrow's Plan
events.description: In the evening, we had dinner together at an authentic Japanese ramen shop in Akihabara, chatting about anime industry gossip and work life over the meal. Lei Mingxuan shared his idea of introducing anime collaboration products to the store, while Gao Yuan offered suggestions from a player's perspective. After the meal, we finalized the itinerary for tomorrow's pilgrimage to the sacred sites in Kamakura.

起始状态.所处地点: Hotel room near Akihabara, Tokyo, Japan
起始状态.心情: Looking forward to meeting up with friends and preparing to embark on a two-person exploration mode.

结束状态.所处地点: Hotel room near Akihabara, Tokyo, Japan
结束状态.心情: Joyful and fulfilling, offline friendships deepened, the shared Taobao experience unforgettable.

state.今日运动: Continue high-intensity walking exploration, navigating through the various shops of Akihabara.

2025-12.daily_overview: Temporarily leaving the hustle and bustle of Tokyo behind, I embarked on a pilgrimage to anime holy sites. I captured the classic scene of a train passing by the coast at Kamakura Kōkō-mae Station, strolled through the old streets of the ancient capital to sample local snacks, and shifted the pace of travel from a shopping frenzy to a leisurely and nostalgic rhythm, allowing both body and mind to relax. In the evening, I received my barista certification and began contemplating how to integrate it with a shop.

events.name: Kamakura "Slam Dunk" Holy Land Pilgrimage
events.description: Early in the morning, we took the train to Kamakura and waited at Kamakura Kōkō-mae Station for the classic moment when the Enoshima Electric Railway passes by the coastal crossing. Taking turns, we imitated Sakuragi Hanamichi's pose to take photos and short videos with anime filters. The fresh air along the Shōnan coast made us feel as if we were in a manga.

events.name: Leisurely Stroll and Lunch at Komachi-dori
events.description: Walk to Kamakura Komachi-dori shopping street, savor taiyaki and matcha ice cream, have lunch at a traditional soba noodle restaurant, and experience the leisurely Japanese ambiance of the ancient capital.

events.name: Returning to Tokyo and a Brief Exploration of Ikebukuro
events.description: In the afternoon, they returned to Tokyo, where Gao Yuan bid farewell and headed back to Hangzhou due to personal commitments. Lei Mingxuan proceeded to Ikebukuro, visiting anime-themed shops and the Pokémon Center in Sunshine City to purchase additional Pokémon and Jump series merchandise as gifts for his cousin Shen Jie and other guests.

events.name: Receiving Barista Certification and Planning
events.description: In the evening, I checked my email and received the electronic certificate for the Specialty Coffee Association's Barista Level 1 certification. I took a screenshot and shared it with my family and my girlfriend, Lin Wei, while thinking about how to integrate the foundational knowledge with the beverage section of the shop.

起始状态.所处地点: Hotel room near Akihabara, Tokyo, Japan
起始状态.心情: Lighthearted and joyful, looking forward to the pilgrimage to outdoor holy sites

结束状态.所处地点: Hotel room near Akihabara, Tokyo, Japan
结束状态.心情: Content and slightly nostalgic, the pilgrimage to the sacred site is complete; parting with friends brings reluctance, while being alone offers leisurely ease.

state.今日运动: A long walking tour in Kamakura, including uphill and downhill paths, with moderate but sustained physical activity.

2025-12.daily_overview: On the last day of the trip, I slowed down the pace for a final exploration. I leisurely visited shops I hadn’t examined in detail the day before. In the afternoon, I had a remote discussion with my parents about purchasing a car for the family. In the evening, I enjoyed a quiet dinner alone, organizing my thoughts and packing my luggage in preparation for the return journey. Due to relaxed eating habits, my weight increased slightly.

events.name: Ikebukuro's Otaku Culture Immersion and Free Exploration
events.description: In the morning, I slept in a bit and then headed to Ikebukuro to complete my exploration of Animate Ikebukuro and a small second-hand model shop, casually browsing and picking up a few small figurines. In the afternoon, I relaxed at a manga café, flipping through Japanese original magazines and soaking in the atmosphere of otaku culture.

events.name: Remote consultation with parents regarding family car purchase
events.description: Via video call with parents in Shanghai, we summarized the car test drive experiences, price information, and charging pile restrictions in the new residential area. The whole family had a good impression of domestic new energy vehicle brands and joint-venture hybrid SUVs, but hesitated due to year-end promotional discounts and the large down payment for the property. It was decided to wait for Lei Mingxuan to return to China before making the final decision.

events.name: Packing Before Returning Home and a Leisurely Dinner
events.description: In the evening, I returned to the hotel to preliminarily organize the nine-day haul, wrapping fragile figurines with clothes. I then enjoyed a quiet sushi dinner at the bar of a nearby sushi restaurant alone, reflecting on the rich journey.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed and slightly languid, with the journey nearing its end and a peaceful state of mind.

结束状态.所处地点: Hotel room near Akihabara, Tokyo, Japan
结束状态.心情: Calm and fulfilled, with shopping desires satisfied, I begin to miss my hometown and plan my return journey.

2025-12.daily_overview: Bidding farewell to Tokyo, I embarked on my journey home. In the morning, I completed my last shopping and tax refund procedures, and in the afternoon, I boarded a flight back to Shanghai. After the long flight, I returned home in the evening, sharing my travel souvenirs with my family and placing the figurines into my collection cabinet. The familiar atmosphere of home alleviated the weariness of travel, though I ended up eating a bit more than usual during the family dinner.

events.name: Airport Shopping and Return Journey
events.description: Check out in the morning, take the train to Narita Airport, and purchase Japanese snacks and skincare products at the duty-free shop as gifts for parents, girlfriend, and friends. Complete check-in, baggage drop, and tax refund procedures, then board the afternoon flight back to Shanghai.

events.name: Returning Home to Shanghai and Arranging the Trophies
events.description: Arrived at Pudong Airport in the evening, collected luggage and took a taxi home. Parents prepared home-cooked dishes and waited. After dinner, unboxed anime merchandise and trendy figurines, placed important collectibles in the prime spot of the study room display cabinet, and organized other gifts by category.

events.name: Sharing Journeys and Community Interaction
events.description: WeChat was used to inform Gao Yuan of a safe arrival and to jest [we'll have a rematch next time]. A selection of nine travel photos was posted in a nine-square grid on the Moments feed, captioned [Recharged and full of gains!], receiving likes and comments from Zhao Min, Qian Duoduo, and others. Sharing close-up shots of rare collectibles in a trendy collectibles community sparked lively discussions.

events.name: Communicating with Parents about Family Finances
events.description: Before going to bed, communicate with parents to inform them that the year-end tax documents for the shop have begun to be organized, particularly the receipts for smart home devices in the new house, and inquire about any other expenses or income that need to be included in the family's year-end financial planning.

起始状态.心情: Eager to return home, preparing to end the journey and head back to familiar surroundings.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom, No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Warm and solid, returning home brings peace of mind, and displaying new collections brings a sense of accomplishment.

2025-12.daily_overview: Ending my travels and returning to normal life, I am now fully dedicated to managing the store, handling backlogged orders and customer inquiries. Year-end financial and tax matters are on the agenda, and I have started communicating remotely with my financial advisor to organize receipts. The disorganized data has caused some stress, leading to a slightly late night. As the weather turns colder, the store’s heating is turned on to create a warm environment.

events.name: Full Store Resumption and New Product Pre-launch
events.description: Arriving early at the Century Avenue store, the part-time staff reported on the business operations of the past week. I then began my tasks: cleaning, organizing the shelves, and displaying small accessories brought back from Japan as complimentary gifts. I posted a message in the store’s WeChat group and on my Moments: "Back from sourcing in Japan—rare trendy collectibles and new accessories are now in stock," which attracted inquiries from regular customers online.

events.name: Initiating Tax Inquiry Handling and Document Organization
events.description: During the lunch break, issues encountered while organizing vouchers were sent to financial advisor Xu Feng via WeChat, such as the deduction regulations for smart home expenses in the new house. Xu Feng provided online confirmation and reminded to pay attention to the collection of electronic invoices. Lei Mingxuan archived screenshots of the electronic invoices from his phone into a dedicated folder on the computer.

events.name: Collection of Restored Old Photographs and Digital Finishing
events.description: In the afternoon, I took some time to go to the old photo studio in the city center to retrieve the professionally restored family portrait of my ancestors. In the evening, I returned home and used a scanner to create high-definition scans of the restored photos. The digital files were then integrated into the [Family Album - Ancestors] folder, completing the main part of the entire family album digitization project.

events.name: Stock Investment Mindset Adjustment
events.description: During the evening review of the stock account, after experiencing market fluctuations and discussions with Xu Feng, I have decided to no longer frequently monitor and trade stocks. Instead, I will treat stock investment as a long-term component of family asset allocation, shifting my focus back to store operations and regular fund investments.

events.name: Start organizing the annual sales data for the store.
events.description: I started organizing the annual sales data for the store in the evening. Feeling stressed due to the disorganized data, I plan to complete the task over several days to prepare for the year-end inventory.

events.name: Telephone discussion with supplier Zhou Tao regarding the new order
events.description: Due to travel delays, I discussed the new quarter's fabric orders with Hangzhou supplier Zhou Tao over the phone in the evening to learn about the latest styles and prices, in preparation for next year's spring collection.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New Area, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Returning to normalcy with calmness, preparing to immerse in work with the fulfillment gained from the journey.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study, No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New Area, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Methodical yet slightly stressed, work is being resumed, financial organization is progressing, and the completion of the family memory project brings satisfaction.

state.今日运动: Commuting to and from the store, and performing light physical labor such as organizing shelves in the store.

2025-12.daily_overview: The move is entering the final sprint. Working together with my parents to pack, the home is gradually emptying. At the same time, I am closely advancing the payment process for the new residence, confirming loan details with the bank. A significant change in living space is imminent, and amidst the busyness, there is a sense of anticipation. Due to the fatigue from packing, I went to bed early in the evening.

events.name: Categorization and Packing of Items from the Former Residence
events.description: After the shop closed in the evening, I joined my parents in the old house for a final packing sprint before moving. We sorted and packed personal belongings, furniture, and clothing, labeling each box with the designated room and category. Unneeded old items were disposed of, leaving the living room filled with boxes and a sense of parting lingering in the air.

events.name: Final Confirmation of New Home Loan
events.description: During the day, I communicated with the bank account manager via phone and WeChat to finalize the loan contract terms, disbursement timeline, first repayment date, and follow-up matters. The account manager sent an electronic version of the contract for review.

events.name: Confirm the moving company and make an appointment.
events.description: During the lunch break, compare moving company quotes and service reviews to identify a reputable company and schedule moving services for the morning of December 12th.

events.name: In-depth Review of Health Examination Report
events.description: During a break from packing in the evening, I took out my physical examination report and nutritional recommendations. Combining these with my winter muscle-building goals, I refined my training ideas in my phone's memo app, planning to discuss them in detail with a gym trainer over the weekend.

events.name: Continue organizing the annual sales data for the store.
events.description: I took some time this afternoon to continue organizing the sales data. The progress is more than halfway, and it is expected to be completed tomorrow.

起始状态.心情: Busy and organized, focused on pre-move preparations.

结束状态.所处地点: Living Room, No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Tired but making steady progress, a sense of accomplishment from finishing packing, and a reluctance to part with the old house.

2025-12.daily_overview: A crucial day for paying the down payment on the new home, and the final preparations before moving. Completed large online payments to consolidate finances, and supervised my parents in separately packing fragile and valuable items in the afternoon. The relocation of the home is progressing steadily from financial arrangements to physical preparations. Due to the pressure of the payment, I briefly felt low-spirited, but chatting with my girlfriend helped alleviate the mood.

events.name: Pay the final installment for the new home down payment
events.description: In the morning, log into the online banking system to consolidate household savings funds into the designated account. Use the USB key for verification to transfer the remaining down payment to the developer's supervision account. After the payment is completed, take a screenshot to save the electronic receipt and send it via WeChat to both the developer's sales representative and the bank's account manager for record-keeping.

events.name: Special Packaging for Fragile and Valuable Items
events.description: In the afternoon, Mother carefully wrapped fragile kitchenware, Father's tea set, photo albums, and important documents with bubble wrap, packed them separately, and labeled the boxes with "Handle with Care." Lei Mingxuan securely packed his own trendy toy collection and computer to ensure safe transportation.

events.name: Preparation for Digital Family Photo Album Backup and Display
events.description: In the evening, back up the final organized scanned photo files to the portable hard drive and the home NAS. Select wonderful family portraits and daily life photos to order an electronic photo frame, which will serve as a housewarming gift for parents after the move.

events.name: Preliminary Research on Installing Smart Home Systems for Parents
events.description: Searching for smart home solutions suitable for the elderly before bedtime, focusing on user-friendly smart doorbells and gas alarms, in preparation for installation after moving.

events.name: Complete the organization of annual sales data for the store.
events.description: Completed the organization of sales data at noon, analyzed best-selling styles and seasonal trends to provide reference for next year's procurement.

events.name: Feeling down due to financial pressure and chatting with girlfriend
events.description: In the evening, feeling financial pressure due to making a large down payment, I experienced a brief period of low spirits. I called my girlfriend Lin Wei to confide my worries, and she comforted and supported me, which helped alleviate my mood.

起始状态.所处地点: Home Study, No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Solemn and serious, facing a large payment, with high concentration.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study Room, No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: With a sense of relief and anticipation, the major financial expenditure has been completed, the new home is within reach, and the preparatory work has been meticulous.

2025-12.daily_overview: The day before moving, I unexpectedly received a request to take care of my neighbor's puppy, adding a heartwarming interlude to the busy relocation day. I gladly accepted the task while simultaneously handling year-end account reconciliations for the shop. Life and work intertwined with old ties and new friendships. While caring for the dog, I noticed a loss of appetite and consulted a veterinarian, which put my mind at ease.

events.name: Accepting a neighbor's request to take care of their beloved dog
events.description: Returning home in the evening, my longtime neighbor Auntie Zhu came to seek help as she needed to return to Ningbo for an urgent matter for a week and was worried about her elderly Teddy dog, Dou Dou. Lei Mingxuan received her and learned about Dou Dou's daily habits (walking twice a day in the morning and evening, specific dog food, and avoiding strenuous exercise due to arthritis). Auntie Zhu expressed full trust in him.

events.name: Internal family consultation and obtaining support
events.description: Before agreeing, I consulted my parents, and they liked Doudou and gave their support. I informed my girlfriend Lin Wei via WeChat, and she expressed understanding and support.

events.name: Officially taking over the [Temporary Cat Sitter] assignment
events.description: Readily agreeing to Aunt Zhu's request, she gratefully handed over the dog food, snacks, toys, leash, small bed, and spare keys, then took Lei Mingxuan to familiarize him with her home environment and the places where Doudou often stayed.

events.name: Help Dou Dou Adapt to the New Environment
events.description: After Aunt Zhu left, she took the slightly uneasy Dou Dou back to her own home, patiently comforting him, using snacks to build trust, and preparing water. She then took Dou Dou for his first walk in the alley to familiarize him with the scents and pace.

events.name: Year-end centralized arrangement of financial vouchers
events.description: After settling Dou Dou, I began organizing the year-end tax voucher system in the study, preliminarily sorting paper invoices, receipts, and electronic bills by month and category, and placing them into file folders and computer directories.

events.name: Taking care of Dou Dou and noticing a loss of appetite, consulting a veterinarian.
events.description: During the evening feeding, it was noticed that Doudou had a poor appetite. After consulting with the pet doctor via WeChat, it was learned that this might be normal due to environmental changes, and observation was recommended. Lei Mingxuan felt reassured.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: A typical busy day, preparing for the final day before moving.

结束状态.所处地点: Living Room, No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Warm and full of responsibility, helping the old neighbor brings comfort, and Dou Dou's addition brings more vitality to the night before moving.

state.今日运动: Walking the dog for about 40 minutes in total morning and evening, as well as daily commuting.
