2025-12.daily_overview: A big day for moving into a new home! With the help of a moving company, belongings were smoothly transported from the old alleyway to the new elevator apartment. Lei Mingxuan directed and coordinated the entire process, while his parents were responsible for inventory and supervision. In the evening, the first simple dinner was cooked in the new kitchen, filled with a sense of ritual and warmth for the new life. Due to the exhaustion from moving, they went to bed late.

events.name: Directing Moving and Item Transportation
events.description: The moving company arrived on time early in the morning. Chief Commander Lei Mingxuan communicated with the workers about handling fragile items with care and disassembling the furniture. He directed the items to be carried out and loaded onto the truck, then followed the truck to the new residential area to move them into the new home, roughly placing them in their predetermined positions. The father checked off the large items, while the mother looked after the boxes containing valuable items.

events.name: Taking Care of Doudou and Adapting to the New Environment
events.description: During the moving process, Doudou was settled in a corner of the new home's balcony. During the midday break, Doudou was taken for a walk in the garden of the new residential area to familiarize him with the excretion environment. Doudou was nervous but closely followed Lei Mingxuan.

events.name: First Fire and Dinner in the New Home
events.description: In the evening, the mother used simple kitchenware to cook noodles for the first time in the new kitchen, frying poached eggs and luncheon meat to prepare a simple "housewarming noodle" meal. The family of three, along with Dou Dou, gathered around the not-yet-fully-tidied dining table to enjoy the warm noodles, discussing ideas for room arrangements. Though tired, their faces were filled with smiles.

events.name: Unboxing and Initial Placement of Essentials
events.description: After dinner, I unpacked the [First Night Essentials] box with my parents, made the beds, gathered toiletries, and organized kitchen utensils to ensure a basic, functional living arrangement for the night.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at No. 12, Lane 1589, Zhangyang Road, Pudong New Area, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Nervous, excited, and busy, preparing to face the dual challenges of physical and mental exertion.

结束状态.所处地点: The bedroom in a newly purchased elevator apartment in Pudong New Area, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Extremely exhausted yet immensely satisfied and warm, the move went smoothly, and the first night in the new home was messy but filled with hopeful warmth.

state.今日运动: Extremely high-intensity physical labor, involving all-day carrying, directing, and organizing, with step count far exceeding the daily average.

2025-12.daily_overview: The first full day after moving into the new home, the morning was spent unpacking and organizing to turn the new house back into a living space. In the afternoon, I met with a financial advisor to review the annual tax matters. In the evening, I enjoyed the first formal family dinner prepared by my mother in the new kitchen, celebrating the beginning of a new life. The dinner was slightly more indulgent than usual.

events.name: Complete Unboxing and Organization of the New Home
events.description: The entire family mobilized for unpacking and organizing all day Saturday. Lei Mingxuan was responsible for the study, bedrooms, and heavy-duty tasks, including shelving books and rearranging the display cabinet for trendy collectibles. Father assembled simple furniture and tested electrical appliances. Mother took the lead in restoring order in the kitchen and living room, putting dishes into cabinets and organizing miscellaneous items. Dou Dou curiously wandered through each room.

events.name: Familiarize with the new residential community environment
events.description: After lunch, the whole family took Doudou downstairs for a walk to familiarize themselves with the new residential community. They visited the central garden, children's play area, convenience store, and community activity center, and located the waste sorting drop-off point. The community is well-landscaped and quiet, and the parents are satisfied.

events.name: Annual Tax Interview with Financial Advisor
events.description: In the afternoon, as scheduled, I met with financial advisor Xu Feng at a quiet café in Xuhui District. Xu Feng analyzed preliminary transaction data, taking into account income from self-employment, revenue from the pop-up store in Hangzhou, and the newly purchased property. He provided specific guidance on annual tax settlement and filing, pointed out tax treatment methods for large expenditures such as store renovations and equipment purchases, and recommended improving the documentation chain.

events.name: The First Formal Family Banquet in the New Home
events.description: In the evening, the mother showcased her culinary skills in the new kitchen, preparing classic Shanghai-style braised pork belly, stir-fried seasonal vegetables, and salted pork with bamboo shoots. The family of three gathered around the neatly arranged dining table to enjoy a sumptuous dinner, raising their glasses to celebrate a new chapter in their lives, all in a warm and joyful atmosphere.

events.name: Develop a Schedule for Balancing Dou Dou's Care and Shop Management
events.description: Based on the characteristics of Dou Dou, a senior dog who requires multiple small meals and regular walks, the daily routine has been restructured in consideration of the shop's business hours: Wake up at 7 a.m. to walk the dog, feed before 8 a.m., then head to the shop; return home during the midday low-traffic period for a brief check and short walk; and take a second, longer walk and feed after closing the shop in the evening.

起始状态.所处地点: The bedroom in a newly purchased elevator apartment in Pudong New Area, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Waking up in a new environment that feels both unfamiliar and familiar, filled with the drive to organize and settle in.

结束状态.所处地点: The bedroom in a newly purchased elevator apartment in Pudong New Area, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled, content, and slightly tired, the new home is gradually taking shape. Family gatherings are warm and cozy, and there is great confidence in the future life ahead.

state.今日运动: Continuous household organizing tasks, as well as the daily commute to and from Xuhui District in the afternoon.

2025-12.daily_overview: Father's birthday also marked the first family gathering in our new home. The warm birthday celebration, secretly planned with my mother and girlfriend, proceeded as scheduled. The presence of old workmates and neighbors, along with the carefully prepared gift of a hearing aid, deeply moved my father. The new home was filled with laughter and family affection, symbolizing the deepening of emotional bonds in our new living environment. Due to the abundant food at the birthday feast, there was a slight increase in weight.

events.name: Final Preparations for the Birthday Banquet and Picking Up Doudou
events.description: In the morning, confirmed the reservation for a private room at the local cuisine restaurant via phone call. Reconnected with Father's former colleague and neighbor Auntie Zhu (who has returned from Ningbo) to reconfirm the dinner arrangements. According to the plan, took care of Dou Dou and handed him over to Auntie Zhu at noon upon her return home. Auntie Zhu expressed gratitude and presented Ningbo rice cakes as a token of appreciation.

events.name: Purchasing a birthday gift with my girlfriend.
events.description: In the afternoon, I met up with my girlfriend Lin Wei and went to a professional hearing aid fitting center. Under the guidance of the audiologist, we carefully selected a hearing aid with simple operation and high clarity as a birthday gift for my father, based on the type and degree of his hearing loss. We also learned the basic methods for adjusting and maintaining the device.

events.name: Secret Arrangements and Welcoming Guests
events.description: In the evening, under the pretext of [going out for dinner], we [tricked] my father into leaving the house. We arrived early at the private dining room to meet Lin Wei, the old workmate, and Aunt Zhu. We briefly decorated the room with balloons and a [longevity] character, and hid the gifts.

events.name: Warm Birthday Family Banquet
events.description: The father, completely unaware, was led into the private room to be greeted by the smiling faces of his family and the well-wishes of friends, leaving him pleasantly surprised. During the dinner, they reminisced about the past and chatted about the new home and new life. Lei Mingxuan, on behalf of the whole family, presented a hearing aid as a gift, emotionally expressing gratitude for the father's hard work and sacrifices. The father tried on the hearing aid, and with his hearing noticeably improved, he was deeply moved. The atmosphere was warm and touching.

events.name: Family Time After the Banquet
events.description: After the birthday banquet, as the guests were seen off, the family returned to their new home. The father excitedly tried out his new hearing aid and shared his joy, saying, "I can hear much more clearly now." The family sat on their new sofa, drinking tea and chatting, reflecting on the busy and fulfilling day as well as the changes over the past year. The atmosphere was warm and harmonious.

起始状态.所处地点: Master bedroom in a newly purchased elevator apartment in Pudong New Area, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Anticipating with a hint of excitement, preparing to create a surprise for my father.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room in a newly purchased elevator apartment in Pudong New Area, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Happiness, warmth, and a sense of fulfillment—the birthday celebration was a complete success. My father was delighted, and the family's bond grew even stronger, leaving me feeling immensely satisfied.

2025-12.daily_overview: After the weekend gatherings, life returned to its usual calm on Monday. Routine operations were carried out at the store, while preparations for the year-end inventory count began. In the evening, the previously postponed winter muscle-building training plan was initiated. Under the guidance of a professional coach, the first systematic training session was conducted, injecting new momentum into health goals. Following the training, body weight remained stable due to protein supplementation.

events.name: Store Operations and Year-End Inventory Preparation
events.description: Resuming normal store operations, we have observed that trendy toys and accessories brought back from Japan are popular among young customers. We have begun organizing shelves in preparation for next week's annual comprehensive inventory count, conducting preliminary checks between system inventory data and physical goods on shelves.

events.name: Final Backup and Gift Preparation for Digital Family Photo Albums
events.description: During the lunch break, check the final digital family photo album folder structure to ensure accuracy, then upload it to the family shared cloud drive and inform parents on how to access it. The purchased digital photo frame has been shipped and is expected to arrive in a few days as a formal housewarming gift for parents.

events.name: Launch the Winter Muscle Gain Training Program
events.description: After closing the shop in the evening, I drove to the Yuanshen Sports Center Gym in Pudong to meet with a scheduled personal trainer. Under the coach's guidance, I underwent my first systematic training session: learning proper techniques for foundational strength exercises such as squats and bench presses to prevent injuries, followed by an experience of variable-speed interval running on the treadmill. The training intensity was moderate and targeted. After the session, I recorded the data and muscle soreness in a fitness app.

events.name: Healthy Dinner and Nutritional Supplementation
events.description: After training, return home to eat the protein-rich dinner prepared by my mother (chicken, fish) and drink a glass of milk to provide nutrition for muscle recovery.

events.name: Planning Smart Home Installation
events.description: After finalizing the online order for a smart doorbell and smoke alarm before bed, I scheduled weekend delivery and installation. I plan to personally install these devices for my parents over the weekend to enhance the safety and convenience of their new home.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with the weekend excitement fading away, ready to dive into the work and plans of the new week.

结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled yet slightly fatigued (post-exercise), the initiation of a new training plan brings a sense of positive motivation, and there is clarity regarding the year-end wrap-up tasks.

2025-12.daily_overview: A Tuesday balancing responsibility and planning. Lei Mingxuan fulfilled his promise early in the morning by carefully taking care of his neighbor Aunt Zhu's pet dog "Dou Dou," bringing it to Binjiang Green Space for outdoor activities. In the afternoon, he utilized the intervals while minding the shop to handle his financial tasks, initiating the organization and analysis of the store's annual operational data to lay the groundwork for the year-end review.

events.name: Walking the neighbor's dog
events.description: The store was open on Saturday, and Lei Mingxuan deliberately delayed the opening time by one hour. In the morning, he took his dog, Doudou, to the rollerblading path near the Pudong Riverside, a place where Aunt Zhu often walked her dog. However, with ample time today, he allowed Doudou to run freely and explore a longer distance. Watching Doudou’s excitement, he recalled his own experiences of rollerblading and felt a sense of contentment.

events.name: Daily Store Operations
events.description: In the afternoon, the store's customer flow was steady. Lei Mingxuan asked the staff to help look after the shop for two hours while he took some time to go home. He carefully checked Dou Dou's condition, confirmed that its excrement was normal, and sent a video of Dou Dou playing to his cousin Shen Jie via WeChat, along with the message: [This little one is so full of energy!].

events.name: Preliminary Arrangement of Annual Financial Statements
events.description: After closing the shop in the evening, Lei Mingxuan turned on the computer in the shop's office. He compiled the weekly records of income and expenses from the past few months into an Excel spreadsheet. Using function formulas, he initially summed up the total annual revenue and total costs up to mid-December and calculated the approximate gross profit. Looking at the preliminary summary table generated on the screen, he marked several large procurement expenses that needed further verification.

events.name: Adjust Social Arrangements
events.description: Lei Mingxuan sent a message to cancel the evening billiards game he had originally arranged with his friend Han Dong. [I have to stay home tonight to look after Doudou. Let’s play another day.] He chose to spend the evening at home with his puppy and also took the opportunity to export the inventory system data from his shop to prepare for subsequent analysis.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a hint of responsibility for the new day (and the dog).

结束状态.心情: Enriched and well-organized, the first step of financial consolidation has been completed.

state.今日运动: Take a 40-minute morning walk with the dog.

2025-12.daily_overview: This was a Wednesday filled with observation, consultation, and warm interactions. From monitoring the health of his puppy to making long-term plans for his shop and family, Lei Mingxuan shifted between trivial and important matters, experiencing the steadiness of plans gradually advancing and the satisfaction of closer relationships with his family.

events.name: Focus on the health of the puppy and make adjustments accordingly.
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan noticed that Doudou showed little interest in his dog food and was being somewhat picky. He immediately contacted his experienced cousin Shen Jie via WeChat video call, showing her the dog food and Doudou’s condition through the camera. Following Shen Jie’s advice, he softened the dry kibble slightly with warm water and mixed in a small spoonful of canned chicken, which Doudou particularly enjoyed. Sure enough, the little one ate with great relish. Lei Mingxuan decided not to give any treats for the rest of the day and planned to observe Doudou’s subsequent reactions more closely.

events.name: Financial Consultation Appointment
events.description: Considering the need for comprehensive planning at the end of the year, Lei Mingxuan contacted financial advisor Xu Feng via WeChat to schedule a brief phone consultation. He provided a general overview of his store's operating profits for the current year and expressed his intention to seek advice on personal tax planning and investment directions for the coming year.

events.name: Continue scanning family old photographs (Phase Two)
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Lei Mingxuan continued with the family photo digitization project. This time, he scanned a group photo of his parents from their youth at a factory cultural performance and their simple wedding photo. His mother, Wang Xiuying, spoke with a hint of shyness about how she was introduced to his father back then, and how they gradually became familiar with each other after participating in activities together. His father, Lei Jianguo, also opened up unusually today, adding details about how they saved money by cutting back on expenses to purchase the "Three Rotations and One Sound."

events.name: Family Listening and Summarization
events.description: After dinner, Lei Mingxuan showed his parents the electronic photos he had scanned and preliminarily organized over the past few days. The family gathered on the living room sofa, reminiscing as they looked through the photos. Wang Xiuying was filled with emotion, while Lei Jianguo remarked with satisfaction, "It's good that you're willing to spend time listening to these old stories." Lei Mingxuan felt he had gained a more vivid understanding of his parents' youth and the family's history.

events.name: Advancing Home Intelligence
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan once again demonstrated the convenience of the smart home app to his father. He specifically showed how to set up the "Home Mode" to turn on the lights and air conditioning in the living room and hallway with a single tap, and taught his father to place the shortcut for "Turning the Bedroom Light On/Off" in the most prominent spot on his phone's home screen. Although Lei Jianguo still remarked, "Why use a phone just to turn a light on or off? It's so complicated," his attitude had clearly softened, and he began to watch his son's demonstration attentively. Meanwhile, his mother, Wang Xiuying, listened with keen interest.

events.name: Overtime work to handle orders
events.description: Lei Mingxuan stayed up until 23:30 handling emails and responding to a customer regarding an urgent order inquiry received in the evening, which resulted in him going to bed late.

起始状态.心情: A bit concerned about Doudou's condition, planning to observe and manage it.

结束状态.心情: Warm and content, yet slightly fatigued.

state.今日运动: Walk the dog twice a day, once in the morning and once in the evening, for a total of about 50 minutes.

date_attribute.weather: Light rain turning overcast, temperatures remain low.

2025-12.daily_overview: A Thursday imbued with a sense of farewell and conclusion. The week-long pet-sitting task was successfully completed, deepening neighborhood bonds during the handover; the annual financial review came to an end, providing a clear closure to the shop's yearly operations; the exploration of family history delved into deeper roots, granting Lei Mingxuan a more profound understanding of his identity as a [native of Pudong].

events.name: Complete the task of taking care on behalf of someone.
events.description: Today was the last day of taking care of Doudou. Lei Mingxuan, as he had done in the previous days, completed the morning and evening walks and feeding. In the afternoon, he thoroughly cleaned Doudou's food bowl, water dish, and resting mat. He also organized the brief records of Doudou's diet, excretion, and mental state observed throughout the week into his phone's memo, preparing to hand them over to Shen Jie in the evening.

events.name: Complete the annual financial archiving
events.description: In the shop, Lei Mingxuan organized the annual income and expenditure summary printed yesterday, all original invoices from the entire year (such as purchase orders, rent receipts, etc.), and backup files of electronic records according to chronological order and category. He used a hole punch and a binder to compile them into a volume. He placed this thick financial archive into a dedicated storage box, affixed a label reading "[2025 Business Archive]," and completed this tedious but necessary task.

events.name: Tracing Back Through Family History
events.description: In the evening, the photo scanning continued, this time uncovering an even older album cherished by his father. Inside were blurry black-and-white photos of his grandparents, and even images of his great-grandparents in front of their old house in Pudong and by the farmland. The photos had yellowed with age, and Lei Mingxuan scanned them with great care. His father, Lei Jianguo, stood by, pointing out the relationships between the people in the photos and their approximate time periods. Drawing on the images, Lei Jianguo recounted to his son how the Lei family ancestors had moved to Pudong, transitioning from farming to factory work, and what life was like before Pudong's development.

events.name: A friend's impromptu gathering led to staying up late.
events.description: Childhood friend Zhang Wei made a last-minute invitation for a late-night snack, so Lei Mingxuan relaxed a bit and returned home later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to complete the finishing work.

结束状态.心情: Enriched with a sense of profound rootedness, yet slightly weary.

state.今日运动: Walk the dog twice a day, morning and evening, for a total of about 50 minutes.

2025-12.daily_overview: Friday was a day of return, harvest, and the collision of inspiration. Neighborhood bonds warmed through the return of a puppy and the sharing of local specialties; listening to the history of the maternal family filled gaps in understanding; and an evening gathering of the coffee community unexpectedly sparked Lei Mingxuan's cross-border creative ideas about the future form of his shop.

events.name: Neighborhood Interaction and Deepening Friendship
events.description: In the evening, Aunt Zhu, the neighbor, returned from Ningbo. Lei Mingxuan brought Dou Dou, who was in high spirits after being well cared for, along with the organized [Pet Care Log] and all the supplies, to Aunt Zhu's home. He provided a detailed report on the week of care, including minor incidents and amusing anecdotes about Dou Dou. Seeing Dou Dou in such good condition, Aunt Zhu was deeply moved and insisted on giving him a large box of Yóuzànzi, a local specialty she had brought back from Ningbo. The two chatted for quite a while at the door, discussing Aunt Zhu's travel experiences, and the neighborly relationship grew even closer through their relaxed conversation.

events.name: Listening to Mother's Hometown Memories
events.description: After returning Doudou, Lei Mingxuan went back home to continue his photo scanning project. This time, he worked on the old photos brought by his mother, Wang Xiuying, which depicted her parents (his maternal grandparents) in their hometown of Nantong. After dinner, as they looked at the scanned photos, his mother began to reminisce. She shared detailed stories of her childhood and teenage years in Nantong, as well as how she later married into a family in Shanghai. She recounted the unfamiliarity, hardships, and warmth she experienced while starting a new life in Huangpu District.

events.name: Reminiscence and Anticipation
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan ate the fried dough twists sent by Aunt Zhu while reminiscing about his brief experience of pet-sitting over the past week. He reflected on the patience and responsibility it required, as well as the simple joy brought by Doudou. He shared this experience and his feelings with his girlfriend Lin Wei via WeChat, half-jokingly saying, "If we ever settle down ourselves in the future, having a dog might not be a bad idea."

events.name: Coffee Community Year-End Gathering and Inspiration Germination
events.description: Lei Mingxuan attended a year-end gathering organized by a coffee community at a specialty café in Xuhui, Shanghai. In the relaxed atmosphere, he met a coffee plantation owner from Yunnan. The two engaged in an in-depth discussion on coffee cultivation, processing techniques, and the plantation’s "coffee + tourism" operational model. The story shared by the plantation owner, which deeply intertwined product experience with lifestyle, greatly inspired Lei Mingxuan. Reflecting on his travels to western Sichuan earlier in the year and his store’s "urban outdoor" style positioning, a vague yet exciting idea suddenly came to his mind: perhaps his store could evolve into more than just a clothing retailer in the future—it could become a small "waystation" integrating apparel, coffee experiences, and travel sharing.

起始状态.心情: Relax, the neighborhood task is about to be completed.

结束状态.心情: Excited and full of imagination, feeling that new possibilities have been discovered.

state.今日运动: Walking the dog back and evening stroll

2025-12.daily_overview: A Saturday filled with intellectual stimulation. The cross-disciplinary inspiration from the previous night continued to ferment during the day, as Lei Mingxuan proactively gathered information, gradually giving shape to the initially vague concepts. Meanwhile, practical matters such as the shop's Christmas season operations and year-end contract renewal negotiations were also advancing in parallel, intertwining idealism with pragmatism.

events.name: Organizing Cross-Border Inspiration
events.description: After waking up, Lei Mingxuan still had the conversations from last night's coffee gathering echoing in his mind. He took out his notebook and wrote down the suddenly emerging concept keyword, "[Wanderer's Lodge]," and began to expand his thoughts around it: How could he integrate clothing retail, premium coffee experiences, outdoor travel elements, and even his collection of trendy toys? Who would be the target audience? How much space would be needed? He created a new memo on his phone and started jotting down these scattered ideas.

events.name: Creating a Christmas Atmosphere in the Store
events.description: In the afternoon at the store, Lei Mingxuan and the staff made final preparations for the upcoming Christmas shopping season. They updated the window displays, hung Christmas lights and small decorations, and played light holiday music in the store to create a warm and inviting shopping atmosphere.

events.name: Prepare for store renewal.
events.description: During a lull in customer flow at the store, Lei Mingxuan organized the business data and customer flow analysis reports from the past two years in the small office at the back of the shop. He drafted a list of key points to discuss during the lease renewal negotiations next year, including expectations for rent adjustments, support for mall marketing activities, and a tentative idea—a preliminary proposal for renovating the store to add a small coffee corner.

events.name: Preliminary Research on Coffee Equipment
events.description: After closing for the night, Lei Mingxuan did not go home immediately. He stayed in the shop and began searching for information on small commercial coffee machines, grinders, and other equipment using his computer and phone. He browsed several professional forums and e-commerce platforms, initially recording the performance parameters and prices of different brands and models to create a rough comparison table, giving him a basic understanding of the potential equipment investment.

events.name: Temporary fitness plan put on hold
events.description: Originally planned to exercise in the afternoon, but canceled due to the shop being busy.

起始状态.心情: Filled with curiosity and a desire to explore, I want to sort out the inspiration from last night.

结束状态.心情: Busy yet with a clear goal, feeling like paving the way for an interesting idea.

2025-12.daily_overview: A warm Sunday centered around family and social connections. Major family financial decisions were temporarily postponed after rational discussions; the housewarming party for the new home was filled with joy; Lei Mingxuan felt a deep sense of accomplishment as his parents transitioned from acceptance to genuine fondness for smart home technology; and the cross-industry vision for the future store continued to evolve through pragmatic research.

events.name: Family Meeting: Decision to Purchase a Car Temporarily Postponed
events.description: In the morning, Lei Mingxuan and his parents held a family discussion regarding the previously considered purchase of a new energy vehicle. Taking into account factors such as potential year-end car purchase discounts possibly being less favorable than those in the coming year, the family’s recent substantial expenditure on a new home, and uncertainties surrounding the installation of charging stations in their residential community, the family rationally analyzed the situation and collectively decided to postpone the car purchase plan. They agreed to continue observing market trends and policy changes in the first half of 2026.

events.name: Housewarming gathering
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan invited several close relatives and friends, including his childhood friend Zhang Wei and cousin Shen Jie, to his new home in Pudong for a small housewarming party. Everyone brought practical gifts such as potted plants and tableware. They chatted while enjoying snacks in the bright new living room, sharing the joy of moving into a new home. Shen Jie was full of praise for the interior design style of the new house.

events.name: The Convenient Experience Brought by Smart Homes
events.description: When Lei Mingxuan returned home for dinner in the evening, his mother Wang Xiuying had already turned on the living room air conditioner in advance using an app, so he was greeted by a warm and cozy atmosphere as soon as he entered. At the dinner table, his parents shared their experiences of using smart devices over the past week: his mother found it particularly convenient and safe to use voice commands to turn on the lights when getting up at night, while his father had also started trying to control the TV with voice commands. Listening to them, Lei Mingxuan felt a sense of accomplishment, realizing that technology had genuinely improved his parents' quality of life.

events.name: Deepen the Coffee Corner Concept
events.description: After the relatives and friends had left, Lei Mingxuan continued to study coffee equipment in his study. He conducted a more detailed comparison of the equipment information he had organized the previous night and began estimating the initial investment costs, including renovation and raw materials. He discovered that if he only set up a small coffee bar in the corner of his existing shop, the initial investment did not seem as unattainable as he had imagined.

起始状态.所处地点: Living Room of the New Home
起始状态.心情: Relax and look forward to gathering with family and friends.

结束状态.心情: Content and at ease, with a harmonious family atmosphere and personal plans steadily advancing.

2025-12.daily_overview: A busy and productive Monday. From tracing the historical roots of his family lineage to meticulously planning a personal romantic evening, from crucial business negotiations determining the store's future for the coming year to in-depth exchanges with important clients and potential partners, Lei Mingxuan fully demonstrated his ESTP-driven action-oriented approach and social finesse throughout the day.

events.name: Complete the scanning of old family photos.
events.description: Lei Mingxuan finished scanning the last batch of old family photographs. These yellowed and even damaged photos recorded traces of the Lei family's life in Pudong from earlier times. The narration by his father, Lei Jianguo, brought these static images to life. In the evening, Lei Mingxuan conducted preliminary categorization and backup of all the scanned digital photos on his computer according to the family lineage, feeling that he had completed a meaningful cultural archiving task.

events.name: Make a restaurant reservation for a Christmas Eve date.
events.description: During the lunch break, Lei Mingxuan used a mobile app to carefully book a highly-rated Italian restaurant in the city center, securing a window seat for Christmas Eve. He specifically noted that it was for an anniversary date.

events.name: Formal Meeting with the Mall Property Manager
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan held a formal meeting with Zheng Kai, the property manager of Century Link Mall, in the property management office. The two parties discussed the core terms for the renewal of the 2026 lease contract. Lei Mingxuan not only expressed expectations for rent adjustments but also formally proposed for the first time the idea of renovating the store to add a coffee corner, inquiring about the relevant property approval process and compliance requirements. Zheng Kai expressed support for the store’s upgrade plan and promised to provide assistance while ensuring compliance.

events.name: Regular Customer Shopping and In-depth Tea Conversation
events.description: Shortly after the meeting, Qian Duoduo, a regular customer and friend, arrived at the store as scheduled to select new outfits for a Christmas party. Lei Mingxuan recommended several seasonal flagship styles based on her preferences. Qian Duoduo was very satisfied after trying them on. After the transaction was completed, the two sat down for tea in the newly established lounge area of the store. Qian Duoduo shared some year-end anecdotes from the MCN industry, while Lei Mingxuan discussed his concept of the [Wanderer's Post]. Qian Duoduo showed great interest upon hearing this and proactively offered to help connect with some lifestyle bloggers for potential collaborative store visits.

events.name: Meeting Minutes Compilation and Conceptual Refinement
events.description: After closing the shop in the evening, Lei Mingxuan organized the meeting minutes based on the key points discussed with Zheng Kai in the afternoon and sent them via email for confirmation. Meanwhile, drawing from his conversation with Qian Duoduo, he began to conceptualize the spatial layout sketch of the coffee corner in greater detail and contemplated how to integrate the concept of this "post station" with online promotion efforts.

events.name: Sports Recovery Training
events.description: I took some time in the afternoon to go to the gym for a 30-minute jog to get back in shape.

起始状态.心情: Methodically prepare for the important meeting.

结束状态.心情: Efficient and hopeful, the business negotiations proceeded smoothly, and new ideas received positive feedback.

2025-12.daily_overview: Tuesday continued the rhythm of high efficiency and creative inspiration. Handling substantial orders from regular customers brought immediate performance satisfaction; exchanges with friends from different circles provided multi-dimensional feedback for cross-boundary ideas; the process of selecting a gift for my girlfriend was filled with anticipation; and consultations on supply chain and design resources brought the concept of [Wanderer's Inn] one step closer from an idea to an executable plan.

events.name: Finalize and prepare team custom orders
events.description: Lei Mingxuan received a customization inquiry from his regular client Feng Xiaoyu regarding team uniforms and souvenirs for her company in Suzhou. Through detailed phone and WeChat communication, he gathered information on the team size, budget, style preferences, and LOGO requirements. He promptly contacted suppliers Zhou Tao and Wu Fang to confirm the feasibility of fabrics and accessories. After consolidating the details, he prepared a comprehensive quotation and design renderings, which he sent to Feng Xiaoyu. Following a second round of communication and minor adjustments, the order was finalized, representing a substantial total value.

events.name: Discussing Cross-Border Concepts with Friends
events.description: At noon, Lei Mingxuan invited his childhood friend Zhang Wei and university classmate Zhao Min to a meal at a local Shanghainese restaurant. During the meal, he excitedly shared his cross-border concept for the [Wanderer's Inn]. Zhang Wei raised some practical questions from the perspectives of the market and consumers, while Zhao Min, who works in the fashion exhibition industry, offered numerous creative ideas regarding spatial design and event planning.

events.name: Selecting Christmas Gifts for Girlfriend
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan took advantage of an opportunity to handle business in another area of the shopping mall to carefully select a necklace with a simple yet thoughtful design as a Christmas gift for his girlfriend Lin Wei, and requested the shop assistant to wrap it exquisitely.

events.name: Consulting on Coffee Supply Chain and Design Resources
events.description: Upon returning to the shop, Lei Mingxuan contacted Zhou Tao, a long-term supplier, via WeChat to inquire about procurement channels for high-quality coffee beans, milk, and other raw materials. At the same time, he also reached out to Qian Duoduo, a regular customer who also serves as a designer resource, to ask if there were any potential collaborations or recommended designers who could assist with the preliminary conceptual design of the coffee corner.

events.name: Share progress with family
events.description: During dinner at home that evening, Lei Mingxuan shared with his parents the positive progress made in communicating with the property management, as well as his idea of introducing a coffee corner as part of the shop's upgrade. Although his parents were somewhat concerned about venturing into a completely unfamiliar field, they expressed their support upon seeing their son's enthusiasm and well-thought-out plan.

events.name: Stress leads to staying up late.
events.description: Due to order details and planning considerations, Lei Mingxuan stayed up until the early hours of the morning to handle work.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward, there are several important and interesting matters to attend to.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room of the new home
结束状态.心情: Fulfilled and inspired, yet somewhat fatigued.

2025-12.daily_overview: A warm and romantic Christmas Eve. The day's work and training proceeded as usual, building up energy for the important evening date. Dinner with my girlfriend Lin Wei was not only an emotional exchange but also a beautiful vision of our shared life in the future. Exchanging gifts and planning trips, this night was filled with sweetness and promises.

events.name: Periodic Fitness Review
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan went to the gym as usual for his winter muscle-building and endurance training. Based on his recent training data, his personal trainer conducted a periodic review and made slight adjustments to the weight loads for strength training and the pace for interval running. Lei Mingxuan felt that his core strength had indeed improved, his breathing was smoother during running, and he felt more confident in persisting to achieve his half-marathon goal.

events.name: Romantic Date on Christmas Eve
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan arrived punctually at the reserved Italian restaurant to have dinner with his girlfriend Lin Wei. The restaurant exuded a warm and romantic atmosphere, and under the candlelight, the two shared moments from the past year—from work challenges to amusing anecdotes in life—with laughter echoing throughout.

events.name: Gift Exchange and Emotional Expression
events.description: During dessert, the two exchanged carefully prepared gifts. Lei Mingxuan presented a necklace, while Lin Wei gave him a limited-edition trendy collectible figurine. Through these gifts, they expressed their feelings for each other and reflected on the journey of their relationship gradually stabilizing and deepening over the past year.

events.name: Planning a Shared Vacation
events.description: As the dinner drew to a close, the two enthusiastically discussed the upcoming New Year's Day holiday. They tentatively decided on a plan to go skiing in a nearby city and began discussing whether to drive or take the high-speed train, as well as accommodation options, looking forward to the trip together.

events.name: Sending my girlfriend home.
events.description: After the date, Lei Mingxuan took a taxi to send Lin Wei home. In the car, the two continued their relaxed conversation, bringing a perfect end to this warm and romantic Christmas Eve. Lei Mingxuan felt that their relationship had entered a new stage—stable, deepening, and beginning to involve concrete plans for the future.

起始状态.心情: Calmness tinged with anticipation for the evening date.

结束状态.所处地点: On the Way Home / New Home
结束状态.心情: Happy, content, and full of anticipation for the future

2025-12.daily_overview: A Christmas filled with familial warmth and a sense of year-end reflection. Sharing dinner with my parents and discussing insights from exploring our family history has strengthened our bonds. Meanwhile, year-end wrap-up tasks are progressing smoothly, from preparing for store inventory checks to scheduling investment reviews and drafting preliminary reports on cross-disciplinary ideas.

events.name: Family Christmas Dinner and Reflections Sharing
events.description: On Christmas evening, the family of three enjoyed dinner together in their new home. Lei Mingxuan shared his reflections from scanning old photos and listening to his parents' stories during this period, expressing gratitude for his parents' hard work and a renewed understanding of [family] and [legacy]. His parents were deeply moved upon hearing this, with his mother Wang Xiuying's eyes growing slightly moist and his father Lei Jianguo patting his son on the shoulder. The family atmosphere was warm and harmonious.

events.name: Prepare year-end inventory
events.description: During the day at the store, Lei Mingxuan prepared for the year-end inventory count scheduled to begin the following evening. He organized the entire year's purchase orders, printed out the system's inventory list, and checked whether tools such as barcode scanners and label papers were fully prepared to ensure the inventory count could proceed efficiently.

events.name: Schedule Year-End Financial Review
events.description: Lei Mingxuan contacted financial manager Xu Feng via WeChat to formally schedule the year-end financial review meeting, informing him that he had already prepared recent performance data for his fund and stock accounts.

events.name: Preliminary Draft on the Feasibility of "Wanderer's Inn"
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan systematically organized the equipment costs, spatial sketches, supply chain information from the past few days of research, as well as feedback obtained from friends. He drafted a preliminary feasibility study report for the [Wanderer's Inn] on his computer, briefly analyzing its advantages, potential risks, and investment return period, and listing action recommendations for further in-depth research in the next steps.

起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy the tranquility of the holiday morning.

结束状态.心情: A warm heart and a clear mind, with a sense of fulfillment in both family and career.

2025-12.daily_overview: Friday marked the commencement of the annual inventory count. After the store closed, Lei Mingxuan immersed himself in the meticulous yet crucial task of stocktaking. Concurrently, the digitalization project for family history entered a new phase, expanding from scanning physical photographs to sifting through a vast collection of digital images. Fitness served as a necessary respite following the intense mental exertion.

events.name: Commence Year-End Inventory Count (Part One)
events.description: After the store closed for the evening, Lei Mingxuan began the year-end inventory count. He cross-referenced the purchase orders and system data, conducting a thorough check of all clothing items in the store (including tops, pants, jackets, etc.) by scanning and counting them one by one. He recorded the actual inventory quantities and compared them with the system’s book records. Though the process was tedious, it required full concentration. It took him nearly three hours to complete the inventory count for the main clothing categories, and he noted several minor discrepancies.

events.name: Select Digital Family Photos
events.description: During the quiet afternoon hours at the shop, Lei Mingxuan connected a portable hard drive to the computer and browsed through a large collection of digital photos taken over the past few years with his phone and camera. He selected clear and representative family portraits, photos of his parents in their new home, and images documenting every corner of the new house, preparing materials for the subsequent creation of a family digital photo album.

events.name: Persist in Winter Training
events.description: Before closing the shop in the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan went to the gym and completed his daily training plan. Despite having inventory to take care of in the evening, he insisted on finishing his workout, believing that sweating would help clear his mind and better handle the tedious tasks later that night.

events.name: Taking Stock of Staying Up Late
events.description: Due to the heavy workload of inventory, Lei Mingxuan stayed up late until the early hours of the morning to complete it.

起始状态.心情: Calm, knowing there is a tough battle to fight tonight.

结束状态.心情: Tired but fulfilled, having completed a significant portion of the inventory count.

state.今日运动: One hour of gym training in the afternoon.

2025-12.daily_overview: On a chilly Saturday, work continued to progress toward year-end closure. The inventory count moved into the more meticulous phase of accessories; an online meeting with the financial advisor outlined adjustments for the coming year's investments; while the process of combining digital photos with parents' recollections infused the organization of family memories with warmth and emotion.

events.name: Continue Year-End Inventory Count (Part Two)
events.description: After closing for the night, Lei Mingxuan continued with the inventory work, this time focusing on accessories, ornaments, and the [City Corners] themed series products. These small items, with their diverse categories and large quantities, required more meticulous attention during the counting process. He carefully inspected the condition of each item and recorded several samples that showed minor flaws due to prolonged display.

events.name: Recalling Stories with Parents Through Digital Photos
events.description: Returning home early in the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan took his laptop and, together with his parents in the living room, viewed the digital family photos he had selected. He asked his parents to share stories behind some recent photos, such as a family dinner or a walk in the park, and noted down key details in his phone's memo app. As they looked at the images of themselves and their new home, his parents' faces were filled with contented smiles.

events.name: Year-End Investment Review and Adjustment Meeting
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan held an online video conference with his financial manager, Xu Feng. Xu Feng provided a detailed analysis of market changes, interpreted the performance of each fund held by Lei Mingxuan, and offered professional adjustment recommendations. Lei also shared his experience from experimenting with a stock trading account, expressing that stock investments were too demanding on his time and energy. He decided to continue focusing on regular fund investments as the core strategy, with the stock account retained only as an experimental field.

events.name: Preliminary Analysis of Annual Sales Data
events.description: After the meeting, Lei Mingxuan did not leave the store immediately. He opened the sales system and began to preliminarily organize the annual sales data, focusing on the sales performance of different themed areas (such as the [Urban Outdoor] corner). He also paid special attention to the sales data from the live streaming channel, feeling that the online growth momentum was indeed strong.

events.name: Sports event canceled due to rain.
events.description: The originally planned outdoor run was canceled due to rainy weather and replaced with indoor rest.

起始状态.心情: Steady, knowing there is still much finishing work to be done.

结束状态.心情: The thinking has become clearer, and both the financial and operational directions are now more defined.

state.今日运动: None (due to rainy weather and inventory work)

2025-12.daily_overview: Sunday was a day of significant progress on multiple year-end tasks. The family photo digitization project was successfully completed; the shop's annual financial data was compiled and calculated, revealing a crucial profit growth driver—online live streaming; the financial adjustment plan also began implementation. All of this is laying a solid foundation for planning the new year.

events.name: Complete photo digitization and preliminary organization
events.description: Lei Mingxuan performed the final categorization, renaming, and backup of all scanned old photos and selected digital photos on his computer. Based on his parents' accounts, he added brief textual notes to many of the photos. In the evening, he presented this preliminary [digital family album] to his parents, expressing gratitude for their sharing. He felt that he had finally gained a clear outline of his family's origins and history.

events.name: Summarize and Calculate Annual Business Data
events.description: After completing all physical inventory counts, Lei Mingxuan began consolidating the annual financial data. He aggregated the monthly bank statements and various cost receipts, using spreadsheets to calculate the total annual revenue, total costs, and the final net profit. Looking at the final figure displayed on the screen, he breathed a long sigh of relief.

events.name: Key Business Findings
events.description: During the computational analysis process, Lei Mingxuan conducted an in-depth comparison of online and offline data. He clearly observed that although his father's illness had impacted store operations in the first half of the year, the sales generated through online live streaming in the second half not only quickly compensated for the shortfall but also achieved a significantly higher profit margin compared to offline retail. This discovery greatly encouraged him, and he immediately highlighted it in the executive summary of the report.

events.name: Execute Investment Adjustment
events.description: According to the plan agreed upon with Xu Feng the previous day, Lei Mingxuan logged into his fund trading account, executed profit-taking operations on some funds, set up new fixed investment instructions, and completed the adjustment of his year-end investment strategy.

events.name: Morning Run Recovery Training
events.description: I went for a 30-minute jog this morning and felt my condition improving.

起始状态.心情: The goal is clear, ready to complete several important closing tasks.

结束状态.心情: Filled with a sense of accomplishment and the joy of insight, a clear path to growth has been revealed.

state.今日运动: Morning run for 30 minutes

2025-12.daily_overview: Monday was spent on delivery, research, and planning. Successfully delivered the project and received the final payment for a large order, adding a finishing touch to the annual performance. The research on [Wanderer's Lodge] expanded from online case studies to on-site visits, making the ideas more concrete. The annual financial data was reviewed and verified without errors, and preliminary key points for next year's business plan were outlined. Shared the plan with my girlfriend and received intimate support.

events.name: Complete team order delivery and deepen cooperation
events.description: The custom-ordered goods from Feng Xiaoyu's company have successively arrived in Shanghai. Lei Mingxuan carefully inspected the quality of the finished products and the effect of the logos. After confirming that everything was correct, he arranged for the shipment to Suzhou. In the evening, he received the final payment for the order from Feng Xiaoyu. Lei Mingxuan not only sent detailed garment care instructions but also proactively offered that if the company has future needs for team-building photography, he could recommend a cooperative photographer and provide a discount, expressing gratitude and seeking to deepen the collaboration.

events.name: In-depth Study of Composite Space Cases
events.description: During idle moments at the shop during the day, Lei Mingxuan systematically researched successful composite space cases combining [clothing + coffee] or [trendy toys + coffee] both domestically and internationally. He browsed industry websites and Xiaohongshu, focusing on their business models and spatial designs, and organized useful links and ideas into a notes document.

events.name: On-site inspection and survey
events.description: After closing the shop in the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan did not go directly home. He drove to emerging commercial districts such as Qiantan in Pudong for on-site scouting, observing foot traffic, the atmosphere of the business area, and rental rates. He also took photos with his phone of some storefronts or spaces he considered promising, contemplating the feasibility of establishing a [Courier Station].

events.name: Review Data and Formulate Key Points of Annual Planning
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan conducted a cross-verification of the previous day's annual financial data to ensure accuracy. Based on data insights (high online profit margins) and recent inspiration (cross-border integration), he drafted preliminary planning points for 2026 in his notebook: [Focus on online live streaming and collaborations with bloggers], [Conduct in-depth research and pilot a coffee corner], [Strengthen the urban outdoor theme area].

events.name: Sharing Future Plans with Girlfriend
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan had a video call with his girlfriend Lin Wei via WeChat, where he elaborated in detail on his upgrade plan for the store next year, particularly the idea of introducing a coffee corner and lifestyle elements. Lin Wei was very supportive after hearing it and even offered some interesting suggestions from the perspective of a female consumer.

起始状态.心情: Be pragmatic, there are several key tasks to be accomplished.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and well-directed, with smooth order processing, clear planning, and support from a loved one.

state.今日运动: An on-site walking survey of approximately one hour in the evening.

2025-12.daily_overview: On the second-to-last day of the year, the theme was extensive consultation and information integration. Lei Mingxuan leveraged his network to seek advice from friends and classmates across various fields, gathering multi-dimensional information on market, operations, and target demographics for the concept of [Wanderer's Inn]. Meanwhile, the materials for the family photo album were finalized and backed up, and personal financial records were updated accordingly.

events.name: Consultation on Online Operations and Traffic Generation
events.description: Lei Mingxuan conducted an in-depth consultation via WeChat voice call with Wang Lei, a university classmate who works as a product manager in Hangzhou. He primarily sought advice on online community operations, mini-program mall development, and how to leverage internet tools to attract traffic to offline composite spaces and enhance user engagement. Wang Lei shared many practical tools and case studies.

events.name: Consult on the preferences of the young customer segment
events.description: Lei Mingxuan consulted with Gao Yuan, an anime enthusiast working in the gaming industry in Hangzhou, to understand the preferences and consumption habits of young trendy toy and anime fans regarding offline spaces, as well as how to create themed spaces that foster a sense of community belonging. From the perspective of a fellow enthusiast, Gao Yuan provided many insightful and professional opinions.

events.name: Consulting on Retail Trends and Consumer Psychology
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan arranged to have dinner with his cousin Shen Jie, a fashion buyer based in Shanghai. At the restaurant, he consulted Shen Jie on the latest trends in offline retail space design, consumption scenarios combining coffee and clothing, and listened to her professional analysis of the consumer psychology of the target demographic (urban young white-collar workers).

events.name: Complete the final organization and backup of family photo album materials.
events.description: After returning home, Lei Mingxuan copied all the photo materials designated for the digital album production—including scanned old photos and selected original digital files—onto a dedicated external hard drive for final backup. He also established a clear folder structure on his computer. The physical photo albums and loose photos were organized and returned to their original places.

events.name: Update personal financial records
events.description: Before going to bed, Lei Mingxuan updated the adjusted investment portfolio information into his personal financial records and briefly noted the insights from this year-end financial review to prepare for the financial planning of the coming year.

events.name: Adjusting sleep schedule by going to bed early.
events.description: To prepare for New Year's Eve, Lei Mingxuan deliberately went to bed early.

起始状态.心情: Actively open-minded, ready to learn from friends.

结束状态.心情: The information is immense yet highly rewarding, further broadening one's train of thought.

2025-12.daily_overview: On the last day of 2025, the time was spent in warmth, reflection, and anticipation. A carefully crafted digital photo album was presented to my parents as a New Year's gift, strengthening family bonds through shared memories. I compiled the research information on [Wanderer's Rest] and formulated a detailed plan for the next phase. Meanwhile, I continued to study and consult with marketing experts, accumulating insights and energy for the upcoming upgrade of the store.

events.name: Gifting a Family Digital Photo Album as a New Year Present
events.description: On New Year's Eve, during the family dinner, Lei Mingxuan presented his parents with a tablet pre-installed with the [Digital Family Album] app as a New Year's gift. He meticulously designed the album's cover page and table of contents, and wrote heartfelt words of gratitude and blessings for his parents. The parents were both surprised and deeply moved. The family happily browsed through the electronic album together, reminiscing about the past.

events.name: Summarize Research Information and Develop a Detailed Plan
events.description: In the afternoon, Lei Mingxuan compiled and organized the information gathered from online consultations (Wang Lei, Gao Yuan, Shen Jie) and on-site observations over the past few days. In his notebook, he sketched out preliminary ideas for the potential positioning of the new store, a profile of the core target customer base, and the required functional area divisions. He also developed a more detailed research plan for the first quarter of 2026, including suppliers requiring in-depth consultation and specific locations planned for site visits.

events.name: Continuous Learning and Information Searching
events.description: Utilizing fragmented time, Lei Mingxuan continued to systematically search for information on [lifestyle concept stores], [live streaming equipment solutions for small shops], and [cross-industry collaboration cases] via his laptop and mobile phone, bookmarking numerous valuable articles and video links.

events.name: Consult Marketing Strategy Experts
events.description: In the evening, Lei Mingxuan met with his university classmate and marketing planner Zhao Min at a café. He elaborated in detail on his complete ideas for upgrading his store, focusing on consulting about the positioning of a collective store, cross-industry collaboration resources, and how to plan an engaging pre-opening or renovation promotional event. Drawing on her exhibition experience, Zhao Min provided several creative directions and contact information for potential partners.

events.name: Celebrating the New Year Remotely with My Girlfriend
events.description: In the evening, Lin Wei had a family gathering, so the two did not spend New Year's Eve together. However, they made a video call around the stroke of midnight, wishing each other "Happy New Year" and briefly sharing their hopes for the coming year. Lei Mingxuan felt that even though they were apart, their hearts remained closely connected.

起始状态.心情: A sense of year-end ritualism and anticipation for the future permeates the tranquility.

结束状态.心情: Satisfactory, filled with gratitude and hope, it drew a satisfying conclusion to the year 2025.
